One_CD historical_JJ authority_NN present_VBZ laborious_JJ and_CC circuitous_JJ testimony_NN tending_VBG to_TO arouse_VB suspicion_NN that_CS Massachusetts_NP wa_BEDZ behind_IN the_AT cloud_NNS settling_VBG down_RP on_IN the_AT embattled_VBN Gorton_NP ._. Under_IN Fosdick_NP the_AT first_OD executive_NN officer_NN of_IN the_AT CTCA_NN wa_BEDZ Richard_NP Byrd_NP ,_, whose_WP$ name_NN in_IN late_JJR year_NNS wa_BEDZ to_TO become_VB synonymous_JJ with_IN activity_NNS at_IN the_AT polar_JJ antipode_NNS ._. From_IN the_AT point_NN of_IN view_NN of_IN popularity_NN the_AT best-known_JJT member_NN of_IN the_AT Commission_NN wa_BEDZ Walter_NP Camp_NP ,_, the_AT Yale_NP athlete_NN whose_WP$ sobriquet_NN wa_BEDZ ``_`` the_AT father_NN of_IN American_JJ football_NN ''_'' ._. The_AT CTCA_NN distributed_VBD a_AT khaki-bound_JJ songbook_NN that_WPS provided_VBD the_AT impetus_NN for_IN spirited_JJ rendition_NNS of_IN the_AT selection_NNS found_VBN therein_RB ,_, plus_CC a_AT number_NN of_IN others_NNS whose_WP$ lyric_NNS were_BED more_QL earthy_JJ --_-- from_IN ``_`` Johnny_NP Get_VB Your_PP$ Gun_NN ''_'' to_IN ``_`` Keep_VB The_AT Home_NN Fires_NNS Burning_VBG ''_'' to_IN ``_`` Mademoiselle_NN From_IN Armentieres_NP ''_'' ._. In_IN the_AT imagination_NN of_IN the_AT nineteenth_OD century_NN the_AT Greek_JJ tragedian_NNS and_CC Shakespeare_NP stand_VB side_NN by_IN side_NN ,_, their_PP$ affinity_NN transcending_VBG all_ABN the_AT immense_JJ contrariety_NNS of_IN historical_JJ circumstance_NN ,_, religious_JJ belief_NN ,_, and_CC poetic_JJ form_NN ._. We_PPSS no_QL longer_RBR use_VB the_AT particular_JJ term_NNS of_IN Lessing_NP and_CC Victor_NP Hugo_NP ._. But_CC we_PPSS abide_VB by_IN their_PP$ insight_NN ._. The_AT word_NN ``_`` tragedy_NN ''_'' encloses_VBZ for_IN u_PPO in_IN a_AT single_AP span_NN both_ABX the_AT Greek_JJ and_CC the_AT Elizabethan_JJ example_NN ._. The_AT sense_NN of_IN relationship_NN overreaches_VBZ the_AT historical_JJ truth_NN that_CS Shakespeare_NP may_MD have_HV known_VBN next_IN to_IN nothing_PN of_IN the_AT actual_JJ work_NNS of_IN Aeschylus_NP ,_, Sophocles_NP ,_, and_CC Euripides_NP ._. It_PPS transcends_VBZ the_AT glaring_VBG fact_NN that_CS the_AT Elizabethans_NPS mixed_VBD tragedy_NN and_CC comedy_NN whereas_CS the_AT Greeks_NPS kept_VBD the_AT two_CD mode_NNS severely_QL distinct_JJ ._. It_PPS overcomes_VBZ our_PP$ emphatic_JJ awareness_NN of_IN the_AT vast_JJ difference_NN in_IN the_AT shape_NN and_CC fabric_NN of_IN the_AT two_CD language_NNS and_CC style_NNS of_IN dramatic_JJ presentation_NN ._. Sturley_NP wrote_VBD to_IN Quiney_NP that_CS Sir_NP Edward_NP ``_`` gave_VBD his_PP$ allowance_NN and_CC liking_NN thereof_RB ,_, and_CC affied_VBD unto_IN u_PPO his_PP$ best_JJT endeavour_NN ,_, so_CS that_CS his_PP$ right_NNS be_BE preserved_VBN ''_'' ,_, and_CC that_CS ``_`` Sir_NP Edward_NP saith_VBZ we_PPSS shall_MD not_* be_BE at_IN any_DTI fault_NN for_IN money_NN for_IN prosecuting_VBG the_AT cause_NN ,_, for_IN himself_PPL will_MD procure_VB it_PPO and_CC lay_VB it_PPO down_RP for_IN u_PPO for_IN the_AT time_NN ''_'' ._. Greville_NP proposed_VBD Quiney_NP a_CS the_AT fit_JJT man_NN ``_`` for_IN the_AT following_NN of_IN the_AT cause_NN and_CC to_TO attend_VB him_PPO in_IN the_AT matter_NN ''_'' ,_, and_CC at_IN his_PP$ suggestion_NN the_AT corporation_NN allowed_VBD Quiney_NP two_CD shilling_NNS a_AT day_NN ._. ``_`` If_CS you_PPSS can_MD firmly_RB make_VB the_AT good_JJ knight_NN sure_JJ to_TO pleasure_VB our_PP$ Corporation_NN ''_'' ,_, Sturley_NP wrote_VBD ,_, ``_`` besides_IN that_DT ordinary_JJ allowance_NN for_IN your_PP$ diet_NN you_PPSS shall_MD have_HV 20_CD for_IN recompence_NN ''_'' ._. In_IN his_PP$ letter_NN mentioning_VBG Shakespeare_NP on_IN January_NP 24_CD ,_, 1597/8_CD ,_, Sturley_NP asked_VBD Quiney_NP especially_RB that_CS ``_`` theare_EX might_MD (_( be_BE )_) bi_IN Sir_NP Ed._NP Grev._NP some_DTI meanes_NNS made_VBN to_IN the_AT Knightes_NNS of_IN the_AT Parliament_NN for_IN an_AT ease_NN and_CC discharge_NN of_IN such_JJ tax_NNS and_CC subsedies_NNS wherewith_WRB our_PP$ towne_NN is_BEZ like_JJ to_TO be_BE charged_VBN ,_, and_CC I_PPSS assure_VB u_PPO I_PPSS am_BEM in_IN great_JJ feare_NN and_CC doubte_NN bi_IN no_AT meanes_NNS hable_JJ to_TO paie_VB ._. Sir_NP Ed._NP Gre._NP is_BEZ gonne_VBN to_IN Brestowe_NP and_CC from_IN thence_RB to_IN Lond._NP a_CS I_PPSS heare_VB ,_, who_WPS verie_QL well_RB knoweth_VBZ our_PP$ estate_NNS and_CC wil_MD be_BE willinge_JJ to_TO do_DO u_PPO ani_DTI good_NN ''_'' ._. The_AT knight_NNS for_IN Warwickshire_NP in_IN this_DT parliament_NN ,_, which_WDT ended_VBD it_PP$ session_NN on_IN February_NP 9_CD ,_, were_BED Fulke_NP Greville_NP (_( the_AT poet_NN )_) and_CC William_NP Combe_NP of_IN Warwick_NP ,_, a_CS Fulke_NP Greville_NP and_CC Edward_NP Greville_NP had_HVD been_BEN in_IN 1593_CD ._. The_AT corporation_NN voted_VBD on_IN September_NP 27_CD ,_, 1598_CD ,_, that_CS Quiney_NP should_MD ride_VB to_IN London_NP about_IN the_AT suit_NN to_IN Sir_NP John_NP Fortescue_NP ,_, chancellor_NN of_IN the_AT Exchequer_NN ,_, for_IN discharging_VBG of_IN the_AT tax_NN and_CC subsidy_NN ._. He_PPS had_HVD been_BEN in_IN London_NP for_IN several_AP week_NNS when_WRB he_PPS wrote_VBD to_IN Shakespeare_NP on_IN October_NP 25_CD ._. Sturley_NP on_IN November_NP 4_CD answered_VBD a_AT letter_NN from_IN Quiney_NP written_VBN on_IN October_NP 25_CD which_WDT imported_VBD ,_, wrote_VBD Sturley_NP ,_, ``_`` that_CS our_PP$ countriman_NN Mr._NP Wm._NP Shak._NP would_MD procure_VB u_PPO monei_NN :_: which_WDT I_PPSS will_MD like_VB of_IN a_CS I_PPSS shall_MD heare_VB when_WRB ,_, wheare_WRB &_CC howe_WRB :_: and_CC I_PPSS prai_VB let_VB not_* go_VB that_DT occasion_NN if_CS it_PPS mai_MD sort_VB to_IN ani_DTI indifferent_JJ condicions_NNS ._. Allso_RB that_CS if_CS monei_NN might_MD be_BE had_HVN for_IN 30_CD or_CC 40_CD a_AT lease_NN &_CC might_MD be_BE procured_VBN ''_'' ._. Sturley_NP quoted_VBD Quiney_NP a_CS having_HVG written_VBN on_IN November_NP 1_CD that_CS if_CS he_PPS had_HVD ``_`` more_AP monei_NN presente_RB much_AP might_MD be_BE done_VBN to_TO obtaine_VB our_PP$ Charter_NN enlargd_VBN ,_, ij_NIL faires_NIL more_NIL ,_, with_IN tole_NN of_IN corne_NN ,_, bestes_NNS ,_, and_CC sheepe_NNS ,_, and_CC a_AT matter_NN of_IN more_AP valewe_NN then_CS all_ABN that_DT ''_'' ._. Sturley_NP thought_VBD that_CS this_DT matter_NN might_MD be_BE ``_`` the_AT rest_NN of_IN the_AT tithe_NNS and_CC the_AT College_NN house_NNS and_CC landes_NNS in_IN our_PP$ towne_NN ''_'' ._. He_PPS suggested_VBD offering_VBG half_NN to_IN Sir_NP Edward_NP ,_, fearing_VBG lest_CS ``_`` he_PPS shall_MD thinke_VB it_PPO to_QL good_JJ for_IN u_PPO and_CC procure_VB it_PPO for_IN himselfe_PPL ,_, a_CS he_PPS served_VBD u_PPO the_AT last_AP time_NN ''_'' ._. This_DT refers_VBZ to_IN what_WDT had_HVD happened_VBN after_CS the_AT Earl_NN of_IN Warwick_NP died_VBD in_IN 1590_CD ,_, when_WRB the_AT town_NN petitioned_VBD Burghley_NP for_IN the_AT right_NN to_TO name_VB the_AT vicar_NN and_CC schoolmaster_NN and_CC other_AP privilege_NNS but_CC Greville_NP bought_VBD the_AT lordship_NN for_IN himself_PPL ._. Sturley's_NP$ allusion_NN probably_RB explains_VBZ why_WRB Greville_NP took_VBD out_RP the_AT patent_NN in_IN the_AT name_NNS of_IN Best_NP and_CC Wells_NP ,_, for_CS Sir_NP Anthony_NP Ashley_NP described_VBD Best_NP a_CS ``_`` a_AT scrivener_NN within_IN Temple_NN Bar_NN ,_, that_WPS deal_VBZ in_IN many_AP matter_NNS for_IN my_PP$ L._NP Essex_NP ''_'' through_IN Sir_NP Gelly_NP Merrick_NP ,_, especially_RB in_IN ``_`` cause_NNS that_WPO he_PPS would_MD not_* be_BE known_VBN of_IN ''_'' ._. Adrian_NP Quiney_NP wrote_VBD to_IN his_PP$ son_NN Richard_NP on_IN October_NP 29_CD and_CC again_RB perhaps_RB the_AT next_AP day_NN ,_, since_CS the_AT bearer_NN of_IN the_AT letter_NN ,_, the_AT bailiff_NN ,_, wa_BEDZ expected_VBN to_TO reach_VB London_NP on_IN November_NP 1_CD ._. In_IN his_PP$ second_OD letter_NN the_AT old_JJ mercer_NN advised_VBD his_PP$ son_NN ``_`` to_TO bye_VB some_DTI such_JJ warys_NNS a_CS yow_PPSS may_MD selle_VB presentlye_RB with_IN profet_NN ._. Yff_CS yow_PPSS bargen_VB with_IN Wm._NP Sha._NP (_( so_RB in_IN the_AT MS_NN )_) or_CC Receave_VB money_NN ther_RB or_CC brynge_VB your_PP$ money_NN home_NR yow_PPSS maye_MD see_VB howe_WRB knite_VBN stockynges_NNS be_BE sold_VBN ther_RB y_BEZ gret_JJ byinge_NN of_IN them_PPO at_IN Aysshom_NP ._. Wherefore_WRB I_PPSS thynke_VB yow_PPSS maye_MD doo_DO good_RB yff_CS yow_PPSS can_MD have_HV money_NN ''_'' ._. This_DT seems_VBZ to_TO refer_VB ,_, not_* to_IN the_AT loan_NN Richard_NP had_HVD asked_VBN for_IN ,_, but_CC to_IN a_AT proposed_VBN bargain_NN with_IN Shakespeare_NP ._. Richard_NP Quiney_NP the_AT young_JJR ,_, a_AT schoolboy_NN of_IN eleven_CD ,_, wrote_VBD a_AT letter_NN in_IN Latin_NP asking_VBG his_PP$ father_NN to_TO buy_VB copybook_NNS (_( ``_`` chartaceos_JJ libellos_NNS )_) ''_'' )_) for_IN him_PPO and_CC his_PP$ brother_NN ._. His_PP$ mother_NN Bess_NP ,_, who_WPS could_MD not_* write_VB herself_PPL ,_, reminded_VBD her_PP$ husband_NN through_IN Sturley_NP to_TO buy_VB the_AT apron_NN he_PPS had_HVD promised_VBN her_PPO and_CC ``_`` a_AT suite_NN of_IN hattes_NNS for_IN 5_CD boy_NNS the_AT yongst_JJT lined_VBN &_CC trimmed_VBN with_IN silke_NN ''_'' (_( for_IN John_NP ,_, only_RB a_AT year_NN old_JJ )_) ._. A_AT letter_NN signed_VBN ``_`` Isabell_NP Bardall_NP ''_'' entreated_VBD ``_`` Good_JJ Cozen_NN ''_'' Quiney_NP to_TO find_VB her_PP$ stepson_NN Adrian_NP ,_, son_NN of_IN George_NP Bardell_NP ,_, a_AT place_NN in_IN London_NP with_IN some_DTI handicraftsman_NN ._. Baker_NP wrote_VBD :_: ``_`` I_PPSS tooke_VBD order_NN with_IN Sr._NP E._NP Grevile_NP for_IN the_AT payment_NN of_IN Ceartaine_JJ monei_NN beefore_IN his_PP$ going_VBG towardes_IN London_NP ._. &_CC synce_CS I_PPSS did_DOD write_VB unto_IN him_PPO to_TO dessier_VB him_PPO to_TO paie_VB 10_CD for_IN mee_PPO which_WDT standeth_VBZ mee_PPO greatly_RB uppon_IN to_TO have_HV paide_VBN ._. &_CC 20_CD more_AP Mr._NP Peeter_NP Rowswell_NP tooke_VBD order_NN with_IN his_PP$ master_NN to_TO paie_VB for_IN mee_PPO ''_'' ._. He_PPS asked_VBD Quiney_NP to_TO find_VB out_RP whether_CS the_AT money_NN had_HVD been_BEN paid_VBN and_CC ,_, if_CS not_* ,_, to_TO send_VB to_IN the_AT lodging_NN of_IN Sir_NP Edward_NP and_CC entreat_VB him_PPO to_TO pay_VB what_WDT he_PPS owed_VBD ._. Baker_NP added_VBD :_: ``_`` I_PPSS pray_VB you_PPSS delivre_VB these_DTS inclosed_VBN Letters_NNS And_CC Comend_VB mee_PPO to_IN Mr._NP Rychard_NP Mytton_NP whoe_WPS I_PPSS know_VB will_MD ffreind_VB mee_PPO for_IN the_AT payment_NN of_IN this_DT monei_NN ''_'' ._. Further_JJR letter_NNS in_IN November_NP mention_VB that_CS Sir_NP Edward_NP paid_VBD forty_CD pound_NNS ._. Stratford's_NP$ petition_NN to_IN the_AT queen_NN declared_VBD that_CS two_CD great_JJ fire_NNS had_HVD burnt_VBN two_CD hundred_CD house_NNS in_IN the_AT town_NN ,_, with_IN household_NN good_NNS ,_, to_IN the_AT value_NN of_IN twelve_CD thousand_CD pound_NNS ._. The_AT chancellor_NN of_IN the_AT Exchequer_NN wrote_VBD on_IN the_AT petition_NN :_: ``_`` in_IN myn_PP$ opinion_NN it_PPS is_BEZ very_QL resonable_JJ and_CC conscionable_JJ for_CS hir_PP$ maiestie_NN to_TO graunt_VB in_IN relief_NN of_IN this_DT towne_NN twise_RB afflicted_VBN and_CC almost_RB wasted_VBN by_IN fire_NN ''_'' ._. The_AT queen_NN agreed_VBD on_IN December_NP 17_CD ,_, a_AT warrant_NN wa_BEDZ signed_VBN on_IN January_NP 27_CD ,_, and_CC the_AT Exchequer_NN paid_VBD Quiney_NP his_PP$ expense_NNS on_IN February_NP 27_CD ,_, 1598/9_CD ._. He_PPS listed_VBD what_WDT he_PPS had_HVD spent_VBN for_IN ``_`` My_PP$ own_JJ diet_NN in_IN London_NP eighteen_CD week_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT I_PPSS wa_BEDZ sick_JJ a_AT month_NN ;_. ;_. my_PP$ mare_NN at_IN coming_VBG up_RP 14_CD day_NNS ;_. ;_. another_DT I_PPSS bought_VBD there_RB to_TO bring_VB me_PPO home_NR 7_CD week_NNS ;_. ;_. and_CC I_PPSS wa_BEDZ six_CD day_NNS going_VBG thither_RB and_CC coming_VBG homewards_RB ;_. ;_. all_ABN which_WDT cost_VBD me_PPO at_IN the_AT least_AP 20_CD pound_NNS ''_'' ._. He_PPS wa_BEDZ allowed_VBN forty-four_CD pound_NNS in_IN all_ABN ,_, including_IN fee_NNS to_IN the_AT master_NNS of_IN request_NNS ,_, Mr._NP Fanshawe_NP of_IN the_AT Exchequer_NN ,_, the_AT solicitor_NN general_NN ,_, and_CC other_AP official_NNS and_CC their_PP$ clerk_NNS ._. If_CS he_PPS borrowed_VBD money_NN from_IN Shakespeare_NP or_CC with_IN his_PP$ help_NN ,_, he_PPS would_MD now_RB have_HV been_BEN able_JJ to_TO repay_VB the_AT loan_NN ._. Since_CS more_AP is_BEZ known_VBN about_IN Quiney_NP than_CS about_IN any_DTI other_AP acquaintance_NN of_IN Shakespeare_NP in_IN Stratford_NP ,_, his_PP$ career_NN may_MD be_BE followed_VBN to_IN it_PP$ sudden_JJ end_NN in_IN 1602_CD ._. He_PPS wa_BEDZ in_IN London_NP ``_`` searching_VBG record_NNS for_IN our_PP$ town's_NN$ cause_NNS ''_'' in_IN 1600_CD with_IN young_JJ Henry_NP Sturley_NP ,_, the_AT assistant_JJ schoolmaster_NN ._. When_WRB Sir_NP Edward_NP Greville_NP enclosed_VBD the_AT town_NN common_NN on_IN the_AT Bancroft_NP ,_, Quiney_NP and_CC others_NNS leveled_VBD his_PP$ hedge_NNS on_IN January_NP 21_CD ,_, 1600/1_CD ,_, and_CC were_BED charged_VBN with_IN riot_NN by_IN Sir_NP Edward_NP ._. He_PPS also_RB sued_VBD them_PPO for_IN taking_VBG toll_NN of_IN grain_NN at_IN their_PP$ market_NN ._. Accompanied_VBN by_IN ``_`` Master_NN Greene_NP our_PP$ solicitor_NN ''_'' (_( Thomas_NP Greene_NP of_IN the_AT Middle_JJ Temple_NN ,_, Shakespeare's_NP$ ``_`` cousin_NN ''_'' )_) ,_, Quiney_NP tried_VBD to_TO consult_VB Sir_NP Edward_NP Coke_NP ,_, attorney_NN general_NN ,_, and_CC gave_VBD money_NN to_IN a_AT clerk_NN and_CC a_AT doorkeeper_NN ``_`` that_CS we_PPSS might_MD have_HV access_NN to_IN their_PP$ master_NN for_IN his_PP$ counsel_NN butt_CC colde_MD nott_* have_HV him_PPO att_IN Leasure_NN by_IN the_AT reason_NN of_IN thees_DTS trobles_NNS ''_'' (_( the_AT Essex_NP rising_VBG on_IN February_NP 8_CD )_) ._. He_PPS set_VBD down_RP that_CS ``_`` I_PPSS gave_VBD Mr._NP Greene_NP a_AT pynte_NN of_IN muskadell_NN and_CC a_AT roll_NN of_IN bread_NN that_DT last_AP morning_NN I_PPSS went_VBD to_TO have_HV his_PP$ company_NN to_IN Master_NN Attorney_NN ''_'' ._. After_CS returning_VBG Stratford_NP he_PPS drew_VBD up_RP a_AT defense_NN of_IN the_AT town's_NN$ right_NN to_TO toll_VB corn_NN and_CC the_AT office_NN of_IN collecting_VBG it_PPO ,_, and_CC his_PP$ list_NN of_IN suggested_VBN witness_NNS included_VBD his_PP$ father_NN and_CC Shakespeare's_NP$ father_NN ._. No_AT one_PN ,_, he_PPS wrote_VBD ,_, took_VBD any_DTI corn_NN of_IN Greville's_NP$ ,_, for_CS his_PP$ bailiff_NN of_IN husbandry_NN ``_`` swore_VBD a_AT greate_JJ oathe_NN thatt_CS who_WPS soe_RB came_VBD to_TO put_VB hys_PP$ hande_NN into_IN hys_PP$ sackes_NNS for_IN anye_DTI corne_NN shuld_MD leave_VB hys_PP$ hande_NN behynde_IN hym_PPO ''_'' ._. Quiney_NP wa_BEDZ in_IN London_NP again_RB in_IN June_NP ,_, 1601_CD ,_, and_CC in_IN November_NP ,_, when_WRB he_PPS rode_VBD up_RP ,_, a_CS Shakespeare_NP must_MD often_RB have_HV done_VBN ,_, by_IN way_NN of_IN Oxford_NP ,_, High_JJ Wycombe_NP ,_, and_CC Uxbridge_NP ,_, and_CC home_NR through_IN Aylesbury_NP and_CC Banbury_NP ._. After_CS Quiney_NP wa_BEDZ elected_VBN bailiff_NN in_IN September_NP ,_, 1601_CD ,_, without_IN Greville's_NP$ approval_NN ,_, Greene_NP wrote_VBD him_PPO that_CS Coke_NP had_HVD promised_VBN to_TO be_BE of_IN counsel_NN for_IN Stratford_NP and_CC had_HVD advised_VBN ``_`` that_CS the_AT office_NN of_IN bayly_NN may_MD be_BE exercised_VBN a_CS it_PPS is_BEZ taken_VBN upon_IN you_PPO ,_, (_( Sr._NP Edwardes_NP his_PP$ consent_NN not_* beinge_BEG hadd_HVN to_IN the_AT swearinge_NN of_IN you_PPO )_) ''_'' ._. Asked_VBN by_IN the_AT townsman_NNS to_TO cease_VB his_PP$ suit_NN ,_, Greville_NP had_HVD answered_VBN that_CS ``_`` hytt_PPS shulde_MD coste_VB hym_PPO 500_CD first_RB &_CC sayed_VBD it_PPS must_MD be_BE tried_VBN ether_DTX before_IN my_PP$ Lorde_NN Anderson_NP in_IN the_AT countrey_NN or_CC his_PP$ uncle_NN Ffortescue_NP in_IN the_AT exchequer_NN with_IN whom_WPO he_PPS colde_MD more_RBR prevaile_VB then_CS we_PPSS ''_'' ._. The_AT corporation_NN proposed_VBD Chief_JJS Justice_NN Anderson_NP for_IN an_AT arbiter_NN ,_, sending_VBG him_PPO a_AT gift_NN of_IN sack_NN and_CC claret_NN ._. Lady_NN Greville_NP ,_, daughter_NN of_IN the_AT late_JJ Lord_NN Chancellor_NN Bromley_NP and_CC niece_NN of_IN Sir_NP John_NP Fortescue_NP ,_, wa_BEDZ offered_VBN twenty_CD pound_NNS by_IN the_AT townsman_NNS to_TO make_VB peace_NN ;_. ;_. she_PPS ``_`` labored_VBD &_CC thought_VBD she_PPS shuld_MD effecte_VB ''_'' it_PPO but_CC her_PP$ husband_NN said_VBD that_CS ``_`` we_PPSS shuld_MD wynne_VB it_PPO by_IN the_AT sworde_NN ''_'' ._. His_PP$ servant_NN Robin_NP Whitney_NP threatened_VBD Quiney_NP ,_, who_WPS had_HVD Whitney_NP bound_VBN to_IN ``_`` the_AT good_JJ abaringe_NN ''_'' to_TO keep_VB the_AT peace_NN ._. A_AT report_NN of_IN Sr._NP Edw_NP Grevyles_NP$ minaces_NNS to_IN the_AT Baileefe_NN Aldermen_NNS &_CC Burgesses_NNS of_IN Stratforde_NP ''_'' tell_VBZ how_WRB Quiney_NP wa_BEDZ injured_VBN by_IN Greville's_NP$ men_NNS :_: ``_`` in_IN the_AT tyme_NN Mr._NP Ryc'_NP Quyney_NP wa_BEDZ bayleefe_NN ther_EX came_VBD some_DTI of_IN them_PPO whoe_WPS beinge_BEG druncke_JJ fell_VBD to_IN braweling_VBG in_IN ther_PP$ host_NN$ howse_NN wher_WRB thei_PPSS druncke_VBD &_CC drewe_VBD ther_PP$ dagers_NNS uppon_IN the_AT hoste_NN :_: att_IN a_AT faier_JJ tyme_NN the_AT Baileefe_NN being_BEG late_RB abroade_RB to_TO see_VB the_AT towne_NN in_IN order_NN &_CC comminge_VBG by_RB in_IN hurley_NN burley_NN came_VBD into_IN the_AT howse_NN &_CC commawnded_VBD the_AT peace_NN to_TO be_BE kept_VBN butt_CC colde_MD nott_* prevayle_VB &_CC in_IN hys_PP$ endevor_NN to_TO sticle_VB the_AT brawle_NN had_HVD his_PP$ heade_NN grevouselye_RB brooken_VBN by_IN one_CD of_IN hys_PP$ (_( Greville's_NP$ )_) men_NNS whom_WPO nether_DTX hymselfe_PPL (_( Greville_NP )_) punnished_VBD nor_CC wolde_MD suffer_VB to_TO be_BE punnished_VBN but_CC with_IN a_AT shewe_NN to_TO turne_VB them_PPO awaye_RB &_CC enterteyned_VBN agayne_RB ''_'' ._. The_AT fall_NN of_IN Rome_NP ,_, the_AT discovery_NN of_IN precious_JJ metal_NNS ,_, and_CC the_AT Protestant_JJ Reformation_NN were_BED all_ABN link_NNS and_CC could_MD only_RB be_BE explained_VBN and_CC understood_VBN by_IN comprehending_VBG the_AT link_NNS that_WPS preceded_VBD and_CC those_DTS that_WPS followed_VBD ._. Often_RB the_AT historian_NN must_MD consider_VB the_AT use_NN of_IN intuition_NN or_CC instinct_NN by_IN those_DTS individual_NNS or_CC nation_NNS which_WDT he_PPS is_BEZ studying_VBG ._. Unconsciously_RB ,_, government_NNS or_CC race_NNS or_CC institution_NNS may_MD enter_VB into_IN some_DTI undertaking_NN without_IN fully_RB realizing_VBG why_WRB they_PPSS are_BER doing_VBG so_RB ._. They_PPSS react_VB in_IN obedience_NN to_IN an_AT instinct_NN or_CC urge_NN which_WDT ha_HVZ itself_PPL been_BEN impelled_VBN by_IN natural_JJ law_NN ._. A_AT court_NN may_MD strike_VB down_RP a_AT law_NN on_IN the_AT basis_NN of_IN an_AT intuitive_JJ feeling_NN that_CS the_AT law_NN is_BEZ inimical_JJ to_IN the_AT numerical_JJ majority_NN ._. A_AT nation_NN may_MD go_VB to_IN war_NN on_IN some_DTI trifling_VBG pretext_NN ,_, when_WRB in_IN reality_NN it_PPS may_MD have_HV been_BEN guided_VBN by_IN an_AT unconscious_JJ instinct_NN that_CS it_PP$ very_AP life_NN wa_BEDZ at_IN stake_NN ._. When_WRB the_AT historian_NN encounter_VBZ a_AT situation_NN in_IN which_WDT he_PPS can_MD perceive_VB no_AT visible_JJ cause_NN and_CC effect_NN sequence_NN ,_, he_PPS should_MD be_BE alert_JJ to_IN intuition_NN and_CC unconscious_JJ instinct_NN a_CS possible_JJ guide_NNS ._. Adams_NP firmly_RB contended_VBD that_CS the_AT historian_NN must_MD never_RB underrate_VB the_AT impact_NN of_IN the_AT geographical_JJ environment_NN on_IN history_NN ._. Here_RB wa_BEDZ another_DT indispensable_JJ tool_NN ._. Indeed_RB ,_, he_PPS concluded_VBD that_CS ``_`` geographical_JJ condition_NNS have_HV exercised_VBN a_AT great_JJ ,_, possibly_RB a_AT preponderating_VBG ,_, influence_NN over_IN man's_NN$ destiny_NN ''_'' ._. The_AT failure_NN of_IN Greece_NP to_TO reach_VB the_AT imperial_JJ destiny_NN that_CS Periclean_JJ Athens_NP had_HVD seemed_VBN to_TO promise_VB wa_BEDZ almost_QL directly_RB attributable_JJ to_IN her_PP$ physical_JJ conformation_NN ._. All_ABN area_NNS of_IN history_NN were_BED either_CC favorably_RB or_CC adversely_RB affected_VBN by_IN the_AT geographical_JJ environment_NN ,_, and_CC no_AT respectable_JJ historian_NN could_MD pursue_VB the_AT study_NN of_IN history_NN without_IN a_AT thorough_JJ knowledge_NN of_IN geography_NN ._. Another_DT powerful_JJ factor_NN in_IN the_AT European_JJ movement_NN wa_BEDZ the_AT threat_NN of_IN Soviet_NP aggression_NN ._. The_AT Communist_JJ coup_NN in_IN Czechoslovakia_NP in_IN 1948_CD wa_BEDZ followed_VBN immediately_RB by_IN the_AT conclusion_NN of_IN the_AT Brussels_NP Treaty_NN ,_, a_AT 50-year_JJ alliance_NN among_IN Britain_NP ,_, France_NP and_CC the_AT Benelux_NP country_NNS ._. And_CC of_IN course_NN the_AT Soviet_NP threat_NN wa_BEDZ responsible_JJ for_IN NATO_NN ,_, the_AT grand_JJ alliance_NN of_IN the_AT Atlantic_JJ nation_NNS ._. Loans_NNS to_IN small_JJ business_NN SBA_NN make_VBZ loan_NNS to_IN individual_JJ small_JJ business_NN firm_NNS ,_, providing_VBG them_PPO with_IN financing_VBG when_WRB it_PPS is_BEZ not_* otherwise_RB available_JJ through_IN private_JJ lending_VBG source_NNS on_IN reasonable_JJ term_NNS ._. Many_AP such_JJ loan_NNS have_HV been_BEN made_VBN to_TO establish_VB small_JJ concern_NNS or_CC to_TO aid_VB in_IN their_PP$ growth_NN ,_, thereby_RB contributing_VBG substantially_RB to_IN community_NN development_NN program_NNS ._. Loan_NN policy_NNS SBA_NP loan_NNS ,_, which_WDT may_MD be_BE made_VBN to_IN small_JJ manufacturer_NNS ,_, small_JJ business_NN pool_NNS ,_, wholesaler_NNS ,_, retailer_NNS ,_, service_NN establishment_NNS and_CC other_AP small_JJ business_NNS (_( when_WRB financing_VBG is_BEZ not_* otherwise_RB available_JJ to_IN them_PPO on_IN reasonable_JJ term_NNS )_) ,_, are_BER to_TO finance_VB business_NN construction_NN ,_, conversion_NN ,_, or_CC expansion_NN ;_. ;_. the_AT purchase_NN of_IN equipment_NN ,_, facility_NNS ,_, machinery_NN ,_, supply_NNS ,_, or_CC material_NNS ;_. ;_. or_CC to_TO supply_VB working_VBG capital_NN ._. Evidence_NN that_CS other_AP source_NNS of_IN financing_VBG are_BER unavailable_JJ must_MD be_BE provided_VBN ._. Types_NNS of_IN loan_NNS SBA_NP business_NN loan_NNS are_BER of_IN two_CD type_NNS :_: ``_`` participation_NN ''_'' and_CC ``_`` direct_JJ ''_'' ._. Participation_NN loan_NNS are_BER those_DTS made_VBN jointly_RB by_IN the_AT SBA_NN and_CC bank_NNS or_CC other_AP private_JJ lending_VBG institution_NNS ._. Direct_JJ loan_NNS are_BER those_DTS made_VBN by_IN SBA_NN alone_RB ._. To_TO qualify_VB for_IN either_DTX type_NN of_IN loan_NN ,_, an_AT applicant_NN must_MD be_BE a_AT small_JJ business_NN or_CC approved_VBN small_JJ business_NN ``_`` pool_NN ''_'' and_CC must_MD meet_VB certain_JJ credit_NN requirement_NNS ._. A_AT small_JJ business_NN is_BEZ defined_VBN a_CS one_CD which_WDT is_BEZ independently_RB owned_VBN and_CC operated_VBN and_CC which_WDT is_BEZ not_* dominant_JJ in_IN it_PP$ field_NN ._. In_IN addition_NN ,_, the_AT SBA_NN us_VBZ such_JJ criterion_NNS a_CS number_NN of_IN employee_NNS and_CC dollar_NN volume_NN of_IN the_AT business_NN ._. Credit_NN requirement_NNS The_AT credit_NN requirement_NNS stipulate_VB that_CS the_AT applicant_NN must_MD have_HV the_AT ability_NN to_TO operate_VB the_AT business_NN successfully_RB and_CC have_HV enough_AP capital_NN in_IN the_AT business_NN so_CS that_CS ,_, with_IN loan_NN assistance_NN from_IN the_AT SBA_NN ,_, it_PPS will_MD be_BE able_JJ to_TO operate_VB on_IN a_AT sound_JJ financial_JJ basis_NN ._. A_AT proposed_VBN loan_NN must_MD be_BE for_IN sound_JJ purpose_NNS or_CC sufficiently_RB secured_VBN so_CS a_CS to_TO assure_VB a_AT reasonable_JJ chance_NN of_IN repayment_NN ._. The_AT record_NN of_IN past_AP earnings_NNS and_CC prospect_NNS for_IN the_AT future_NN must_MD indicate_VB it_PPS ha_HVZ the_AT ability_NN to_TO repay_VB the_AT loan_NN out_IN of_IN current_JJ and_CC anticipated_VBN income_NN ._. Loan_NN amount_NN The_AT amount_NN which_WDT may_MD be_BE borrowed_VBN from_IN the_AT SBA_NN depends_VBZ on_IN how_WQL much_AP is_BEZ required_VBN to_TO carry_VB out_RP the_AT intended_VBN purpose_NN of_IN the_AT loan_NN ._. The_AT maximum_JJ loan_NN which_WDT SBA_NN may_MD make_VB to_IN any_DTI one_CD borrower_NN is_BEZ $350,000_NNS ._. Business_NN loan_NNS generally_RB are_BER repayable_JJ in_IN regular_JJ installment_NNS --_-- usually_RB monthly_RB ,_, including_IN interest_NN at_IN the_AT rate_NN of_IN 5-1/2_CD percent_NN per_IN annum_NN on_IN the_AT unpaid_JJ balance_NN --_-- and_CC have_HV a_AT maximum_JJ maturity_NN of_IN 10_CD year_NNS ;_. ;_. the_AT term_NN of_IN loan_NNS for_IN working_VBG capital_NN is_BEZ 6_CD year_NNS ._. To_IN cooperative_NNS The_AT Farm_NN Credit_NN Administration_NN ,_, an_AT independent_JJ agency_NN located_VBN within_IN the_AT Department_NN of_IN Agriculture_NN ,_, supervises_VBZ and_CC coordinate_VBZ a_AT cooperative_JJ credit_NN system_NN for_IN agriculture_NN ._. The_AT system_NN is_BEZ composed_VBN of_IN three_CD credit_NN service_NNS ,_, Federal_JJ Land_NN Banks_NNS and_CC National_JJ Farm_NN Loan_NN Associations_NNS ,_, Federal_JJ Intermediate_JJ (_( short-term_NN )_) Credit_NN Banks_NNS ,_, and_CC Banks_NNS for_IN Cooperatives_NNS ._. This_DT system_NN provides_VBZ long-_JJ and_CC short-term_NN credit_NN to_IN farmer_NNS and_CC their_PP$ cooperative_JJ marketing_NN ,_, purchasing_VBG ,_, and_CC business_NN service_NN organization_NNS ._. As_CS a_AT source_NN of_IN investment_NN capital_NN ,_, the_AT system_NN is_BEZ beneficial_JJ to_IN local_JJ community_NNS and_CC encourages_VBZ the_AT development_NN of_IN industry_NNS in_IN rural_JJ area_NNS ._. The_AT credit_NN provdied_VBN by_IN the_AT first_OD two_CD service_NNS in_IN the_AT system_NN outlined_VBN above_RB is_BEZ primarily_RB for_IN general_JJ agricultural_JJ purpose_NNS ._. The_AT third_OD credit_NN service_NN ,_, Banks_NNS for_IN Cooperatives_NNS ,_, exists_VBZ under_IN authority_NN of_IN the_AT Farm_NN Credit_NN Act_NN of_IN 1933_CD ._. The_AT Banks_NNS for_IN Cooperatives_NNS were_BED established_VBN to_TO provide_VB a_AT permanent_JJ source_NN of_IN credit_NN on_IN a_AT sound_JJ basis_NN for_IN farmers'_NNS$ cooperative_NNS ._. Types_NNS of_IN loan_NNS Three_CD distinct_JJ class_NNS of_IN loan_NNS are_BER made_VBN available_JJ to_IN farmers'_NNS$ cooperative_NNS by_IN the_AT Banks_NNS for_IN Cooperatives_NNS :_: Commodity_NN loan_NNS ,_, operating_VBG capital_NN loan_NNS ,_, and_CC facility_NN loan_NNS ._. Eligibility_NN To_TO be_BE eligible_JJ to_TO borrow_VB from_IN a_AT Bank_NN for_IN Cooperatives_NNS ,_, a_AT cooperative_NN must_MD be_BE an_AT association_NN in_IN which_WDT farmer_NNS act_VB together_RB in_IN processing_VBG and_CC marketing_VBG farm_NN product_NNS ,_, purchasing_VBG farm_NN supply_NNS ,_, or_CC furnishing_VBG farm_NN business_NN service_NNS ,_, and_CC must_MD meet_VB the_AT requirement_NNS set_VBN forth_RB in_IN the_AT Farm_NN Credit_NN Act_NN of_IN 1933_CD ,_, a_CS amended_VBN ._. Interest_NN rate_NNS Interest_NN rate_NNS are_BER determined_VBN by_IN the_AT board_NN of_IN director_NNS of_IN the_AT bank_NN with_IN the_AT approval_NN of_IN the_AT Farm_NN Credit_NN Administration_NN ._. Minerals_NNS exploration_NN To_TO encourage_VB exploration_NN for_IN domestic_JJ source_NNS of_IN mineral_NNS ,_, the_AT Office_NN of_IN Minerals_NNS Exploration_NN (_( OME_NP )_) of_IN the_AT U.S._NP Department_NN of_IN the_AT Interior_NN offer_VBZ financial_JJ assistance_NN to_IN firm_NNS and_CC individual_NNS who_WPS desire_VB to_TO explore_VB their_PP$ property_NNS or_CC claim_NNS for_IN 1_CD or_CC more_AP of_IN the_AT 32_CD mineral_NN commodity_NNS listed_VBN in_IN the_AT OME_NN regulation_NNS ._. Requirements_NNS This_DT help_NN is_BEZ offered_VBN to_IN applicant_NNS who_WPS ordinarily_RB would_MD not_* undertake_VB the_AT exploration_NN under_IN present_JJ condition_NNS or_CC circumstance_NNS at_IN their_PP$ sole_JJ expense_NN and_CC who_WPS are_BER unable_JJ to_TO obtain_VB fund_NNS from_IN commercial_JJ source_NNS on_IN reasonable_JJ term_NNS ._. Each_DT applicant_NN is_BEZ required_VBN to_TO own_VB or_CC have_HV sufficient_JJ interest_NN in_IN the_AT property_NN to_TO be_BE explored_VBN ._. The_AT Government_NN will_MD contract_VB with_IN an_AT eligible_JJ applicant_NN to_TO pay_VB up_RP to_IN one-half_NN of_IN the_AT cost_NN of_IN approved_VBN exploration_NN work_NN a_CS it_PPS progress_VBZ ._. The_AT applicant_NN pay_VBZ the_AT rest_NN of_IN the_AT cost_NN ,_, but_CC his_PP$ own_JJ time_NN spent_VBN on_IN the_AT work_NN and_CC charge_NNS for_IN the_AT use_NN of_IN equipment_NN which_WDT he_PPS owns_VBZ may_MD be_BE applied_VBN toward_IN his_PP$ share_NN of_IN the_AT cost_NN ._. Repayment_NN Funds_NNS contributed_VBN by_IN the_AT Government_NN are_BER repaid_VBN by_IN a_AT royalty_NN on_IN production_NN from_IN the_AT property_NN ._. If_CS nothing_PN is_BEZ produced_VBN ,_, there_EX is_BEZ no_AT obligation_NN to_TO repay_VB ._. A_AT 5-percent_NN royalty_NN is_BEZ paid_VBN on_IN any_DTI production_NN during_IN the_AT period_NN the_AT contract_NN is_BEZ in_IN effect_NN ;_. ;_. if_CS the_AT Government_NN certifies_VBZ that_CS production_NN may_MD be_BE possible_JJ from_IN the_AT property_NN ,_, the_AT royalty_NN obligation_NN continues_VBZ for_IN the_AT 10-year_JJ period_NN usually_RB specified_VBN in_IN the_AT contract_NN or_CC until_CS the_AT Government's_NN$ contribution_NN is_BEZ repaid_VBN with_IN interest_NN ._. The_AT royalty_NN applies_VBZ to_IN both_ABX principal_NN and_CC interest_NN ,_, but_CC it_PPS never_RB exceeds_VBZ 5_CD percent_NN ._. Contact_VB Information_NN ,_, application_NN form_NNS ,_, and_CC assistance_NN in_IN filing_VBG may_MD be_BE obtained_VBN from_IN the_AT Office_NN of_IN Minerals_NNS Exploration_NN ,_, U.S._NP Department_NN of_IN the_AT Interior_NN ,_, Washington_NP 25_CD ,_, D.C._NP ,_, or_CC from_IN the_AT appropriate_JJ regional_JJ office_NN listed_VBN below_RB ._. In_IN most_AP of_IN the_AT le_QL developed_VBN country_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, such_JJ programing_NN is_BEZ at_IN best_JJT inadequate_JJ and_CC at_IN bad_JJT nonexistent_JJ ._. Only_RB a_AT very_QL few_AP of_IN the_AT more_QL advanced_VBN one_NNS ,_, such_JJ a_CS India_NP and_CC Pakistan_NP ,_, have_HV developed_VBN systematic_JJ technique_NNS of_IN programing_VBG ._. Others_NNS have_HV so-called_JJ development_NN plan_NNS ,_, but_CC some_DTI of_IN these_DTS are_BER little_AP more_AP than_CS list_NNS of_IN project_NNS collected_VBN from_IN various_JJ ministry_NNS while_CS others_NNS are_BER statement_NNS of_IN goal_NNS without_IN analysis_NN of_IN the_AT action_NNS required_VBN to_TO attain_VB them_PPO ._. Only_RB rarely_RB is_BEZ attention_NN given_VBN to_IN accurate_JJ progress_NN report_NNS and_CC evaluation_NN ._. We_PPSS can_MD help_VB in_IN the_AT planning_VBG process_NN ._. Neither_CC growth_NN nor_CC a_AT development_NN program_NN can_MD be_BE imposed_VBN on_IN a_AT country_NN ;_. ;_. it_PPS must_MD express_VB the_AT nation's_NN$ own_JJ will_NN and_CC goal_NN ._. Nevertheless_RB ,_, we_PPSS can_MD administer_VB an_AT aid_NN program_NN in_IN such_ABL a_AT manner_NN a_CS to_TO promote_VB the_AT development_NN of_IN responsible_JJ programing_NN ._. First_RB ,_, we_PPSS can_MD encourage_VB responsibility_NN by_IN establishing_VBG a_CS condition_NNS for_IN assistance_NN on_IN a_AT substantial_JJ and_CC sustained_VBN scale_NN the_AT definition_NN of_IN objective_NNS and_CC the_AT assessment_NN of_IN cost_NNS ._. Second_RB ,_, we_PPSS can_MD make_VB assistance_NN for_IN particular_JJ project_NNS conditional_JJ on_IN the_AT consistency_NN of_IN such_JJ project_NNS with_IN the_AT program_NN ._. Third_RB ,_, we_PPSS can_MD offer_VB technical_JJ help_NN in_IN the_AT formulation_NN of_IN program_NNS for_IN development_NN which_WDT are_BER adapted_VBN to_IN the_AT country's_NN$ objective_NNS and_CC resource_NNS ._. This_DT includes_VBZ assistance_NN in_IN --_-- assembling_VBG the_AT basic_JJ economic_JJ ,_, financial_JJ ,_, technological_JJ ,_, and_CC educational_JJ information_NN on_IN which_WDT programing_VBG depends_VBZ ;_. ;_. surveying_VBG the_AT need_NNS and_CC requirement_NNS over_IN time_NN of_IN broad_JJ sector_NNS of_IN the_AT economy_NN ,_, such_JJ a_CS transport_NN ,_, agriculture_NN ,_, communication_NN ,_, industry_NN ,_, and_CC power_NN ;_. ;_. designing_VBG the_AT financial_JJ mechanism_NNS of_IN the_AT economy_NN in_IN way_NNS that_WPS will_MD promote_VB growth_NN without_IN inflation_NN ;_. ;_. and_CC administrative_JJ practice_NNS which_WDT will_MD make_VB possible_JJ the_AT more_QL effective_JJ review_NN and_CC implementation_NN of_IN program_NNS once_RB established_VBN ._. We_PPSS must_MD use_VB common_JJ sense_NN in_IN applying_VBG condition_NNS ._. The_AT application_NN of_IN condition_NNS in_IN the_AT allocation_NN of_IN aid_NN fund_NNS cannot_MD* ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, be_BE mechanical_JJ ._. It_PPS must_MD be_BE recognized_VBN that_CS country_NNS at_IN different_JJ stage_NNS of_IN development_NN have_HV very_QL different_JJ capability_NNS of_IN meeting_VBG such_JJ condition_NNS ._. To_TO insist_VB on_IN a_AT level_NN of_IN performance_NN in_IN programing_VBG and_CC budgeting_VBG completely_QL beyond_IN the_AT capability_NNS of_IN the_AT recipient_JJ country_NN would_MD result_VB in_IN the_AT frustration_NN of_IN the_AT basic_JJ objective_NN of_IN our_PP$ development_NN assistance_NN to_TO encourage_VB more_QL rapid_JJ growth_NN ._. In_IN the_AT more_QL primitive_JJ area_NNS ,_, where_WRB the_AT capacity_NN to_TO absorb_VB and_CC utilize_VB external_JJ assistance_NN is_BEZ limited_VBN ,_, some_DTI activity_NNS may_MD be_BE of_IN such_QL obvious_JJ priority_NN that_CS we_PPSS may_MD decide_VB to_TO support_VB them_PPO before_CS a_AT well_RB worked_VBN out_RP program_NN is_BEZ available_JJ ._. Thus_RB ,_, we_PPSS might_MD provide_VB limited_VBN assistance_NN in_IN such_JJ field_NNS a_CS education_NN ,_, essential_JJ transport_NN ,_, communication_NNS ,_, and_CC agricultural_JJ improvement_NN despite_IN the_AT absence_NN of_IN acceptable_JJ country_NN program_NNS ._. In_IN such_ABL a_AT case_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, we_PPSS would_MD encourage_VB the_AT recipient_NN country_NN to_TO get_VB on_RP with_IN it_PP$ programing_VBG task_NN ,_, supply_VB it_PPO with_IN substantial_JJ technical_JJ assistance_NN in_IN performing_VBG that_DT task_NN ,_, and_CC make_VB it_PPO plain_JJ that_CS an_AT expansion_NN or_CC even_RB a_AT continuation_NN of_IN our_PP$ assistance_NN to_IN the_AT country's_NN$ development_NN wa_BEDZ conditional_JJ upon_IN programing_VBG progress_NN being_BEG made_VBN ._. At_IN the_AT other_AP end_NN of_IN the_AT spectrum_NN ,_, where_WRB the_AT more_QL advanced_VBN country_NNS can_MD be_BE relied_VBN upon_RB to_TO make_VB well_RB thought_VBN through_RP decision_NNS a_IN to_IN project_NN priority_NNS within_IN a_AT consistent_JJ program_NN ,_, we_PPSS should_MD be_BE prepared_VBN to_TO depart_VB substantially_RB from_IN detailed_VBN project_NN approval_NN a_CS the_AT basis_NN for_IN granting_VBG assistance_NN and_CC to_TO move_VB toward_IN long-term_NN support_NN ,_, in_IN cooperation_NN with_IN other_AP developed_VBN country_NNS ,_, of_IN the_AT essential_JJ foreign_JJ exchange_NN requirement_NNS of_IN the_AT country's_NN$ development_NN program_NN ._. D_NP ._. Encouraging_VBG self-help_NN 1_CD ._. The_AT reason_NNS for_IN stressing_VBG self-help_NN A_AT systematic_JJ approach_NN to_IN development_NN budgeting_NN and_CC programing_NN is_BEZ one_CD important_JJ kind_NN of_IN self-help_NN ._. There_EX are_BER many_AP others_NNS ._. It_PPS is_BEZ vitally_QL important_JJ that_CS the_AT new_JJ U.S._NP aid_NN program_NN should_MD encourage_VB all_ABN of_IN them_PPO ,_, since_CS the_AT main_JJS thrust_NN for_IN development_NN must_MD come_VB from_IN the_AT le_QL developed_VBN country_NNS themselves_PPLS ._. External_JJ aid_NN can_MD only_RB be_BE marginal_JJ ,_, although_CS the_AT margin_NN ,_, a_CS in_IN the_AT case_NN of_IN the_AT Marshall_NP plan_NN ,_, can_MD be_BE decisive_JJ ._. External_JJ aid_NN can_MD be_BE effective_JJ only_RB if_CS it_PPS is_BEZ a_AT complement_NN to_IN self-help_NN ._. U.S._NP aid_NN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, should_MD increasingly_RB be_BE designed_VBN to_TO provide_VB incentive_NNS for_CS country_NNS to_TO take_VB the_AT step_NNS that_WPO only_RB they_PPSS themselves_PPLS can_MD take_VB ._. Aid_NN advice_NN is_BEZ not_* interference_NN ._. In_IN establishing_VBG condition_NNS of_IN self-help_NN ,_, it_PPS is_BEZ important_JJ that_CS we_PPSS not_* expect_VB country_NNS to_TO remake_VB themselves_PPLS in_IN our_PP$ image_NN ._. Open_JJ society_NNS can_MD take_VB many_AP form_NNS ,_, and_CC within_IN very_QL broad_JJ limit_NNS recipient_NNS must_MD be_BE free_JJ to_TO set_VB their_PP$ own_JJ goal_NNS and_CC to_TO devise_VB their_PP$ own_JJ institution_NNS to_TO achieve_VB those_DTS goal_NNS ._. On_IN the_AT other_AP hand_NN ,_, it_PPS is_BEZ no_AT interference_NN with_IN sovereignty_NN to_TO point_VB out_RP defect_NNS where_WRB they_PPSS exist_VB ,_, such_JJ a_CS that_CS a_AT plan_NN call_VBZ for_IN factory_NNS without_IN power_NN to_TO run_VB them_PPO ,_, or_CC for_IN institution_NNS without_IN trained_VBN personnel_NNS to_TO staff_VB them_PPO ._. Once_CS we_PPSS have_HV made_VBN clear_JJ that_CS we_PPSS are_BER genuinely_RB concerned_VBN with_IN a_AT country's_NN$ development_NN potential_NN ,_, we_PPSS can_MD be_BE blunt_JJ in_IN suggesting_VBG the_AT technical_JJ condition_NNS that_WPS must_MD be_BE met_VBN for_CS development_NN to_TO occur_VB ._. 2_CD ._. The_AT range_NN of_IN self-help_NN The_AT major_JJ area_NNS of_IN self-help_NN are_BER the_AT following_NN :_: (_( A_AT )_) the_AT effective_JJ mobilizing_VBG of_IN resource_NNS ._. This_DT includes_VBZ not_* only_RB development_NN programing_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB establishing_VBG tax_NN policy_NNS designed_VBN to_TO raise_VB equitably_RB resource_NNS for_IN investment_NN ;_. ;_. fiscal_JJ and_CC monetary_JJ policy_NNS designed_VBN to_TO prevent_VB serious_JJ inflation_NN ;_. ;_. and_CC regulatory_JJ policy_NNS aimed_VBN to_TO attract_VB the_AT financial_JJ and_CC managerial_JJ resource_NNS of_IN foreign_JJ investment_NN and_CC to_TO prevent_VB excessive_JJ luxury_NN consumption_NN by_IN a_AT few_AP ._. (_( B_NN )_) the_AT reduction_NN of_IN dependence_NN on_IN external_JJ source_NNS ._. This_DT includes_VBZ foreseeing_VBG balance-of-payments_NN crisis_NNS ,_, with_IN adequate_JJ attention_NN to_IN reducing_VBG dependence_NN on_IN import_NNS and_CC adopting_VBG realistic_JJ exchange_NN rate_NNS to_TO encourage_VB infant_JJ industry_NNS and_CC spur_VB export_NNS ._. It_PPS also_RB includes_VBZ providing_VBG for_IN the_AT training_NN of_IN national_NNS to_TO operate_VB project_NNS after_CS they_PPSS are_BER completed_VBN ._. (_( C_NP )_) tapping_VBG the_AT energy_NNS of_IN the_AT entire_JJ population_NN ._. For_IN both_ABX economic_JJ and_CC political_JJ reason_NNS all_ABN segment_NNS of_IN the_AT population_NN must_MD be_BE able_JJ to_TO share_VB in_IN the_AT growth_NN of_IN a_AT country_NN ._. Otherwise_RB ,_, development_NN will_MD not_* lead_VB to_IN longrun_NN stability_NN ._. (_( D_NP )_) honesty_NN in_IN government_NN ._. In_IN many_AP society_NNS ,_, what_WDT we_PPSS regard_VB a_CS corruption_NN ,_, favoritism_NN ,_, and_CC personal_JJ influence_NN are_BER so_QL accepted_VBN a_CS consistent_JJ with_IN the_AT more_NNS of_IN officialdom_NN and_CC so_QL integral_JJ a_AT part_NN of_IN routine_JJ administrative_JJ practice_NN that_CS any_DTI attempt_NN to_TO force_VB their_PP$ elimination_NN will_MD be_BE regarded_VBN by_IN the_AT local_JJ leadership_NN a_CS not_* only_RB unwarranted_JJ but_CC unfriendly_JJ ._. Yet_CC an_AT economy_NN cannot_MD* get_VB the_AT most_AP out_IN of_IN it_PP$ resource_NNS if_CS dishonesty_NN ,_, corruption_NN ,_, and_CC favoritism_NN are_BER widespread_JJ ._. Moreover_RB ,_, tolerance_NN by_IN u_PPO of_IN such_JJ practice_NNS result_VBZ in_IN serious_JJ waste_NN and_CC diversion_NN of_IN aid_NN resource_NNS and_CC in_IN the_AT long_JJ run_NN generates_VBZ anti-American_JJ sentiment_NN of_IN a_AT kind_NN peculiarly_QL damaging_VBG to_IN our_PP$ political_JJ interest_NN ._. It_PPS wa_BEDZ organizationally_RB the_AT responsibility_NN of_IN the_AT Department_NN of_IN Public_JJ Works_NNS and_CC wa_BEDZ financed_VBN on_IN a_AT rotary_JJ fund_NN basis_NN with_IN each_DT agency_NN of_IN government_NN contributing_VBG to_IN the_AT pool's_NN$ operation_NN ._. In_IN 1951_CD the_AT pool's_NN$ operation_NN wa_BEDZ transferred_VBN to_IN the_AT newly-created_JJ Department_NN of_IN Administration_NN ,_, an_AT agency_NN established_VBN a_CS the_AT central_JJ staff_NN and_CC auxiliary_JJ department_NN of_IN the_AT state_NN government_NN ._. The_AT management_NN of_IN state-owned_JJ vehicle_NNS since_IN that_DT time_NN ha_HVZ been_BEN described_VBN in_IN a_AT recent_JJ report_NN in_IN the_AT following_VBG manner_NN :_: ``_`` Under_IN this_DT new_JJ management_NN considerable_JJ progress_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_HV been_BEN made_VBN ._. The_AT agency_NNS of_IN government_NN are_BER now_RB billed_VBN for_IN the_AT actual_JJ cost_NN of_IN service_NNS provided_VBN to_IN each_DT passenger_NN car_NN rather_IN than_IN the_AT prior_JJ uniform_JJ charge_NN for_IN all_ABN car_NNS ._. Whereas_CS the_AT maintenance_NN rotary_JJ fund_NN had_HVD in_IN the_AT past_NN sustained_VBN loss_NNS considerably_RB beyond_IN expectation_NNS ,_, the_AT introduction_NN of_IN the_AT cost-billing_NN system_NN plus_CC other_AP control_NN refinement_NNS ha_HVZ resulted_VBN in_IN keeping_VBG the_AT fund_NN on_IN a_AT proper_JJ working_VBG basis_NN ._. One_CD indication_NN of_IN the_AT merit_NNS of_IN the_AT new_JJ management_NN is_BEZ found_VBN in_IN the_AT fact_NN that_CS during_IN the_AT period_NN 1951-1956_CD ,_, while_CS total_JJ annual_JJ mileage_NN put_VBN on_IN the_AT vehicle_NNS increased_VBD 35%_NN ,_, the_AT total_JJ maintenance_NN cost_NN increased_VBD only_RB 11%_NN ._. ``_`` In_IN order_NN to_TO far_RBR refine_VB the_AT management_NN of_IN passenger_NN vehicle_NNS ,_, on_IN July_NP 1_CD ,_, 1958_CD ,_, the_AT actual_JJ title_NN to_IN every_AT vehicle_NN wa_BEDZ transferred_VBN ,_, by_IN Executive_JJ Order_NN ,_, to_IN the_AT Division_NN of_IN Methods_NNS ,_, Research_NN and_CC Office_NN Services_NNS ._. The_AT objective_NN behind_IN this_DT action_NN wa_BEDZ to_TO place_VB in_IN one_CD agency_NN the_AT responsibility_NN for_IN the_AT management_NN ,_, assignment_NN ,_, and_CC replacement_NN of_IN all_ABN vehicle_NNS ._. (_( Note_VB :_: So_QL far_RB a_CS State_NN Police_NNS car_NNS are_BER concerned_VBN ,_, only_RB their_PP$ replacement_NN is_BEZ under_IN this_DT division_NN )_) ._. This_DT tied_VBD in_RP closely_RB with_IN the_AT current_JJ attempt_NN to_TO upgrade_VB state-owned_JJ car_NNS to_IN the_AT extent_NN that_CS vehicle_NNS are_BER not_* retained_VBN beyond_IN the_AT point_NN where_WRB maintenance_NN cost_NNS (_( in_IN light_NN of_IN depreciation_NN )_) become_VB excessive_JJ ._. Moreover_RB ,_, it_PPS allows_VBZ the_AT present_JJ management_NN to_TO reassign_VB vehicle_NNS so_CS that_CS mileage_NN will_MD be_BE more_QL uniformly_RB distributed_VBN throughout_IN the_AT fleet_NN ;_. ;_. for_IN example_NN ,_, if_CS one_CD driver_NN put_VBZ on_RP 22,000_CD mile_NNS per_IN year_NN and_CC another_DT driver_NN 8,000_CD mile_NNS per_IN year_NN ,_, their_PP$ car_NNS will_MD be_BE switched_VBN so_CS that_CS both_ABX car_NNS will_MD have_HV 30,000_CD mile_NNS after_IN two_CD year_NNS ,_, rather_IN than_IN 44,000_CD mile_NNS (_( and_CC related_VBN high_JJR maintenance_NN cost_NNS )_) and_CC 16,000_CD mile_NNS respectively_RB ''_'' ._. The_AT motor_NN pool_NN is_BEZ a_AT completely_QL centralized_VBN and_CC mechanized_VBN operation_NN ._. It_PPS handle_VBZ all_ABN type_NNS of_IN vehicle_NN maintenance_NN ,_, but_CC concentrate_VBZ more_RBR on_IN ``_`` service_NN station_NN activity_NNS ''_'' than_CS on_IN extensive_JJ vehicle_NN repair_NNS ._. It_PPS contract_VBZ with_IN outside_JJ repair_NN garage_NNS for_IN much_AP of_IN the_AT latter_AP work_NN ._. Where_WRB the_AT pool_NN excels_VBZ is_BEZ in_IN it_PP$ compilation_NN of_IN maintenance_NN and_CC cost-data_NN study_NNS and_CC analysis_NNS ._. Pool_NN record_NNS reveal_VB in_IN detail_NN the_AT cost_NN per_IN mile_NN and_CC mile_NNS per_IN gallon_NN of_IN each_DT vehicle_NN ,_, the_AT mile_NNS traveled_VBN in_IN one_CD year_NN or_CC three_CD year_NNS ,_, the_AT period_NNS when_WRB vehicle_NN cost_NNS become_VB excessive_JJ ,_, and_CC when_WRB car_NNS should_MD be_BE traded_VBN for_IN sound_JJ economy_NNS ._. From_IN this_DT ,_, motor_NN pool_NN personnel_NNS develop_VB other_AP meaningful_JJ and_CC related_VBN data_NN ._. In_IN 1959-60_CD ,_, vehicle_NNS averaged_VBD an_AT operating_VBG cost_NN of_IN $.027_NNS per_IN mile_NN ._. Based_VBN on_IN this_DT figure_NN and_CC considering_VBG depreciation_NN cost_NNS of_IN vehicle_NNS ,_, pool_NN personnel_NNS have_HV determined_VBN that_CS travel_NN in_IN excess_NN of_IN 10,000_CD mile_NNS annually_RB is_BEZ more_QL economical_JJ by_IN state_NN car_NN than_CS by_IN payment_NN of_IN allowance_NNS for_IN use_NN of_IN personally-owned_JJ vehicle_NNS ._. They_PPSS estimate_VB far_RBR that_CS with_IN sufficient_JJ experience_NN and_CC when_WRB cost-data_NN of_IN compact_JJ car_NNS is_BEZ compiled_VBN ,_, the_AT break-even_JJ point_NN may_MD be_BE reduced_VBN to_IN 7,500_CD mile_NNS of_IN travel_NN per_IN year_NN ._. Table_NN 2_CD show_VBZ operating_VBG cost_NN data_NN of_IN state_NN vehicle_NNS selected_VBN at_IN random_NN ._. One_CD matter_NN of_IN concern_NN to_IN the_AT complete_JJ effectiveness_NN of_IN pool_NN operation_NNS is_BEZ the_AT lack_NN of_IN adequate_JJ central_JJ garage_NN facility_NNS ._. Good_JJ facility_NNS would_MD be_BE a_AT decided_VBN help_NN to_IN pool_NN operation_NNS and_CC probably_RB reduce_VB vehicle_NN cost_NNS even_QL more_RBR ._. Purchasing_VBG practice_NNS ._. The_AT purchase_NN of_IN state-owned_JJ vehicle_NNS is_BEZ handled_VBN in_IN the_AT same_AP manner_NN a_CS all_ABN other_AP purchase_NNS of_IN the_AT state_NN ._. Unit_NN price_NNS for_IN state_NN vehicle_NNS are_BER invariably_RB low_JJR than_CS to_IN the_AT general_JJ public_NN ._. The_AT reason_NNS are_BER obvious_JJ :_: (_( 1_CD )_) the_AT state_NN is_BEZ buying_VBG in_IN quantity_NN ,_, and_CC (_( 2_CD )_) it_PPS ha_HVZ no_AT federal_JJ excise_NN or_CC state_NN sale_NNS tax_NN to_TO pay_VB ._. Until_IN 1958_CD the_AT state_NN wa_BEDZ also_RB entitled_VBN to_IN a_AT special_JJ type_NN of_IN manufacturers'_NNS$ discount_NN through_IN the_AT dealer_NNS ._. This_DT is_BEZ a_AT normal_JJ governmental_JJ procedure_NN which_WDT reflects_VBZ more_QL accurately_RB cost-accounting_NN principle_NNS ._. The_AT assignment_NN and_CC use_NN of_IN vehicle_NNS after_IN purchase_NN is_BEZ another_DT matter_NN to_TO be_BE covered_VBN in_IN detail_NN later_RBR ._. Vehicle_NN purchase_NN ,_, assignment_NN ,_, and_CC use_NN policy_NNS Probably_RB the_AT most_QL important_JJ of_IN all_ABN matter_NNS for_IN review_NN are_BER the_AT broad_JJ administrative_JJ policy_NNS governing_VBG the_AT purchase_NN ,_, assignment_NN ,_, use_NN ,_, and_CC management_NN of_IN state_NN vehicle_NNS ._. The_AT legislature's_NN$ role_NN in_IN policy_NN determination_NN in_IN this_DT area_NN for_IN year_NNS ha_HVZ been_BEN confined_VBN almost_QL solely_RB to_IN the_AT amount_NN of_IN fund_NNS appropriated_VBN annually_RB for_IN the_AT purchase_NN and_CC operation_NN of_IN vehicle_NNS ._. The_AT more_QL meaningful_JJ policy_NNS have_HV been_BEN left_VBN to_IN the_AT judgment_NN of_IN the_AT chief_JJS administrative_JJ officer_NN of_IN the_AT state_NN --_-- the_AT Director_NN of_IN Administration_NN ._. The_AT Rhode_NP Island_NN property_NN tax_NN There_EX wa_BEDZ a_AT time_NN some_DTI year_NNS ago_RB when_WRB local_JJ taxation_NN by_IN the_AT city_NNS and_CC town_NNS wa_BEDZ sufficient_JJ to_TO support_VB their_PP$ own_JJ operation_NNS and_CC a_AT part_NN of_IN the_AT cost_NN of_IN the_AT state_NN government_NN a_QL well_RB ._. For_IN many_AP year_NNS a_AT state_NN tax_NN on_IN city_NNS and_CC town_NNS wa_BEDZ paid_VBN by_IN the_AT several_AP municipality_NNS to_IN the_AT state_NN from_IN the_AT proceeds_NNS of_IN the_AT general_JJ property_NN tax_NN ._. This_DT tax_NN wa_BEDZ discontinued_VBN in_IN 1936_CD ._. Since_IN that_DT time_NN the_AT demand_NNS of_IN the_AT citizen_NNS for_IN new_JJ and_CC expanded_VBN service_NNS have_HV placed_VBN financial_JJ burden_NNS on_IN the_AT state_NN which_WDT could_MD not_* have_HV been_BEN foreseen_VBN in_IN early_JJR year_NNS ._. At_IN the_AT same_AP time_NN there_EX ha_HVZ been_BEN an_AT upgrading_NN and_CC expansion_NN of_IN municipal_JJ service_NNS a_QL well_RB ._. Thus_RB ,_, there_EX ha_HVZ come_VBN into_IN being_BEG a_AT situation_NN in_IN which_WDT the_AT state_NN must_MD raise_VB all_ABN of_IN it_PP$ own_JJ revenue_NNS and_CC ,_, in_IN addition_NN ,_, must_MD give_VB assistance_NN to_IN it_PP$ local_JJ government_NNS ._. This_DT financial_JJ assistance_NN from_IN the_AT state_NN ha_HVZ become_VBN necessary_JJ because_CS the_AT local_JJ government_NNS themselves_PPLS found_VBD the_AT property_NN tax_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN least_AP at_IN the_AT rate_NNS then_RB existing_VBG ,_, insufficient_JJ for_IN their_PP$ requirement_NNS ._. Consequently_RB there_EX have_HV developed_VBN several_AP form_NNS of_IN grant-in-aid_NNS and_CC shared_VBN tax_NNS ,_, a_QL well_RB a_CS the_AT unrestricted_JJ grant_NN to_IN local_JJ government_NNS for_IN general_JJ purpose_NNS whose_WP$ adoption_NN accompanied_VBD the_AT introduction_NN of_IN a_AT sale_NNS tax_VB at_IN the_AT state_NN level_NN ._. Notwithstanding_IN state_NN aid_NN ,_, the_AT local_JJ government_NNS are_BER continuing_VBG to_TO seek_VB additional_JJ revenue_NN of_IN their_PP$ own_JJ by_IN strengthening_VBG the_AT property_NN tax_NN ._. This_DT is_BEZ being_BEG done_VBN both_ABX by_IN the_AT revaluation_NN of_IN real_JJ property_NN and_CC by_IN seeking_VBG out_RP form_NNS of_IN personal_JJ property_NN hitherto_RB neglected_VBN or_CC ignored_VBN ._. Taxation_NN of_IN tangible_JJ movable_JJ property_NN in_IN Rhode_NP Island_NN ha_HVZ been_BEN generally_RB of_IN a_AT ``_`` hand_NNS off_RP ''_'' nature_NN due_JJ possibly_RB to_IN several_AP reason_NNS :_: (_( 1_CD )_) local_JJ assessor_NNS ,_, in_IN the_AT main_JJS ,_, are_BER not_* well_RB paid_VBN and_CC have_HV inadequate_JJ office_NN staff_NNS ,_, (_( 2_CD )_) the_AT numerous_JJ category_NNS of_IN this_DT component_NN of_IN personal_JJ property_NN make_VB locating_VBG extremely_QL difficult_JJ ,_, and_CC (_( 3_CD )_) the_AT inexperience_NN of_IN the_AT majority_NN of_IN assessor_NNS in_IN evaluating_VBG this_DT type_NN of_IN property_NN ._. Problems_NNS of_IN taxing_VBG personal_JJ property_NN ._. Among_IN the_AT many_AP problem_NNS in_IN the_AT taxing_VBG of_IN personal_JJ property_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN movable_JJ tangible_JJ property_NN in_IN particular_JJ ,_, two_CD are_BER significant_JJ :_: (_( 1_CD )_) situs_NN ,_, (_( 2_CD )_) fair_JJ and_CC equitable_JJ assessment_NN of_IN value_NN ._. These_DTS problem_NNS are_BER not_* local_JJ to_IN Rhode_NP Island_NN ,_, but_CC are_BER recognized_VBN a_CS common_JJ to_IN all_ABN state_NNS ._. Situs_NN of_IN property_NN ._. Although_CS the_AT law_NNS of_IN the_AT various_JJ state_NNS ,_, in_IN general_JJ ,_, specify_VB the_AT situs_NN of_IN property_NN ,_, i.e._RB ,_, residence_NN or_CC domicile_NN of_IN the_AT owner_NN ,_, or_CC location_NN of_IN the_AT property_NN ,_, the_AT exception_NNS regarding_IN boat_NNS ,_, airplane_NNS ,_, mobile_JJ home_NNS ,_, etc._RB ,_, seem_VB to_TO add_VB to_IN the_AT uncertainty_NN of_IN the_AT proper_JJ origination_NN point_NN for_IN assessment_NN ._. Rhode_NP Island_NN law_NN specifies_VBZ that_CS all_ABN real_JJ estate_NN is_BEZ taxable_JJ in_IN the_AT town_NN in_IN which_WDT it_PPS is_BEZ situated_VBN ._. It_PPS also_RB provides_VBZ for_IN the_AT taxation_NN of_IN all_ABN personal_JJ property_NN ,_, belonging_VBG to_IN inhabitant_NNS of_IN the_AT state_NN ,_, both_ABX tangible_JJ and_CC intangible_JJ ,_, and_CC the_AT tangible_JJ personal_JJ property_NN of_IN non-residents_NNS in_IN this_DT state_NN ._. In_IN defining_VBG personal_JJ property_NN ,_, it_PPS specifically_RB mention_VBZ ``_`` all_ABN ship_NNS or_CC vessel_NNS ,_, at_IN home_NN or_CC abroad_RB ''_'' ._. Intangible_JJ property_NN is_BEZ taxable_JJ wherever_WRB the_AT owner_NN ha_HVZ a_AT place_NN of_IN abode_NN the_AT great_JJR portion_NN of_IN the_AT year_NN ._. Although_CS a_AT similar_JJ situs_NN for_IN tangible_JJ property_NN is_BEZ mentioned_VBN in_IN the_AT statute_NN ,_, this_DT is_BEZ cancelled_VBN out_RP by_IN the_AT provision_NN that_CS definite_JJ kind_NNS of_IN property_NN ``_`` and_CC all_ABN other_AP tangible_JJ property_NN ''_'' situated_VBN or_CC being_BEG in_IN any_DTI town_NN is_BEZ taxable_JJ where_WRB the_AT property_NN is_BEZ situated_VBN ._. This_DT would_MD seem_VB to_TO fix_VB the_AT tax_NN situs_NN of_IN all_ABN movable_JJ personal_JJ property_NN at_IN it_PP$ location_NN on_IN December_NP 31_CD ._. Both_ABX boat_NNS and_CC aircraft_NN would_MD fall_VB within_IN this_DT category_NN ,_, a_QL well_RB a_CS motor_NN vehicle_NNS ._. The_AT location_NN of_IN the_AT latter_AP now_RB is_BEZ determined_VBN for_IN tax_NN purpose_NNS at_IN the_AT time_NN of_IN registration_NN ,_, and_CC it_PPS is_BEZ now_RB accepted_VBN practice_NN to_TO consider_VB a_AT motor_NN vehicle_NN a_CS being_BEG situated_VBN where_WRB it_PPS is_BEZ garaged_VBN ._. Obviously_RB ,_, it_PPS would_MD be_BE impossible_JJ to_TO determine_VB where_WRB every_AT vehicle_NN might_MD be_BE on_IN the_AT 31st_OD day_NN of_IN December_NP ._. In_IN view_NN of_IN the_AT acceptance_NN accorded_VBN the_AT status_NN of_IN motor_NN vehicle_NNS for_IN tax_NN purpose_NNS ,_, in_IN the_AT absence_NN of_IN any_DTI specific_JJ provision_NN it_PPS would_MD seem_VB entirely_QL consistent_JJ to_TO apply_VB the_AT same_AP interpretation_NN to_IN boat_NNS or_CC aircraft_NN ._. A_AT recent_JJ example_NN of_IN this_DT problem_NN is_BEZ the_AT flying_NN of_IN six_CD airplane_NNS ,_, on_IN December_NP 31_CD ,_, 1960_CD ,_, from_IN the_AT Newport_NP Airpark_NP in_IN Middletown_NP ,_, to_IN the_AT North_JJ Central_JJ Airport_NN in_IN Smithfield_NP ._. This_DT situation_NN resulted_VBD in_IN both_ABX town_NNS claiming_VBG the_AT tax_NN ,_, and_CC probably_RB justifiably_RB ._. Middletown_NP base_VBZ it_PP$ claim_NN on_IN the_AT general_JJ provision_NN of_IN the_AT law_NN that_CS ``_`` all_ABN rateable_JJ property_NN ,_, both_ABX tangible_JJ and_CC intangible_JJ ,_, shall_MD be_BE taxed_VBN to_IN the_AT owner_NN thereof_RB in_IN the_AT town_NN in_IN which_WDT such_JJ owner_NN shall_MD have_HV had_HVN his_PP$ actual_JJ place_NN of_IN abode_NN for_IN the_AT large_JJR portion_NN of_IN the_AT twelve_CD (_( 12_CD )_) month_NNS next_RB preceding_VBG the_AT first_OD day_NN of_IN April_NP in_IN each_DT year_NN ''_'' ._. The_AT Smithfield_NP tax_NN assessor_NN ,_, in_IN turn_NN ,_, claim_VBZ the_AT tax_NN under_IN the_AT provision_NN of_IN law_NN ``_`` and_CC all_ABN other_AP tangible_JJ personal_JJ property_NN situated_VBN or_CC being_BEG in_IN any_DTI town_NN ,_, in_IN or_CC upon_IN any_DTI place_NN of_IN storage_NN shall_MD be_BE taxed_VBN to_IN such_JJ person_NN in_IN the_AT town_NN where_WRB said_VBN property_NN is_BEZ situated_VBN ''_'' ._. Assessment_NN of_IN value_NN ._. This_DT problem_NN of_IN fair_JJ and_CC equitable_JJ assessment_NN of_IN value_NN is_BEZ a_AT difficult_JJ one_CD to_TO solve_VB in_IN that_CS the_AT determination_NN of_IN fair_JJ valuation_NN is_BEZ dependent_JJ on_IN local_JJ assessor_NNS ,_, who_WPS in_IN general_NN are_BER non-professional_JJ and_CC part-time_JJ personnel_NNS taking_VBG an_AT individualistic_JJ approach_NN to_IN the_AT problem_NN ._. This_DT account_VBZ for_IN the_AT wide_JJ variance_NN in_IN assessment_NN practice_NNS of_IN movable_JJ tangible_JJ property_NN in_IN the_AT various_JJ municipality_NNS in_IN Rhode_NP Island_NN ._. This_DT condition_NN will_MD undoubtedly_RB continue_VB until_IN such_JJ time_NN a_CS a_AT state_NN uniform_JJ system_NN of_IN evaluation_NN is_BEZ established_VBN ,_, or_CC through_IN mutual_JJ agreement_NN of_IN the_AT local_JJ assessing_VBG official_NNS for_IN a_AT method_NN of_IN standard_JJ assessment_NN practice_NN to_TO be_BE adopted_VBN ._. The_AT Rhode_NP Island_NN Public_JJ Expenditure_NN Council_NN in_IN it_PP$ publication_NN once_RB commented_VBD :_: ``_`` The_AT most_QL realistic_JJ way_NN of_IN facing_VBG up_RP to_IN this_DT problem_NN would_MD be_BE to_TO have_HV the_AT State_NN take_VB over_RP full_JJ responsibility_NN for_IN assessing_VBG all_ABN taxable_JJ property_NN ._. An_AT adequately_RB staffed_VBN and_CC equipped_VBN State_NN assessing_VBG office_NN could_MD apply_VB uniform_JJ method_NNS and_CC standard_NNS which_WDT would_MD go_VB far_RB toward_IN producing_VBG equitable_JJ assessment_NNS on_IN all_ABN property_NNS throughout_IN the_AT State_NN ._. A_AT single_AP statewide_JJ assessing_VBG unit_NN would_MD eliminate_VB the_AT difference_NNS and_CC complication_NNS that_WPS are_BER inherent_JJ in_IN a_AT system_NN of_IN 39_CD different_JJ and_CC independent_JJ assessing_VBG unit_NNS ''_'' ._. The_AT Institute_NN of_IN Public_JJ Administration_NN ,_, in_IN it_PP$ report_NN to_IN the_AT State_NN Fiscal_JJ Study_NN Commission_NN in_IN 1959_CD ,_, recommended_VBD ``_`` consolidating_VBG and_CC centralizing_VBG all_ABN aspect_NNS of_IN property_NN tax_NN administration_NN in_IN a_AT single_AP state_NN agency_NN professionally_RB organized_VBN and_CC equipped_VBN for_IN the_AT job_NN ''_'' ._. The_AT resulting_VBG setup_NN ,_, it_PPS wa_BEDZ declared_VBN ,_, ``_`` would_MD be_BE similar_JJ to_IN that_DT which_WDT is_BEZ in_IN successful_JJ operation_NN in_IN a_AT number_NN of_IN metropolitan_JJ county_NNS a_QL large_JJ or_CC large_JJR than_CS Rhode_NP Island_NN ''_'' ._. Practices_NNS in_IN Rhode_NP Island_NN ._. To_TO determine_VB the_AT practice_NN and_CC attitude_NN of_IN municipal_JJ government_NNS concerning_IN tangible_JJ movable_JJ property_NN ,_, a_AT questionnaire_NN wa_BEDZ sent_VBN to_IN all_ABN local_JJ government_NN assessor_NNS or_CC board_NNS of_IN assessor_NNS in_IN Rhode_NP Island_NN ._. The_AT reply_NNS from_IN each_DT individual_NN town_NN are_BER not_* given_VBN in_IN detail_NN because_CS the_AT question_NNS asked_VBD the_AT personal_JJ opinion_NN of_IN the_AT several_AP assessor_NNS and_CC are_BER not_* necessarily_RB the_AT established_VBN policy_NN of_IN the_AT town_NN in_IN each_DT case_NN ._. There_EX are_BER legitimate_JJ reason_NNS for_IN difference_NNS of_IN opinion_NN among_IN the_AT assessor_NNS a_CS a_AT whole_NN and_CC among_IN the_AT public_JJ official_NNS in_IN each_DT town_NN ._. These_DTS opinion_NNS of_IN the_AT assessor_NNS are_BER of_IN significance_NN in_IN indicating_VBG what_WDT their_PP$ thinking_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_BE at_IN the_AT present_JJ time_NN ._. In_IN reply_NN to_IN a_AT question_NN of_IN whether_CS they_PPSS now_RB tax_VB boat_NNS ,_, airplane_NNS and_CC other_AP movable_JJ property_NN excluding_IN automobile_NNS ,_, nineteen_CD said_VBD that_CS they_PPSS did_DOD and_CC twenty_CD that_CS they_PPSS did_DOD not_* ._. The_AT wording_NN of_IN the_AT question_NN wa_BEDZ quite_QL general_JJ and_CC may_MD have_HV been_BEN subject_JJ to_IN different_JJ interpretation_NNS ._. One_CD assessor_NN checked_VBD boat_NNS only_RB ,_, another_DT trailer_NNS and_CC tractor_NNS ,_, one_CD mentioned_VBD house_NN trailer_NNS ,_, and_CC two_CD others_NNS referred_VBD to_IN trailer_NNS without_IN specifying_VBG the_AT type_NN ._. In_IN two_CD case_NNS ,_, airplane_NNS only_RB were_BED indicated_VBN ._. It_PPS is_BEZ difficult_JJ to_TO tabulate_VB exactly_RB what_WDT wa_BEDZ meant_VBN in_IN each_DT individual_NN situation_NN ,_, but_CC the_AT conclusion_NN may_MD be_BE drawn_VBN that_CS 21_CD town_NNS do_DO not_* ass_VB movable_JJ personal_JJ property_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN the_AT remainder_NN only_RB certain_AP type_NNS are_BER valued_VBN for_IN tax_NN purpose_NNS ._. Boats_NNS were_BED indicated_VBN specifically_RB by_IN only_RB one_CD of_IN the_AT five_CD town_NNS known_VBN to_TO tax_VB boat_NNS ._. It_PPS would_MD seem_VB ,_, then_RB ,_, that_CS movable_JJ property_NN and_CC equipment_NN is_BEZ not_* taxed_VBN a_CS a_AT whole_NN but_CC that_CS certain_AP type_NNS are_BER taxed_VBN in_IN town_NNS where_WRB this_DT is_BEZ bound_VBN to_TO be_BE expedient_JJ for_IN that_DT particular_JJ kind_NN of_IN personal_JJ property_NN ._. So_QL few_AP answered_VBD the_AT question_NN relating_VBG to_IN their_PP$ effort_NNS to_TO ass_VB movable_JJ property_NN that_CS the_AT result_NNS are_BER inconclusive_JJ ._. Adjusting_VBG the_AT fiscal_JJ calendar_NNS The_AT advantage_NNS of_IN a_AT uniform_JJ fiscal_JJ year_NN and_CC well_RB synchronized_VBN fiscal_JJ and_CC tax_NN collection_NN calendar_NNS are_BER sufficiently_QL great_JJ for_IN Rhode_NP Island_NN municipality_NNS to_TO exert_VB effort_NN to_TO secure_VB them_PPO ._. Adjustment_NN of_IN fiscal_JJ year_NN ._. One_CD town_NN and_CC one_CD city_NN ,_, Coventry_NP and_CC East_JJ Providence_NP ,_, require_VB an_AT adjustment_NN of_IN their_PP$ fiscal_JJ year_NN only_RB ._. Adjustment_NN of_IN tax_NN collection_NN year_NN ._. These_DTS city_NNS and_CC town_NNS include_VB Bristol_NP ,_, Glocester_NP ,_, Pawtucket_NP ,_, Cumberland_NP ,_, Central_JJ Falls_NNS ,_, and_CC Woonsocket_NP ._. Simultaneous_JJ adjustment_NNS ._. The_AT State_NN Ballet_NN of_IN Rhode_NP Island_NN ,_, the_AT first_OD incorporated_VBN group_NN ,_, wa_BEDZ formed_VBN for_IN the_AT purpose_NN of_IN extending_VBG knowledge_NN of_IN the_AT art_NN of_IN ballet_NN in_IN the_AT Community_NN ,_, to_TO promote_VB interest_NN in_IN ballet_NN performance_NNS ,_, to_TO contribute_VB to_IN the_AT cultural_JJ life_NN of_IN the_AT State_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO provide_VB opportunity_NN for_IN gifted_JJ dance_NN student_NNS who_WPS ,_, for_IN one_CD reason_NN or_CC another_DT ,_, are_BER unable_JJ to_TO pursue_VB a_AT career_NN and_CC to_TO develop_VB others_NNS for_IN the_AT professional_JJ state_NN ;_. ;_. and_CC now_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, do_DO I_PPSS ,_, John_NP A._NP Notte_NP ,_, Jr._NP ,_, Governor_NN of_IN the_AT State_NN of_IN Rhode_NP Island_NN and_CC Providence_NP Plantations_NNS ,_, proclaim_VB the_AT week_NN of_IN Monday_NR ,_, November_NP 13_CD ,_, 1961_CD ,_, a_CS the_AT State_NN Ballet_NN of_IN Rhode_NP Island_NN Week_NN ,_, requesting_VBG all_ABN Rhode_NP Islanders_NNS to_TO give_VB special_JJ attention_NN to_IN this_DT unusual_JJ event_NN which_WDT should_MD contribute_VB to_IN the_AT cultural_JJ life_NN of_IN the_AT State_NN ._. In_IN testimony_NN whereof_WRB ,_, I_PPSS have_HV hereunto_RB set_VBN my_PP$ hand_NN and_CC caused_VBN the_AT seal_NN of_IN the_AT State_NN to_TO be_BE affixed_VBN this_DT 23d_OD day_NN of_IN October_NP ,_, in_IN the_AT year_NN of_IN Our_PP$ Lord_NN ,_, one_CD thousand_CD nine_CD hundred_CD and_CC sixty-one_CD ,_, and_CC of_IN Independence_NN ,_, the_AT one_CD hundred_CD and_CC eighty-sixth_OD ._. Governor_NN Proclamation_NN Thanksgiving_NN Day_NN by_IN John_NP A._NP Notte_NP ,_, Jr._NP ,_, Governor_NN As_CS another_DT Thanksgiving_NN draw_VBZ near_RB ,_, let_VB u_PPO take_VB time_NN out_RP from_IN the_AT often_RB hectic_JJ pace_NN of_IN our_PP$ life_NNS to_TO try_VB and_CC recapture_VB the_AT feeling_NNS that_WPS filled_VBD the_AT heart_NNS of_IN the_AT Pilgrims_NNS on_IN the_AT first_OD Thanksgiving_NN ._. The_AT Pilgrims_NNS gathered_VBD to_TO thank_VB the_AT Lord_NN for_IN His_PP$ benevolence_NN during_IN their_PP$ first_OD year_NN in_IN the_AT new_JJ land_NN ._. They_PPSS had_HVD been_BEN through_IN trying_JJ time_NNS ,_, but_CC their_PP$ faith_NN in_IN the_AT Almighty_NP had_HVD given_VBN them_PPO the_AT courage_NN and_CC the_AT strength_NN to_TO meet_VB and_CC overcome_VB the_AT many_AP problem_NNS and_CC difficulty_NNS that_WPS were_BED the_AT price_NN they_PPSS had_HVD to_TO pay_VB for_IN freedom_NN ._. And_CC a_CS the_AT Pilgrims_NNS bowed_VBD their_PP$ head_NNS in_IN humble_JJ gratitude_NN ,_, they_PPSS shared_VBD another_DT feeling_NN --_-- the_AT anticipation_NN of_IN what_WDT the_AT future_NN held_VBD for_IN them_PPO and_CC their_PP$ posterity_NN ._. They_PPSS could_MD not_* guess_VB that_CS from_IN their_PP$ concept_NNS of_IN liberty_NN and_CC freedom_NN would_MD some_DTI day_NN be_BE born_VBN a_AT new_JJ nation_NN that_WPS for_IN year_NNS would_MD be_BE the_AT symbol_NN of_IN hope_NN to_IN the_AT oppressed_VBN country_NNS of_IN the_AT world_NN ._. They_PPSS simply_RB turned_VBD to_IN God_NP filled_VBD with_IN gratitude_NN and_CC faith_NN ._. We_PPSS who_WPS are_BER living_VBG today_NR may_MD learn_VB a_AT valuable_JJ lesson_NN from_IN those_DTS who_WPS celebrated_VBD the_AT first_OD Thanksgiving_NN Day_NN ._. The_AT Lord_NN ha_HVZ shown_VBN time_NN and_CC time_NN again_RB His_PP$ love_NN for_IN u_PPO ._. We_PPSS have_HV only_RB to_TO compare_VB the_AT liberty_NN and_CC high_JJ standard_NN of_IN living_VBG we_PPSS enjoy_VB in_IN this_DT great_JJ country_NN with_IN the_AT oppression_NN and_CC frugality_NN of_IN other_AP nation_NNS to_TO realize_VB with_IN humble_JJ gratitude_NN that_CS God's_NP$ Providence_NP ha_HVZ been_BEN with_IN u_PPO since_IN the_AT very_AP beginning_NN of_IN our_PP$ country_NN ._. And_CC yet_RB ,_, accompanying_VBG our_PP$ gratitude_NN is_BEZ the_AT realization_NN that_CS we_PPSS are_BER living_VBG in_IN a_AT crucial_JJ time_NN ._. With_IN world_NN peace_NN constantly_RB being_BEG threatened_VBN ,_, most_AP of_IN u_PPO regard_VB the_AT future_NN skeptically_RB ,_, and_CC even_RB with_IN fear_NN ._. It_PPS is_BEZ at_IN this_DT time_NN that_CS we_PPSS should_MD imitate_VB the_AT Pilgrims_NNS by_IN accompanying_VBG our_PP$ prayer_NNS of_IN thanks_NNS with_IN the_AT conviction_NN that_CS we_PPSS shall_MD continue_VB to_TO be_BE in_IN dire_JJ need_NN for_IN the_AT Lord's_NP$ protection_NN in_IN the_AT future_NN ,_, if_CS we_PPSS are_BER to_TO have_HV peace_NN ;_. ;_. now_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, do_DO I_PPSS ,_, John_NP A._NP Notte_NP ,_, Jr._NP ,_, governor_NN of_IN the_AT State_NN of_IN Rhode_NP Island_NN and_CC Providence_NP Plantations_NNS ,_, proclaim_VB Thursday_NR ,_, November_NP 23rd_OD ,_, 1961_CD ,_, a_CS Thanksgiving_NN Day_NN ,_, And_CC so_RB ,_, let_VB u_PPO remember_VB on_IN this_DT day_NN not_* only_RB to_TO thank_VB the_AT Almighty_NP Who_WPS gave_VBD hope_NN and_CC courage_NN to_IN the_AT Pilgrims_NNS ,_, but_CC also_RB to_TO place_VB our_PP$ trust_NN in_IN Him_PPO that_CS He_PPS will_MD continue_VB to_TO protect_VB u_PPO in_IN the_AT future_NN a_CS He_PPS ha_HVZ in_IN the_AT past_NN ._. In_IN testimony_NN whereof_WRB ,_, I_PPSS have_HV hereunto_RB set_VBN my_PP$ hand_NN and_CC caused_VBN the_AT seal_NN of_IN the_AT State_NN to_TO be_BE affixed_VBN this_DT 21st_OD day_NN of_IN November_NP ,_, in_IN the_AT year_NN of_IN Our_PP$ Lord_NN ,_, one_CD thousand_CD nine_CD hundred_CD and_CC sixty-one_CD and_CC of_IN Independence_NN ,_, the_AT one_CD hundred_CD and_CC eighty-sixth_OD ._. John_NP A._NP Notte_NP Jr._NP ,_, Governor_NN Be_BE it_PPS enacted_VBN by_IN the_AT Senate_NN and_CC House_NN of_IN Representatives_NNS of_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS of_IN America_NP in_IN Congress_NP assembled_VBN ,_, That_CS the_AT Act_NN of_IN July_NP 3_CD ,_, 1952_CD (_( 66_CD Stat._NN 328_CD )_) a_CS amended_VBN (_( 42_CD U.S.C._NP 1952-1958_CD )_) ,_, is_BEZ far_RBR amended_VBN to_TO read_VB a_CS follows_VBZ :_: Section_NN 1_CD ._. In_IN view_NN of_IN the_AT increasing_VBG shortage_NN of_IN usable_JJ surface_NN and_CC ground_NN water_NN in_IN many_AP part_NNS of_IN the_AT Nation_NN and_CC the_AT importance_NN of_IN finding_VBG new_JJ source_NNS of_IN supply_NN to_TO meet_VB it_PP$ present_JJ and_CC future_JJ water_NN need_NNS ,_, it_PPS is_BEZ the_AT policy_NN of_IN the_AT Congress_NP to_TO provide_VB for_IN the_AT development_NN of_IN practicable_JJ low-cost_NN mean_NNS for_IN the_AT large-scale_NN production_NN of_IN water_NN of_IN a_AT quality_NN suitable_JJ for_IN municipal_JJ ,_, industrial_JJ ,_, agricultural_JJ ,_, and_CC other_AP beneficial_JJ consumptive_JJ us_NNS from_IN saline_JJ water_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN study_NNS and_CC research_NN related_VBN thereto_RB ._. As_CS used_VBN in_IN this_DT Act_NN ,_, the_AT term_NN '_' saline_JJ water_NN '_' includes_VBZ sea_NN water_NN ,_, brackish_JJ water_NN ,_, and_CC other_AP mineralized_VBN or_CC chemically_RB charged_VBN water_NN ,_, and_CC the_AT term_NN '_' United_VBN States_NNS '_' extends_VBZ to_IN and_CC includes_VBZ the_AT District_NN of_IN Columbia_NP ,_, the_AT Commonwealth_NN of_IN Puerto_NP Rico_NP ,_, and_CC the_AT territory_NNS and_CC possession_NNS of_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS ._. Sec._NN 2_CD ._. In_IN order_NN to_TO accomplish_VB the_AT purpose_NNS of_IN this_DT Act_NN ,_, the_AT Secretary_NN of_IN the_AT Interior_NN shall_MD --_-- (_( A_NP )_) conduct_VB ,_, encourage_VB ,_, and_CC promote_VB fundamental_JJ scientific_JJ research_NN and_CC basic_JJ study_NNS to_TO develop_VB the_AT best_JJT and_CC most_QL economical_JJ process_NNS and_CC method_NNS for_IN converting_VBG saline_JJ water_NN into_IN water_NN suitable_JJ for_IN beneficial_JJ consumptive_JJ purpose_NNS ;_. ;_. (_( B_NP )_) conduct_VB engineering_VBG research_NN and_CC technical_JJ development_NN work_NN to_TO determine_VB ,_, by_IN laboratory_NN and_CC pilot_NN plant_NN testing_NN ,_, the_AT result_NNS of_IN the_AT research_NN and_CC study_NNS aforesaid_RB in_IN order_NN to_TO develop_VB process_NNS and_CC plant_NN design_NNS to_IN the_AT point_NN where_WRB they_PPSS can_MD be_BE demonstrated_VBN on_IN a_AT large_JJ and_CC practical_JJ scale_NN ;_. ;_. Sec._NN 3_CD ._. Sec._NN 4_CD ._. (_( B_NP )_) to_TO finance_VB ,_, for_IN not_* more_AP than_IN two_CD year_NNS beyond_IN the_AT end_NN of_IN said_VBN period_NN ,_, such_JJ grant_NNS ,_, contract_NNS ,_, cooperative_JJ agreement_NNS ,_, and_CC study_NNS a_CS may_MD theretofore_RB have_HV been_BEN undertaken_VBN pursuant_IN to_IN this_DT Act_NN ;_. ;_. and_CC (_( C_NP )_) to_TO finance_VB ,_, for_IN not_* more_AP than_IN three_CD year_NNS beyond_IN the_AT end_NN of_IN said_VBN period_NN ,_, such_JJ activity_NNS a_CS are_BER required_VBN to_TO correlate_VB ,_, coordinate_VB ,_, and_CC round_VB out_RP the_AT result_NNS of_IN study_NNS and_CC research_NN undertaken_VBN pursuant_IN to_IN this_DT Act_NN :_: Provided_VBN ,_, That_CS fund_NNS available_JJ in_IN any_DTI one_CD year_NN for_IN research_NN and_CC development_NN may_MD ,_, subject_JJ to_IN the_AT approval_NN of_IN the_AT Secretary_NN of_IN State_NN to_TO assure_VB that_CS such_JJ activity_NNS are_BER consistent_JJ with_IN the_AT foreign_JJ policy_NN objective_NNS of_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS ,_, be_BE expended_VBN in_IN cooperation_NN with_IN public_JJ or_CC private_JJ agency_NNS in_IN foreign_JJ country_NNS in_IN the_AT development_NN of_IN process_NNS useful_JJ to_IN the_AT program_NN in_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS :_: And_CC provided_VBN far_RBR ,_, That_CS every_AT such_JJ contract_NN or_CC agreement_NN made_VBN with_IN any_DTI public_JJ or_CC private_JJ agency_NN in_IN a_AT foreign_JJ country_NN shall_MD contain_VB provision_NNS effective_JJ to_TO insure_VB that_CS the_AT result_NNS or_CC information_NN developed_VBN in_IN connection_NN therewith_RB shall_MD be_BE available_JJ without_IN cost_NN to_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS for_IN the_AT use_NN of_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS throughout_IN the_AT world_NN and_CC for_IN the_AT use_NN of_IN the_AT general_JJ public_NN within_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS ._. Sec._NN 2_CD ._. Section_NN 4_CD of_IN the_AT joint_NN resolution_NN of_IN September_NP 2_CD ,_, 1958_CD (_( 72_CD Stat._NN 1707_CD ;_. ;_. 42_CD U._NP S._NP C._NP 1958_CD (_( )_) )_) ,_, is_BEZ hereby_RB amended_VBN to_TO read_VB :_: The_AT authority_NN of_IN the_AT Secretary_NN of_IN the_AT Interior_NN under_IN this_DT joint_JJ resolution_NN to_TO construct_VB ,_, operate_VB ,_, and_CC maintain_VB demonstration_NN plant_NNS shall_MD terminate_VB upon_IN the_AT expiration_NN of_IN twelve_CD year_NNS after_IN the_AT date_NN on_IN which_WDT this_DT joint_JJ resolution_NN is_BEZ approved_VBN ._. Approved_VBN September_NP 22_CD ,_, 1961_CD ._. Be_BE it_PPS enacted_VBN by_IN the_AT Senate_NN and_CC House_NN of_IN Representatives_NNS of_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS of_IN America_NP in_IN Congress_NP assembled_VBN ,_, That_CS the_AT Secretary_NN of_IN the_AT Interior_NN is_BEZ hereby_RB authorized_VBN and_CC directed_VBN to_TO make_VB or_CC cause_VB to_TO be_BE made_VBN a_AT study_NN covering_VBG --_-- (_( 1_CD )_) the_AT cause_NNS of_IN injury_NNS and_CC health_NN hazard_NNS in_IN Metal_NN and_CC nonmetallic_JJ mine_NNS (_( excluding_IN coal_NN and_CC lignite_NN mine_NNS )_) ;_. ;_. Sec._NN 2_CD ._. (_( A_NP )_) The_AT Secretary_NN of_IN the_AT Interior_NN or_CC any_DTI duly_RB authorized_VBN representative_NN shall_MD be_BE entitled_VBN to_IN admission_NN to_IN ,_, and_CC to_TO require_VB report_NNS from_IN the_AT operator_NN of_IN ,_, any_DTI metal_NN or_CC nonmetallic_JJ mine_NN which_WDT is_BEZ in_IN a_AT State_NN (_( excluding_IN any_DTI coal_NN or_CC lignite_NN mine_NN )_) ,_, the_AT product_NNS of_IN which_WDT regularly_RB enter_VB commerce_NN or_CC the_AT operation_NNS of_IN which_WDT substantially_RB affect_VB commerce_NN ,_, for_IN the_AT purpose_NN of_IN gathering_VBG data_NN and_CC information_NN necessary_JJ for_IN the_AT study_NN authorized_VBN in_IN the_AT first_OD section_NN of_IN this_DT Act_NN ._. Sec._NN 3_CD ._. Sec._NN 2_CD ._. (_( A_NP )_) Subject_JJ to_IN the_AT limitation_NNS of_IN this_DT Act_NN ,_, the_AT Secretary_NN shall_MD make_VB stabilization_NN payment_NNS to_IN small_JJ domestic_JJ producer_NNS upon_IN presentation_NN of_IN evidence_NN satisfactory_JJ to_IN him_PPO of_IN their_PP$ status_NN a_CS such_JJ producer_NNS and_CC of_IN the_AT sale_NN by_IN them_PPO of_IN newly_RB mined_VBN ore_NNS ,_, or_CC concentrate_NNS produced_VBN therefrom_RB ,_, a_CS provided_VBN in_IN this_DT Act_NN ._. (_( B_NP )_) Such_JJ payment_NNS shall_MD be_BE made_VBN to_IN small_JJ domestic_JJ producer_NNS of_IN lead_NN a_QL long_RB a_CS the_AT market_NN price_NN for_IN common_JJ lead_NN at_IN New_JJ York_NP ,_, New_JJ York_NP ,_, a_CS determined_VBN by_IN the_AT Secretary_NN ,_, is_BEZ below_IN 14-1/2_CD cent_NNS per_IN pound_NN ,_, and_CC such_JJ payment_NNS shall_MD be_BE 75_CD per_IN centum_NN of_IN the_AT difference_NN between_IN 14-1/2_CD cent_NNS per_IN pound_NN and_CC the_AT average_JJ market_NN price_NN for_IN the_AT month_NN in_IN which_WDT the_AT sale_NN occurred_VBD a_CS determined_VBN by_IN the_AT Secretary_NN ._. Armed_VBN Forces_NNS Medical_JJ Publication_NN Agency_NN The_AT Armed_VBN Forces_NNS Medical_JJ Publication_NN Agency_NN ,_, established_VBN in_IN 1949_CD ,_, ha_HVZ published_VBN ,_, since_IN January_NP 1950_CD ,_, The_AT United_VBN States_NNS Armed_VBN Forces_NNS Medical_JJ Journal_NN a_CS a_AT triservice_NN publication_NN to_TO furnish_VB material_NN of_IN professional_JJ interest_NN to_IN Medical_JJ Department_NN officer_NNS of_IN the_AT three_CD military_JJ service_NNS ._. Its_PP$ supplement_NN ,_, The_AT Medical_JJ Technicians_NNS Bulletin_NN ,_, supplied_VBD similar_JJ material_NN to_IN enlisted_VBN medical_JJ personnel_NNS ._. These_DTS publication_NNS replaced_VBD the_AT U._NP S._NP Naval_JJ Medical_JJ Bulletin_NN ,_, published_VBN continuously_RB from_IN 1907_CD through_IN 1959_CD ,_, a_QL well_RB a_CS the_AT Navy's_NN$ Hospital_NN Corps_NN Quarterly_NN and_CC the_AT Bulletin_NN of_IN the_AT U._NP S._NP Army_NN Medical_JJ Department_NN ,_, published_VBN from_IN 1922_CD to_IN 1949_CD ._. In_IN addition_NN ,_, their_PP$ establishment_NN made_VBD it_PPO unnecessary_JJ to_TO begin_VB publication_NN of_IN a_AT contemplated_VBN Air_NN Force_NN medical_JJ bulletin_NN ._. Estimated_VBN annual_JJ saving_NNS resulting_VBG from_IN publication_NN of_IN the_AT Journal_NN and_CC Bulletin_NN on_IN a_AT triservice_NN basis_NN ,_, a_CS compared_VBN with_IN the_AT cost_NN of_IN producing_VBG separate_JJ periodical_NNS for_IN each_DT service_NN ,_, were_BED between_IN $65,000_NNS and_CC $70,000_NNS ._. Additionally_RB ,_, on_IN the_AT many_AP ship_NNS at_IN sea_NN and_CC in_IN the_AT small_JJR naval_JJ station_NNS ,_, the_AT availability_NN of_IN the_AT Journal_NN removed_VBD the_AT necessity_NN of_IN subscribing_VBG to_IN several_AP additional_JJ journal_NNS of_IN civilian_JJ origin_NN over_IN and_CC above_IN the_AT quantity_NN now_RB authorized_VBN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO provide_VB any_DTI reasonably_RB comparable_JJ coverage_NN ._. From_IN 1_CD July_NP 1958_CD to_IN 30_CD June_NP 1960_CD ,_, 24_CD number_NNS of_IN the_AT Journal_NN and_CC nine_CD of_IN the_AT Bulletin_NN were_BED published_VBN ._.
