The_AT first_OD report_NN in_IN this_DT continuing_VBG series_NN appeared_VBD in_IN the_AT September_NP 1960_CD issue_NN of_IN the_AT Journal_NN ._. Another_DT recent_JJ achievement_NN wa_BEDZ the_AT successful_JJ development_NN of_IN a_AT method_NN for_IN the_AT complete_JJ combustion_NN in_IN a_AT bomb_NN calorimeter_NN of_IN a_AT metal_NN in_IN fluorine_NN when_WRB the_AT product_NN is_BEZ relatively_QL non-volatile_JJ ._. This_DT work_NN gave_VBD a_AT heat_NN of_IN formation_NN of_IN aluminum_NN fluoride_NN which_WDT closely_RB substantiates_VBZ a_AT value_NN which_WDT had_HVD been_BEN determined_VBN by_IN a_AT le_QL direct_JJ method_NN ,_, and_CC raise_VBZ this_DT property_NN to_IN 15_CD percent_NN above_IN that_DT accepted_VBN a_AT few_AP year_NNS ago_RB ._. Similar_JJ measurement_NNS are_BER being_BEG initiated_VBN to_TO resolve_VB a_AT large_JJ discrepancy_NN in_IN the_AT heat_NN of_IN formation_NN of_IN another_DT important_JJ combustion_NN product_NN ,_, beryllium_NN fluoride_NN ._. The_AT development_NN and_CC testing_NN of_IN new_JJ apparatus_NN to_TO measure_VB other_AP property_NNS is_BEZ nearing_VBG completion_NN ._. In_IN one_CD of_IN these_DTS ,_, an_AT exploding-wire_NN device_NN to_TO study_VB system_NNS thermodynamically_RB up_RP to_IN 6,000_CD Af_NN and_CC 100_CD atmosphere_NNS pressure_NN ,_, a_AT major_JJ goal_NN wa_BEDZ achieved_VBN ._. The_AT accuracy_NN of_IN measuring_VBG the_AT total_NN electrical_JJ energy_NN entering_VBG an_AT exploding_VBG wire_NN during_IN a_AT few_AP microsecond_NNS wa_BEDZ verified_VBN when_WRB two_CD independent_JJ type_NNS of_IN comparison_NN with_IN the_AT heat_NN energy_NN produced_VBN had_HVD an_AT uncertainty_NN of_IN le_AP than_IN 2_CD percent_NN ._. This_DT agreement_NN is_BEZ considered_VBN very_QL good_JJ for_IN such_QL short_JJ time_NN interval_NNS ._. The_AT method_NN of_IN calibration_NN employ_VBZ a_AT fixed_VBN resistance_NN element_NN a_CS a_AT calorimeter_NN ._. The_AT element_NN is_BEZ inserted_VBN in_IN the_AT discharge_NN circuit_NN in_IN place_NN of_IN the_AT exploding_VBG wire_NN ,_, and_CC the_AT calorimetric_JJ heating_NN of_IN the_AT element_NN is_BEZ measured_VBN with_IN high_JJ accuracy_NN ._. This_DT is_BEZ used_VBN a_CS a_AT reference_NN for_IN comparing_VBG the_AT ohmic_JJ heating_NN and_CC the_AT electrical_JJ energy_NN obtained_VBN from_IN the_AT measured_VBN current_NN through_IN the_AT element_NN and_CC the_AT measured_VBN voltage_NN across_IN the_AT element_NN ._. A_AT high-speed_NN shutter_NN ha_HVZ been_BEN developed_VBN in_IN order_NN to_TO permit_VB photographic_JJ observation_NN of_IN any_DTI portion_NN of_IN the_AT electrical_JJ wire_NN explosion_NN ._. The_AT shutter_NN consists_VBZ of_IN two_CD part_NNS :_: a_AT fast-opening_JJ part_NN and_CC a_AT fast-closing_JJ part_NN ._. Using_VBG Edgerton's_NP$ method_NN ,_, the_AT fast-closing_JJ action_NN is_BEZ obtained_VBN from_IN the_AT blackening_NN of_IN a_AT window_NN by_IN exploding_VBG a_AT series_NN of_IN parallel_JJ lead_NN wire_NNS ._. The_AT fast-opening_JJ of_IN the_AT shutter_NN consists_VBZ of_IN a_AT piece_NN of_IN aluminum_NN foil_NN (_( approximately_RB Af_NN )_) placed_VBN directly_RB in_IN front_NN of_IN the_AT camera_NN lens_NN so_CS that_CS no_AT light_NN may_MD pas_VB into_IN the_AT camera_NN ._. The_AT opening_VBG action_NN is_BEZ obtained_VBN when_WRB a_AT capacitor_NN ,_, charged_VBN to_IN high_JJ voltage_NN ,_, is_BEZ suddenly_RB discharged_VBN through_IN the_AT foil_NN ._. During_IN the_AT discharge_NN the_AT magnetic_JJ force_NNS set_VBN up_RP by_IN the_AT passage_NN of_IN current_NN cause_VB the_AT edge_NNS of_IN the_AT foil_NN to_TO roll_VB inward_RB toward_IN it_PP$ center_NN line_NN ,_, thus_RB allowing_VBG light_NN to_TO pas_VB into_IN the_AT camera_NN ._. Experiments_NNS have_HV shown_VBN that_CS the_AT shutter_NN is_BEZ 75_CD percent_NN open_JJ in_IN about_RB 60-80_CD microsecond_NNS ._. The_AT shutter_NN aperture_NN may_MD be_BE made_VBN large_JJR or_CC small_JJR by_IN changing_VBG the_AT foil_NN area_NN and_CC adjusting_VBG the_AT electrical_JJ energy_NN input_NN to_IN the_AT foil_NN ._. Laboratory_NN measurement_NNS of_IN interstellar_JJ radio_NN spectrum_NNS ._. Besides_IN the_AT well-known_JJ hydrogen_NN line_NN at_IN 21_CD cm_NN wavelength_NN ,_, the_AT spectrum_NNS of_IN extraterrestrial_JJ radio_NN source_NNS may_MD contain_VB sharp_JJ line_NNS characteristic_JJ of_IN other_AP atom_NNS ,_, ion_NNS ,_, and_CC small_JJ molecule_NNS ._. The_AT detection_NN and_CC study_NN of_IN such_JJ line_NN spectrum_NNS would_MD add_VB considerably_RB to_IN present_JJ information_NN on_IN interstellar_JJ gas_NN cloud_NNS and_CC ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, planetary_JJ atmosphere_NNS ._. Among_IN the_AT most_QL likely_JJ producer_NNS of_IN detectable_JJ radio_NN line_NN spectrum_NNS are_BER the_AT light_JJ diatomic_JJ hydride_NNS OH_NN and_CC CH_NN ;_. ;_. somewhat_QL le_QL likely_JJ source_NNS are_BER the_AT heavy_JJR hydride_NNS SH_NN ,_, SiH_NN ,_, and_CC Aj_NN ._. Very_QL small_JJ concentration_NNS of_IN these_DTS hydride_NNS should_MD be_BE detectable_JJ ;_. ;_. in_IN interstellar_JJ gas_NN ,_, concentration_NNS a_QL low_JJ a_CS Af_NN molecule_NNS per_IN Af_NN may_MD be_BE sufficient_JJ ,_, a_CS compared_VBN to_IN the_AT Af_NN hydrogen_NN atom's_NN$ Af_NN required_VBN for_IN detection_NN of_IN the_AT 21-cm_NN line_NN ._. High_JJ sensitivity_NN in_IN radio_NN telescope_NNS is_BEZ achieved_VBN by_IN reducing_VBG the_AT bandwidth_NN of_IN the_AT receiver_NN ;_. ;_. therefore_RB ,_, only_RB with_IN precise_JJ foreknowledge_NN of_IN the_AT line_NN frequency_NNS is_BEZ an_AT astronomical_JJ search_NN for_IN the_AT radio_NN spectrum_NNS of_IN these_DTS molecule_NNS feasible_JJ ._. To_TO secure_VB precise_JJ measurement_NNS of_IN these_DTS frequency_NNS ,_, a_AT research_NN program_NN in_IN free_JJ radical_NN microwave_NN spectroscopy_NN ha_HVZ been_BEN started_VBN ._. Since_CS conventional_JJ method_NNS are_BER insensitive_JJ at_IN the_AT low_JJ frequency_NNS of_IN these_DTS molecular_JJ transition_NNS ,_, the_AT paramagnetic_JJ resonance_NN method_NN is_BEZ being_BEG used_VBN instead_RB ._. This_DT involves_VBZ the_AT application_NN of_IN a_AT strong_JJ magnetic_JJ field_NN to_IN the_AT radical_NN vapor_NN ,_, which_WDT shift_VBZ the_AT low-frequency_NN spectrum_NNS to_IN a_AT conveniently_RB high_JJ microwave_NN range_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PPSS may_MD be_BE measured_VBN with_IN optimum_JJ sensitivity_NN ._. The_AT first_OD diatomic_JJ hydride_NN investigated_VBN by_IN the_AT paramagnetic_JJ resonance_NN method_NN wa_BEDZ the_AT OH_NN radical_NN ._. Results_NNS of_IN this_DT experiment_NN include_VB the_AT frequency_NNS of_IN the_AT two_CD strong_JJ spectral_JJ line_NNS by_IN which_WDT OH_NN may_MD be_BE identified_VBN in_IN interstellar_JJ gas_NN ;_. ;_. the_AT frequency_NNS are_BER 1665.32_CD and_CC 1667.36_CD Af_NN ,_, with_IN an_AT uncertainty_NN of_IN 0.10_CD Af_NN ._. Success_NN in_IN observing_VBG these_DTS spectral_JJ line_NNS ha_HVZ so_QL far_RB ,_, apparently_RB ,_, been_BEN confined_VBN to_IN the_AT laboratory_NN ;_. ;_. extraterrestrial_JJ observation_NNS have_HV yet_RB to_TO be_BE reported_VBN ._. Preparations_NNS are_BER being_BEG made_VBN for_IN similar_JJ experiment_NNS on_IN CH_NN and_CC SH_NN radical_NNS ._. Low_JJ temperature_NN thermometry_NN ._. The_AT Bureau_NN is_BEZ pursuing_VBG an_AT active_JJ program_NN to_TO provide_VB a_AT temperature_NN scale_NN and_CC thermometer_NN calibration_NN service_NNS in_IN the_AT range_NN 1.5_CD to_IN 20_CD Af_NN ._. The_AT effort_NNS and_CC accomplishment_NNS fall_VB into_IN three_CD main_JJS category_NNS :_: absolute_JJ thermometry_NN based_VBN upon_IN the_AT velocity_NN of_IN sound_NN in_IN helium_NN gas_NN ,_, secondary_JJ thermometry_NN involving_VBG principally_RB study_NNS of_IN the_AT behavior_NN of_IN germanium_NN resistor_NNS ,_, and_CC helium-4_NN vapor-pressure_NN measurement_NNS (_( see_VB p._NN 144_CD )_) ._. Acoustical_JJ interferometer_NN ._. An_AT acoustical_JJ interferometer_NN ha_HVZ been_BEN constructed_VBN and_CC used_VBN ,_, with_IN helium_NN gas_NN a_CS the_AT thermometric_JJ fluid_NN ,_, to_TO measure_VB temperature_NNS near_IN 4.2_CD and_CC 2.1_CD Af_NN ._. Such_ABL an_AT interferometer_NN provides_VBZ a_AT mean_NN of_IN absolute_JJ temperature_NN measurement_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD be_BE used_VBN a_CS an_AT alternative_NN to_IN the_AT gas_NN thermometer_NN ._. When_WRB value_NNS of_IN temperature_NN derived_VBN with_IN this_DT instrument_NN were_BED compared_VBN with_IN the_AT accepted_VBN value_NNS associated_VBN with_IN liquid_NN helium-4_NN vapor_NN pressure_NNS ,_, difference_NNS of_IN about_RB 10_CD and_CC 7_CD millidegree_NNS respectively_RB were_BED found_VBN ._. This_DT result_NN is_BEZ preliminary_JJ ,_, and_CC work_NN is_BEZ continuing_VBG ._. Resistance_NN thermometer_NNS ._. Carbon_NN resistor_NNS and_CC impurity-doped_JJ germanium_NN resistor_NNS have_HV been_BEN investigated_VBN for_IN use_NN a_CS precision_JJ secondary_JJ thermometer_NNS in_IN the_AT liquid_NN helium_NN temperature_NN region_NN ._. Several_AP germanium_NN resistor_NNS have_HV been_BEN thermally_RB cycled_VBN from_IN 300_CD to_IN 4.2_CD Af_NN and_CC their_PP$ resistance_NNS have_HV been_BEN found_VBN to_TO be_BE reproducible_JJ within_IN 1/3_CD millidegree_NN when_WRB temperature_NNS were_BED derived_VBN from_IN a_AT vapor_NN pressure_NN thermometer_NN whose_WP$ tubing_NN is_BEZ jacketed_VBN through_IN most_AP of_IN the_AT liquid_NN helium_NN ._. Preliminary_JJ calibration_NNS of_IN the_AT resistor_NNS have_HV been_BEN made_VBN from_IN 4.21_CD to_IN 2.16_CD Af_NN at_IN every_AT 0.1_CD Af_NN ._. The_AT estimated_VBN standard_JJ deviation_NNS of_IN the_AT data_NN for_IN two_CD of_IN the_AT resistor_NNS were_BED 1_CD millidegree_NN ;_. ;_. and_CC for_IN the_AT third_OD resistor_NN ,_, 3.3_CD millidegree_NNS ._. Vapor_NN pressure_NN method_NN ._. The_AT reproducibility_NNS of_IN helium_NN vapor-pressure_NN thermometer_NNS have_HV been_BEN investigated_VBN in_IN conjunction_NN with_IN a_AT ``_`` constant_JJ temperature_NN ''_'' liquid_NN helium_NN bath_NN from_IN 4.2_CD to_IN 1.8_CD Af_NN ._. Surface_NN temperature_NN gradient_NNS have_HV been_BEN found_VBN to_TO exist_VB in_IN liquid_NN helium_NN bath_NNS contained_VBN in_IN 15-_CD and_CC 25-liter_JJ metallic_JJ storage_NN dewar_NNS ._. The_AT gradient_NN wa_BEDZ about_RB one_CD half_ABN of_IN a_AT millidegree_NN at_IN 4.2_CD Af_NN but_CC increased_VBD to_IN several_AP millidegree_NNS for_IN bath_NN temperature_NNS slightly_QL great_JJR than_CS the_AT **yl_NN point_NN ._. A_AT hydrostatic_JJ head_NN correction_NN ha_HVZ been_BEN neither_CC necessary_JJ nor_CC applicable_JJ in_IN the_AT determination_NN of_IN vapor_NN pressure_NNS or_CC temperature_NNS for_IN the_AT bulk_JJ liquid_NN helium_NN ._. However_RB ,_, the_AT surface_NN temperature_NN gradient_NN can_MD produce_VB erroneous_JJ vapor-pressure_NN measurement_NNS for_IN the_AT bulk_JJ liquid_NN helium_NN unless_CS precaution_NNS are_BER taken_VBN to_TO isolate_VB the_AT tube_NN (_( which_WDT pass_VBZ through_IN the_AT surface_NN to_IN the_AT vapor_NN pressure_NN bulb_NN )_) from_IN the_AT liquid_NN helium_NN surface_NN ._. It_PPS ha_HVZ also_RB been_BEN observed_VBN ,_, in_IN helium_NN 2_CD ,_, that_CS large_JJ discrepancy_NNS can_MD exist_VB between_IN surface_NN vapor_NN pressure_NNS and_CC those_DTS pressure_NNS measured_VBN by_IN a_AT vapor_NN pressure_NN thermometer_NN ._. This_DT ha_HVZ been_BEN attributed_VBN to_IN helium_NN film_NN flow_NN in_IN the_AT vapor_NN pressure_NN thermometer_NN ._. In_IN this_DT case_NN also_RB the_AT design_NN of_IN the_AT thermometer_NN can_MD be_BE modified_VBN to_TO reduce_VB the_AT helium_NN film_NN flow_NN ._. Pressure_NN transducer_NN for_IN pvt_NN measurement_NNS ._. Precise_JJ pressure-volume-temperature_NN measurement_NNS on_IN corrosive_JJ gas_NNS are_BER dependent_JJ on_IN a_AT sensitive_JJ yet_CC rugged_JJ pressure_NN transducer_NN ._. A_AT prototype_NN which_WDT fulfills_VBZ the_AT requirement_NNS wa_BEDZ developed_VBN and_CC thoroughly_RB tested_VBN ._. The_AT transducer_NN is_BEZ a_AT null-type_JJ instrument_NN and_CC employ_VBZ a_AT stretched_VBN diaphragm_NN ,_, 0.001_CD in._NN thick_JJ and_CC 1_CD in._NN in_IN diameter_NN ._. A_AT small_JJ pressure_NN unbalance_NN displaces_VBZ the_AT diaphragm_NN and_CC change_VBZ the_AT capacitance_NN between_IN the_AT diaphragm_NN and_CC an_AT electrically_RB insulated_VBN plate_NN spaced_VBN 0.001_CD in._NN apart_RB (_( for_IN Af_NN )_) ._. Spherical_JJ concave_JJ backing_VBG surface_NNS support_VB the_AT diaphragm_NN when_WRB excessive_JJ pressure_NNS are_BER applied_VBN and_CC prevent_VB the_AT stress_NNS within_IN the_AT diaphragm_NN from_IN exceeding_VBG the_AT elastic_JJ limit_NN ._. Over_IN a_AT temperature_NN range_NN from_IN 25_CD to_IN 200_CD Af_NN and_CC at_IN pressure_NNS up_RP to_IN 250_CD atm_NN ,_, an_AT overload_NN of_IN 300_CD psi_NN ,_, applied_VBN for_IN a_AT period_NN of_IN one_CD day_NN ,_, result_VBZ in_IN an_AT uncertainty_NN in_IN the_AT pressure_NN of_IN ,_, at_IN most_AP ,_, one_CD millimeter_NN of_IN mercury_NN ._. Transport_NN property_NNS of_IN air_NN ._. A_AT 6-year_JJ study_NN of_IN the_AT transport_NN property_NNS of_IN air_NN at_IN elevated_VBN temperature_NNS ha_HVZ been_BEN completed_VBN ._. This_DT project_NN wa_BEDZ carried_VBN out_RP under_IN sponsorship_NN of_IN the_AT Ballistic_JJ Missile_NN Division_NN of_IN the_AT Air_NN Research_NN and_CC Development_NN Command_NN ,_, U.S._NP Air_NN Force_NN ,_, and_CC had_HVD a_CS it_PP$ goal_NN the_AT investigation_NN of_IN the_AT transport_NN by_IN diffusion_NN of_IN the_AT heat_NN energy_NN of_IN chemical_NN binding_VBG ._. A_AT significant_JJ effect_NN discovered_VBN during_IN the_AT study_NN is_BEZ the_AT existence_NN of_IN Prandtl_NP number_NNS reaching_VBG value_NNS of_IN more_AP than_IN unity_NN in_IN the_AT nitrogen_NN dissociation_NN region_NN ._. Another_DT effect_NN discovered_VBN is_BEZ the_AT large_JJ coefficient_NN of_IN thermal_JJ diffusion_NN tending_VBG to_TO separate_VB nitrogen_NN from_IN the_AT oxygen_NN when_WRB temperature_NN difference_NNS straddling_VBG the_AT nitrogen_NN dissociation_NN region_NN are_BER present_RB ._. The_AT result_NNS of_IN the_AT study_NN ,_, based_VBN on_IN collision_NN integral_NNS computed_VBN from_IN the_AT late_JJT critically_RB evaluated_VBN data_NN on_IN intermolecular_JJ force_NNS in_IN air_NN ,_, will_MD be_BE reported_VBN in_IN the_AT form_NN of_IN a_AT table_NN of_IN viscosity_NN ,_, thermal_JJ conductivity_NN ,_, thermal_JJ diffusion_NN ,_, and_CC diffusion_NN coefficient_NNS at_IN temperature_NNS of_IN 1,000_CD to_IN 10,000_CD Af_NN and_CC of_IN logarithm_NN of_IN pressure_NN in_IN atmosphere_NNS from_IN Af_NN to_IN Af_NN time_NNS normal_JJ density_NN ._. International_JJ cooperative_JJ activity_NNS ._. Temperature_NN symposium_NN ._. During_IN the_AT last_AP week_NN of_IN march_NN 1961_CD ,_, Columbus_NP ,_, Ohio_NP wa_BEDZ the_AT site_NN of_IN the_AT Fourth_OD Symposium_NN on_IN Temperature_NN ,_, Its_PP$ Measurement_NN And_CC Control_NN In_IN Science_NN And_CC Industry_NN ._. The_AT Symposium_NN ,_, which_WDT wa_BEDZ jointly_RB sponsored_VBN by_IN the_AT American_JJ Institute_NN of_IN Physics_NN ,_, the_AT Instrument_NN Society_NN of_IN America_NP ,_, and_CC the_AT National_JJ Bureau_NN of_IN Standards_NNS ,_, attracted_VBD nearly_RB one_CD thousand_CD registrant_NNS ,_, including_IN many_AP from_IN abroad_RB ._. The_AT Bureau_NN contributed_VBD to_IN the_AT planning_NN and_CC success_NN of_IN the_AT Symposium_NN through_IN the_AT effort_NNS of_IN Mr._NP W._NP A._NP Wildhack_NP ,_, General_JJ Chairman_NN ,_, and_CC Dr._NN C._NP M._NP Herzfeld_NP ,_, Program_NN Chairman_NN ._. Dr._NN A._NP V._NP Astin_NP ,_, NBS_NN Director_NN ,_, opened_VBD the_AT 5-day_JJ session_NN with_IN introductory_JJ remark_NNS ,_, following_VBG which_WDT a_AT total_NN of_IN twenty-six_CD paper_NNS were_BED given_VBN throughout_IN the_AT week_NN by_IN NBS_NN scientist_NNS ,_, from_IN both_ABX the_AT Washington_NP and_CC Boulder_NP Laboratories_NNS ._. 2.1.6_CD ._. Atomic_JJ physic_NN In_IN addition_NN to_IN the_AT basic_JJ program_NNS in_IN wavelength_NN standard_NNS ,_, spectroscopy_NN ,_, solid_NN state_NN physic_NN ,_, interaction_NNS of_IN the_AT free_JJ electron_NN and_CC atomic_JJ constant_NNS which_WDT are_BER necessary_JJ to_TO provide_VB the_AT foundation_NN for_IN technological_JJ progress_NN ,_, the_AT Bureau_NN ha_HVZ strengthened_VBN it_PP$ activity_NNS in_IN laboratory_NN astrophysics_NN ._. The_AT program_NNS in_IN infrared_JJ spectroscopy_NN are_BER undergoing_VBG reorientation_NN toward_IN wavelength_NN standard_NNS in_IN the_AT far_JJ infrared_NN ,_, the_AT application_NN of_IN infrared_JJ technique_NNS to_IN solid_NN state_NN study_NNS ,_, and_CC increased_VBN emphasis_NN on_IN high_JJ resolution_NN instrumentation_NN ._. Laboratory_NN astrophysics_NN ._. Transition_NN probability_NNS ._. Under_IN the_AT sponsorship_NN of_IN the_AT Office_NN of_IN Naval_JJ Research_NN and_CC the_AT Advanced_JJ Research_NN Projects_NNS Agency_NN ,_, a_AT data_NN center_NN wa_BEDZ established_VBN to_TO gather_VB and_CC index_VB all_ABN published_VBN information_NN on_IN atomic_JJ transition_NN probability_NNS ._. An_AT exhaustive_JJ survey_NN wa_BEDZ made_VBN of_IN the_AT literature_NN ,_, and_CC a_AT primary_JJ reference_NN file_NN of_IN approximately_RB 600_CD reference_NNS wa_BEDZ catalogued_VBN ._. Selected_VBN bibliography_NNS and_CC table_NNS of_IN available_JJ data_NN are_BER now_RB in_IN preparation_NN ._. A_AT wall-stabilized_JJ high-current_NN arc_NN source_NN wa_BEDZ constructed_VBN and_CC used_VBN to_TO study_VB transition_NN probability_NNS of_IN atomic_JJ hydrogen_NN and_CC oxygen_NN ._. This_DT apparatus_NN will_MD also_RB be_BE used_VBN to_TO measure_VB transition_NN probability_NNS of_IN a_AT large_JJ number_NN of_IN other_AP element_NNS ._. A_AT study_NN of_IN the_AT hydrogen_NN line_NN profile_NNS indicates_VBZ that_CS a_AT measurement_NN of_IN these_DTS profile_NNS can_MD be_BE used_VBN to_TO calculate_VB a_AT temperature_NN for_IN the_AT arc_NN plasma_NN that_WPS is_BEZ reliable_JJ to_IN about_RB Af_NN percent_NN ._. A_AT set_NN of_IN table_NNS containing_VBG spectral_JJ intensity_NNS for_IN 39,000_CD line_NNS of_IN 70_CD element_NNS ,_, a_CS observed_VBN in_IN a_AT copper_NN matrix_NN in_IN a_AT d-c_NN arc_NN ,_, wa_BEDZ completed_VBN and_CC published_VBN ._. Studies_NNS of_IN the_AT intensity_NN data_NN indicate_VB that_CS they_PPSS may_MD be_BE converted_VBN to_IN approximate_JJ transition_NN probability_NNS ._. These_DTS data_NN are_BER not_* of_IN the_AT precision_NN obtainable_JJ by_IN the_AT method_NNS previously_RB mentioned_VBN ,_, but_CC the_AT vast_JJ number_NN of_IN approximate_JJ value_NNS available_JJ will_MD be_BE useful_JJ in_IN many_AP area_NNS ._. The_AT Navy_NN ,_, on_IN April_NP 25_CD ,_, announced_VBD it_PPS is_BEZ bringing_VBG back_RB the_AT carrier_NN Shangri-La_NP from_IN the_AT Mediterranean_NP ,_, increasing_VBG to_IN four_CD the_AT number_NN of_IN attack_NN carrier_NNS in_IN the_AT vicinity_NN of_IN Cuba_NP ._. More_AP than_IN 36_CD other_AP big_JJ Navy_NN ship_NNS are_BER no_AT le_AP than_IN a_AT day's_NN$ sailing_VBG time_NN away_RB ._. To_TO round_VB out_RP the_AT blockading_VBG force_NN ,_, submarine_NNS would_MD be_BE needed_VBN --_-- to_TO locate_VB ,_, identify_VB and_CC track_VB approaching_VBG vessel_NNS ._. Land-based_JJ radar_NN would_MD help_VB with_IN this_DT task_NN ._. So_RB would_MD radar_NN picket_NN ship_NNS ._. A_AT squadron_NN of_IN Navy_NN jet_NNS and_CC another_DT of_IN long-range_NN patrol_NN plane_NNS would_MD add_VB support_NN to_IN the_AT carrier_NN task_NN force_NNS ._. Three_CD requirement_NNS go_VB with_IN a_AT blockade_NN :_: It_PPS must_MD be_BE proclaimed_VBN ;_. ;_. the_AT blockading_VBG force_NN must_MD be_BE powerful_JJ enough_QLP to_TO enforce_VB it_PPO ;_. ;_. and_CC it_PPS must_MD be_BE enforced_VBN without_IN discrimination_NN ._. Once_CS these_DTS condition_NNS of_IN international_JJ law_NN are_BER met_VBN ,_, country_NNS that_WPS try_VB to_TO run_VB the_AT blockade_NN do_DO so_RB at_IN their_PP$ own_JJ risk_NN ._. Blockade_NN runner_NNS can_MD be_BE stopped_VBN --_-- by_IN gunfire_NN ,_, if_CS necessary_JJ --_-- searched_VBN and_CC held_VBN ,_, at_IN least_AP temporarily_RB ._. They_PPSS could_MD be_BE sent_VBN to_IN U.S._NP port_NNS for_IN ruling_NNS whether_CS cargo_NN should_MD be_BE confiscated_VBN ._. What_WDT could_MD a_AT blockade_NN accomplish_VB ?_. ?_. Plenty_NN ,_, say_VB the_AT expert_NNS ._. In_IN a_AT broad_JJ sense_NN ,_, it_PPS would_MD reaffirm_VB the_AT Monroe_NP Doctrine_NN by_IN opposing_VBG Communist_JJ interference_NN in_IN the_AT Western_JJ Hemisphere_NN ._. It_PPS could_MD ,_, by_IN avoiding_VBG direct_JJ intervention_NN ,_, provide_VB a_AT short-of-war_JJ strategy_NN to_TO meet_VB short-of-war_JJ infiltration_NN ._. Primary_JJ target_NN would_MD be_BE shipment_NNS of_IN tank_NNS ,_, gun_NNS ,_, aviation_NN gasoline_NN and_CC ammunition_NN coming_VBG from_IN Russia_NP and_CC Czechoslovakia_NP ._. Shipments_NNS of_IN arm_NNS from_IN Western_JJ country_NNS could_MD similarly_RB be_BE seized_VBN a_CS contraband_NN ._. In_IN a_AT total_NN blockade_NN ,_, action_NN could_MD also_RB be_BE taken_VBN against_IN ship_NNS bringing_VBG in_RP chemical_NNS ,_, oil_NNS ,_, textile_NNS ,_, and_CC even_RB foodstuff_NNS ._. At_IN time_NNS ,_, three_CD ship_NNS a_AT day_NN from_IN the_AT Soviet_NP bloc_NN are_BER unloading_VBG in_IN Cuban_JJ port_NNS ._. From_IN it_PP$ inception_NN in_IN 1920_CD with_IN the_AT passage_NN of_IN Public_JJ Law_NN 236_CD ,_, 66th_OD Congress_NP ,_, the_AT purpose_NN of_IN the_AT vocational_JJ rehabilitation_NN program_NN ha_HVZ been_BEN to_TO assist_VB the_AT States_NNS ,_, by_IN mean_NNS of_IN grant-in-aid_NNS ,_, to_TO return_VB disabled_VBN men_NNS and_CC woman_NNS to_IN productive_JJ ,_, gainful_JJ employment_NN ._. The_AT authority_NN for_IN the_AT program_NN wa_BEDZ renewed_VBN several_AP time_NNS until_CS the_AT vocational_JJ rehabilitation_NN program_NN wa_BEDZ made_VBN permanent_JJ a_CS Title_NN 5_CD ,_, of_IN the_AT Social_JJ Security_NN Act_NN in_IN 1935_CD ._. Up_RP to_IN this_DT time_NN and_CC for_IN the_AT next_AP eight_CD year_NNS ,_, the_AT service_NNS provided_VBN disabled_VBN person_NNS consisted_VBD mainly_RB of_IN training_VBG ,_, counseling_VBG ,_, and_CC placement_NN on_IN a_AT job_NN ._. Recognizing_VBG the_AT limitation_NNS of_IN such_ABL a_AT program_NN ,_, the_AT 78th_OD Congress_NP in_IN 1943_CD passed_VBD P._NP L._NP 113_CD ,_, which_WDT broadened_VBD the_AT concept_NN of_IN rehabilitation_NN to_TO include_VB the_AT provision_NN of_IN physical_JJ restoration_NN service_NNS to_TO remove_VB or_CC reduce_VB disability_NNS ,_, and_CC which_WDT revised_VBD the_AT financing_VBG structure_NN ._. Recent_JJ change_NNS ._. Despite_IN the_AT successful_JJ rehabilitation_NN of_IN over_RP a_AT half_ABN million_CD disabled_VBN person_NNS in_IN the_AT first_OD eleven_CD year_NNS after_IN 1943_CD ,_, the_AT existing_VBG program_NN wa_BEDZ still_RB seen_VBN to_TO be_BE inadequate_JJ to_TO cope_VB with_IN the_AT nation's_NN$ backlog_NN of_IN an_AT estimated_VBN two_CD million_CD disabled_VBN ._. To_TO assist_VB the_AT States_NNS ,_, therefore_RB ,_, in_IN rehabilitating_VBG handicapped_VBN individual_NNS ,_, ``_`` so_CS that_CS they_PPSS may_MD prepare_VB for_IN and_CC engage_VB in_IN remunerative_JJ employment_NN to_IN the_AT extent_NN of_IN their_PP$ capability_NNS ''_'' ,_, the_AT 83rd_OD Congress_NP enacted_VBD the_AT Vocational_JJ Rehabilitation_NN Amendments_NNS of_IN 1954_CD (_( P._NP L._NP 565_NP )_) ._. These_DTS amendment_NNS to_IN the_AT Vocational_JJ Rehabilitation_NN Act_NN were_BED designed_VBN to_TO help_VB provide_VB for_IN more_AP specialized_VBN rehabilitation_NN facility_NNS ,_, for_IN more_AP sheltered_VBN and_CC ``_`` half-way_JJ ''_'' workshop_NNS ,_, for_IN great_JJR number_NNS of_IN adequately_RB trained_VBN personnel_NNS ,_, for_IN more_AP comprehensive_JJ service_NNS to_IN individual_NNS (_( particularly_RB to_IN the_AT homebound_JJ and_CC the_AT blind_JJ )_) ,_, and_CC for_IN other_AP administrative_JJ improvement_NNS to_TO increase_VB the_AT program's_NN$ overall_JJ effectiveness_NN ._. Financial_JJ aspect_NNS ._. Under_IN the_AT law_NN a_CS it_PPS existed_VBD until_IN 1943_CD ,_, the_AT Federal_JJ Government_NN made_VBD grant_NNS to_IN the_AT States_NNS on_IN the_AT basis_NN of_IN population_NN ,_, matching_VBG State_NN expenditure_NNS on_IN a_AT 50-50_CD basis_NN ._. Under_IN P._NP L._NP 113_CD ,_, 78th_OD Congress_NP ,_, the_AT Federal_JJ Government_NN assumed_VBD responsibility_NN for_IN 100%_NN of_IN necessary_JJ State_NN expenditure_NNS in_IN connection_NN with_IN administration_NN and_CC the_AT counseling_NN and_CC placement_NN of_IN the_AT disabled_VBN ,_, and_CC for_IN 50%_NN of_IN the_AT necessary_JJ cost_NNS of_IN providing_VBG client_NNS with_IN rehabilitation_NN case_NN service_NNS ._. Throughout_IN these_DTS year_NNS ,_, the_AT statutory_JJ authorization_NN wa_BEDZ for_IN such_JJ sum_NNS a_CS were_BED necessary_JJ to_TO carry_VB out_RP the_AT provision_NNS of_IN the_AT Act_NN ._. The_AT 1954_CD Amendments_NNS completely_RB changed_VBD the_AT financing_NN of_IN the_AT vocational_JJ rehabilitation_NN program_NN ,_, providing_VBG for_IN a_AT three-part_JJ grant_NN structure_NN --_-- for_IN (_( 1_CD )_) basic_JJ support_NN ;_. ;_. (_( 2_CD )_) extension_NN and_CC improvement_NN ;_. ;_. and_CC (_( 3_CD )_) research_NN ,_, demonstration_NNS ,_, training_VBG and_CC traineeship_NNS for_IN vocational_JJ rehabilitation_NN --_-- and_CC in_IN addition_NN for_IN short-term_NN training_NN and_CC instruction_NN ._. The_AT first_OD part_NN of_IN the_AT new_JJ structure_NN --_-- that_DT for_IN supporting_VBG the_AT basic_JJ program_NN of_IN vocational_JJ rehabilitation_NN service_NNS --_-- is_BEZ described_VBN in_IN this_DT Section_NN ._. Subsequent_JJ section_NNS on_IN grant_NNS describe_VB the_AT other_AP category_NNS of_IN the_AT grant_NN structure_NN ._. The_AT following_VBG table_NN show_VBZ ,_, for_IN selected_VBN year_NNS ,_, the_AT authorization_NNS ,_, appropriation_NNS ,_, allotment_NN base_NN ,_, Federal_JJ grant_NNS to_IN States_NNS and_CC State_NN matching_VBG fund_NNS for_IN this_DT part_NN of_IN the_AT grant_NN program_NN :_: method_NN of_IN distributing_VBG fund_NNS description_NN of_IN formula_NN ._. In_IN order_NN to_TO assist_VB the_AT States_NNS in_IN maintaining_VBG basic_JJ vocational_JJ rehabilitation_NN service_NNS ,_, Section_NN 2_CD of_IN the_AT amended_VBN Act_NN provides_VBZ that_CS allotment_NNS to_IN States_NNS for_IN support_NN of_IN such_JJ service_NNS be_BE based_VBN on_IN (_( 1_CD )_) need_NN ,_, a_CS measured_VBN by_IN a_AT State's_NN$ population_NN ,_, and_CC (_( 2_CD )_) fiscal_JJ capacity_NN ,_, a_CS measured_VBN by_IN it_PP$ per_IN caput_NNS income_NN ._. The_AT Act_NN far_RBR provides_VBZ for_IN a_AT ``_`` floor_NN ''_'' or_CC minimum_JJ allotment_NN ,_, set_VBN at_IN the_AT 1954_CD level_NN ,_, which_WDT is_BEZ called_VBN the_AT ``_`` base_NN ''_'' allotment_NN ,_, and_CC a_AT ``_`` ceiling_NN ''_'' or_CC maximum_JJ allotment_NN ,_, for_IN each_DT State_NN ._. It_PPS stipulates_VBZ ,_, in_IN addition_NN ,_, that_CS all_ABN amount_NNS remaining_VBG a_CS a_AT result_NN of_IN imposing_VBG the_AT ``_`` ceiling_NN ''_'' ,_, and_CC not_* used_VBN for_IN insuring_VBG the_AT ``_`` floor_NN ''_'' ,_, be_BE redistributed_VBN to_IN those_DTS States_NNS still_RB below_IN their_PP$ maximum_NNS ._. These_DTS provision_NNS are_BER designed_VBN to_TO reflect_VB the_AT difference_NNS in_IN wealth_NN and_CC population_NN among_IN the_AT States_NNS ,_, with_IN the_AT objective_NN that_CS a_AT vocationally_RB handicapped_VBN person_NN have_HV access_NN to_IN needed_VBN service_NNS regardless_RB of_IN whether_CS he_PPS resides_VBZ in_IN a_AT State_NN with_IN a_AT low_JJ or_CC high_JJ per_IN caput_NNS income_NN or_CC a_AT sparsely_RB or_CC thickly_RB populated_VBN State_NN ._. The_AT provision_NNS are_BER also_RB designed_VBN to_TO avoid_VB disruption_NN in_IN State_NN program_NNS already_RB in_IN operation_NN ,_, which_WDT might_MD otherwise_RB result_VB from_IN the_AT allotment_NN of_IN fund_NNS on_IN the_AT basis_NN of_IN wealth_NN and_CC population_NN alone_RB ._. Method_NN of_IN computing_VBG allotment_NNS ._. The_AT method_NN used_VBN in_IN computing_VBG the_AT allotment_NNS is_BEZ specifically_RB set_VBN forth_RB in_IN the_AT Act_NN ._. The_AT term_NN ``_`` State_NN ''_'' mean_VBZ the_AT several_AP States_NNS ,_, the_AT District_NN of_IN Columbia_NP ,_, the_AT Virgin_NN Islands_NNS ,_, Guam_NP and_CC Puerto_NP Rico_NP ;_. ;_. the_AT term_NN ``_`` United_VBN States_NNS ''_'' includes_VBZ the_AT several_AP States_NNS and_CC the_AT District_NN of_IN Columbia_NP ,_, and_CC excludes_VBZ the_AT Virgin_NN Islands_NNS ,_, Guam_NP and_CC Puerto_NP Rico_NP ,_, and_CC ,_, prior_RB to_IN 1962_CD ,_, Alaska_NP and_CC Hawaii_NP ._. The_AT following_VBG step_NNS are_BER employed_VBN in_IN calculation_NNS :_: 1_CD ._. For_IN each_DT State_NN (_( except_IN Puerto_NP Rico_NP ,_, Guam_NP ,_, the_AT Virgin_NN Islands_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, prior_RB to_IN 1962_CD ,_, Alaska_NP and_CC Hawaii_NP )_) determine_VB average_JJ per_IN caput_NNS income_NN based_VBN on_IN the_AT last_AP three_CD year_NNS ._. (_( See_VB Source_NN of_IN Data_NNS ,_, below_RB for_IN per_IN caput_NNS income_NN data_NN to_TO be_BE used_VBN in_IN this_DT step_NN ._. )_) 2_CD ._. Determine_VB the_AT ratio_NN of_IN 50%_NN to_IN the_AT average_JJ per_IN caput_NNS income_NN of_IN the_AT U._NP S._NP (_( Divide_VB 50_CD by_IN the_AT result_NN obtained_VBN in_IN item_NN 2_CD above_RB ._. )_) 4_CD ._. Determine_VB for_IN each_DT State_NN (_( except_IN the_AT Virgin_NN Islands_NNS ,_, Guam_NP and_CC Puerto_NP Rico_NP ,_, and_CC ,_, prior_RB to_IN 1962_CD ,_, Alaska_NP and_CC Hawaii_NP )_) that_DT percentage_NN which_WDT bear_VBZ the_AT same_AP ratio_NN to_IN 50%_NN a_CS the_AT particular_JJ State's_NN$ average_JJ per_IN caput_NNS income_NN bear_VBZ to_IN the_AT average_JJ per_IN caput_NNS income_NN of_IN the_AT U._NP S._NP ._. (_( Multiply_VB the_AT result_NN obtained_VBN in_IN item_NN 3_CD above_RB by_IN the_AT result_NN obtained_VBN for_IN each_DT State_NN in_IN item_NN 1_CD above_RB ._. )_) 5_CD ._. Determine_VB the_AT particular_JJ State's_NN$ ``_`` allotment_NN percentage_NN ''_'' ._. By_IN law_NN this_DT is_BEZ 75%_NN for_IN the_AT Virgin_NN Islands_NNS ,_, Guam_NP and_CC Puerto_NP Rico_NP ._. (_( Alaska_NP and_CC Hawaii_NP had_HVD fixed_VBN allotment_NN percentage_NNS in_IN effect_NN prior_RB to_IN fiscal_JJ year_NN 1962_CD ._. )_) In_IN all_ABN other_AP States_NNS it_PPS is_BEZ the_AT difference_NN obtained_VBN by_IN subtracting_VBG from_IN 100_CD the_AT result_NN obtained_VBN in_IN item_NN 4_CD above_RB ;_. ;_. except_IN that_CS no_AT State_NN shall_MD have_HV an_AT allotment_NN percentage_NN le_AP than_IN 33-1/3%_NN nor_CC more_AP than_IN 75%_NN ._. If_CS the_AT resulting_VBG difference_NN for_IN the_AT particular_JJ State_NN is_BEZ le_AP or_CC more_AP than_IN these_DTS extreme_NNS ,_, the_AT State's_NN$ allotment_NN percentage_NN must_MD be_BE raised_VBN or_CC lowered_VBN to_IN the_AT appropriate_JJ extreme_NN ._. 6_CD ._. Square_VB each_DT State's_NN$ allotment_NN percentage_NN ._. 7_CD ._. Determine_VB each_DT State's_NN$ population_NN ._. (_( See_VB Source_NN of_IN Data_NNS ,_, below_RB for_IN population_NN data_NN to_TO be_BE used_VBN in_IN this_DT step_NN ._. )_) 8_CD ._. (_( Multiply_VB result_NN obtained_VBN in_IN item_NN 7_CD above_RB ,_, by_IN result_NN obtained_VBN in_IN item_NN 6_CD above_RB ._. )_) 9_CD ._. Determine_VB the_AT sum_NN of_IN the_AT product_NNS obtained_VBN in_IN item_NN 8_CD above_RB ,_, for_IN all_ABN the_AT States_NNS ._. (_( For_IN each_DT State_NN ,_, make_VB all_ABN computation_NNS set_VBN forth_RB in_IN item_NNS 1_CD to_IN 8_CD above_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB add_VB the_AT result_NNS obtained_VBN for_IN each_DT State_NN in_IN item_NN 8_CD ._. )_) 10_CD ._. Determine_VB the_AT ratio_NN that_WPS the_AT amount_NN being_BEG allotted_VBN is_BEZ to_IN the_AT sum_NN of_IN the_AT product_NNS for_IN all_ABN the_AT States_NNS ._. (_( Divide_VB the_AT amount_NN being_BEG allotted_VBN by_IN the_AT result_NN obtained_VBN in_IN item_NN 9_CD above_RB ._. )_) 11_CD ._. (_( Multiply_VB the_AT State_NN product_NN in_IN item_NN 8_CD above_RB by_IN the_AT result_NN obtained_VBN in_IN item_NN 10_CD above_RB ._. )_) 12_CD ._. Determine_VB if_CS the_AT particular_JJ State's_NN$ unadjusted_JJ allotment_NN (_( result_NN obtained_VBN in_IN item_NN 11_CD above_RB )_) is_BEZ great_JJR than_CS it_PP$ maximum_JJ allotment_NN ,_, and_CC if_CS so_RB lower_VB it_PP$ unadjusted_JJ allotment_NN to_IN it_PP$ maximum_JJ allotment_NN ._. (_( Each_DT State's_NN$ unadjusted_JJ allotment_NN for_IN any_DTI fiscal_JJ year_NN ,_, which_WDT exceeds_VBZ it_PP$ minimum_JJ allotment_NN described_VBN in_IN item_NN 13_CD below_RB by_IN a_AT percentage_NN great_JJR than_IN one_CD and_CC one-half_NN time_NNS the_AT percentage_NN by_IN which_WDT the_AT sum_NN being_BEG allotted_VBN exceeds_VBZ $23,000,000_NNS ,_, must_MD be_BE reduced_VBN by_IN the_AT amount_NN of_IN the_AT excess_NN ._. )_) 13_CD ._. Determine_VB if_CS the_AT particular_JJ State's_NN$ unadjusted_JJ allotment_NN (_( result_NN obtained_VBN in_IN item_NN 11_CD above_RB )_) is_BEZ le_AP than_IN it_PP$ minimum_JJ (_( base_NN )_) allotment_NN ,_, and_CC if_CS so_RB raise_VB it_PP$ unadjusted_JJ allotment_NN to_IN it_PP$ minimum_JJ allotment_NN ._. Regardless_RB of_IN it_PP$ unadjusted_JJ allotment_NN ,_, each_DT State_NN is_BEZ guaranteed_VBN by_IN law_NN a_AT minimum_JJ allotment_NN each_DT year_NN equal_JJ to_IN the_AT allotment_NN which_WDT it_PPS received_VBD in_IN fiscal_JJ year_NN 1954_CD --_-- increased_VBN by_IN a_AT uniform_JJ percentage_NN of_IN 5.4865771_CD which_WDT brings_VBZ total_NN 1954_CD allotment_NNS to_IN all_ABN States_NNS up_RP to_IN $23,000,000_NNS ._. 14_CD ._. The_AT fund_NNS recouped_VBN by_IN reduction_NNS in_IN item_NN 12_CD above_RB are_BER used_VBN :_: first_RB ,_, to_TO increase_VB the_AT unadjusted_JJ allotment_NNS to_IN the_AT specified_VBN minimum_NN in_IN those_DTS States_NNS where_WRB the_AT unadjusted_JJ allotment_NN is_BEZ le_AP than_IN the_AT minimum_JJ allotment_NN (_( item_NN 13_CD above_RB )_) ;_. ;_. and_CC second_RB ,_, to_TO increase_VB uniformly_RB the_AT allotment_NNS to_IN those_DTS States_NNS whose_WP$ allotment_NNS are_BER below_IN their_PP$ maximum_NNS ,_, with_IN adjustment_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_AT allotment_NN of_IN any_DTI State_NN from_IN thereby_RB exceeding_VBG it_PP$ maximum_JJ ._. Additional_JJ note_NN on_IN allotment_NNS ._. For_IN the_AT States_NNS which_WDT maintain_VB two_CD separate_JJ agency_NNS --_-- one_CD for_IN the_AT vocational_JJ rehabilitation_NN of_IN the_AT blind_JJ ,_, and_CC one_CD for_IN the_AT rehabilitation_NN of_IN person_NNS other_AP than_IN the_AT blind_JJ --_-- the_AT Act_NN specifies_VBZ that_CS their_PP$ minimum_JJ (_( base_NN )_) allotment_NN shall_MD be_BE divided_VBN between_IN the_AT two_CD agency_NNS in_IN the_AT same_AP proportion_NN a_CS it_PPS wa_BEDZ divided_VBN in_IN fiscal_JJ year_NN 1954_CD ._. Funds_NNS allotted_VBN in_IN addition_NN to_IN their_PP$ minimum_JJ allotment_NN are_BER apportioned_VBN to_IN the_AT two_CD agency_NNS a_CS they_PPSS may_MD determine_VB ._. Matching_VBG requirement_NNS explanation_NN of_IN matching_VBG formula_NN ._. As_CS is_BEZ the_AT case_NN with_IN the_AT allotment_NN provision_NNS for_IN support_NN of_IN vocational_JJ rehabilitation_NN service_NNS ,_, the_AT matching_VBG requirement_NNS are_BER also_RB based_VBN on_IN a_AT statutory_JJ formula_NN ._. Prior_RB to_IN 1960_CD ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO provide_VB matching_VBG for_IN the_AT minimum_JJ (_( base_NN )_) allotment_NN ,_, State_NN fund_NNS had_HVD to_TO equal_VB 1954_CD State_NN fund_NNS ._. Prior_RB to_IN and_CC since_IN 1960_CD the_AT rest_NN of_IN the_AT support_NN allotment_NN is_BEZ matched_VBN at_IN rate_NNS related_VBN to_IN the_AT fiscal_JJ capacity_NN of_IN the_AT State_NN ,_, with_IN a_AT pivot_NN of_IN 40%_NN State_NN (_( or_CC 60%_NN Federal_JJ )_) participation_NN in_IN total_NN program_NN cost_NNS ._. The_AT percentage_NN of_IN Federal_JJ participation_NN in_IN such_JJ cost_NNS for_IN any_DTI State_NN is_BEZ referred_VBN to_IN in_IN the_AT law_NN a_CS that_DT State's_NN$ ``_`` Federal_JJ share_NN ''_'' ._. For_IN purpose_NNS of_IN this_DT explanation_NN ,_, this_DT percentage_NN is_BEZ referred_VBN to_IN a_CS the_AT State's_NN$ ``_`` unadjusted_JJ Federal_JJ share_NN ''_'' ._. Beginning_VBG in_IN 1960_CD ,_, the_AT matching_VBG requirement_NNS for_IN the_AT base_NN allotment_NN are_BER being_BEG adjusted_VBN (_( upward_RB or_CC downward_RB ,_, a_CS required_VBN )_) 25%_NN a_AT year_NN ,_, so_CS that_CS by_IN 1963_CD the_AT entire_JJ support_NN allotment_NN will_MD be_BE matched_VBN on_IN the_AT basis_NN of_IN a_AT 40%_NN pivot_NN State_NN share_NN ,_, with_IN maximum_JJ and_CC minimum_JJ State_NN share_NNS of_IN 50%_NN and_CC 30%_NN ,_, respectively_RB ._. The_AT pre-1960_JJ rate_NN of_IN Federal_JJ participation_NN with_IN respect_NN to_IN any_DTI State's_NN$ base_NN allotment_NN ,_, a_QL well_RB a_CS the_AT adjusted_VBN rate_NN in_IN effect_NN during_IN the_AT 1960_CD -_IN 1962_CD period_NN ,_, is_BEZ designated_VBN by_IN the_AT statute_NN a_CS that_DT State's_NN$ ``_`` adjusted_VBN Federal_JJ Share_NN ''_'' ._. The_AT provision_NNS for_IN determining_VBG a_AT State's_NN$ unadjusted_JJ Federal_JJ share_NN are_BER designed_VBN to_TO reflect_VB the_AT varying_VBG financial_JJ resource_NNS among_IN the_AT States_NNS ._. The_AT purpose_NN of_IN the_AT adjusted_VBN Federal_JJ share_NN relating_VBG to_IN the_AT base_NN allotment_NN and_CC of_IN the_AT transition_NN provision_NNS for_IN reaching_VBG the_AT unadjusted_JJ Federal_JJ share_NN is_BEZ to_TO prevent_VB dislocation_NNS from_IN abrupt_JJ change_NNS in_IN matching_VBG rate_NNS ._. Method_NN of_IN computing_VBG Federal_JJ share_NNS ._. The_AT method_NN used_VBN for_IN computing_VBG the_AT respective_JJ Federal_JJ and_CC State_NN share_NNS in_IN total_NN program_NN cost_NNS is_BEZ specifically_RB set_VBN forth_RB in_IN the_AT Act_NN ._. The_AT term_NN ``_`` State_NN ''_'' mean_VBZ the_AT several_AP States_NNS ,_, the_AT District_NN of_IN Columbia_NP ,_, the_AT Virgin_NN Islands_NNS ,_, Guam_NP and_CC Puerto_NP Rico_NP ;_. ;_. the_AT term_NN ``_`` United_VBN States_NNS ''_'' includes_VBZ the_AT several_AP States_NNS and_CC the_AT District_NN of_IN Columbia_NP and_CC excludes_VBZ the_AT Virgin_NN Islands_NNS ,_, Guam_NP and_CC Puerto_NP Rico_NP ,_, and_CC ,_, prior_RB to_IN 1962_CD ,_, Alaska_NP and_CC Hawaii_NP ._. For_IN each_DT State_NN (_( except_IN the_AT Virgin_NN Islands_NNS ,_, Guam_NP ,_, Puerto_NP Rico_NP ,_, and_CC ,_, prior_RB to_IN 1962_CD ,_, Alaska_NP and_CC Hawaii_NP )_) ,_, determine_VB the_AT average_JJ per_IN caput_NNS income_NN for_IN the_AT last_AP three_CD year_NNS ._. (_( the_AT same_AP amount_NN used_VBN in_IN item_NN 1_CD under_IN Method_NN Of_IN Computing_VBG Allotments_NNS ,_, above_RB ._. )_) 2_CD ._. (_( The_AT same_AP amount_NN used_VBN in_IN item_NN 2_CD under_IN Method_NN Of_IN Computing_VBG Allotments_NNS ,_, above_RB ._. )_) 3_CD ._. Radio_NN reception_NN ._. 4_CD ._. Lighting_VBG ._. The_AT entrance_NN must_MD have_HV at_IN least_AP one_CD right-angle_NN turn_NN ._. Radiation_NN scatter_VBZ somewhat_RB like_CS light_NN ._. Living_VBG in_IN a_AT shelter_NN The_AT radioactivity_NN of_IN fallout_NN decay_VBZ rapidly_RB at_IN first_RB ._. Forty-nine_CD hour_NNS after_IN an_AT atomic_JJ burst_NN the_AT radiation_NN intensity_NN is_BEZ only_RB about_RB 1_CD percent_NN of_IN what_WDT it_PPS wa_BEDZ an_AT hour_NN after_IN the_AT explosion_NN ._. Radiation_NN instrument_NNS suitable_JJ for_IN home_NR use_NN are_BER available_JJ ,_, and_CC would_MD be_BE of_IN value_NN in_IN locating_VBG that_DT portion_NN of_IN the_AT home_NN which_WDT offer_VBZ the_AT best_JJT protection_NN against_IN fallout_NN radiation_NN ._. There_EX is_BEZ a_AT possibility_NN that_CS battery-powered_JJ radio_NNS with_IN built-in_JJ radiation_NN meter_NNS may_MD become_VB available_JJ ._. One_CD instrument_NN thus_RB would_MD serve_VB both_ABX purpose_NNS ._. Your_PP$ local_JJ civil_JJ defense_NN will_MD gather_VB it_PP$ own_JJ information_NN and_CC will_MD receive_VB broad_JJ information_NN from_IN State_NN and_CC Federal_JJ source_NNS ._. It_PPS will_MD tell_VB you_PPO a_QL soon_RB a_CS possible_JJ :_: How_WQL long_RB to_TO stay_VB in_IN your_PP$ shelter_NN ;_. ;_. How_WQL soon_RB you_PPSS may_MD go_VB outdoors_RB ;_. ;_. How_WQL long_RB you_PPSS may_MD stay_VB outside_RB ._. You_PPSS should_MD be_BE prepared_VBN to_TO stay_VB in_IN your_PP$ shelter_NN full_JJ time_NN for_IN at_IN least_AP several_AP day_NNS and_CC to_TO make_VB it_PPO your_PP$ home_NR for_IN 14_CD day_NNS or_CC longer_RBR ._. A_AT checklist_NN in_IN the_AT Appendix_NN (_( (_( page_NN 30_CD )_) tell_VBZ what_WDT is_BEZ needed_VBN ._. Families_NNS with_IN child_NNS will_MD have_HV particular_JJ problem_NNS ._. However_RB ,_, a_QL much_AP time_NN a_CS possible_JJ should_MD be_BE spent_VBN within_IN the_AT shelter_NN to_TO hold_VB radiation_NN exposure_NN to_IN a_AT minimum_NN ._. The_AT housekeeping_NN problem_NNS of_IN living_VBG in_IN a_AT shelter_NN will_MD begin_VB a_QL soon_RB a_CS the_AT shelter_NN is_BEZ occupied_VBN ._. Food_NN ,_, medical_JJ supply_NNS ,_, utensil_NNS ,_, and_CC equipment_NN ,_, if_CS not_* already_RB stored_VBN in_IN the_AT shelter_NN ,_, must_MD be_BE quickly_RB gathered_VBN up_RP and_CC carried_VBN into_IN it_PPO ._. Sanitation_NN in_IN the_AT confines_NNS of_IN the_AT family_NN shelter_NN will_MD require_VB much_AP thought_NN and_CC planning_NN ._. Water_NN rationing_NN will_MD be_BE difficult_JJ and_CC should_MD be_BE planned_VBN carefully_RB ._. A_AT portable_JJ electric_JJ heater_NN is_BEZ advisable_JJ for_IN shelter_NNS in_IN cold_JJ climate_NNS ._. Even_RB if_CS the_AT electric_JJ power_NN fails_VBZ after_IN an_AT attack_NN ,_, any_DTI time_NN that_CS the_AT heater_NN ha_HVZ been_BEN used_VBN will_MD make_VB the_AT shelter_NN that_QL much_QL more_QL comfortable_JJ ._. Body_NN heat_NN in_IN the_AT close_JJ quarter_NNS will_MD help_VB keep_VB up_RP the_AT temperature_NN ._. Warm_JJ clothing_NN and_CC bedding_NN ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, are_BER essential_JJ ._. Open-flame_NN heating_NN or_CC cooking_VBG should_MD be_BE avoided_VBN ._. A_AT flame_NN would_MD use_VB up_RP air_NN ._. Some_DTI family_NNS already_RB have_HV held_VBN weekend_NN rehearsal_NNS in_IN their_PP$ home_NN shelter_NNS to_TO learn_VB the_AT problem_NNS and_CC to_TO determine_VB for_IN themselves_PPLS what_WDT supply_NNS they_PPSS would_MD need_VB ._. 4_CD ._. If_CS an_AT attack_NN find_VBZ you_PPO without_IN a_AT prepared_VBN shelter_NN Few_AP area_NNS ,_, if_CS any_DTI ,_, are_BER a_QL good_JJ a_CS prepared_VBN shelter_NNS but_CC they_PPSS are_BER worth_JJ knowing_VBG about_IN ._. A_AT family_NN dwelling_NN without_IN a_AT basement_NN provides_VBZ some_DTI natural_JJ shielding_NN from_IN fallout_NN radiation_NN ._. On_IN the_AT ground_NN floor_NN the_AT radiation_NN would_MD be_BE about_RB half_RB what_WDT it_PPS is_BEZ outside_RB ._. The_AT best_JJT protection_NN would_MD be_BE on_IN the_AT ground_NN floor_NN in_IN the_AT central_JJ part_NN of_IN the_AT house_NN ._. A_AT belowground_JJ basement_NN can_MD cut_VB the_AT fallout_NN radiation_NN to_IN one-tenth_NN of_IN the_AT outside_JJ level_NN ._. The_AT safe_JJT place_NN is_BEZ the_AT basement_NN corner_NN least_RBT exposed_VBN to_IN window_NNS and_CC deepest_RBT below_IN ground_NN ._. If_CS there_EX is_BEZ time_NN after_IN the_AT warning_VBG ,_, the_AT basement_NN shielding_NN could_MD be_BE improved_VBN substantially_RB by_IN blocking_VBG window_NNS with_IN brick_NNS ,_, dirt_NN ,_, book_NNS ,_, magazine_NNS ,_, or_CC other_AP heavy_JJ material_NN ._. 5_CD ._. Shelter_NN in_IN apartment_NN building_NNS Large_JJ apartment_NN building_NNS of_IN masonry_NN or_CC concrete_NN provide_VB good_JJR natural_JJ shelter_NN than_CS the_AT usual_JJ family_NN dwelling_NNS ._. In_IN general_JJ ,_, such_JJ apartment_NNS afford_VB more_AP protection_NN than_CS small_JJR building_NNS because_CS their_PP$ wall_NNS are_BER thick_JJ and_CC there_EX is_BEZ more_AP space_NN ._. The_AT central_JJ area_NN of_IN the_AT ground_NN floor_NN of_IN a_AT heavily_RB constructed_VBN apartment_NN building_NN ,_, with_IN concrete_NN floor_NNS ,_, should_MD provide_VB more_AP fallout_NN protection_NN than_CS the_AT ordinary_JJ basement_NN of_IN a_AT family_NN dwelling_NN ._. The_AT basement_NN of_IN such_ABL an_AT apartment_NN building_NN may_MD provide_VB a_QL much_AP natural_JJ protection_NN a_CS the_AT specially_RB constructed_VBN concrete_NN block_NN shelter_NN recommended_VBN for_IN the_AT basement_NN of_IN a_AT family_NN dwelling_NN ._. The_AT Federal_JJ Government_NN is_BEZ aiding_VBG local_JJ government_NNS in_IN several_AP place_NNS to_TO survey_VB residential_JJ ,_, commercial_JJ and_CC industrial_JJ building_NNS to_TO determine_VB what_WDT fallout_NN protection_NN they_PPSS would_MD provide_VB ,_, and_CC for_IN how_WQL many_AP people_NNS ._. The_AT problem_NN for_IN the_AT city_NN apartment_NN dweller_NN is_BEZ primarily_RB to_TO plan_VB the_AT use_NN of_IN existing_VBG space_NN ._. Such_JJ planning_NN will_MD require_VB the_AT cooperation_NN of_IN other_AP occupant_NNS and_CC of_IN the_AT apartment_NN management_NN ._. A_AT former_AP Du_NP Pont_NP official_NN became_VBD a_AT General_NN Motors_NNS vice_NN president_NN and_CC set_VBD about_RB maximizing_VBG Du_NP Pont's_NP$ share_NN of_IN the_AT General_NN Motors_NNS market_NN ._. Lines_NNS of_IN communication_NNS were_BED established_VBN between_IN the_AT two_CD company_NNS and_CC several_AP Du_NP Pont_NP product_NNS were_BED actively_RB promoted_VBN ._. Within_IN a_AT few_AP year_NNS various_JJ Du_NP Pont_NP manufactured_VBN item_NNS were_BED filling_VBG the_AT entire_JJ requirement_NNS of_IN from_IN four_CD to_IN seven_CD of_IN General_NN Motors'_NNS$ eight_CD operating_VBG division_NNS ._. The_AT Fisher_NP Body_NN division_NN ,_, long_RB controlled_VBN by_IN the_AT Fisher_NP brother_NNS under_IN a_AT voting_VBG trust_NN even_RB though_CS General_NN Motors_NNS owned_VBD a_AT majority_NN of_IN it_PP$ stock_NN ,_, followed_VBD an_AT independent_JJ course_NN for_IN many_AP year_NNS ,_, but_CC by_IN 1947_CD and_CC 1948_CD ``_`` resistance_NN had_HVD collapsed_VBN ''_'' and_CC it_PP$ purchase_NNS from_IN Du_NP Pont_NP ``_`` compared_VBD favorably_RB ''_'' with_IN purchase_NNS by_IN other_AP General_NN Motors_NNS division_NNS ._. The_AT inference_NN is_BEZ overwhelming_JJ that_CS Du_NP Pont's_NP$ commanding_VBG position_NN wa_BEDZ promoted_VBN by_IN it_PP$ stock_NN interest_NN and_CC wa_BEDZ not_* gained_VBN solely_RB on_IN competitive_JJ merit_NN ''_'' ._. 353_CD U._NP S._NP ,_, at_IN 605_CD ._. This_DT Court_NN agreed_VBD with_IN the_AT trial_NN court_NN ``_`` that_CS consideration_NNS of_IN price_NN ,_, quality_NN and_CC service_NN were_BED not_* overlooked_VBN by_IN either_CC Du_NP Pont_NP or_CC General_NN Motors_NNS ''_'' ._. 353_CD U._NP S._NP ,_, at_IN 606_CD ._. However_RB ,_, it_PPS determined_VBD that_CS neither_CC this_DT factor_NN ,_, nor_CC ``_`` the_AT fact_NN that_CS all_ABN concerned_VBN in_IN high_JJ executive_NN post_NNS in_IN both_ABX company_NNS acted_VBD honorably_RB and_CC fairly_RB ,_, each_DT in_IN the_AT honest_JJ conviction_NN that_CS his_PP$ action_NNS were_BED in_IN the_AT best_JJT interest_NNS of_IN his_PP$ own_JJ company_NN and_CC without_IN any_DTI design_NN to_TO overreach_VB anyone_PN ,_, including_IN Du_NP Pont's_NP$ competitor_NNS ''_'' ,_, outweighed_VBD the_AT Government's_NN$ claim_NN for_IN relief_NN ._. This_DT claim_NN ,_, a_CS submitted_VBN to_IN the_AT District_NN Court_NN and_CC dismissed_VBN by_IN it_PPO ,_, 126_CD F.Supp.235_NP ,_, alleged_VBD violation_NN not_* only_RB of_IN 7_NN of_IN the_AT Clayton_NP Act_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB of_IN 1_NN and_CC 2_CD of_IN the_AT Sherman_NP Act_NN ._. The_AT latter_AP provision_NNS proscribe_VB any_DTI contract_NN ,_, combination_NN ,_, or_CC conspiracy_NN in_IN restraint_NN of_IN interstate_JJ or_CC foreign_JJ trade_NN ,_, and_CC monopolization_NN of_IN ,_, or_CC attempt_NNS ,_, combination_NNS ,_, or_CC conspiracy_NNS to_TO monopolize_VB ,_, such_JJ trade_NN ._. However_RB ,_, this_DT Court_NN put_VBD to_IN one_CD side_NN without_IN consideration_NN the_AT Government's_NN$ appeal_NN from_IN the_AT dismissal_NN of_IN it_PP$ Sherman_NP Act_NN allegation_NNS ._. It_PPS rested_VBD it_PP$ decision_NN solely_RB on_IN 7_NN ,_, which_WDT read_VBZ in_IN pertinent_JJ part_NN :_: ``_`` No_AT corporation_NN engaged_VBN in_IN commerce_NN shall_MD acquire_VB ,_, directly_RB or_CC indirectly_RB ,_, the_AT whole_NN or_CC any_DTI part_NN of_IN the_AT stock_NN or_CC other_AP share_NN capital_NN of_IN another_DT corporation_NN engaged_VBN also_RB in_IN commerce_NN ,_, where_WRB the_AT effect_NN of_IN such_JJ acquisition_NN may_MD be_BE to_TO substantially_RB lessen_VB competition_NN between_IN the_AT corporation_NN whose_WP$ stock_NN is_BEZ so_RB acquired_VBN and_CC the_AT corporation_NN making_VBG the_AT acquisition_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO restrain_VB such_JJ commerce_NN in_IN any_DTI section_NN or_CC community_NN ,_, or_CC tend_VB to_TO create_VB a_AT monopoly_NN of_IN any_DTI line_NN of_IN commerce_NN ._. This_DT section_NN shall_MD not_* apply_VB to_IN corporation_NNS purchasing_VBG such_JJ stock_NN solely_RB for_IN investment_NN and_CC not_* using_VBG the_AT same_AP by_IN voting_VBG or_CC otherwise_RB to_TO bring_VB about_RP ,_, or_CC in_IN attempting_VBG to_TO bring_VB about_RP ,_, the_AT substantial_JJ lessening_NN of_IN competition_NN ._. ''_'' The_AT purpose_NN of_IN this_DT provision_NN wa_BEDZ thus_RB explained_VBN in_IN the_AT Court's_NN$ opinion_NN :_: ``_`` Section_NN 7_CD is_BEZ designed_VBN to_TO arrest_VB in_IN it_PP$ incipiency_NN not_* only_RB the_AT substantial_JJ lessening_NN of_IN competition_NN from_IN the_AT acquisition_NN by_IN one_CD corporation_NN of_IN the_AT whole_NN or_CC any_DTI part_NN of_IN the_AT stock_NN of_IN a_AT competing_VBG corporation_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB to_TO arrest_VB in_IN their_PP$ incipiency_NN restraint_NNS or_CC monopoly_NNS in_IN a_AT relevant_JJ market_NN which_WDT ,_, a_CS a_AT reasonable_JJ probability_NN ,_, appear_VB at_IN the_AT time_NN of_IN suit_NN likely_JJ to_TO result_VB from_IN the_AT acquisition_NN by_IN one_CD corporation_NN of_IN all_ABN or_CC any_DTI part_NN of_IN the_AT stock_NN of_IN any_DTI other_AP corporation_NN ._. The_AT section_NN is_BEZ violated_VBN whether_CS or_CC not_* actual_JJ restraint_NNS or_CC monopoly_NNS ,_, or_CC the_AT substantial_JJ lessening_NN of_IN competition_NN ,_, have_HV occurred_VBN or_CC are_BER intended_VBN ._. ''_'' 353_CD U._NP S._NP ,_, at_IN 589_CD ._. Thus_RB ,_, a_AT finding_NN of_IN conspiracy_NN to_TO restrain_VB trade_NN or_CC attempt_VB to_TO monopolize_VB wa_BEDZ excluded_VBN from_IN the_AT Court's_NN$ decision_NN ._. Indeed_RB ,_, a_CS already_RB noted_VBN ,_, the_AT Court_NN proceeded_VBD on_IN the_AT assumption_NN that_CS the_AT executive_NNS involved_VBN in_IN the_AT dealing_NNS between_IN Du_NP Pont_NP and_CC General_NN Motors_NNS acted_VBD ``_`` honorably_RB and_CC fairly_RB ''_'' and_CC exercised_VBD their_PP$ business_NN judgment_NN only_RB to_TO serve_VB what_WDT they_PPSS deemed_VBD the_AT best_JJT interest_NNS of_IN their_PP$ own_JJ company_NNS ._. This_DT ,_, however_RB ,_, did_DOD not_* bar_VB finding_VBG that_CS Du_NP Pont_NP had_HVD become_VBN pre-eminent_JJ a_CS a_AT supplier_NN of_IN automotive_JJ fabric_NNS and_CC finish_NNS to_IN General_NN Motors_NNS ;_. ;_. that_CS these_DTS product_NNS constituted_VBD a_AT ``_`` line_NN of_IN commerce_NN ''_'' within_IN the_AT meaning_NN of_IN the_AT Clayton_NP Act_NN ;_. ;_. that_CS General_NN Motors'_NNS$ share_NN of_IN the_AT market_NN for_IN these_DTS product_NNS wa_BEDZ substantial_JJ ;_. ;_. and_CC that_DT competition_NN for_IN this_DT share_NN of_IN the_AT market_NN wa_BEDZ endangered_VBN by_IN the_AT financial_JJ relationship_NN between_IN the_AT two_CD concern_NNS :_: ``_`` The_AT statutory_JJ policy_NN of_IN fostering_VBG free_JJ competition_NN is_BEZ obviously_RB furthered_VBN when_WRB no_AT supplier_NN ha_HVZ an_AT advantage_NN over_IN his_PP$ competitor_NNS from_IN an_AT acquisition_NN of_IN his_PP$ customer's_NN$ stock_NN likely_JJ to_TO have_HV the_AT effect_NNS condemned_VBN by_IN the_AT statute_NN ._. ''_'' 353_CD U._NP S._NP ,_, at_IN 607_CD ._. The_AT plan_NN called_VBD for_IN divestiture_NN by_IN Du_NP Pont_NP of_IN it_PP$ 63,000,000_CD share_NNS of_IN General_NN Motors_NNS stock_NN by_IN equal_JJ annual_JJ distribution_NNS to_IN it_PP$ stockholder_NNS ,_, a_CS a_AT dividend_NN ,_, over_IN a_AT period_NN of_IN ten_CD year_NNS ._. Christiana_NP Securities_NNS Company_NN and_CC Delaware_NP Realty_NN &_CC Investment_NN Company_NN ,_, major_JJ stockholder_NNS in_IN Du_NP Pont_NP ,_, and_CC the_AT stockholder_NNS of_IN Delaware_NP were_BED dealt_VBN with_IN specially_RB by_IN provision_NNS requiring_VBG the_AT annual_JJ sale_NN by_IN a_AT trustee_NN ,_, again_RB over_IN a_AT ten-year_JJ period_NN ,_, of_IN Du_NP Pont's_NP$ General_NN Motors_NNS stock_NN allocable_JJ to_IN them_PPO ,_, a_QL well_RB a_CS any_DTI General_NN Motors_NNS stock_NN which_WDT Christiana_NP and_CC Delaware_NP owned_VBD outright_RB ._. In_IN addition_NN ,_, the_AT right_NN to_TO vote_VB the_AT General_NN Motors_NNS stock_NN held_VBN by_IN Du_NP Pont_NP wa_BEDZ to_TO be_BE vested_VBN in_IN Du_NP Pont's_NP$ stockholder_NNS ,_, other_AP than_CS Christiana_NP and_CC Delaware_NP and_CC the_AT stockholder_NNS of_IN Delaware_NP ;_. ;_. Du_NP Pont_NP ,_, Christiana_NP ,_, and_CC Delaware_NP were_BED to_TO be_BE prohibited_VBN to_TO have_HV any_DTI director_NN or_CC officer_NN in_IN common_JJ with_IN General_NN Motors_NNS ,_, and_CC vice_RB versa_RB ;_. ;_. and_CC General_NN Motors_NNS and_CC Du_NP Pont_NP were_BED to_TO be_BE ordered_VBN to_TO terminate_VB any_DTI agreement_NN that_WPS provided_VBD for_IN the_AT purchase_NN by_IN General_NN Motors_NNS of_IN any_DTI specified_VBN percentage_NN of_IN it_PP$ requirement_NNS of_IN any_DTI Du_NP Pont_NP manufactured_VBN product_NN ,_, or_CC for_IN the_AT grant_NN of_IN exclusive_JJ patent_NN right_NNS ,_, or_CC for_IN a_AT grant_NN by_IN General_NN Motors_NNS to_IN Du_NP Pont_NP of_IN a_AT preferential_JJ right_NN to_TO make_VB or_CC sell_VB any_DTI chemical_NN discovery_NN of_IN General_NN Motors_NNS ,_, or_CC for_IN the_AT maintenance_NN of_IN any_DTI joint_JJ commercial_JJ enterprise_NN by_IN the_AT two_CD company_NNS ._. On_IN motion_NN of_IN the_AT Amici_NNS Curiae_NN$ ,_, the_AT court_NN directed_VBD that_CS a_AT ruling_NN be_BE obtained_VBN from_IN the_AT Commissioner_NN of_IN Internal_JJ Revenue_NN a_IN to_IN the_AT federal_JJ income_NN tax_NN consequence_NNS of_IN the_AT Government's_NN$ plan_NN ._. On_IN May_NP 9_CD ,_, 1958_CD ,_, the_AT Commissioner_NN announced_VBD his_PP$ ruling_NNS ._. The_AT annual_JJ dividend_NNS paid_VBN to_IN Du_NP Pont_NP stockholder_NNS in_IN share_NNS of_IN General_NN Motors_NNS stock_NN would_MD be_BE taxable_JJ a_CS ordinary_JJ income_NN to_IN the_AT extent_NN of_IN Du_NP Pont's_NP$ earnings_NNS and_CC profit_NNS ._. The_AT measure_NN ,_, for_IN federal_JJ income_NN tax_NN purpose_NNS ,_, of_IN the_AT dividend_NN to_IN individual_JJ stockholder_NNS would_MD be_BE the_AT fair_JJ market_NN value_NN of_IN the_AT share_NNS at_IN the_AT time_NN of_IN each_DT annual_JJ distribution_NN ._. In_IN the_AT case_NN of_IN taxpaying_JJ corporate_JJ stockholder_NNS ,_, the_AT measure_NN would_MD be_BE the_AT less_JJR of_IN the_AT fair_JJ market_NN value_NN of_IN the_AT share_NNS or_CC Du_NP Pont's_NP$ tax_NN basis_NN for_IN them_PPO ,_, which_WDT is_BEZ approximately_RB $2.09_NNS per_IN share_NN ._. The_AT forced_VBN sale_NN of_IN the_AT General_NN Motors_NNS stock_NN owned_VBN by_IN or_CC allocable_JJ to_IN Christiana_NP ,_, Delaware_NP ,_, and_CC the_AT stockholder_NNS of_IN Delaware_NP ,_, and_CC deposited_VBN with_IN the_AT trustee_NN ,_, would_MD result_VB in_IN a_AT tax_NN to_IN those_DTS party_NNS at_IN the_AT capital_NN gain_NNS rate_NN ._. Du_NP Pont's_NP$ counterproposal_NN wa_BEDZ filed_VBN on_IN May_NP 14_CD ,_, 1958_CD ._. Du_NP Pont_NP would_MD be_BE enjoined_VBN from_IN having_HVG a_CS a_AT director_NN ,_, officer_NN ,_, or_CC employee_NN anyone_PN who_WPS wa_BEDZ simultaneously_RB an_AT officer_NN or_CC employee_NN of_IN General_NN Motors_NNS ,_, and_CC no_AT director_NN ,_, officer_NN ,_, or_CC employee_NN of_IN Du_NP Pont_NP could_MD serve_VB a_CS a_AT director_NN of_IN General_NN Motors_NNS without_IN court_NN approval_NN ._. On_IN June_NP 6_CD ,_, 1958_CD ,_, General_NN Motors_NNS submitted_VBD it_PP$ objection_NNS to_IN the_AT Government's_NN$ proposal_NN ._. General_NN Motors_NNS comprehensively_RB contended_VBD that_CS the_AT Government_NN plan_NN would_MD not_* be_BE ``_`` in_IN the_AT public_JJ interest_NN ''_'' a_CS required_VBN by_IN the_AT mandate_NN of_IN this_DT Court_NN ._. The_AT decree_NNS proposed_VBN by_IN the_AT amici_NNS curia_NN$ were_BED filed_VBN in_IN August_NP of_IN 1958_CD ._. These_DTS plan_NNS ,_, like_CS Du_NP Pont's_NP$ ,_, contained_VBD provision_NNS for_IN passing_VBG the_AT vote_NN on_IN Du_NP Pont's_NP$ General_NN Motors_NNS share_NNS on_RP to_IN the_AT ultimate_JJ stockholder_NNS of_IN Du_NP Pont_NP ,_, Christiana_NP ,_, and_CC Delaware_NP ,_, except_IN that_CS officer_NNS and_CC director_NNS of_IN the_AT three_CD company_NNS ,_, their_PP$ spouse_NNS ,_, and_CC other_AP people_NNS living_VBG in_IN their_PP$ household_NNS ,_, a_QL well_RB a_CS other_AP specified_VBN person_NNS ,_, were_BED to_TO be_BE totally_RB disenfranchised_VBN ._. Both_ABX plan_NNS also_RB prohibited_VBD common_JJ director_NNS ,_, officer_NNS ,_, or_CC employee_NNS between_IN Du_NP Pont_NP ,_, Christiana_NP ,_, and_CC Delaware_NP ,_, on_IN the_AT one_CD hand_NN ,_, and_CC General_NN Motors_NNS on_IN the_AT other_AP ._. It_PPS is_BEZ not_* a_AT medieval_JJ mental_JJ quirk_NN or_CC an_AT attitude_NN ``_`` unnourished_JJ by_IN sense_NN ''_'' to_TO believe_VB that_CS husband_NNS and_CC wife_NNS should_MD not_* be_BE subjected_VBN to_IN such_ABL a_AT risk_NN ,_, or_CC that_CS such_ABL a_AT possibility_NN should_MD not_* be_BE permitted_VBN to_TO endanger_VB the_AT confidentiality_NN of_IN the_AT marriage_NN relationship_NN ._. One_PN need_MD not_* waver_VB in_IN his_PP$ belief_NN in_IN virile_JJ law_NN enforcement_NN to_TO insist_VB that_CS there_EX are_BER other_AP thing_NNS in_IN American_JJ life_NN which_WDT are_BER also_RB of_IN great_JJ importance_NN ,_, and_CC to_IN which_WDT even_RB law_NN enforcement_NN must_MD accommodate_VB itself_PPL ._. One_CD of_IN these_DTS is_BEZ the_AT solidarity_NN and_CC the_AT confidential_JJ relationship_NN of_IN marriage_NN ._. The_AT Court's_NN$ opinion_NN dogmatically_RB asserts_VBZ that_CS the_AT husband-wife_JJ conspiracy_NN doctrine_NN doe_DOZ not_* in_IN fact_NN protect_VB this_DT relationship_NN ,_, and_CC that_CS hence_RB the_AT doctrine_NN ``_`` enthrones_VBZ an_AT unreality_NN into_IN a_AT rule_NN of_IN law_NN ''_'' ._. I_PPSS am_BEM not_* easily_RB persuaded_VBN that_CS a_AT rule_NN accepted_VBN by_IN so_QL many_AP people_NNS for_IN so_QL many_AP century_NNS can_MD be_BE so_QL lightly_RB dismissed_VBN ._. Nor_CC would_MD it_PPO be_BE possible_JJ in_IN many_AP case_NNS for_CS them_PPO to_TO live_VB in_IN health_NN or_CC any_DTI effectiveness_NN on_IN what_WDT their_PP$ counterpart_NNS abroad_RB are_BER paid_VBN ._. To_IN the_AT Congress_NP of_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS :_: I_PPSS recommend_VB to_IN the_AT Congress_NP the_AT establishment_NN of_IN a_AT permanent_JJ Peace_NN Corps_NN --_-- a_AT pool_NN of_IN trained_VBN American_JJ men_NNS and_CC woman_NNS sent_VBN overseas_RB by_IN the_AT U.S._NP Government_NN or_CC through_IN private_JJ organization_NNS and_CC institution_NNS to_TO help_VB foreign_JJ country_NNS meet_VB their_PP$ urgent_JJ need_NNS for_IN skilled_JJ manpower_NN ._. Wildlife_NN habitat_NN resource_NNS In_IN 1960_CD one-quarter_NN of_IN the_AT 92.5_CD million_CD recreation_NN visit_NNS to_IN the_AT National_JJ Forests_NNS and_CC Grasslands_NNS were_BED for_IN the_AT primary_JJ purpose_NN of_IN hunting_VBG and_CC fishing_VBG ._. Hunter_NN and_CC fisherman_NN visit_NNS since_IN 1949_CD have_HV increased_VBN 8_CD time_NNS faster_RBR than_CS the_AT nationwide_JJ sale_NN of_IN hunting_VBG and_CC fishing_VBG license_NNS ._. This_DT use_NN is_BEZ expected_VBN to_TO increase_VB to_IN about_RB 50_CD million_CD visit_NNS by_IN 1972_CD ._. The_AT long-range_NN objective_NN of_IN habitat_NN management_NN is_BEZ to_TO make_VB it_PPO fully_QL productive_JJ so_CS a_CS to_TO support_VB fish_NN and_CC game_NN population_NNS to_TO contribute_VB to_IN the_AT need_NN for_IN public_NN use_NN and_CC enjoyment_NN ._. The_AT wildlife_NN habitat_NN management_NN proposal_NNS for_IN the_AT 10-year_JJ period_NN are_BER :_: 1_CD ._. Inventory_VB and_CC evaluate_VB wildlife_NN habitat_NN resource_NNS in_IN cooperation_NN with_IN other_AP Federal_JJ agency_NNS and_CC with_IN the_AT States_NNS in_IN which_WDT National_JJ Forests_NNS and_CC Grasslands_NNS are_BER located_VBN ,_, a_CS a_AT basis_NN for_IN orderly_JJ development_NN of_IN wildlife_NN habitat_NN improvement_NN and_CC coordination_NN program_NNS ,_, including_IN (_( A_NP )_) big-game_NN ,_, gamebird_NN ,_, and_CC small-game_NN habitat_NN survey_NNS and_CC investigation_NNS on_IN the_AT 186_CD million_CD acre_NNS of_IN National_JJ Forests_NNS and_CC Grasslands_NNS ,_, (_( B_NP )_) fishery_NN habitat_NN survey_NNS and_CC investigation_NNS on_IN the_AT 81,000_CD mile_NNS of_IN National_JJ Forest_NN fishing_VBG stream_NNS and_CC nearly_RB 3_CD million_CD acre_NNS of_IN lake_NNS and_CC impoundment_NNS ,_, and_CC (_( C_NP )_) participation_NN in_IN planning_VBG ,_, inspection_NN ,_, and_CC control_NN phase_NNS of_IN all_ABN habitat_NN improvement_NN ,_, land_NN and_CC water_NN use_NN project_NNS conducted_VBN on_IN National_JJ Forest_NN land_NNS by_IN States_NNS ,_, other_AP Federal_JJ agency_NNS ,_, and_CC private_JJ group_NNS to_TO assure_VB that_CS project_NNS will_MD benefit_VB wildlife_NN and_CC be_BE in_IN harmony_NN with_IN other_AP resource_NN value_NNS ._. 3_CD ._. Improve_VB 7,000_CD mile_NNS of_IN fishing_VBG stream_NNS and_CC 56,000_CD acre_NNS of_IN lake_NNS by_IN stabilizing_VBG bank_NNS ,_, planting_VBG streamside_NN cover_NN ,_, and_CC constructing_VBG channel_NN improvement_NNS ._. Protection_NN The_AT total_JJ adverse_JJ impact_NN of_IN disease_NN ,_, insect_NNS ,_, fire_NN ,_, weather_NN ,_, destructive_JJ animal_NNS ,_, and_CC other_AP force_NNS on_IN the_AT us_NNS and_CC value_NNS of_IN forest_NN resource_NNS is_BEZ not_* generally_RB recognized_VBN ._. They_PPSS kill_VB and_CC destroy_VB ,_, retard_VB or_CC prevent_VB reproduction_NN and_CC growth_NN ,_, impair_VB and_CC damage_VB value_NNS ,_, and_CC disrupt_VB us_NNS ._. The_AT loss_NN in_IN growth_NN of_IN sawtimber_NN because_RB of_IN damage_NN by_IN destructive_JJ agency_NNS in_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS in_IN 1952_CD wa_BEDZ estimated_VBN to_TO be_BE about_RB 44_CD billion_CD board_NN foot_NNS ._. If_CS it_PPS were_BED not_* for_IN the_AT effect_NN of_IN destructive_JJ agency_NNS ,_, sawtimber_NN growth_NN would_MD have_HV been_BEN nearly_RB twice_RB a_QL great_JJ a_CS the_AT 47_CD billion_CD board_NN foot_NNS in_IN 1952_CD ._. About_RB 45_CD percent_NN of_IN the_AT loss_NN in_IN growth_NN wa_BEDZ attributable_JJ to_IN disease_NN ,_, 20_CD percent_NN to_IN insect_NNS ,_, 17_CD percent_NN to_IN fire_NN ,_, and_CC 18_CD percent_NN to_IN weather_NN ,_, animal_NNS ,_, and_CC various_AP other_AP cause_NNS ._. These_DTS destructive_JJ force_NNS also_RB have_HV a_AT seriously_QL adverse_JJ effect_NN upon_IN the_AT watershed_NNS and_CC their_PP$ life-supporting_JJ waterflows_NNS ,_, and_CC upon_IN the_AT other_AP renewable_JJ forest_NN resource_NNS ._. The_AT long-range_NN objective_NN is_BEZ to_TO hold_VB the_AT damage_NN from_IN destructive_JJ agency_NNS below_IN the_AT level_NN which_WDT would_MD seriously_RB interfere_VB with_IN intensive_JJ management_NN of_IN the_AT National_JJ Forest_NN System_NN under_IN principle_NNS of_IN multiple_JJ use_NN and_CC high-level_NN sustained_VBN yield_NN of_IN product_NNS and_CC service_NNS ._. This_DT can_MD be_BE accomplished_VBN substantially_RB by_IN a_AT continued_VBN trend_NN toward_IN good_JJR facility_NNS and_CC technique_NNS for_IN fire_NN control_NN and_CC more_AP resource_NNS to_TO cope_VB with_IN critical_JJ fire_NN period_NNS ,_, and_CC a_AT more_QL intensive_JJ application_NN of_IN a_AT program_NN of_IN prevention_NN ,_, detection_NN ,_, and_CC control_NN of_IN insect_NN and_CC disease_NN infestation_NNS ._. In_IN addition_NN to_IN direct_JJ protection_NN measure_NNS ,_, more_QL intensive_JJ management_NN of_IN timber_NN resource_NNS will_MD assist_VB in_IN reduction_NN of_IN loss_NNS from_IN insect_NNS and_CC disease_NN ._. Protection_NN from_IN insect_NNS and_CC disease_NN In_IN the_AT 10-year_JJ period_NN ,_, it_PPS is_BEZ proposed_VBN that_CS insect_NN and_CC disease_NN control_NN on_IN the_AT National_JJ Forest_NN System_NN be_BE stepped_VBN up_RP to_IN a_AT level_NN of_IN prevention_NN ,_, detection_NN ,_, and_CC control_NN of_IN insect_NN and_CC disease_NN infestation_NNS that_WPS will_MD substantially_RB reduce_VB the_AT occurrence_NN of_IN large_JJ infestation_NNS toward_IN the_AT end_NN of_IN the_AT initial_JJ period_NN ._. This_DT will_MD require_VB about_RB a_AT 40_CD percent_NN increase_NN over_IN the_AT present_JJ level_NN of_IN protection_NN ._. The_AT work_NN will_MD consist_VB of_IN :_: 1_CD ._. Intensification_NN of_IN present_JJ activity_NNS through_IN (_( A_NP )_) quick_JJR ,_, more_QL extensive_JJ ,_, and_CC more_QL thorough_JJ survey_NNS to_TO detect_VB incipient_JJ outbreak_NNS ;_. ;_. (_( B_NP )_) more_QL reliable_JJ evaluation_NN of_IN the_AT potential_NN of_IN initial_JJ outbreak_NNS to_TO cause_VB widespread_JJ damage_NN ;_. ;_. (_( C_NP )_) quick_JJR and_CC more_QL effective_JJ control_NN action_NN in_IN the_AT initial_JJ stage_NNS to_TO prevent_VB a_AT large-scale_NN epidemic_NN ._. The_AT initial_JJ suppression_NN activity_NNS would_MD cover_VB about_RB twice_RB the_AT acreage_NN currently_RB being_BEG treated_VBN ._. 2_CD ._. Continuation_NN of_IN present_JJ blister_NN rust_NN control_NN work_NN plus_IN extension_NN of_IN control_NN to_IN 250,000_CD acre_NNS not_* now_RB protected_VBN but_CC which_WDT should_MD be_BE managed_VBN for_IN white_JJ pine_NN production_NN ._. The_AT objective_NN is_BEZ to_TO achieve_VB sufficient_JJ effectiveness_NN of_IN control_NN on_IN all_ABN of_IN the_AT area_NN now_RB under_IN treatment_NN plus_IN the_AT additional_JJ acre_NNS so_CS that_CS after_IN the_AT initial_JJ period_NN only_AP maintenance_NN control_NN will_MD be_BE needed_VBN ._. 3_CD ._. Protection_NN from_IN fire_NN It_PPS is_BEZ proposed_VBN that_CS in_IN 10_CD year_NNS all_ABN commercial_JJ timberland_NNS ,_, all_ABN critical_JJ watershed_NNS ,_, and_CC other_AP land_NNS in_IN the_AT National_JJ Forest_NN System_NN developed_VBN or_CC proposed_VBN for_IN intensive_JJ use_NN will_MD be_BE given_VBN protection_NN from_IN fire_NN adequate_JJ to_TO meet_VB the_AT fire_NN situation_NN in_IN the_AT bad_JJT year_NNS and_CC under_IN serious_JJ peak_NN load_NNS ._. Expansion_NN ,_, modernization_NN ,_, and_CC development_NN of_IN fire_NN control_NN to_IN a_AT proficiency_NN and_CC strength_NN of_IN force_NN which_WDT will_MD prevent_VB a_QL many_AP fire_NNS a_CS possible_JJ and_CC suppress_VB fire_NNS before_CS they_PPSS spread_VB beyond_IN permitted_VBN standard_NNS ._. This_DT is_BEZ to_TO be_BE accomplished_VBN by_IN nearly_RB doubling_VBG the_AT present_JJ level_NN of_IN preventive_JJ effort_NN ,_, detection_NN ,_, skilled_JJ fire-fighting_JJ crew_NNS ,_, and_CC equipment_NN use_NN ._. Adoption_NN and_CC use_NN of_IN new_JJ and_CC modern_JJ technique_NNS being_BEG developed_VBN for_IN prevention_NN ,_, for_IN suppression_NN of_IN fire_NNS while_CS small_JJ ,_, and_CC for_IN stopping_VBG large_JJ fire_NNS while_CS running_VBG and_CC burning_VBG intensely_RB ._. 3_CD ._. Reduction_NN of_IN hazardous_JJ fuel_NN condition_NNS to_TO minimize_VB the_AT chance_NNS of_IN large_JJ fire_NNS developing_VBG and_CC spreading_VBG to_IN high-value_NN area_NNS ._. Roads_NNS and_CC trail_NNS The_AT transportation_NN system_NN which_WDT serf_VBZ the_AT National_JJ Forests_NNS is_BEZ a_AT complex_NN of_IN highway_NNS and_CC access_NN road_NNS and_CC trail_NNS under_IN various_JJ ownership_NNS and_CC jurisdiction_NNS ._. This_DT system_NN is_BEZ divided_VBN into_IN a_AT forest_NN highway_NN system_NN ,_, administered_VBN by_IN the_AT Secretary_NN of_IN Commerce_NN ,_, and_CC a_AT forest_NN development_NN road_NN and_CC trail_NN system_NN ,_, administered_VBN by_IN the_AT Secretary_NN of_IN Agriculture_NN ._. Both_ABX of_IN these_DTS system_NNS are_BER essential_JJ for_IN the_AT production_NN ,_, development_NN ,_, and_CC use_NN of_IN the_AT National_JJ Forests_NNS ._. In_IN the_AT forest_NN highway_NN system_NN ,_, there_EX are_BER now_RB 24,400_CD mile_NNS of_IN public_JJ road_NNS ._. These_DTS are_BER mostly_RB through_IN highway_NNS that_WPS carry_VB traffic_NN going_VBG from_IN one_CD destination_NN to_IN another_DT ._. Because_CS administration_NN of_IN the_AT forest_NN highway_NN system_NN is_BEZ a_AT responsibility_NN of_IN the_AT Secretary_NN of_IN Commerce_NN with_IN maintenance_NN provided_VBN by_IN the_AT States_NNS and_CC county_NNS ,_, this_DT Development_NN Program_NN for_IN the_AT National_JJ Forests_NNS doe_DOZ not_* include_VB estimate_NNS of_IN the_AT fund_NNS needed_VBN to_TO maintain_VB the_AT forest_NN highway_NN system_NN nor_CC to_TO construct_VB the_AT addition_NNS to_IN it_PPO that_WPS are_BER needed_VBN ._. It_PPS is_BEZ estimated_VBN that_CS about_RB 70,000_CD mile_NNS of_IN forest_NN highway_NNS will_MD eventually_RB be_BE needed_VBN to_TO fully_RB serve_VB the_AT National_JJ Forests_NNS ._. In_IN the_AT forest_NN development_NN road_NN and_CC trail_NN system_NN ,_, there_EX are_BER now_RB 162,400_CD mile_NNS of_IN road_NNS and_CC 106,500_CD mile_NNS of_IN supplemental_JJ foot_NN and_CC horse_NN trail_NNS ._. Construction_NN and_CC maintenance_NN of_IN this_DT system_NN is_BEZ a_AT responsibility_NN of_IN the_AT Secretary_NN of_IN Agriculture_NN ._. The_AT ultimate_JJ trail_NN system_NN will_MD be_BE of_IN value_NN primarily_RB for_IN recreation_NN and_CC wildlife_NN utilization_NN and_CC fire_NN protection_NN ._. It_PPS will_MD be_BE carefully_RB planned_VBN to_TO maintain_VB optimum_JJ service_NN to_IN these_DTS important_JJ resource_NNS and_CC watershed_NNS ._. The_AT presence_NN or_CC lack_NN of_IN access_NN by_IN road_NN or_CC trail_NN ha_HVZ a_AT direct_JJ and_CC controlling_VBG influence_NN on_IN all_ABN phase_NNS of_IN forest_NN management_NN and_CC utilization_NN such_JJ a_CS :_: (_( A_NP )_) the_AT protection_NN of_IN forage_NN ,_, timber_NN ,_, and_CC wildlife_NN resource_NNS from_IN fire_NN ,_, insect_NNS ,_, and_CC disease_NN ;_. ;_. (_( D_NP )_) the_AT level_NN of_IN salvage_NN cutting_NN in_IN dead_JJ and_CC dying_VBG timber_NN stand_NNS and_CC the_AT opportunity_NN to_TO promptly_RB salvage_VB loss_NNS resulting_VBG from_IN fire_NN ,_, windstorm_NN ,_, insect_NNS ,_, and_CC disease_NN ;_. ;_. (_( E_NP )_) the_AT protection_NN of_IN watershed_NN land_NNS from_IN erosion_NN and_CC overgrazing_VBG by_IN animal_NNS ._. Land_NN adjustment_NN ,_, land_NN purchase_NN ,_, land_NN use_NN Within_IN the_AT unit_NNS in_IN the_AT National_JJ Forest_NN System_NN the_AT pattern_NN of_IN land_NN ownership_NN is_BEZ quite_QL irregular_JJ ._. In_IN many_AP others_NNS ,_, the_AT previous_JJ patenting_NN of_IN land_NN under_IN the_AT public_JJ land_NN law_NNS ,_, or_CC the_AT way_NN in_IN which_WDT land_NN wa_BEDZ available_JJ for_IN purchase_NN ,_, resulted_VBD in_IN a_AT scattered_VBN pattern_NN of_IN ownership_NN ._. One_CD consequence_NN is_BEZ the_AT occurrence_NN of_IN occasional_JJ conflict_NNS because_CS private_JJ owner_NNS of_IN some_DTI inholdings_NNS object_VB to_IN public_JJ program_NNS of_IN use_NN on_IN neighboring_VBG National_JJ Forest_NN or_CC other_AP Federal_JJ land_NN ,_, or_CC because_CS such_JJ ownership_NNS are_BER developed_VBN for_IN us_NNS that_WPS are_BER not_* compatible_JJ with_IN use_NN for_IN the_AT public_NN of_IN neighboring_VBG National_JJ Forest_NN land_NN ._. Some_DTI privately_RB held_VBN inholdings_NNS are_BER a_AT source_NN of_IN direct_JJ damage_NN to_IN these_DTS Federal_JJ land_NNS ._. Lands_NNS in_IN this_DT last_AP category_NN are_BER situated_VBN largely_RB in_IN the_AT mountainous_JJ portion_NNS of_IN the_AT Eastern_JJ States_NNS ._. Forces_NNS and_CC military_JJ personnel_NNS strength_NN ._. --_-- This_DT budget_NN will_MD provide_VB in_IN the_AT fiscal_JJ year_NN 1961_CD for_IN the_AT continued_VBN support_NN of_IN our_PP$ force_NNS at_IN approximately_RB the_AT present_JJ level_NN --_-- a_AT year-end_JJ strength_NN of_IN 2,489,000_CD men_NNS and_CC woman_NNS in_IN the_AT active_JJ force_NNS ._. I_PPSS again_RB proposed_VBD a_AT reduction_NN in_IN the_AT Army_NN National_JJ Guard_NN and_CC Army_NN Reserve_NN --_-- from_IN their_PP$ present_JJ strength_NNS of_IN 400,000_CD and_CC 300,000_CD ,_, respectively_RB ,_, to_IN 360,000_CD and_CC 270,000_CD by_IN the_AT end_NN of_IN the_AT fiscal_JJ year_NN 1961_CD ._. These_DTS strength_NNS are_BER considered_VBN adequate_JJ to_TO meet_VB the_AT essential_JJ role_NNS and_CC mission_NNS of_IN the_AT reserve_NNS in_IN support_NN of_IN our_PP$ national_JJ security_NN objective_NNS ._. Military_JJ personnel_NNS cost_NNS ._. --_-- About_RB 30%_NN of_IN the_AT expenditure_NNS for_IN the_AT Department_NN of_IN Defense_NN in_IN 1961_CD are_BER for_IN military_JJ personnel_NNS cost_NNS ,_, including_IN pay_NN for_IN active_JJ ,_, reserve_NN ,_, and_CC retired_VBN military_JJ personnel_NNS ._. These_DTS expenditure_NNS are_BER estimated_VBN to_TO be_BE $12.1_NNS billion_CD ,_, an_AT increase_NN of_IN $187_NNS million_CD over_IN 1960_CD ,_, reflecting_VBG additional_JJ longevity_NN pay_NN of_IN career_NN personnel_NNS ,_, more_AP dependent_NNS ,_, an_AT increased_VBN number_NN of_IN men_NNS drawing_VBG proficiency_NN pay_NN ,_, and_CC social_JJ security_NN tax_NN increase_NNS (_( effective_JJ for_IN the_AT full_JJ year_NN in_IN 1961_CD compared_VBN with_IN only_RB 6_CD month_NNS in_IN 1960_CD )_) ._. In_IN total_NN ,_, these_DTS increase_NNS in_IN operating_VBG cost_NNS outweigh_VB the_AT saving_NNS that_WPS result_VB from_IN declining_VBG program_NNS and_CC from_IN economy_NN measure_NNS ,_, such_JJ a_CS reduced_VBN number_NNS of_IN unit_NNS and_CC installation_NNS ,_, small_JJR inventory_NNS of_IN major_JJ equipment_NN ,_, and_CC improvement_NNS in_IN the_AT supply_NN and_CC distribution_NN system_NNS of_IN the_AT Armed_VBN Forces_NNS ._. In_IN the_AT budget_NN message_NN for_IN 1959_CD ,_, and_CC again_RB for_IN 1960_CD ,_, I_PPSS recommended_VBD immediate_JJ repeal_NN of_IN section_NN 601_CD of_IN the_AT Act_NN of_IN September_NP 28_CD ,_, 1951_CD (_( 65_CD Stat._NN 365_CD )_) ._. Procurement_NN ,_, research_NN ,_, and_CC construction_NN ._. --_-- Approximately_RB 45%_NN of_IN the_AT expenditure_NNS for_IN the_AT Department_NN of_IN Defense_NN are_BER for_IN procurement_NN ,_, research_NN ,_, development_NN ,_, and_CC construction_NN program_NNS ._.
