However_RB ,_, it_PPS cannot_MD* be_BE presumed_VBN ,_, informal_JJ though_CS the_AT structure_NN of_IN the_AT population_NN seems_VBZ ,_, that_CS there_EX are_BER not_* well-defined_JJ role_NNS within_IN the_AT system_NN ._. The_AT present_JJ study_NN relates_VBZ to_IN the_AT theory_NN of_IN functional_JJ system_NNS ._. It_PPS is_BEZ hypothesized_VBN that_DT fertility_NN is_BEZ a_AT function_NN of_IN the_AT social_JJ system_NN when_WRB the_AT population_NN a_CS a_AT whole_NN is_BEZ considered_VBN and_CC a_AT function_NN of_IN the_AT subsystem_NNS when_WRB the_AT two-fold_JJ division_NN of_IN core_NN family_NNS and_CC marginal_JJ family_NNS is_BEZ considered_VBN ._. As_CS mentioned_VBN above_RB ,_, where_WRB family_NNS are_BER concentrated_VBN in_IN large_JJR number_NNS ,_, group_NN control_NNS seem_VB strong_JJT and_CC most_QL effective_JJ ._. Adaptation_NN to_IN the_AT social_JJ and_CC non-social_JJ environment_NN through_IN the_AT economy_NN ha_HVZ been_BEN met_VBN to_IN a_AT degree_NN through_IN a_AT type_NN of_IN occupational_JJ segregation_NN ._. Integration_NN ``_`` ha_HVZ to_TO do_DO with_IN the_AT inter-relation_NN of_IN part_NNS ''_'' ._. The_AT problem_NN of_IN solidarity_NN and_CC morale_NN again_RB involves_VBZ the_AT concept_NN of_IN value_NNS ._. In_IN this_DT respect_NN it_PPS would_MD seem_VB that_CS the_AT great_JJR the_AT social_JJ distance_NN between_IN the_AT Brandywine_NP population_NN and_CC the_AT white_JJ and_CC Negro_NP population_NNS within_IN the_AT same_AP general_JJ locality_NN ,_, the_AT great_JJR the_AT possibility_NN for_IN high_JJR morale_NN and_CC solidarity_NN within_IN the_AT Brandywine_NP population_NN ._. It_PPS is_BEZ conceived_VBN that_CS one_CD of_IN the_AT mean_NNS to_TO attain_VB this_DT social_JJ distance_NN is_BEZ that_DT of_IN physical_JJ and_CC social_JJ isolation_NN ._. The_AT population_NN can_MD thereby_RB replenish_VB itself_PPL and_CC actually_RB grow_VB large_JJR ._. Master_NN process_NNS Of_IN particular_JJ utility_NN in_IN the_AT analysis_NN of_IN the_AT development_NN ,_, persistence_NN ,_, and_CC change_NN of_IN social_JJ system_NNS ha_HVZ been_BEN the_AT use_NN of_IN the_AT master_NN or_CC comprehensive_JJ process_NNS ._. Communication_NN ._. In_IN discussing_VBG the_AT process_NN of_IN communication_NN ,_, Loomis_NP defines_VBZ it_PPO a_CS ``_`` the_AT process_NN by_IN which_WDT information_NN ,_, decision_NNS ,_, and_CC directive_NNS are_BER transmitted_VBN among_IN actor_NNS and_CC the_AT way_NNS in_IN which_WDT knowledge_NN ,_, opinion_NNS ,_, and_CC attitude_NNS are_BER formed_VBN ,_, or_CC modified_VBN by_IN interaction_NN ''_'' ._. Communication_NN may_MD be_BE facilitated_VBN by_IN mean_NNS of_IN the_AT high_JJ visibility_NN within_IN the_AT large_JJR community_NN ._. Intense_JJ interaction_NN is_BEZ easy_JJR where_WRB segregated_VBN living_NN and_CC occupational_JJ segregation_NN mark_VB off_RP a_AT group_NN from_IN the_AT rest_NN of_IN the_AT community_NN ,_, a_CS in_IN the_AT case_NN of_IN this_DT population_NN ._. However_RB ,_, the_AT factor_NN of_IN physical_JJ isolation_NN is_BEZ not_* a_AT static_JJ situation_NN ._. Although_CS the_AT Brandywine_NP population_NN is_BEZ still_RB predominantly_QL rural_JJ ,_, ``_`` there_EX are_BER indication_NNS of_IN a_AT consistent_JJ and_CC a_AT statistically_QL significant_JJ trend_NN away_RB from_IN the_AT old_JJR and_CC relatively_QL isolated_VBN rural_JJ community_NNS ._. Urbanization_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_BE an_AT important_JJ factor_NN in_IN the_AT disintegration_NN of_IN this_DT group_NN ._. This_DT conclusion_NN is_BEZ ,_, however_RB ,_, an_AT over-simplification_NN ._. Social_JJ control_NN ._. The_AT process_NN of_IN social_JJ control_NN is_BEZ operative_JJ insofar_RB a_CS sanction_NNS play_VB a_AT part_NN in_IN the_AT individual's_NN$ behavior_NN ,_, a_QL well_RB a_CS the_AT group's_NN$ behavior_NN ._. By_IN mean_NNS of_IN this_DT social_JJ control_NN ,_, deviance_NN is_BEZ either_CC eliminated_VBN or_CC somehow_RB made_VBN compatible_JJ with_IN the_AT function_NN of_IN the_AT social_JJ group_NN ._. Examples_NNS from_IN this_DT population_NN indicate_VB that_CS deviance_NN seems_VBZ to_TO be_BE sanctioned_VBN by_IN ostracism_NN from_IN the_AT group_NN ._. Socialization_NN ._. There_EX is_BEZ an_AT oral_JJ tradition_NN among_IN the_AT member_NNS of_IN the_AT population_NN in_IN regard_NN to_IN the_AT origin_NN and_CC subsequent_JJ separate_JJ status_NN of_IN the_AT group_NN in_IN the_AT large_JJR society_NN ._. Confused_VBN and_CC divided_VBN though_CS this_DT tradition_NN may_MD be_BE ,_, it_PPS is_BEZ an_AT important_JJ part_NN of_IN the_AT social_JJ and_CC cultural_JJ heritage_NN of_IN the_AT group_NN ,_, and_CC act_VBZ a_CS a_AT mean_NNS of_IN socialization_NN ,_, particularly_RB for_IN member_NNS of_IN the_AT rural_JJ community_NN ._. The_AT fact_NN of_IN Indian_JJ ancestry_NN and_CC ``_`` free_JJ ''_'' status_NN during_IN the_AT day_NNS of_IN slavery_NN ,_, are_BER important_JJ distinction_NNS made_VBN by_IN member_NNS of_IN the_AT group_NN ._. Boundary_NN maintenance_NN ._. ``_`` Culturally_RB induced_VBN social_JJ cohesion_NN resulting_VBG from_IN common_JJ norm_NNS and_CC value_NNS internalized_VBN by_IN member_NNS of_IN the_AT group_NN ''_'' is_BEZ operative_JJ in_IN the_AT boundary_NN maintenance_NN of_IN the_AT group_NN a_QL well_RB a_CS in_IN the_AT process_NN of_IN socialization_NN ._. The_AT process_NN of_IN boundary_NN maintenance_NN identifies_VBZ and_CC preserve_VBZ the_AT social_JJ system_NN or_CC subsystem_NNS ,_, and_CC the_AT characteristic_JJ interaction_NN is_BEZ maintained_VBN ._. As_CS the_AT threat_NN of_IN encroachment_NN on_IN the_AT system_NN increase_VBZ ,_, the_AT ``_`` probability_NN of_IN applied_VBN boundary_NN maintenance_NN mechanism_NNS increase_VBZ ''_'' ._. The_AT fertility_NN rate_NN pattern_NN would_MD seem_VB to_TO be_BE a_AT function_NN ,_, though_CS a_AT latent_JJ one_CD ,_, of_IN the_AT process_NN of_IN maintaining_VBG the_AT boundary_NN ._. ``_`` Increased_VBN boundary_NN maintenance_NN may_MD be_BE achieved_VBN ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, by_IN assigning_VBG a_AT high_JJR primacy_NN or_CC evaluation_NN to_IN activity_NNS characteristic_JJ of_IN the_AT external_JJ pattern_NN ._. ''_'' The_AT external_JJ pattern_NN or_CC external_JJ system_NN can_MD be_BE considered_VBN a_CS ``_`` group_NN behavior_NN that_WPS enables_VBZ the_AT group_NN to_TO survive_VB in_IN it_PP$ environment_NN ._. ''_'' Boundary_NN maintenance_NN for_IN this_DT group_NN would_MD seem_VB to_TO be_BE primarily_RB social_JJ ,_, a_CS is_BEZ the_AT preference_NN for_IN endogamy_NN ._. Systemic_JJ linkage_NN ._. Where_WRB boundary_NN maintenance_NN describes_VBZ the_AT boundary_NNS or_CC limit_NNS of_IN the_AT group_NN ,_, systemic_JJ linkage_NN is_BEZ defined_VBN ``_`` a_CS the_AT process_NN whereby_WRB one_CD or_CC more_AP of_IN the_AT element_NNS of_IN at_IN least_AP two_CD social_JJ system_NNS is_BEZ articulated_VBN in_IN such_ABL a_AT manner_NN that_CS the_AT two_CD system_NNS in_IN some_DTI way_NNS and_CC on_IN some_DTI occasion_NNS may_MD be_BE viewed_VBN a_CS a_AT single_AP unit_NN ._. A_AT royal_JJ decree_NN issued_VBN in_IN 1910_CD ,_, two_CD year_NNS after_CS the_AT Belgian_JJ government_NN assumed_VBD authority_NN for_IN the_AT administration_NN of_IN the_AT Congo_NP ,_, prescribed_VBD the_AT registration_NN of_IN all_ABN adult_NN male_NNS by_IN chiefdoms_NNS ._. Further_JJR decree_NNS along_IN this_DT line_NN were_BED issued_VBN in_IN 1916_CD and_CC 1919_CD ._. In_IN 1922_CD a_AT continuous_JJ registration_NN of_IN the_AT whole_JJ indigenous_JJ population_NN wa_BEDZ instituted_VBN by_IN ordinance_NN of_IN the_AT Governor-General_NN ,_, and_CC the_AT periodic_JJ compilation_NN of_IN these_DTS record_NNS wa_BEDZ ordered_VBN ._. But_CC specific_JJ procedure_NNS for_IN carrying_VBG out_RP this_DT plan_NN were_BED left_VBN to_IN the_AT discretion_NN of_IN the_AT provincial_JJ governor_NNS ._. A_AT unified_VBN set_NN of_IN regulation_NNS ,_, applicable_JJ to_IN all_ABN area_NNS ,_, wa_BEDZ issued_VBN in_IN 1929_CD ,_, and_CC a_AT complementary_JJ series_NN of_IN demographic_JJ inquiry_NNS in_IN selected_VBN area_NNS wa_BEDZ instituted_VBN at_IN the_AT same_AP time_NN ._. The_AT whole_JJ system_NN wa_BEDZ again_RB reviewed_VBN and_CC reorganized_VBN in_IN 1933_CD ._. General_JJ responsibility_NN for_IN it_PP$ administration_NN rested_VBD with_IN a_AT division_NN of_IN the_AT colonial_JJ government_NN concerned_VBN with_IN labor_NN supply_NN and_CC native_NN affair_NNS ,_, Service_NN de_IN+AT Affaires_NNS Indigenes_JJ et_CC de_IN la_AT Main-d'Oeuvre_NN (_( AIMO_NP ,_, Af_NN Direction_NN ,_, Af_NN Direction_NN Generale_JJ ,_, Gouvernement_NN Generale_JJ )_) ._. Tribal_JJ authority_NNS ,_, the_AT chief_NNS and_CC their_PP$ secretary_NNS ,_, were_BED held_VBN responsible_JJ for_IN maintaining_VBG the_AT register_NNS of_IN indigenous_JJ person_NNS within_IN their_PP$ territory_NNS ,_, under_IN the_AT general_JJ supervision_NN of_IN district_NN official_NNS ._. The_AT district_NN official_NNS ,_, along_RB with_IN their_PP$ other_AP duty_NNS ,_, were_BED obliged_VBN to_TO organize_VB special_JJ demographic_JJ inquiry_NNS in_IN selected_VBN area_NNS and_CC to_TO supervise_VB the_AT annual_JJ tabulation_NNS of_IN demographic_JJ statistic_NNS ._. The_AT regulation_NNS require_VB the_AT inscription_NN of_IN each_DT individual_NN (_( male_NN or_CC female_NN ,_, adult_NN or_CC child_NN )_) on_IN a_AT separate_JJ card_NN (_( fiche_NN )_) ._. The_AT card_NNS ,_, filed_VBN by_IN circonscription_NN (_( sub-chiefdom_NN ,_, or_CC village_NN )_) ,_, are_BER kept_VBN in_IN the_AT headquarters_NN of_IN each_DT territoire_NN (_( chiefdom_NN )_) ._. Each_DT card_NN is_BEZ expected_VBN to_TO show_VB certain_AP information_NN about_IN the_AT individual_NN concerned_VBN ,_, including_IN his_PP$ or_CC her_PP$ date_NN of_IN birth_NN (_( or_CC age_NN at_IN a_AT specified_VBN time_NN )_) ,_, spouse_NNS ,_, and_CC child_NNS ._. Additional_JJ entry_NNS must_MD be_BE made_VBN from_IN time_NN to_IN time_NN ._. Different_JJ card_NNS are_BER used_VBN for_IN male_NNS and_CC female_NNS ,_, and_CC a_AT corner_NN is_BEZ clipped_VBN from_IN the_AT card_NNS of_IN adult_NNS ,_, and_CC of_IN child_NNS when_WRB they_PPSS reach_VB puberty_NN ._. So_RB a_AT quick_JJ count_NN could_MD be_BE made_VBN at_IN any_DTI time_NN ,_, even_RB by_IN an_AT illiterate_JJ clerk_NN ,_, of_IN the_AT number_NN of_IN registered_VBN person_NNS in_IN four_CD age-and-sex_NN class_NNS ._. Personal_JJ identification_NN card_NNS are_BER issued_VBN to_IN all_ABN adult_NN male_NNS on_IN which_WDT tax_NN payment_NNS ,_, inoculation_NNS ,_, period_NNS of_IN employment_NN ,_, and_CC change_NNS of_IN residence_NN are_BER recorded_VBN ._. Similar_JJ identification_NN card_NNS were_BED issued_VBN in_IN 1959_CD to_IN all_ABN adult_NN female_NNS ._. Each_DT adult_NN is_BEZ held_VBN personally_RB responsible_JJ for_IN assuring_VBG his_PP$ inscription_NN and_CC obtaining_VBG an_AT identification_NN card_NN which_WDT must_MD be_BE shown_VBN on_IN demand_NN ._. The_AT registration_NN card_NN of_IN a_AT person_NN leaving_VBG his_PP$ home_NN territory_NN for_IN a_AT short_JJ period_NN is_BEZ put_VBN into_IN a_AT special_JJ file_NN for_IN absent_JJ person_NNS ._. The_AT card_NNS of_IN permanent_JJ out-migrants_NNS are_BER ,_, in_IN theory_NN ,_, sent_VBN to_IN an_AT office_NN in_IN the_AT place_NN of_IN new_JJ residence_NN ._. Finally_RB ,_, the_AT registration_NN of_IN birth_NNS and_CC death_NNS by_IN near_JJT relative_NNS wa_BEDZ made_VBN compulsory_JJ in_IN most_AP region_NNS ._. Numbers_NNS of_IN registered_VBN person_NNS in_IN four_CD age-and-sex_NN class_NNS were_BED counted_VBN each_DT year_NN ._. In_IN addition_NN ,_, demographic_JJ inquiry_NNS ,_, supposedly_RB involving_VBG field_NN investigation_NNS ,_, were_BED conducted_VBN in_IN selected_VBN minor_JJ division_NNS (_( circonscriptions_NNS )_) containing_VBG about_RB 3_CD percent_NN of_IN the_AT total_NN population_NN ._. The_AT result_NNS of_IN these_DTS inquiry_NNS were_BED used_VBN to_TO adjust_VB compilation_NNS of_IN data_NN from_IN the_AT register_NNS and_CC to_TO provide_VB various_AP ratio_NNS and_CC rate_NNS by_IN district_NNS ,_, including_IN birth_NN and_CC death_NN rate_NNS ,_, general_JJ fertility_NN rate_NNS ,_, distribution_NNS by_IN marital_JJ status_NN ,_, fertility_NN of_IN wife_NNS separately_RB in_IN polygynous_JJ and_CC non-polygynous_JJ household_NNS ,_, infant_NN mortality_NN ,_, and_CC migration_NN ._. The_AT area_NNS to_TO be_BE examined_VBN in_IN these_DTS inquiry_NNS were_BED selected_VBN by_IN local_JJ official_NNS ,_, supposedly_RB a_CS representative_JJ of_IN a_AT large_JJR population_NN ._. Averages_NNS of_IN the_AT ratio_NNS obtained_VBN in_IN a_AT few_AP selected_VBN area_NNS were_BED applied_VBN to_IN the_AT large_JJR population_NN ._. The_AT scheme_NN ,_, in_IN theory_NN ,_, is_BEZ an_AT ingenious_JJ adaptation_NN of_IN European_JJ registration_NN system_NNS to_IN the_AT condition_NNS of_IN African_JJ life_NN ._. But_CC it_PPS place_VBZ a_AT severe_JJ strain_NN on_IN the_AT administrative_JJ resource_NNS (_( already_RB burdened_VBN in_IN other_AP way_NNS )_) of_IN a_AT widely_RB dispersed_VBN ,_, poor_JJ and_CC largely_QL illiterate_JJ population_NN ._. The_AT sampling_VBG program_NN wa_BEDZ instituted_VBN before_CS the_AT principle_NNS of_IN probability_NN sampling_NN were_BED widely_RB recognized_VBN in_IN population_NN study_NNS ._. The_AT system_NN wa_BEDZ not_* well_RB adapted_VBN to_IN condition_NNS of_IN life_NN in_IN urban_JJ center_NNS ._. The_AT distinction_NN between_IN domiciled_VBN (_( de_IN jure_NN )_) and_CC present_JJ (_( de_IN facto_NN )_) population_NN wa_BEDZ not_* clearly_RB defined_VBN ._. So_CS the_AT result_NNS are_BER subject_JJ to_IN considerable_JJ confusion_NN ._. The_AT system_NN tended_VBD to_TO break_VB down_RP during_IN the_AT war_NN ,_, but_CC wa_BEDZ reactivated_VBN ;_. ;_. it_PPS had_HVD reached_VBN the_AT pre-war_JJ level_NN of_IN efficiency_NN by_IN 1951_CD ._. But_CC the_AT information_NN on_IN the_AT dynamic_NNS of_IN population_NN wa_BEDZ often_RB quite_QL misleading_JJ ._. Here_RB again_RB it_PPS seems_VBZ that_CS useful_JJ approximation_NNS of_IN the_AT size_NN and_CC geographical_JJ distribution_NN of_IN the_AT population_NN were_BED obtained_VBN in_IN this_DT way_NN in_IN the_AT late_JJ pre-war_JJ and_CC early_JJ post-war_JJ period_NNS ._. Before_CS considering_VBG more_QL recent_JJ activity_NNS ,_, we_PPSS should_MD note_VB another_DT important_JJ aspect_NN of_IN demography_NN in_IN Belgian_JJ Africa_NP ._. A_AT number_NN of_IN strong_JJ independent_JJ agency_NNS ,_, established_VBN in_IN some_DTI case_NNS with_IN governmental_JJ or_CC royal_JJ support_NN ,_, have_HV conducted_VBN large_JJ medical_JJ ,_, social_JJ ,_, educational_JJ and_CC research_NN operation_NNS in_IN particular_JJ part_NNS of_IN the_AT Congo_NP and_CC Ruanda-Urundi_NP ._. This_DT reasoning_NN wa_BEDZ also_RB a_QL inevitable_JJ a_CS anything_PN could_MD be_BE ._. Here_RB is_BEZ the_AT best_JJT short_JJ explanation_NN of_IN the_AT origin_NNS of_IN the_AT Cold_JJ War_NN that_WPO ha_HVZ been_BEN written_VBN ._. The_AT police_NNS were_BED disqualified_VBN along_RB with_IN certain_AP category_NNS of_IN naturalized_VBN citizen_NNS ,_, criminal_NNS and_CC those_DTS punished_VBN for_IN Protectorate_NP activity_NNS ._. The_AT registration_NN figure_NNS given_VBN in_IN Table_NN 2_CD must_MD be_BE interpreted_VBN with_IN caution_NN since_CS the_AT estimate_NN for_IN eligible_JJ elector_NNS were_BED made_VBN without_IN the_AT benefit_NN of_IN a_AT reliable_JJ census_NN ._. Unemployed_JJ old_JJR worker_NNS who_WPS have_HV no_AT expectation_NN of_IN securing_VBG employment_NN in_IN the_AT occupation_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PPSS are_BER skilled_JJ should_MD be_BE able_JJ to_TO secure_VB counseling_VBG and_CC retraining_VBG in_IN an_AT occupation_NN with_IN a_AT future_NN ._. Some_DTI vocational_JJ training_NN school_NNS provide_VB such_JJ training_NN ,_, but_CC the_AT current_JJ need_NN exceeds_VBZ the_AT facility_NNS ._. Current_JJ program_NNS The_AT present_JJ Federal_JJ program_NN of_IN vocational_JJ education_NN began_VBD in_IN 1917_CD with_IN the_AT passage_NN of_IN the_AT Smith-Hughes_NP Act_NN ,_, which_WDT provided_VBD a_AT continuing_VBG annual_JJ appropriation_NN of_IN $7_NNS million_CD to_TO support_VB ,_, on_IN a_AT matching_VBG basis_NN ,_, state-administered_JJ program_NNS of_IN vocational_JJ education_NN in_IN agriculture_NN ,_, trade_NNS ,_, industrial_JJ skill_NNS and_CC home_NN economics_NN ._. Since_IN 1917_CD some_RB thirteen_CD supplementary_JJ and_CC related_VBN act_NNS have_HV extended_VBN this_DT Federal_JJ program_NN ._. The_AT George-Barden_NP Act_NN of_IN 1946_CD raised_VBD the_AT previous_JJ increase_NNS in_IN annual_JJ authorization_NNS to_IN $29_NNS million_CD in_IN addition_NN to_IN the_AT $7_NNS million_CD under_IN the_AT Smith_NP Act_NN ._. The_AT Health_NN Amendment_NN Act_NN of_IN 1956_CD added_VBD $5_NNS million_CD for_IN practical_JJ nurse_NN training_NN ._. The_AT late_JJT major_JJ change_NN in_IN this_DT program_NN wa_BEDZ introduced_VBN by_IN the_AT National_JJ Defense_NN Education_NN Act_NN of_IN 1958_CD ,_, Title_NN 8_CD ,_, of_IN which_WDT amended_VBD the_AT George-Barden_NP Act_NN ._. Annual_JJ authorization_NNS of_IN $15_NNS million_CD were_BED added_VBN for_IN area_NN vocational_JJ education_NN program_NNS that_WPS meet_VB national_JJ defense_NN need_NNS for_IN highly_QL skilled_JJ technician_NNS ._. The_AT Federal_JJ program_NN of_IN vocational_JJ education_NN merely_RB provides_VBZ financial_JJ aid_NN to_TO encourage_VB the_AT establishment_NN of_IN vocational_JJ education_NN program_NNS in_IN public_JJ school_NNS ._. The_AT initiative_NN ,_, administration_NN and_CC control_NN remain_VB primarily_RB with_IN the_AT local_JJ school_NN district_NNS ._. Even_RB the_AT state_NNS remain_VB primarily_RB in_IN an_AT assisting_VBG role_NN ,_, providing_VBG leadership_NN and_CC teacher_NN training_NN ._. Federal_JJ assistance_NN is_BEZ limited_VBN to_IN half_ABN of_IN the_AT total_JJ expenditure_NN ,_, and_CC the_AT state_NN or_CC local_JJ district_NNS must_MD pay_VB at_IN least_AP half_ABN ._. The_AT state_NN may_MD decide_VB to_TO encourage_VB local_JJ program_NNS by_IN paying_VBG half_ABN of_IN the_AT cost_NN ,_, or_CC the_AT state_NN may_MD require_VB the_AT local_JJ district_NN to_TO bear_VB this_DT half_NN or_CC some_DTI part_NN of_IN it_PPO ._. Throughout_IN the_AT history_NN of_IN the_AT program_NN ,_, state_NN government_NN expenditure_NNS in_IN the_AT aggregate_NN have_HV usually_RB matched_VBN or_CC exceeded_VBN the_AT Federal_JJ expenditure_NNS ,_, while_CS local_JJ district_NNS all_QL together_RB have_HV spent_VBN more_AP than_CS either_CC Federal_JJ or_CC state_NN government_NNS ._. Today_NR ,_, Federal_JJ fund_NNS account_VB for_IN only_RB one-fifth_NN of_IN the_AT nation's_NN$ expenditure_NNS for_IN vocational_JJ education_NN ._. The_AT great_JJT impact_NN of_IN the_AT matching-fund_NN principle_NN ha_HVZ been_BEN in_IN initially_RB encouraging_VBG the_AT poor_JJT state_NNS and_CC school_NN district_NNS to_TO spend_VB enough_AP to_TO obtain_VB their_PP$ full_JJ allocation_NN of_IN outside_JJ fund_NNS ._. National_JJ defense_NN consideration_NNS have_HV been_BEN the_AT major_JJ reason_NN behind_IN most_AP Federal_JJ training_VBG expenditure_NNS in_IN recent_JJ decade_NNS ._. During_IN World_NN War_NN 2_CD ,_, about_RB 7.5_CD million_CD person_NNS were_BED enrolled_VBN in_IN course_NNS organized_VBN under_IN two_CD special_JJ program_NNS administered_VBN by_IN state_NN and_CC local_JJ school_NN authority_NNS :_: (_( 1_CD )_) Vocational_JJ Education_NN for_IN National_JJ Defense_NN ,_, and_CC (_( 2_CD )_) War_NN Production_NN Training_NN ._. The_AT total_JJ cost_NN of_IN the_AT five-year_JJ program_NN wa_BEDZ $297_NNS million_CD ._. For_IN the_AT Smith-Hughes_NP ,_, George-Barden_NP ,_, and_CC National_JJ Defense_NN Act_NN of_IN 1958_CD ,_, the_AT cumulative_JJ total_NN of_IN Federal_JJ expenditure_NNS in_IN 42_CD year_NNS wa_BEDZ only_RB about_RB $740_NNS million_CD ._. No_AT comparable_JJ measure_NNS are_BER available_JJ of_IN enrollment_NNS and_CC expenditure_NNS for_IN private_JJ vocational_JJ education_NN training_NN ._. There_EX are_BER a_AT great_JJ number_NN and_CC variety_NN of_IN private_JJ commercial_JJ school_NNS ,_, trade_NN school_NNS and_CC technical_JJ school_NNS ._. In_IN addition_NN ,_, many_AP large_JJ corporation_NNS operate_VB their_PP$ own_JJ formal_JJ training_VBG program_NNS ._. A_AT recent_JJ study_NN indicated_VBD that_CS 85_CD per_IN cent_NN of_IN the_AT nation's_NN$ large_JJT corporation_NNS conducted_VBD educational_JJ program_NNS involving_VBG some_DTI class_NN meeting_NNS and_CC examination_NNS ._. Most_AP skilled_JJ industrial_JJ worker_NNS ,_, nevertheless_RB ,_, still_RB acquire_VB their_PP$ skill_NNS outside_RB of_IN formal_JJ training_NN institution_NNS ._. The_AT National_JJ Manpower_NN Council_NN of_IN Columbia_NP University_NN ha_HVZ estimated_VBN that_CS three_CD out_RP of_IN five_CD skilled_JJ worker_NNS and_CC one_CD out_RP of_IN five_CD technician_NNS have_HV not_* been_BEN formally_RB trained_VBN ._. There_EX is_BEZ little_AP doubt_NN that_CS the_AT student_NNS benefit_VB from_IN vocational_JJ education_NN ._. Employers_NNS prefer_VB to_TO hire_VB youth_NN with_IN such_JJ training_NN rather_RB than_CS those_DTS without_IN ,_, and_CC most_AP graduate_NNS of_IN vocational_JJ training_NN go_VB to_TO work_VB in_IN job_NNS related_VBN to_IN their_PP$ training_NN ._. Vocational_JJ educator_NNS do_DO not_* claim_VB that_CS school_NN training_NN alone_RB make_VBZ skilled_JJ worker_NNS ,_, but_CC it_PPS provides_VBZ the_AT essential_JJ groundwork_NN for_IN developing_VBG skill_NNS ._. In_IN most_AP state_NNS ,_, trade_NN and_CC industrial_JJ training_NN is_BEZ provided_VBN in_IN a_AT minority_NN of_IN the_AT high_JJ school_NNS ,_, usually_RB located_VBN in_IN the_AT large_JJR city_NNS ._. In_IN Arkansas_NP fewer_AP than_CS 6_CD per_IN cent_NN of_IN the_AT high_JJ school_NNS offer_VB trade_NN and_CC industrial_JJ course_NNS ._. In_IN Illinois_NP about_RB 13_CD per_IN cent_NN of_IN the_AT school_NNS have_HV program_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN Pennsylvania_NP 11_CD per_IN cent_NN ._. An_AT important_JJ recent_JJ trend_NN is_BEZ the_AT development_NN of_IN area_NN vocational_JJ school_NNS ._. For_IN a_AT number_NN of_IN year_NNS Kentucky_NP ,_, Louisiana_NP and_CC several_AP other_AP state_NNS have_HV been_BEN building_VBG state-sponsored_JJ vocational_JJ education_NN school_NNS that_WPS serve_VB nearby_JJ school_NN district_NNS in_IN several_AP county_NNS ._. The_AT Title_NN 8_CD ,_, program_NN of_IN the_AT National_JJ Defense_NN Education_NN Act_NN of_IN 1958_CD wa_BEDZ a_AT great_JJ spur_NN to_IN this_DT trend_NN toward_IN area_NN school_NNS ._. Relation_NN to_IN new_JJ industry_NN Some_DTI of_IN this_DT trend_NN toward_IN area_NN vocational_JJ school_NNS ha_HVZ been_BEN related_VBN to_IN the_AT problem_NNS of_IN persistent_JJ labor_NN surplus_NN area_NNS and_CC their_PP$ desire_NN to_TO attract_VB new_JJ industry_NN ._. The_AT major_JJ training_VBG need_NN of_IN a_AT new_JJ industrial_JJ plant_NN is_BEZ a_AT short_JJ period_NN of_IN pre-employment_JJ training_NN for_IN a_AT large_JJ number_NN of_IN semi-skilled_JJ machine_NN operator_NNS ._. A_AT few_AP key_JJS skilled_JJ worker_NNS experienced_VBN in_IN the_AT company's_NN$ type_NN of_IN work_NN usually_RB must_MD be_BE brought_VBN in_RP with_IN the_AT plant_NN manager_NN ,_, or_CC hired_VBN away_RB from_IN a_AT similar_JJ plant_NN elsewhere_RB ._. A_AT prospective_JJ industry_NN also_RB may_MD be_BE interested_VBN in_IN the_AT long-run_NN advantage_NNS of_IN training_VBG program_NNS in_IN the_AT area_NN to_TO supply_VB future_JJ skilled_JJ worker_NNS and_CC provide_VB supplementary_JJ extension_NN course_NNS for_IN it_PP$ employee_NNS ._. The_AT existence_NN of_IN a_AT public_JJ school_NN vocational_JJ training_VBG program_NN in_IN trade_NN and_CC industry_NN provides_VBZ a_AT base_NN from_IN which_WDT such_JJ need_NNS can_MD be_BE filled_VBN ._. Additional_JJ course_NNS can_MD readily_RB be_BE added_VBN and_CC special_JJ cooperative_JJ program_NNS worked_VBN out_RP with_IN any_DTI new_JJ industry_NN if_CS the_AT basic_JJ facility_NNS ,_, staff_NN and_CC program_NN are_BER in_IN being_BEG ._. Thus_RB ,_, besides_IN the_AT training_NN provided_VBN to_IN youth_NN in_IN school_NN ,_, the_AT existence_NN of_IN the_AT school_NN program_NN can_MD have_HV supplementary_JJ benefit_NNS to_IN industry_NN which_WDT make_VB it_PPO an_AT asset_NN to_IN industrial_JJ development_NN effort_NNS ._. Few_AP state_NNS make_VB effective_JJ use_NN of_IN their_PP$ existing_VBG vocational_JJ education_NN program_NNS or_CC fund_NNS for_IN the_AT purpose_NN of_IN attracting_VBG new_JJ industry_NN ._. Local_JJ focus_NN of_IN program_NNS The_AT major_JJ weakness_NN of_IN vocational_JJ training_VBG program_NNS in_IN labor_NN surplus_NN area_NNS is_BEZ their_PP$ focus_NN on_IN serving_VBG solely_QL local_JJ job_NN demand_NNS ._. This_DT weakness_NN is_BEZ not_* unique_JJ to_IN labor_NN surplus_NN area_NNS ,_, for_CS it_PPS is_BEZ inherent_JJ in_IN the_AT system_NN of_IN local_JJ school_NN district_NNS in_IN this_DT country_NN ._. Planning_NN of_IN vocational_JJ education_NN program_NNS and_CC course_NNS is_BEZ oriented_VBN to_IN local_JJ employer_NN need_NNS for_IN trained_VBN worker_NNS ._. Furthermore_RB ,_, there_EX is_BEZ a_AT cautious_JJ conservatism_NN on_IN the_AT part_NN of_IN those_DTS making_VBG local_JJ skill_NN survey_NNS ._. Local_JJ job_NNS can_MD be_BE seen_VBN and_CC counted_VBN ,_, while_CS opportunity_NNS elsewhere_RB are_BER regarded_VBN a_CS more_QL hypothetical_JJ ._. While_CS the_AT U._NP S._NP Department_NN of_IN Labor_NN ha_HVZ a_AT program_NN of_IN projecting_VBG industry_NN and_CC occupational_JJ employment_NN trend_NNS and_CC publishing_VBG current_JJ outlook_NN statement_NNS ,_, there_EX is_BEZ little_AP tangible_JJ evidence_NN that_CS these_DTS projection_NNS have_HV been_BEN used_VBN extensively_RB in_IN local_JJ curriculum_NN planning_NN ._. The_AT U._NP S._NP Office_NN of_IN Education_NN continues_VBZ to_TO stress_VB local_JJ survey_NNS rather_RB than_CS national_JJ survey_NNS ._. This_DT procedure_NN is_BEZ extremely_QL shortsighted_JJ in_IN chronic_JJ labor_NN surplus_NN area_NNS with_IN a_AT long_JJ history_NN of_IN declining_VBG employment_NN ._. No_AT effort_NN is_BEZ made_VBN in_IN the_AT same_AP study_NNS to_TO present_VB information_NN on_IN regional_JJ or_CC national_JJ demand_NN trend_NNS in_IN these_DTS skill_NNS or_CC to_TO consider_VB whether_CS regional_JJ or_CC national_JJ demand_NNS for_IN other_AP skill_NNS might_MD provide_VB much_QL good_JJR opportunity_NNS for_IN the_AT youth_NN to_TO be_BE trained_VBN ._. There_EX simply_RB is_BEZ not_* enough_AP material_NN available_JJ on_IN the_AT type_NNS of_IN job_NN skill_NNS that_WPS are_BER in_IN demand_NN and_CC the_AT type_NNS of_IN training_VBG program_NNS that_WPS are_BER required_VBN or_CC most_QL suitable_JJ ._. If_CS there_EX is_BEZ adequate_JJ information_NN on_IN job_NN opportunity_NNS for_IN skilled_JJ job_NNS elsewhere_RB ,_, many_QL more_AP worker_NNS can_MD be_BE expected_VBN to_TO respond_VB ._. Another_DT problem_NN is_BEZ who_WPS will_MD pay_VB for_IN the_AT training_NN ._. Local_JJ school_NN district_NNS are_BER hard_RB pressed_VBN financially_RB and_CC unenthusiastic_JJ about_IN vocational_JJ training_NN ._. Programs_NNS usually_RB are_BER expanded_VBN only_RB when_WRB outside_JJ fund_NNS are_BER available_JJ or_CC local_JJ business_NN leader_NNS demand_VB it_PPO ._. Even_RB industrial_JJ development_NN leader_NNS find_VB it_PPO hard_JJ to_TO win_VB local_JJ support_NN for_IN training_VBG unless_CS a_AT new_JJ industry_NN is_BEZ in_IN sight_NN and_CC request_VBZ it_PPO ._. State_NN government_NNS have_HV been_BEN taking_VBG the_AT lead_NN in_IN establishing_VBG area_NN vocational_JJ school_NNS ,_, but_CC their_PP$ focus_NN is_BEZ still_RB on_IN area_NN job_NN opportunity_NNS ._. Only_RB the_AT Federal_JJ government_NN is_BEZ likely_JJ to_TO be_BE able_JJ to_TO take_VB a_AT long-run_NN and_CC nation-wide_JJ view_NN and_CC to_TO pay_VB for_IN training_VBG to_TO meet_VB national_JJ skilled_JJ manpower_NN need_NNS ._. If_CS only_AP state_NN fund_NNS were_BED used_VBN to_TO pay_VB for_IN the_AT vocational_JJ education_NN ,_, it_PPS could_MD be_BE argued_VBN that_CS the_AT state_NN should_MD not_* have_HV to_TO bear_VB the_AT cost_NN of_IN vocational_JJ training_NN which_WDT would_MD benefit_VB employer_NNS in_IN other_AP state_NNS ._. However_RB ,_, if_CS Federal_JJ fund_NNS are_BER used_VBN ,_, it_PPS would_MD be_BE entirely_QL appropriate_JJ to_TO train_VB worker_NNS for_IN job_NNS which_WDT could_MD be_BE obtained_VBN elsewhere_RB a_QL well_RB a_CS for_IN job_NNS in_IN the_AT area_NN of_IN chronic_JJ unemployment_NN ._. Such_JJ training_NN would_MD increase_VB the_AT tendency_NN of_IN worker_NNS to_TO leave_VB the_AT area_NN and_CC find_VB job_NNS in_IN other_AP locality_NNS ._. A_AT further_JJR possibility_NN is_BEZ suggested_VBN by_IN the_AT example_NN of_IN the_AT G._NP I._NP bill_NNS and_CC also_RB by_IN some_DTI recent_JJ trend_NNS in_IN attitude_NNS toward_IN improving_VBG college_NN education_NN :_: that_DT is_BEZ to_TO provide_VB financial_JJ assistance_NN to_IN individual_NNS for_IN vocational_JJ training_NN when_WRB local_JJ facility_NNS are_BER inadequate_JJ ._. This_DT probably_RB would_MD require_VB some_DTI support_NN for_IN subsistence_NN a_QL well_RB a_CS for_IN tuition_NN ,_, but_CC the_AT total_NN would_MD be_BE no_QL great_JJR than_CS for_IN the_AT proposal_NNS of_IN unemployment_NN compensation_NN or_CC a_AT Youth_NN Conservation_NN Corps_NN ._. A_AT maximum_JJ of_IN $600_NNS per_IN year_NN per_IN student_NN would_MD enable_VB many_AP to_TO take_VB training_VBG away_RB from_IN home_NN ._. A_AT program_NN of_IN financial_JJ assistance_NN would_MD permit_VB placing_VBG emphasis_NN on_IN the_AT national_JJ interest_NN in_IN training_VBG highly_QL skilled_JJ labor_NN ._. Instead_RB of_IN being_BEG limited_VBN to_IN the_AT poor_JJ training_VBG facility_NNS in_IN remote_JJ area_NNS ,_, the_AT student_NN would_MD be_BE able_JJ to_TO move_VB to_IN large_JJ institution_NNS of_IN concentrated_VBN specialized_VBN training_NN ._. Such_JJ specialized_VBN training_NN institution_NNS could_MD be_BE located_VBN near_IN the_AT most_QL rapidly_RB growing_VBG industry_NNS ,_, where_WRB the_AT equipment_NN and_CC job_NN experience_NN exist_VB and_CC where_WRB the_AT future_JJ employment_NN opportunity_NNS are_BER located_VBN ._. This_DT would_MD heighten_VB possibility_NNS for_IN part-time_JJ cooperative_JJ ,_, on-the-job_JJ and_CC extension_NN training_NN ._. Personal_JJ financial_JJ assistance_NN would_MD enable_VB more_AP emphasis_NN to_TO be_BE placed_VBN on_IN the_AT interest_NNS of_IN the_AT individual_NN ._. His_PP$ aptitude_NNS and_CC preference_NNS could_MD be_BE given_VBN more_AP weight_NN in_IN selecting_VBG the_AT proper_JJ training_NN ._. But_CC briefly_RB ,_, the_AT topping_VBG configuration_NN must_MD be_BE examined_VBN for_IN it_PP$ inference_NNS ._. Then_RB the_AT fact_NN that_CS the_AT low_JJR channel_NN line_NN wa_BEDZ pierced_VBN had_HVD further_JJR forecasting_VBG significance_NN ._. And_CC then_RB the_AT application_NN of_IN the_AT count_NN rule_NNS to_IN the_AT width_NN (_( horizontally_RB )_) of_IN the_AT configuration_NN give_VBZ u_PPO an_AT intial_JJ estimate_NN of_IN the_AT probable_JJ depth_NN of_IN the_AT decline_NN ._. The_AT very_AP idea_NN of_IN there_EX being_BEG ``_`` count_NN rule_NNS ''_'' implies_VBZ that_CS there_EX is_BEZ some_DTI sort_NN of_IN proportion_NN to_TO be_BE expected_VBN between_IN the_AT amount_NN of_IN congestive_JJ activity_NN and_CC the_AT extent_NN of_IN the_AT breakaway_NN (_( run_VB up_RP or_CC run_VB down_RP )_) movement_NN ._. This_DT expectation_NN is_BEZ what_WDT really_RB ``_`` sold_VBD ''_'' point_NN and_CC figure_NN ._. But_CC there_EX is_BEZ no_AT positive_JJ and_CC consistently_RB demonstrable_JJ relationship_NN in_IN the_AT strict_JJT sense_NN ._. Experience_NN will_MD show_VB that_CS only_RB the_AT vague_JJT generality_NNS apply_VB ,_, and_CC in_IN fine_JJ ,_, these_DTS merely_RB dwell_VB upon_IN a_AT relationship_NN between_IN the_AT duration_NNS and_CC intensity_NNS of_IN event_NNS ._. After_IN all_ABN ,_, too_QL much_AP doe_DOZ not_* happen_VB too_QL suddenly_RB ,_, nor_CC doe_DOZ very_QL little_AP take_VB long_RB ._. The_AT advantage_NNS and_CC disadvantage_NNS of_IN these_DTS two_CD type_NNS of_IN charting_VBG ,_, bar_NN charting_NN and_CC point_NN and_CC figure_NN charting_NN ,_, remain_VB the_AT subject_NN of_IN fairly_QL good-natured_JJ litigation_NN among_IN their_PP$ respective_JJ professional_JJ advocate_NNS ,_, with_IN both_ABX method_NNS enjoying_VBG in_IN common_JJ ,_, one_CD irrevocable_JJ merit_NN ._. They_PPSS are_BER both_ABX trend-following_JJ method_NNS ._. (_( We_PPSS abstract_VB here_RB from_IN technological_JJ progress_NN and_CC assume_VB that_CS price_NNS of_IN all_ABN other_AP product_NNS change_VB proportionately_RB ._. )_) The_AT form_NN of_IN the_AT industry_NN demand_NN function_NN is_BEZ one_CD which_WDT make_VBZ quantity_NN demanded_VBN vary_VB inversely_RB with_IN the_AT product_NN price_NN ,_, and_CC vary_VB directly_RB with_IN the_AT level_NN of_IN Aj_NN ._. C_NP ._. Industry_NN product_NN price_NN policy_NN The_AT industry_NN of_IN this_DT model_NN is_BEZ so_QL important_JJ that_CS it_PP$ wage_NN and_CC price_NN policy_NNS are_BER affected_VBN with_IN a_AT public_JJ interest_NN ._. Because_RB of_IN it_PP$ importance_NN ,_, and_CC because_CS the_AT lack_NN of_IN price_NN competition_NN is_BEZ well_RB recognized_VBN ,_, the_AT industry_NN is_BEZ under_IN considerable_JJ public_JJ pressure_NN not_* to_TO raise_VB it_PP$ price_NN any_QL more_RBR than_CS could_MD be_BE justified_VBN by_IN cost_NN increase_NNS ._. The_AT threat_NN of_IN effective_JJ anti-trust_JJ action_NN ,_, provoked_VBN by_IN ``_`` gouging_VBG the_AT public_NN ''_'' through_IN price_NN increase_NNS not_* justified_VBN by_IN cost_NN increase_NNS ,_, and_CC fear_NNS of_IN endangering_VBG relation_NNS with_IN customer_NNS ,_, Congress_NP ,_, the_AT general_JJ public_NN and_CC the_AT press_NN ,_, all_ABN operate_VB to_TO keep_VB price_NN increase_NNS in_IN some_DTI relation_NN to_IN cost_NN increase_NNS ._. For_IN the_AT industry_NN of_IN this_DT model_NN ,_, the_AT effect_NN of_IN such_JJ public_JJ pressure_NNS in_IN the_AT past_NN ha_HVZ been_BEN to_TO hold_VB the_AT price_NN well_QL below_IN the_AT short-run_NN profit-maximizing_JJ price_NN (_( given_VBN the_AT wage_NN rate_NN and_CC the_AT level_NN of_IN GNP_NN )_) ,_, and_CC even_RB below_IN the_AT entry-limited_JJ price_NN (_( but_CC not_* below_IN average_JJ cost_NN )_) ._. For_IN such_ABL an_AT industry_NN ,_, it_PPS is_BEZ only_RB ``_`` safe_JJ ''_'' to_TO raise_VB it_PP$ price_NN if_CS such_ABL an_AT increase_NN is_BEZ manifestly_RB ``_`` justified_VBN ''_'' by_IN rising_VBG cost_NNS (_( due_JJ to_IN rising_VBG wage_NNS ,_, etc._RB )_) ._. Thus_RB ,_, if_CS public_JJ pressure_NN set_VBZ the_AT effective_JJ limit_NN to_IN the_AT price_NN that_WPO the_AT industry_NN may_MD charge_VB ,_, this_DT pressure_NN is_BEZ itself_PPL a_AT function_NN of_IN the_AT wage_NN rate_NN ._. In_IN this_DT model_NN ,_, we_PPSS abstract_VB from_IN all_ABN non-wage_NN source_NNS of_IN cost_NN change_NNS ,_, so_CS that_CS the_AT ``_`` public-limit_NN price_NN ''_'' only_RB rise_VBZ a_CS the_AT wage_NN rate_NN rise_VBZ ._. In_IN such_JJ circumstance_NNS ,_, it_PPS may_MD well_RB be_BE to_IN the_AT advantage_NN of_IN the_AT industry_NN to_TO allow_VB an_AT increase_NN in_IN the_AT basic_JJ wage_NN rate_NN ._. Since_CS marginal_JJ cost_NNS rise_VB when_WRB the_AT wage_NN rate_NN rise_VBZ ,_, the_AT profit-maximizing_JJ price_NN also_RB rise_VBZ when_WRB the_AT public-limit_NN price_NN is_BEZ elevated_VBN ,_, and_CC is_BEZ likely_JJ to_TO remain_VB well_QL above_IN the_AT latter_AP ._. The_AT entry-limiting_JJ price_NN will_MD also_RB be_BE raised_VBN for_IN potential_JJ domestic_JJ competition_NN ,_, but_CC unless_CS general_JJ inflation_NN permit_VBZ profit_NN margin_NNS to_TO increase_VB proportionately_RB throughout_IN the_AT economy_NN ,_, we_PPSS might_MD expect_VB the_AT public-limit_NN price_NN to_TO approach_VB the_AT entry-limit_NN price_NN ._. The_AT foreign-entry-limit_NN price_NN would_MD be_BE approached_VBN more_QL rapidly_RB ,_, since_CS domestic_JJ wage-rates_NNS do_DO not_* enter_VB foreign_JJ cost_NNS directly_RB ._. Where_WRB this_DT approach_NN becomes_VBZ critical_JJ ,_, the_AT industry_NN can_MD be_BE expected_VBN to_TO put_VB much_AP emphasis_NN on_IN this_DT a_CS evidence_NN of_IN it_PP$ sincerity_NN in_IN ``_`` resisting_VBG ''_'' the_AT wage_NN pressure_NNS of_IN a_AT powerful_JJ union_NN ,_, requesting_VBG tariff_NN relief_NN after_CS it_PPS ha_HVZ ``_`` reluctantly_RB ''_'' acceded_VBN to_IN the_AT union_NN pressure_NN ._. Whether_CS or_CC not_* it_PPS is_BEZ in_IN the_AT industry's_NN$ interest_NN to_TO allow_VB the_AT basic_JJ wage_NN rate_NN to_TO rise_VB obviously_RB depends_VBZ upon_IN the_AT extent_NN to_IN which_WDT the_AT public-limit_NN price_NN rise_VBZ in_IN response_NN to_IN a_AT basic_JJ wage_NN increase_NN ,_, and_CC the_AT relation_NN of_IN this_DT response_NN to_IN the_AT increase_NN in_IN cost_NNS accompanying_VBG the_AT wage_NN increase_NN ._. The_AT extent_NN to_IN which_WDT the_AT public-limit_NN price_NN is_BEZ raised_VBN by_IN a_AT given_VBN increase_NN in_IN the_AT basic_JJ wage_NN rate_NN is_BEZ itself_PPL a_AT function_NN of_IN three_CD thing_NNS :_: the_AT passage_NN of_IN time_NN ,_, the_AT level_NN of_IN GNP_NN ,_, and_CC the_AT size_NN of_IN the_AT wage_NN increase_NN ._. We_PPSS are_BER abstracting_VBG from_IN the_AT fact_NN of_IN strike_NNS here_RB ,_, but_CC it_PPS should_MD be_BE obvious_JJ that_CS the_AT extent_NN to_IN which_WDT the_AT public-limit_NN price_NN is_BEZ raised_VBN by_IN a_AT given_VBN increase_NN in_IN the_AT basic_JJ wage_NN rate_NN is_BEZ also_RB a_AT function_NN of_IN the_AT show_NN of_IN resistance_NN put_VBN up_RP by_IN the_AT industry_NN ._. The_AT industry_NN may_MD deliberately_RB take_VB a_AT strike_NN ,_, not_* to_TO put_VB pressure_NN on_IN the_AT union_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN order_NN to_TO ``_`` educate_VB ''_'' the_AT government_NN and_CC the_AT customer_NNS of_IN the_AT industry_NN ._. As_CS a_AT strike_NN continues_VBZ ,_, these_DTS party_NNS increase_VB their_PP$ pressure_NN on_IN the_AT industry_NN to_TO reach_VB an_AT agreement_NN ._. They_PPSS become_VB increasingly_QL willing_JJ to_TO accept_VB the_AT price_NN increase_NN that_WPO the_AT industry_NN claim_VBZ the_AT wage_NN bargain_NN would_MD entail_VB ._. Public_JJ indignation_NN and_CC resistance_NN to_IN wage-price_NN increase_NNS is_BEZ obviously_RB much_QL le_AP when_WRB the_AT increase_NNS are_BER on_IN the_AT order_NN of_IN 3%_NN per_IN annum_NN than_CS when_WRB the_AT increase_NNS are_BER on_IN the_AT order_NN of_IN 3%_NN per_IN month_NN ._. The_AT simple_JJ passage_NN of_IN an_AT additional_JJ eleven_CD months'_NNS$ time_NN make_VBZ the_AT second_OD 3%_NN boost_NN more_QL acceptable_JJ ._. Thus_RB ,_, the_AT public-limit_NN price_NN is_BEZ raised_VBN far_RBR by_IN a_AT given_VBN wage_NN increase_NN the_AT long_JJR it_PPS ha_HVZ been_BEN since_CS the_AT previous_JJ price_NN increase_NN ._. Notice_VB ,_, however_RB ,_, that_CS the_AT passage_NN of_IN time_NN doe_DOZ not_* permit_VB the_AT raising_NN of_IN price_NNS per_IN se_PPL ,_, without_IN an_AT accompanying_VBG wage_NN increase_NN ._. Similarly_RB ,_, high_JJR level_NNS of_IN GNP_NN do_DO not_* ,_, in_IN themselves_PPLS ,_, provide_VB ground_NNS for_IN raising_VBG price_NNS ,_, but_CC they_PPSS do_DO relax_VB some_DTI of_IN the_AT pressure_NN on_IN the_AT industry_NN so_CS that_CS it_PPS can_MD raise_VB price_NNS higher_RBR for_IN a_AT given_VBN wage_NN increase_NN ._. This_DT is_BEZ not_* extended_VBN to_IN anticipated_VBN level_NNS of_IN GNP_NN ,_, however_RB --_-- only_RB the_AT current_JJ level_NN of_IN GNP_NN affect_VBZ the_AT public_JJ pressure_NN against_IN wage-price_NN increase_NNS ._. Finally_RB ,_, since_CS the_AT public_NN requires_VBZ some_DTI restraint_NN on_IN the_AT part_NN of_IN the_AT company_NNS ,_, large_JJR wage_NN increase_NNS call_VB for_IN le_AP than_CS proportionately_RB large_JJR price_NN increase_NNS (_( e.g._RB ,_, if_CS a_AT wage_NN increase_NN of_IN 5%_NN allows_VBZ a_AT price_NN increase_NN of_IN 7%_NN ,_, a_AT wage_NN increase_NN of_IN 10%_NN allows_VBZ a_AT price_NN increase_NN of_IN something_PN le_AP than_IN 14%_NN )_) ._. D_NP ._. Industry_NN cost_NNS We_PPSS assume_VB that_CS average_JJ total_JJ unit_NN cost_NN in_IN the_AT relevant_JJ region_NN of_IN operation_NN is_BEZ constant_JJ with_IN respect_NN to_IN quantity_NN produced_VBN (_( the_AT average_JJ cost_NN curve_NN is_BEZ horizontal_JJ ,_, and_CC therefore_RB is_BEZ identical_JJ with_IN the_AT marginal_JJ cost_NN curve_NN )_) ,_, and_CC is_BEZ the_AT same_AP for_IN every_AT firm_NN (_( and_CC therefore_RB for_IN the_AT industry_NN )_) ._. The_AT level_NN of_IN this_DT average_JJ cost_NN is_BEZ determined_VBN by_IN factor_NN price_NNS ,_, technology_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB forth_RB ._. As_CS we_PPSS have_HV noted_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, we_PPSS are_BER abstracting_VBG from_IN change_NNS in_IN all_ABN determinant_NNS of_IN this_DT level_NN except_IN for_IN change_NNS in_IN the_AT wage_NN rate_NN ._. The_AT level_NN of_IN average_JJ cost_NN (_( equal_JJ to_IN marginal_JJ cost_NN )_) is_BEZ thus_RB strictly_RB a_AT function_NN of_IN the_AT wage_NN rate_NN ._. E_NP ._. Union_NN policy_NNS and_CC collective_JJ bargaining_VBG issue_NNS The_AT single_AP union_NN which_WDT face_VBZ the_AT industry_NN doe_DOZ not_* restrict_VB it_PP$ membership_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX is_BEZ an_AT adequate_JJ supply_NN of_IN labor_NN available_JJ to_IN the_AT firm_NNS of_IN the_AT industry_NN at_IN the_AT going_VBG wage_NN rate_NN ._. The_AT union_NN doe_DOZ not_* regard_VB unemployment_NN of_IN it_PP$ own_JJ member_NNS a_CS a_AT matter_NN of_IN concern_NN when_WRB setting_VBG it_PP$ own_JJ wage_NN policy_NN --_-- it_PP$ concern_NN with_IN employment_NN make_VBZ itself_PPL felt_VBN in_IN pressure_NN upon_IN the_AT government_NN to_TO maintain_VB full_JJ employment_NN ._. The_AT union_NN vigorously_RB demand_VBZ wage_NN increase_NNS from_IN productivity_NN increase_NNS ,_, and_CC wage_NN increase_NNS to_TO offset_VB cost-of-living_NN increase_NNS ,_, but_CC we_PPSS abstract_VB from_IN these_DTS force_NNS here_RB ._. For_IN our_PP$ present_JJ purpose_NNS we_PPSS assume_VB that_CS the_AT sole_JJ subject_NN of_IN bargaining_NN is_BEZ the_AT basic_JJ wage_NN rate_NN (_( not_* including_IN productivity_NN improvement_NN factor_NNS or_CC cost-of-living_NN adjustment_NNS )_) ,_, and_CC it_PPS is_BEZ this_DT basic_JJ wage_NN rate_NN which_WDT determines_VBZ the_AT level_NN of_IN cost_NNS ._. Productivity_NN is_BEZ something_PN of_IN an_AT amorphous_JJ concept_NN and_CC the_AT amount_NN of_IN productivity_NN increase_NN in_IN a_AT given_VBN time_NN period_NN is_BEZ not_* even_RB well_RB known_VBN to_IN the_AT industry_NN ,_, much_QL le_AP to_IN the_AT union_NN or_CC to_IN the_AT public_NN ._. Disagreement_NN on_IN the_AT amount_NN of_IN productivity_NN increase_NN exacerbates_VBZ the_AT problem_NN of_IN agreeing_VBG how_WRB an_AT increase_NN in_IN profit_NN margin_NNS related_VBN to_IN a_AT productivity_NN increase_NN should_MD be_BE shared_VBN ._. The_AT existence_NN of_IN conflict_NN and_CC of_IN vigorous_JJ union_NN demand_NN for_IN an_AT increase_NN in_IN money_NN wage_NNS doe_DOZ not_* contradict_VB the_AT assumption_NN that_CS the_AT union_NN is_BEZ willing_JJ to_TO settle_VB for_IN cost-of-living_NN and_CC productivity-share_NN increase_NNS a_CS distinct_JJ from_IN a_AT cost-raising_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_AT basic_JJ wage_NN rate_NN ._. We_PPSS assume_VB far_RBR that_CS the_AT union_NN recognizes_VBZ the_AT possibility_NN that_CS price-level_NN increase_NNS may_MD offset_VB wage-rate_NN increase_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PPS doe_DOZ not_* entirely_RB disregard_VB the_AT effect_NN of_IN price_NN increase_NNS arising_VBG from_IN it_PP$ own_JJ wage_NN increase_NNS upon_IN the_AT ``_`` real_JJ ''_'' wage_NN rate_NN ._. For_IN internal_JJ political_JJ reason_NNS ,_, the_AT union_NN asks_VBZ for_IN (_( and_CC accepts_VBZ )_) increase_NNS in_IN the_AT basic_JJ wage_NN rate_NN ,_, and_CC would_MD vigorously_RB oppose_VB a_AT reduction_NN in_IN this_DT rate_NN ,_, but_CC the_AT adjustment_NN of_IN the_AT basic_JJ wage_NN rate_NN upwards_RB is_BEZ essentially_RB up_RP to_IN the_AT discretion_NN of_IN the_AT company_NNS of_IN the_AT industry_NN ._. Changes_NNS in_IN the_AT basic_JJ wage_NN rate_NN are_BER cost-raising_JJ ,_, and_CC they_PPSS constitute_VB an_AT argument_NN for_IN raising_VBG price_NNS ._. However_RB ,_, it_PPS is_BEZ not_* known_VBN to_IN either_CC the_AT union_NN or_CC the_AT public_NN precisely_RB how_WQL much_AP of_IN a_AT cost_NN increase_NN is_BEZ caused_VBN by_IN a_AT given_VBN change_NN in_IN the_AT basic_JJ wage_NN rate_NN ,_, although_CS the_AT company_NNS are_BER presumed_VBN to_TO have_HV reliable_JJ estimate_NNS of_IN this_DT magnitude_NN ._. In_IN this_DT model_NN ,_, then_RB ,_, the_AT industry_NN is_BEZ presumed_VBN to_TO realize_VB that_CS they_PPSS could_MD successfully_RB resist_VB a_AT change_NN in_IN the_AT basic_JJ wage_NN rate_NN ,_, but_CC since_CS such_ABL a_AT change_NN is_BEZ the_AT only_AP effective_JJ mean_NN to_IN raising_VBG price_NNS they_PPSS may_MD ,_, in_IN circumstance_NNS to_TO be_BE spelled_VBN out_RP in_IN Part_NN 2_CD ,_, below_RB ,_, find_VB it_PPO to_IN their_PP$ advantage_NN to_TO allow_VB the_AT wage_NN rise_NN ._. Thus_RB ,_, for_IN non-negative_JJ change_NNS in_IN the_AT basic_JJ wage_NN rate_NN ,_, the_AT industry_NN becomes_VBZ the_AT active_JJ wage-setter_NN ,_, since_CS any_DTI increase_NN in_IN the_AT basic_JJ wage_NN rate_NN can_MD occur_VB only_AP by_IN reason_NN of_IN industry_NN acquiescence_NN ._. The_AT presumption_NN in_IN the_AT literature_NN would_MD appear_VB to_TO be_BE that_CS the_AT basic_JJ wage_NN rate_NN would_MD be_BE unchanged_JJ in_IN this_DT case_NN ,_, on_IN the_AT ground_NNS that_CS it_PPS is_BEZ ``_`` clearly_RB ''_'' not_* in_IN the_AT interest_NN of_IN the_AT industry_NN to_TO raise_VB wage_NNS gratuitously_RB ._. From_IN this_DT presumption_NN it_PPS is_BEZ an_AT easy_JJ step_NN to_IN the_AT conclusion_NN that_CS any_DTI observed_VBN increase_NNS in_IN the_AT basic_JJ wage_NN rate_NN must_MD be_BE due_JJ to_IN union_NN behavior_NN different_JJ and_CC more_QL aggressive_JJ than_CS assumed_VBN in_IN our_PP$ model_NN ._. It_PPS is_BEZ this_DT conclusion_NN that_WPO we_PPSS challenge_VB ;_. ;_. we_PPSS do_DO so_RB by_IN disproving_VBG the_AT presumption_NN on_IN which_WDT it_PPS is_BEZ based_VBN ._. 2_CD ,_, the_AT operation_NN of_IN the_AT model_NN It_PPS is_BEZ convenient_JJ to_TO assume_VB that_CS the_AT union-industry_NN contract_NN is_BEZ of_IN one_CD year's_NN$ duration_NN ._. In_IN the_AT century_NN from_IN 1815_CD to_IN 1914_CD the_AT law_NN of_IN nation_NNS became_VBD international_JJ law_NN ._. Several_AP factor_NNS contributed_VBD to_IN this_DT change_NN ._. The_AT Congress_NP of_IN Vienna_NP is_BEZ a_AT convenient_JJ starting_VBG point_NN because_CS it_PPS both_ABX epitomized_VBD and_CC symbolized_VBD what_WDT wa_BEDZ to_TO follow_VB ._. Here_RB in_IN 1815_CD the_AT great_JJ nation_NNS assembled_VBD to_TO legislate_VB not_* merely_RB for_IN Europe_NP ,_, but_CC for_IN the_AT world_NN ._. Thus_RB the_AT Congress_NP mark_VBZ a_AT formal_JJ recognition_NN of_IN the_AT political_JJ system_NN that_WPS wa_BEDZ central_JJ to_IN world_NN politics_NN for_IN a_AT century_NN ._. International_JJ law_NN had_HVD to_TO fit_VB the_AT condition_NNS of_IN Europe_NP ,_, and_CC nothing_PN that_WPS could_MD not_* fit_VB this_DT system_NN ,_, or_CC the_AT interest_NNS of_IN the_AT great_JJ European_JJ nation_NNS collectively_RB ,_, could_MD possibly_RB emerge_VB a_CS law_NN in_IN any_DTI meaningful_JJ sense_NN ._. Essentially_RB this_DT imposed_VBD two_CD condition_NNS :_: First_RB ,_, international_JJ law_NN had_HVD to_TO recognize_VB and_CC be_BE compatible_JJ with_IN an_AT international_JJ political_JJ system_NN in_IN which_WDT a_AT number_NN of_IN state_NNS were_BED competitive_JJ ,_, suspicious_JJ ,_, and_CC opportunistic_JJ in_IN their_PP$ political_JJ alignment_NNS with_IN one_CD another_DT ;_. ;_. second_RB ,_, it_PPS had_HVD to_TO be_BE compatible_JJ with_IN the_AT value_NN system_NN that_WPO they_PPSS shared_VBD ._. In_IN both_ABX respect_NNS ,_, international_JJ law_NN wa_BEDZ Europeanized_VBN ._. It_PPS wa_BEDZ not_* always_RB easy_JJ to_TO develop_VB theory_NN and_CC doctrine_NN which_WDT would_MD square_VB the_AT two_CD condition_NNS ._. On_IN the_AT one_CD hand_NN ,_, the_AT major_JJ European_JJ nation_NNS had_HVD to_TO maintain_VB vis-a-vis_IN each_DT other_AP an_AT emphasis_NN upon_IN sovereignty_NN ,_, independence_NN ,_, formal_JJ equality_NN --_-- thus_RB insuring_VBG for_IN themselves_PPLS individually_RB an_AT optimal_JJ freedom_NN of_IN action_NN to_TO maintain_VB the_AT ``_`` flexibility_NN of_IN alignment_NN ''_'' that_WPO the_AT system_NN required_VBD and_CC to_TO avoid_VB anything_PN approaching_VBG a_AT repetition_NN of_IN the_AT disastrous_JJ Napoleonic_JJ experience_NN ._. But_CC there_EX wa_BEDZ no_AT pressing_VBG need_NN to_TO maintain_VB these_DTS same_AP standard_NNS with_IN regard_NN to_IN most_AP of_IN the_AT rest_NN of_IN the_AT world_NN ._. Thus_RB ,_, theory_NN and_CC doctrine_NN applicable_JJ among_IN the_AT great_JJ nation_NNS and_CC the_AT small_JJR European_JJ state_NNS did_DOD not_* really_RB comfortably_RB fit_VB le_QL developed_VBN and_CC le_QL powerful_JJ society_NNS elsewhere_RB ._. Political_JJ interference_NN in_IN Africa_NP and_CC Asia_NP and_CC even_RB in_IN Latin_JJ America_NP (_( though_CS limited_VBN in_IN Latin_JJ America_NP by_IN the_AT special_JJ interest_NN of_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS a_CS expressed_VBN in_IN the_AT Monroe_NP Doctrine_NN ,_, itself_PPL from_IN the_AT outset_NN related_VBN to_IN European_JJ politics_NN and_CC long_RB dependent_JJ upon_IN the_AT ``_`` balance_NN of_IN power_NN ''_'' system_NN in_IN Europe_NP )_) wa_BEDZ necessary_JJ in_IN order_NN to_TO preserve_VB both_ABX common_JJ economic_JJ value_NNS and_CC the_AT European_JJ ``_`` balance_NN ''_'' itself_PPL ._. A_AT nation_NN such_JJ a_CS Switzerland_NP could_MD be_BE neutralized_VBN by_IN agreement_NN and_CC could_MD be_BE relied_VBN upon_RB to_TO protect_VB it_PP$ neutrality_NN ;_. ;_. more_QL doubtful_JJ ,_, but_CC possible_JJ ,_, (_( with_IN an_AT assist_NN from_IN the_AT North_NR )_) wa_BEDZ the_AT neutralization_NN of_IN the_AT Latin_JJ American_JJ country_NNS ;_. ;_. out_RP of_IN the_AT question_NN wa_BEDZ the_AT neutralization_NN of_IN Asia_NP and_CC Africa_NP ._. This_DT Europeanization_NN of_IN the_AT law_NN wa_BEDZ made_VBN explicit_JJ by_IN a_AT number_NN of_IN 19th_OD century_NN scholar_NNS ._. More_AP emphasis_NN wa_BEDZ put_VBN upon_IN the_AT fact_NN that_CS international_JJ law_NN wa_BEDZ the_AT law_NN of_IN ``_`` civilized_VBN nation_NNS ''_'' ;_. ;_. Kent_NP and_CC Story_NP ,_, the_AT great_JJ early_JJ American_JJ scholar_NNS ,_, repeatedly_RB made_VBD use_NN of_IN this_DT phrase_NN ,_, or_CC of_IN ``_`` Christian_JJ nation_NNS ''_'' ,_, which_WDT is_BEZ a_AT substantial_JJ equivalent_NN ._. Wheaton_NP stated_VBD that_CS the_AT public_JJ law_NN wa_BEDZ essentially_RB ``_`` limited_VBN to_IN the_AT civilized_VBN and_CC Christian_JJ people_NNS of_IN Europe_NP or_CC to_IN those_DTS of_IN European_JJ origin_NN ''_'' ._. Of_IN course_NN it_PPS had_HVD always_RB been_BEN of_IN European_JJ origin_NN in_IN fact_NN ,_, but_CC it_PPS had_HVD maintained_VBN a_AT universal_JJ outlook_NN under_IN the_AT natural_JJ law_NN theory_NN ._. Now_RB ,_, with_IN virtually_RB every_AT writer_NN ,_, not_* only_RB wa_BEDZ the_AT European_JJ origin_NN of_IN public_JJ law_NN acknowledged_VBN a_CS a_AT historical_JJ phenomenon_NN ,_, but_CC the_AT rule_NNS thus_RB established_VBN by_IN the_AT advanced_VBN civilization_NNS of_IN Europe_NP were_BED to_TO be_BE imposed_VBN on_IN others_NNS ._. The_AT European_JJ custom_NNS on_IN which_WDT international_JJ law_NN wa_BEDZ based_VBN were_BED to_TO become_VB ,_, by_IN force_NN and_CC fiat_NN ,_, the_AT custom_NNS that_WPO others_NNS were_BED to_TO accept_VB a_CS law_NN if_CS they_PPSS were_BED to_TO join_VB this_DT community_NN a_CS sovereign_JJ state_NNS ._. Hall_NP ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, wa_BEDZ quite_QL explicit_JJ on_IN this_DT point_NN when_WRB he_PPS said_VBD state_NNS outside_IN European_JJ civilization_NN must_MD formally_RB enter_VB into_IN the_AT circle_NN of_IN law-governed_JJ country_NNS ._. They_PPSS must_MD do_DO something_PN with_IN the_AT acquiescence_NN of_IN the_AT latter_AP ,_, or_CC some_DTI of_IN them_PPO ,_, which_WDT amount_VBZ to_IN an_AT acceptance_NN of_IN the_AT law_NN in_IN it_PP$ entirety_NN beyond_IN all_ABN possibility_NN of_IN misconstruction_NN ''_'' ._. During_IN the_AT nineteenth_OD century_NN these_DTS view_NNS were_BED protested_VBN by_IN virtually_RB all_ABN the_AT Latin_JJ American_JJ writer_NNS ,_, though_CS ineffectively_RB ,_, just_RB a_CS the_AT new_JJ nation_NNS of_IN Africa_NP and_CC Asia_NP protest_VB them_PPO ,_, with_IN more_AP effect_NN ,_, today_NR ._. A_AT number_NN of_IN other_AP nineteenth-century_NN development_NNS contributed_VBD to_IN the_AT transmutation_NN of_IN the_AT law_NN of_IN nation_NNS into_IN international_JJ law_NN ;_. ;_. that_DT is_BEZ ,_, from_IN aspect_NNS of_IN a_AT universal_JJ system_NN of_IN Justice_NN into_IN particular_JJ rule_NNS governing_VBG the_AT relation_NNS of_IN sovereign_JJ state_NNS ._. The_AT difference_NN is_BEZ important_JJ ,_, for_CS although_CS the_AT old_JJR law_NN of_IN nation_NNS did_DOD cover_VB relationship_NNS among_IN sovereign_NNS ,_, this_DT wa_BEDZ by_IN no_AT mean_NNS it_PP$ exclusive_JJ domain_NN ._. The_AT law_NN of_IN nature_NN governed_VBD sovereign_NNS in_IN their_PP$ relationship_NN to_IN their_PP$ own_JJ citizen_NNS ,_, to_IN foreigner_NNS ,_, and_CC to_IN each_DT other_AP in_IN a_AT conceptually_RB unified_VBN system_NN ._. The_AT theory_NN of_IN international_JJ law_NN ,_, which_WDT in_IN the_AT nineteenth_OD century_NN became_VBD common_JJ to_IN virtually_RB all_ABN writer_NNS in_IN Europe_NP and_CC America_NP ,_, broke_VBD this_DT unity_NN and_CC this_DT universality_NN ._. A_AT most_QL revealing_JJ recent_JJ case_NN is_BEZ Textile_NN Workers_NNS Union_NN v._IN Lincoln_NP Mills_NNS ._.
