How_WRB can_MD judge_NNS exercise_VB jurisdiction_NN to_TO enforce_VB national_JJ right_NNS when_WRB Congress_NP ha_HVZ created_VBN none_PN ?_. The_AT Court_NN held_VBD that_CS Congress_NP had_HVD intended_VBN the_AT federal_JJ judiciary_NN to_TO ``_`` fashion_VB ''_'' an_AT appropriate_JJ law_NN of_IN labor-management_NN contract_NNS ._. In_IN short_JJ ,_, congressional_JJ power_NN to_TO grant_VB federal-question_NN authority_NN to_IN federal_JJ court_NNS is_BEZ now_RB apparently_RB so_QL broad_JJ that_CS Congress_NP need_MD not_* create_VB ,_, or_CC specify_VB ,_, the_AT right_NN to_TO be_BE enforced_VBN ._. The_AT Lincoln_NP Mills_NNS decision_NN authorizes_VBZ a_AT whole_JJ new_JJ body_NN of_IN federal_JJ ``_`` common_JJ law_NN ''_'' which_WDT ,_, a_CS Mr._NP Justice_NP Frankfurter_NP pointed_VBD out_RP in_IN dissent_NN ,_, lead_VBZ to_IN one_CD of_IN the_AT following_VBG ``_`` incongruity_NNS ''_'' :_: ``_`` (_( (_( 1_CD )_) conflict_NN in_IN federal_JJ and_CC state_NN court_NN interpretation_NNS of_IN collective_JJ bargaining_NN agreement_NNS ;_. ;_. (_( 2_CD )_) displacement_NN of_IN state_NN law_NN by_IN federal_JJ law_NN in_IN state_NN court_NNS in_IN all_ABN action_NNS regarding_IN collective_JJ bargaining_NN agreement_NNS ;_. ;_. or_CC (_( 3_CD )_) exclusion_NN of_IN state_NN court_NN jurisdiction_NN over_IN these_DTS matter_NNS ''_'' ._. The_AT Justice's_NN$ elaborate_JJ examination_NN of_IN the_AT legislative_JJ history_NN of_IN the_AT provision_NN in_IN question_NN suggests_VBZ that_CS Congress'_NP$ purpose_NN wa_BEDZ merely_RB to_TO make_VB union_NNS suable_JJ ._. With_IN a_AT few_AP exception_NNS ,_, the_AT lawmaker_NNS seemed_VBD unaware_JJ of_IN the_AT technical_JJ problem_NNS of_IN federal_JJ jurisdiction_NN involved_VBN --_-- to_TO say_VB nothing_PN of_IN the_AT delegation_NN of_IN lawmaking_JJ power_NN to_IN judge_NNS ._. To_TO avoid_VB these_DTS constitutional_JJ difficulty_NNS ,_, Mr._NP Justice_NP Frankfurter_NP wa_BEDZ prepared_VBN to_TO read_VB the_AT Taft-Hartley_NP provision_NN a_CS concerned_VBN with_IN diversity_NN ,_, rather_RB than_CS federal_JJ question_NN ,_, jurisdiction_NN ._. This_DT would_MD satisfy_VB what_WDT presumably_RB wa_BEDZ Congress'_NP$ major_JJ purpose_NN --_-- the_AT suability_NN of_IN union_NNS ._. It_PPS would_MD also_RB leave_VB intact_JJ the_AT states'_NNS$ traditional_JJ authority_NN in_IN the_AT realm_NN of_IN contract_NN law_NN ._. (_( As_CS we_PPSS have_HV seen_VBN ,_, the_AT Erie_NP and_CC York_NP decision_NNS require_VB federal_JJ court_NNS in_IN diversity_NN case_NNS to_TO follow_VB state_NN decisional_JJ rule_NNS ._. )_) Here_RB again_RB Mr._NP Justice_NP Frankfurter_NP could_MD not_* lightly_RB accept_VB the_AT principle_NN of_IN wholesale_JJ judicial_JJ legislation_NN ._. If_CS Congress_NP want_VBZ to_TO displace_VB the_AT state_NNS from_IN area_NNS which_WDT they_PPSS have_HV customarily_RB occupied_VBN ,_, let_VB it_PPS do_DO so_RB knowingly_RB and_CC explicitly_RB ._. And_CC let_VB it_PPS do_DO it_PP$ own_JJ lawmaking_NN and_CC not_* leave_VB that_DT to_IN federal_JJ judge_NNS ._. Does_DOZ Lincoln_NP Mills_NNS suggest_VB that_CS if_CS Congress_NP granted_VBD jurisdiction_NN over_IN interstate_JJ divorce_NN case_NNS ,_, the_AT federal_JJ court_NNS would_MD be_BE authorized_VBN to_TO fashion_VB a_AT national_JJ law_NN for_IN the_AT dissolution_NN of_IN marriage_NNS ?_. There_EX is_BEZ a_AT common_JJ problem_NN behind_IN most_AP of_IN these_DTS federal_JJ question_NN and_CC diversity_NN case_NNS ._. Congress_NP ha_HVZ not_* clearly_RB defined_VBN the_AT bound_NNS between_IN state_NN and_CC federal_JJ court_NN competence_NN ._. It_PPS ha_HVZ the_AT power_NN to_TO do_DO so_RB but_CC for_IN the_AT most_AP part_NN ha_HVZ left_VBN the_AT matter_NN for_IN solution_NN by_IN judge_NNS on_IN a_AT case-by-case_JJ basis_NN ._. A_AT careful_JJ student_NN ha_HVZ suggested_VBN that_CS ``_`` In_IN any_DTI new_JJ revision_NN (_( of_IN the_AT Judicial_JJ Code_NN )_) the_AT legislator_NNS would_MD do_DO well_RB to_TO remember_VB that_CS the_AT allocation_NN of_IN power_NN to_IN the_AT federal_JJ court_NNS should_MD be_BE limited_VBN to_IN those_DTS matter_NNS in_IN which_WDT their_PP$ expertise_NN in_IN federal_JJ law_NN might_MD be_BE used_VBN ,_, leaving_VBG to_IN the_AT state_NN judiciary_NNS the_AT primary_JJ obligation_NN of_IN pronouncing_VBG state_NN law_NN ''_'' ._. Obviously_RB ,_, the_AT goal_NN here_RB proposed_VBN is_BEZ the_AT guiding_VBG principle_NN in_IN Mr._NP Justice_NP Frankfurter's_NP$ opinion_NNS --_-- to_IN the_AT extent_NN that_CS Congress_NP leaf_VBZ the_AT problem_NN to_IN judicial_JJ discretion_NN ._. The_AT same_AP rule_NN of_IN specialization_NN and_CC division_NN of_IN labor_NN guide_VBZ him_PPO in_IN the_AT FELA_NN certiorari_NN case_NNS ,_, in_IN the_AT administrative_JJ law_NN area_NN ,_, and_CC indeed_RB in_IN the_AT whole_JJ realm_NN of_IN judicial_JJ review_NN ._. Mr._NP Justice_NP Black_NP no_AT doubt_NN concurs_VBZ in_IN principle_NN but_CC is_BEZ more_QL apt_JJ to_TO make_VB exception_NNS to_TO achieve_VB a_AT generous_JJ and_CC ``_`` just_JJ ''_'' result_NN ._. He_PPS will_MD not_* be_BE ``_`` fooled_VBN by_IN technicality_NNS ''_'' ._. Federal_JJ review_NN of_IN state_NN decision_NNS With_IN few_AP exception_NNS ,_, Congress_NP ha_HVZ not_* given_VBN federal_JJ court_NNS exclusive_JJ authority_NN to_TO enforce_VB right_NNS arising_VBG under_IN federal_JJ law_NN ._. To_TO put_VB it_PPO differently_RB ,_, state_NN and_CC federal_JJ court_NNS have_HV concurrent_JJ jurisdiction_NN with_IN respect_NN to_IN most_AP claim_NNS of_IN federal_JJ right_NN ._. To_TO insure_VB uniformity_NN in_IN the_AT meaning_NN of_IN national_JJ law_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, state_NN interpretation_NNS are_BER subject_JJ to_IN Supreme_JJ Court_NN review_NN ._. It_PPS may_MD be_BE noted_VBN ,_, parenthetically_RB ,_, that_CS to_TO evade_VB ``_`` desegregation_NN ''_'' an_AT ex-Justice_NN and_CC former_AP southern_JJ governor_NN ha_HVZ urged_VBN Congress_NP to_TO abolish_VB this_DT reviewing_VBG authority_NN ._. The_AT result_NN ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, would_MD be_BE that_CS federal_JJ law_NN inevitably_RB would_MD mean_VB different_JJ thing_NNS in_IN different_JJ state_NNS ._. It_PPS would_MD also_RB probably_RB mean_VB different_JJ thing_NNS within_IN the_AT same_AP state_NN --_-- depending_IN upon_IN what_WDT court_NN (_( state_NN or_CC federal_JJ )_) rendered_VBD decision_NN ._. We_PPSS consider_VB here_RB only_RB a_AT few_AP of_IN many_AP problem_NNS involved_VBN in_IN this_DT crucial_JJ federal-state_NN relationship_NN ._. The_AT first_OD is_BEZ that_CS enforcement_NN of_IN national_JJ law_NN in_IN state_NN litigation_NN raise_VBZ in_IN reverse_JJ the_AT old_JJ diversity_NN puzzle_NN of_IN the_AT relation_NN of_IN procedure_NN to_IN substance_NN ._. Subject_JJ to_IN certain_AP constitutional_JJ restraint_NNS in_IN favor_NN of_IN fair_JJ trial_NNS ,_, each_DT level_NN of_IN government_NN is_BEZ free_JJ to_TO devise_VB it_PP$ own_JJ judicial_JJ procedure_NNS ._. Litigants_NNS who_WPS choose_VB to_TO assert_VB federal_JJ claim_NNS in_IN a_AT state_NN court_NN go_VB into_IN that_DT court_NN subject_JJ to_IN it_PP$ rule_NNS of_IN procedure_NN ._. A_AT similar_JJ canon_NN applies_VBZ to_IN those_DTS who_WPS press_VB state_NN claim_NNS in_IN federal_JJ tribunal_NNS ,_, e.g._RB ,_, in_IN diversity_NN case_NNS ._. In_IN an_AT FELA_NN controversy_NN the_AT state_NN court_NN followed_VBD established_VBN state_NN procedure_NN by_IN construing_VBG a_AT vague_JJ complaint_NN ``_`` most_QL strongly_RB against_IN ''_'' the_AT complainant_NN ._. In_IN other_AP word_NNS the_AT burden_NN of_IN pleading_VBG clearly_RB rested_VBD upon_IN the_AT pleader_NN by_IN state_NN law_NN ._. The_AT result_NN wa_BEDZ that_CS the_AT plaintiff's_NN$ case_NN wa_BEDZ dismissed_VBN ._. Mr._NP Justice_NP Black_NP led_VBD a_AT reversing_VBG majority_NN :_: ``_`` Strict_JJ local_JJ rule_NNS of_IN pleading_VBG cannot_MD* be_BE used_VBN to_TO impose_VB unnecessary_JJ burden_NNS upon_IN right_NNS of_IN recovery_NN authorized_VBN by_IN federal_JJ law_NN ''_'' ._. Here_RB ,_, a_CS in_IN the_AT Byrd_NP case_NN ,_, another_DT element_NN of_IN state_NN procedure_NN wa_BEDZ subsumed_VBN to_IN federal_JJ judge-made_JJ law_NN ._. Justices_NNS Frankfurter_NP and_CC Jackson_NP dissented_VBD :_: ``_`` One_CD State_NN may_MD cherish_VB formality_NNS more_RBR than_CS another_DT ,_, one_CD State_NN may_MD be_BE more_QL responsive_JJ than_CS another_DT to_IN procedural_JJ reform_NNS ._. If_CS a_AT litigant_NN chooses_VBZ to_TO enforce_VB a_AT Federal_JJ right_NN in_IN a_AT State_NN court_NN ,_, he_PPS cannot_MD* be_BE heard_VBN to_TO object_VB if_CS he_PPS is_BEZ treated_VBN exactly_RB a_CS are_BER plaintiff_NNS who_WPS press_VB like_JJ claim_NNS arising_VBG under_IN State_NN law_NN with_IN regard_NN to_IN the_AT form_NN in_IN which_WDT the_AT claim_NN must_MD be_BE stated_VBN --_-- the_AT particularity_NN ,_, for_IN instance_NN ,_, with_IN which_WDT a_AT cause_NN of_IN action_NN must_MD be_BE described_VBN ._. Federal_JJ law_NN ,_, though_CS invoked_VBN in_IN a_AT State_NN court_NN ,_, delimits_VBZ the_AT Federal_JJ claim_NN --_-- defines_VBZ what_WDT give_VBZ a_AT right_NN to_IN recovery_NN and_CC what_WDT go_VBZ to_TO prove_VB it_PPO ._. But_CC the_AT form_NN in_IN which_WDT the_AT claim_NN must_MD be_BE stated_VBN need_MD not_* be_BE different_JJ from_IN what_WDT the_AT State_NN exacts_VBZ in_IN the_AT enforcement_NN of_IN like_JJ obligation_NNS created_VBN by_IN it_PPO ,_, so_QL long_RB a_CS a_AT requirement_NN doe_DOZ not_* add_VB to_IN ,_, or_CC diminish_VB ,_, the_AT right_NN a_CS defined_VBN by_IN Federal_JJ law_NN ,_, nor_CC burden_VB the_AT realization_NN of_IN this_DT right_NN in_IN the_AT actuality_NNS of_IN litigation_NN ''_'' ._. Another_DT problem_NN in_IN the_AT area_NN of_IN federal-state_NN relationship_NNS is_BEZ this_DT :_: what_WDT constitutes_VBZ reversible_JJ error_NN in_IN a_AT state_NN decision_NN ?_. Terminiello_NP v._IN Chicago_NP involved_VBD a_AT conviction_NN for_IN disorderly_JJ conduct_NN under_IN a_AT local_JJ ordinance_NN ._. The_AT conduct_NN in_IN question_NN wa_BEDZ a_AT speech_NN ._. The_AT accused_VBN did_DOD not_* object_VB to_IN the_AT trial_NN court's_NN$ charge_NN to_IN the_AT jury_NN that_CS discourse_NN ``_`` may_MD constitute_VB a_AT breach_NN of_IN the_AT peace_NN if_CS it_PPS stir_VBZ the_AT public_NN to_IN anger_NN ,_, invite_VBZ dispute_NN ,_, brings_VBZ about_RP a_AT condition_NN of_IN unrest_NN ._. ''_'' For_IN present_JJ purpose_NNS it_PPS may_MD be_BE assumed_VBN that_CS this_DT charge_NN so_QL narrowly_RB limited_VBD speech_NN a_CS to_TO violate_VB the_AT federal_JJ Constitution_NN ._. Though_CS the_AT accused_VBN raised_VBD many_AP other_AP objection_NNS ,_, he_PPS did_DOD not_* object_VB on_IN this_DT crucial_JJ point_NN at_IN any_DTI stage_NN of_IN the_AT proceeding_NNS ._. That_DT is_BEZ ,_, he_PPS did_DOD not_* claim_VB in_IN any_DTI of_IN the_AT four_CD court_NNS through_IN which_WDT his_PP$ case_NN progressed_VBD that_CS the_AT jury_NN charge_NN had_HVD denied_VBN him_PPO any_DTI federal_JJ right_NN ._. How_WRB else_RB can_MD one_PN explain_VB ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, allowing_VBG the_AT survival_NN of_IN the_AT right_NN to_TO amortize_VB bond_NN discount_NN and_CC premium_NN (_( section_NN 381(c)(9)_CD )_) ,_, but_CC not_* the_AT right_NN to_TO amortize_VB bond_NN issue_NN expense_NNS ;_. ;_. or_CC allowing_VBG a_AT deduction_NN for_IN payment_NN of_IN certain_AP obligation_NNS of_IN a_AT transferor_NN assumed_VBN in_IN the_AT reorganization_NN (_( section_NN 381(c)(16)_CD )_) ,_, but_CC not_* a_AT deduction_NN for_IN theft_NN loss_NNS sustained_VBN by_IN a_AT transferor_NN prior_RB to_IN a_AT reorganization_NN but_CC discovered_VBN after_IN it_PPO ;_. ;_. or_CC requiring_VBG a_AT transferor_NN to_TO carry_VB over_RP it_PP$ method_NN of_IN depreciation_NN (_( section_NN 381(c)(6)_CD )_) ,_, but_CC not_* allowing_VBG rapid_JJ amortization_NN of_IN emergency_NN facility_NNS transferred_VBN in_IN a_AT reorganization_NN ;_. ;_. or_CC allowing_VBG survival_NN of_IN a_AT dividend_NN carryover_NN to_IN a_AT personal_JJ holding_VBG company_NN (_( section_NN 381(c)(14)_CD )_) ,_, but_CC not_* carryover_NN of_IN excess_JJ tax_NN credit_NNS for_IN foreign_JJ tax_NNS ?_. These_DTS item_NNS ,_, and_CC most_AP of_IN the_AT others_NNS listed_VBN above_RB ,_, seem_VB quite_QL comparable_JJ to_IN item_NNS whose_WP$ right_NN of_IN survival_NN is_BEZ provided_VBN for_IN in_IN section_NN 381_CD ._. There_EX doe_DOZ not_* seem_VB to_TO be_BE any_DTI reasonable_JJ basis_NN for_IN distinction_NN either_CC in_IN term_NNS of_IN the_AT nature_NN of_IN the_AT tax_NN attribute_NN or_CC in_IN term_NNS of_IN tax-avoidance_NN possibility_NNS ._. With_IN respect_NN to_IN item_NNS such_JJ a_CS these_DTS the_AT provision_NNS of_IN section_NN 381(c)_CD ,_, viewed_VBN in_IN historical_JJ perspective_NN ,_, suggest_VB a_AT rule_NN requiring_VBG survival_NN ,_, whether_CS the_AT item_NNS are_BER beneficial_JJ or_CC detrimental_JJ to_IN the_AT surviving_VBG corporation_NN ._. To_IN this_DT extent_NN some_DTI stretching_VBG of_IN the_AT literal_JJ meaning_NN of_IN the_AT Committee_NN Report_NN seems_VBZ justified_VBN ,_, since_CS the_AT literal_JJ meaning_NN conflict_VBZ with_IN the_AT clear_JJ implication_NN ,_, if_CS not_* the_AT language_NN ,_, of_IN the_AT statute_NN ._. It_PPS is_BEZ not_* contended_VBN that_CS section_NN 381_CD should_MD prescribe_VB the_AT survival_NN of_IN all_ABN of_IN the_AT transferor's_NN$ tax_NN attribute_NNS ._. Such_ABL an_AT interpretation_NN could_MD not_* be_BE justified_VBN by_IN a_AT construction_NN of_IN the_AT statute_NN alone_JJ ;_. ;_. it_PPS would_MD certainly_RB violate_VB the_AT intention_NN of_IN Congress_NP a_CS expressed_VBN in_IN the_AT Committee_NN Report_NN ;_. ;_. and_CC in_IN at_IN least_AP one_CD instance_NN ,_, involving_VBG refund_NN claim_NNS ,_, it_PPS might_MD be_BE contrary_JJ to_IN another_DT provision_NN of_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS Code_NN ._. Refund_NN claim_NNS Section_NN 203_CD of_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS Code_NN void_VBZ an_AT assignment_NN of_IN a_AT claim_NN against_IN the_AT Government_NN unless_CS made_VBN after_CS it_PPS ha_HVZ been_BEN allowed_VBN ,_, the_AT amount_NN due_JJ ha_HVZ been_BEN ascertained_VBN ,_, and_CC a_AT warrant_NN for_IN it_PP$ payment_NN ha_HVZ been_BEN issued_VBN ._. If_CS it_PPS were_BED not_* for_IN judicial_JJ development_NN of_IN certain_AP exception_NNS ,_, this_DT section_NN would_MD prohibit_VB a_AT suit_NN for_IN refund_NN by_IN an_AT acquiring_VBG corporation_NN for_IN tax_NNS paid_VBN by_IN a_AT transferor_NN corporation_NN ,_, even_RB though_CS the_AT reorganization_NN meet_VBZ the_AT requirement_NNS of_IN section_NN 381(a)_CD ._. A_AT clearly_RB recognized_VBN exception_NN is_BEZ a_AT statutory_JJ merger_NN or_CC consolidation_NN ._. The_AT leading_VBG case_NN ,_, Seaboard_NN Air_NN Line_NN Railway_NN v._IN United_VBN States_NNS ,_, held_VBD that_CS the_AT transferee_NN could_MD sue_VB for_IN a_AT refund_NN of_IN tax_NNS paid_VBN by_IN the_AT transferor_NN ,_, and_CC it_PPS ha_HVZ been_BEN consistently_RB followed_VBN ._. The_AT Court_NN said_VBD the_AT purpose_NN of_IN the_AT section_NN wa_BEDZ principally_RB to_TO spare_VB the_AT Government_NN the_AT embarrassment_NN and_CC trouble_NN of_IN dealing_VBG with_IN several_AP party_NNS ,_, one_CD of_IN them_PPO a_AT stranger_NN to_IN the_AT claim_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO prevent_VB traffic_NN in_IN claim_NNS ,_, particularly_RB tenuous_JJ claim_NNS ,_, against_IN the_AT Government_NN ._. Neither_DTX reason_NN ,_, said_VBD the_AT Court_NN ,_, applied_VBD to_IN the_AT case_NN at_IN hand_NN ;_. ;_. furthermore_RB ,_, Congress_NP could_MD not_* be_BE presumed_VBN to_TO have_HV intended_VBN to_TO obstruct_VB merger_NNS approved_VBN by_IN the_AT state_NNS ._. Other_AP exception_NNS are_BER assignment_NNS for_IN the_AT benefit_NN of_IN creditor_NNS ,_, corporate_JJ dissolution_NNS ,_, transfer_NNS by_IN descent_NN ,_, or_CC transfer_NNS by_IN subrogation_NN ._. Exceptions_NNS are_BER often_RB classified_VBN a_CS transfer_NNS by_IN ``_`` operation_NN of_IN law_NN ''_'' ._. A_AT tax-free_JJ reorganization_NN not_* complying_VBG with_IN the_AT merger_NN or_CC consolidation_NN statute_NNS of_IN the_AT state_NNS involved_VBN is_BEZ difficult_JJ to_TO fit_VB into_IN an_AT ``_`` operation_NN of_IN law_NN ''_'' mold_NN ._. Although_CS it_PPS is_BEZ in_IN some_DTI way_NNS comparable_JJ to_IN a_AT voluntary_JJ sale_NN of_IN asset_NNS for_IN cash_NN ,_, to_IN which_WDT section_NN 203_CD quite_QL clearly_RB applies_VBZ ,_, the_AT court_NNS and_CC Treasury_NN have_HV held_VBN that_CS acquiring_VBG corporation_NNS in_IN several_AP type_NNS of_IN non-taxable_JJ reorganization_NNS may_MD sue_VB for_IN refund_NN of_IN tax_NNS paid_VBN by_IN transferor_NNS ._. A_AT recent_JJ case_NN in_IN point_NN is_BEZ Mitchell_NP Canneries_NNS v._IN United_VBN States_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT a_AT claim_NN against_IN the_AT Government_NN wa_BEDZ transferred_VBN first_RB from_IN a_AT corporation_NN to_IN a_AT partnership_NN ,_, whose_WP$ partner_NNS were_BED former_AP stockholder_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB to_IN another_DT corporation_NN formed_VBN by_IN the_AT partner_NNS ._. Holding_VBG the_AT final_JJ corporation_NN entitled_VBN to_TO sue_VB on_IN the_AT claim_NN ,_, the_AT Court_NN cited_VBD the_AT Seaboard_NN ,_, Novo_NP Trading_VBG ,_, and_CC Roomberg_NP case_NNS for_IN the_AT proposition_NN that_CS ``_`` transfer_NNS by_IN operation_NN of_IN law_NN or_CC in_IN conjunction_NN with_IN change_NNS of_IN corporate_JJ structure_NN are_BER not_* assignment_NNS prohibited_VBN by_IN the_AT statute_NN ''_'' ._. In_IN an_AT early_JJR case_NN ,_, Kingan_NP &_CC Co._NN v._IN United_VBN States_NNS ,_, an_AT American_JJ corporation_NN wa_BEDZ formed_VBN for_IN the_AT purpose_NN of_IN acquiring_VBG the_AT stock_NN of_IN a_AT British_JJ corporation_NN in_IN exchange_NN for_IN it_PP$ own_JJ stock_NN and_CC then_RB liquidating_VBG the_AT British_JJ corporation_NN ._. The_AT anti-assignment_JJ statute_NN wa_BEDZ held_VBN not_* to_TO prevent_VB the_AT American_JJ corporation_NN from_IN suing_VBG for_IN a_AT refund_NN of_IN tax_NNS paid_VBN by_IN the_AT British_JJ corporation_NN ._. The_AT transaction_NN presumably_RB would_MD have_HV qualified_VBN under_IN section_NN 368(a)(1)_CD a_CS a_AT contractual_JJ reorganization_NN ,_, followed_VBN by_IN a_AT section_NN 332_CD liquidation_NN ,_, but_CC not_* under_IN section_NN 368(a)(1)_CD a_CS a_AT statutory_JJ merger_NN of_IN consolidation_NN ._. The_AT Court_NN ,_, nevertheless_RB ,_, relied_VBD on_IN the_AT Seaboard_NN case_NN and_CC also_RB mentioned_VBD that_CS the_AT shareholder_NNS of_IN the_AT two_CD corporation_NNS were_BED the_AT same_AP ._. In_IN substance_NN ,_, said_VBD the_AT Court_NN ,_, there_EX wa_BEDZ no_AT transfer_NN of_IN equitable_JJ title_NN ._. The_AT Treasury_NN arrives_VBZ at_IN substantially_RB the_AT same_AP conclusion_NN ,_, but_CC skirt_VBZ the_AT problem_NN of_IN section_NN 203_CD of_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS Code_NN ._. Revenue_NN Ruling_NN 54-17_CD provides_VBZ that_CS if_CS the_AT corporation_NN against_IN which_WDT a_AT tax_NN wa_BEDZ assessed_VBN ha_HVZ since_RB been_BEN liquidated_VBN by_IN merger_NN with_IN a_AT successor_NN corporation_NN ,_, a_AT claim_NN for_IN refund_NN should_MD be_BE filed_VBN by_IN the_AT successor_NN in_IN the_AT name_NN and_CC on_IN behalf_NN of_IN the_AT corporation_NN which_WDT paid_VBD the_AT tax_NN ,_, followed_VBN by_IN the_AT name_NN of_IN the_AT successor_NN corporation_NN ._. Proper_JJ evidence_NN of_IN the_AT liquidation_NN and_CC succession_NN must_MD also_RB be_BE filed_VBN ._. If_CS the_AT succession_NN is_BEZ a_AT matter_NN of_IN public_JJ record_NN ,_, certificate_NNS of_IN the_AT Secretaries_NNS of_IN State_NN or_CC other_AP public_JJ official_NNS having_HVG custody_NN of_IN the_AT document_NNS will_MD suffice_VB ;_. ;_. if_CS the_AT succession_NN is_BEZ not_* of_IN record_NN ,_, all_ABN document_NNS relating_VBG to_IN such_JJ succession_NN ,_, properly_RB certified_VBN ,_, are_BER required_VBN ._. The_AT former_AP proof_NN seems_VBZ applicable_JJ to_IN a_AT statutory_JJ merger_NN or_CC consolidation_NN ,_, the_AT latter_AP to_IN a_AT contractual_JJ acquisition_NN ._. The_AT Ruling_NN would_MD not_* ,_, however_RB ,_, apply_VB to_IN an_AT acquisition_NN of_IN asset_NNS for_IN cash_NN ._. A_AT recent_JJ Ruling_NN ,_, although_CS rather_QL confusing_VBG ,_, cite_VBZ and_CC follows_VBZ Rev._NP Rul._NN 54-17_CD ._. The_AT Ruling_NN suggests_VBZ also_RB that_CS it_PPS applies_VBZ to_IN either_CC a_AT statutory_JJ or_CC contractual_JJ reorganization_NN ._. Hence_RB ,_, a_AT successor_NN corporation_NN in_IN a_AT C_NN reorganization_NN appears_VBZ entitled_VBN to_TO sue_VB for_IN a_AT refund_NN of_IN tax_NNS paid_VBN by_IN the_AT merged_VBN corporation_NN despite_IN section_NN 203_CD ._. In_IN a_AT B_NN reorganization_NN ,_, followed_VBN by_IN a_AT section_NN 332_CD liquidation_NN ,_, those_DTS case_NNS which_WDT hold_VB that_CS section_NN 203_CD is_BEZ inapplicable_JJ to_IN transfer_NNS in_IN liquidation_NN appear_VB to_TO permit_VB the_AT successor_NN corporation_NN to_TO sue_VB for_IN refund_NN of_IN tax_NNS paid_VBN by_IN the_AT transferor_NN ._. In_IN fact_NN ,_, a_AT cash_NN purchase_NN of_IN a_AT corporation's_NN$ stock_NN followed_VBN by_IN liquidation_NN might_MD also_RB be_BE an_AT effective_JJ way_NN to_TO transfer_VB a_AT claim_NN for_IN refund_NN if_CS the_AT Kimbell-Diamond_NP doctrine_NN is_BEZ not_* applied_VBN to_TO eliminate_VB the_AT intermediate_JJ step_NN ._. These_DTS result_NNS appear_VB sound_JJ ._. As_CS stated_VBN in_IN Seaboard_NN and_CC numerous_JJ other_AP case_NNS ,_, the_AT two_CD primary_JJ reason_NNS for_IN the_AT enactment_NN of_IN section_NN 203_CD of_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS Code_NN were_BED to_TO prevent_VB the_AT Government_NN from_IN having_HVG to_TO deal_VB with_IN more_AP than_IN one_CD claimant_NN and_CC to_TO prevent_VB the_AT assignment_NN of_IN meretricious_JJ claim_NNS on_IN a_AT contingent-fee_NN basis_NN ._. The_AT case_NNS have_HV allowed_VBN transfer_NN of_IN claim_NNS if_CS beneficial_JJ ownership_NN is_BEZ not_* changed_VBN ._. The_AT first_OD reason_NN would_MD never_RB apply_VB to_IN a_AT reorganization_NN transfer_NN which_WDT meet_VBZ the_AT condition_NNS of_IN section_NN 381(a)_CD ,_, which_WDT is_BEZ the_AT only_AP type_NN presently_RB under_IN discussion_NN ._. Section_NN 381(a)_CD applies_VBZ only_RB to_IN a_AT transfer_NN by_IN liquidation_NN of_IN a_AT subsidiary_NN owned_VBN to_IN the_AT extent_NN of_IN at_IN least_AP 80_CD per_IN cent_NN ,_, a_AT statutory_JJ merger_NN or_CC consolidation_NN ,_, an_AT acquisition_NN of_IN substantially_RB all_ABN a_AT corporation's_NN$ asset_NNS solely_RB in_IN exchange_NN for_IN voting_VBG stock_NN ,_, or_CC a_AT change_NN of_IN identity_NN ,_, form_NN ,_, or_CC place_NN of_IN organization_NN ._. In_IN virtually_RB every_AT case_NN the_AT transferor_NN corporation_NN is_BEZ liquidated_VBN ,_, and_CC it_PP$ former_AP stockholder_NNS either_CC own_VB outright_RB ,_, or_CC have_HV a_AT continuing_VBG stock_NN interest_NN in_IN ,_, the_AT asset_NNS which_WDT gave_VBD rise_NN to_IN the_AT tax_NN ._. In_IN these_DTS circumstance_NNS the_AT possibility_NN of_IN multiple_JJ or_CC conflicting_VBG claim_NNS is_BEZ exceedingly_QL remote_JJ ._. Furthermore_RB ,_, in_IN a_AT C_NN reorganization_NN the_AT continuing_VBG interest_NN of_IN stockholder_NNS of_IN the_AT corporation_NN which_WDT paid_VBD the_AT tax_NN must_MD be_BE great_JJR than_CS is_BEZ necessary_JJ in_IN a_AT statutory_JJ merger_NN ,_, to_IN which_WDT the_AT statute_NN is_BEZ clearly_RB inapplicable_JJ ._. Nor_CC is_BEZ it_PPS at_IN all_ABN likely_JJ that_CS a_AT ``_`` desperate_JJ ''_'' claim_NN against_IN the_AT Government_NN will_MD be_BE assigned_VBN on_IN a_AT contingent-fee_NN basis_NN in_IN the_AT guise_NN of_IN a_AT tax-free_JJ reorganization_NN ._. If_CS the_AT transferor_NN ha_HVZ substantial_JJ asset_NNS other_AP than_CS the_AT claim_NN ,_, it_PPS seems_VBZ reasonable_JJ to_TO assume_VB no_AT corporation_NN would_MD be_BE willing_JJ to_TO acquire_VB all_ABN of_IN it_PP$ property_NNS in_IN the_AT dim_JJ hope_NN of_IN collecting_VBG a_AT claim_NN for_IN refund_NN of_IN tax_NNS ._. If_CS such_ABL an_AT unlikely_JJ transaction_NN were_BED to_TO take_VB place_NN ,_, it_PPS would_MD more_QL logically_RB be_BE accomplished_VBN by_IN a_AT stock_NN purchase_NN ,_, followed_VBN by_IN the_AT prosecution_NN of_IN the_AT claim_NN by_IN the_AT wholly-owned_JJ subsidiary_NN ,_, followed_VBN by_IN liquidation_NN ._. In_IN the_AT rare_JJ case_NN where_WRB a_AT corporation's_NN$ only_AP substantial_JJ asset_NN ,_, or_CC it_PP$ most_QL important_JJ one_CD ,_, is_BEZ a_AT claim_NN for_IN refund_NN ,_, perhaps_RB it_PP$ transfer_NN should_MD not_* be_BE permitted_VBN ,_, whether_CS the_AT reorganization_NN take_VBZ the_AT form_NN of_IN a_AT statutory_JJ merger_NN or_CC of_IN the_AT acquisition_NN of_IN asset_NNS for_IN stock_NN ._. It_PPS appears_VBZ ,_, then_RB ,_, that_CS although_CS the_AT matter_NN is_BEZ not_* dealt_VBN with_IN in_IN section_NN 381(c)_CD ,_, a_AT successor_NN corporation_NN in_IN a_AT reorganization_NN of_IN a_AT type_NN specified_VBN in_IN section_NN 381(a)_CD is_BEZ entitled_VBN to_TO sue_VB for_IN refund_NN of_IN tax_NNS paid_VBN by_IN a_AT transferor_NN corporation_NN ._. Section_NN 203_CD of_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS Code_NN ha_HVZ been_BEN interpreted_VBN a_CS not_* applying_VBG to_IN claim_NNS against_IN the_AT Government_NN transferred_VBN in_IN tax-free_JJ reorganization_NNS ._. The_AT successor_NN corporation_NNS have_HV been_BEN held_VBN entitled_VBN to_TO sue_VB on_IN such_JJ claim_NNS ._. Other_AP tax_NN attribute_NNS of_IN the_AT transferor_NN There_EX are_BER certain_AP tax_NN attribute_NNS of_IN a_AT corporation_NN whose_WP$ nature_NN and_CC effect_NN might_MD depend_VB on_IN the_AT fact_NNS of_IN the_AT particular_JJ reorganization_NN involved_VBN ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, property_NN ``_`` used_VBN in_IN the_AT trade_NN or_CC business_NN ''_'' of_IN a_AT transferor_NN corporation_NN ,_, a_CS defined_VBN in_IN section_NN 1231_CD ,_, presumably_RB would_MD not_* retain_VB it_PP$ special_JJ status_NN following_IN a_AT non-taxable_JJ reorganization_NN if_CS it_PPS is_BEZ not_* so_RB used_VBN in_IN the_AT business_NN of_IN the_AT acquiring_VBG corporation_NN ._. The_AT parent_NN of_IN a_AT group_NN filing_VBG consolidated_VBN return_NNS might_MD be_BE treated_VBN a_CS the_AT same_AP corporation_NN following_IN a_AT reorganization_NN defined_VBN in_IN section_NN 368(a)(1)_CD ,_, but_CC a_CS a_AT different_JJ corporation_NN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN after_IN a_AT tax-free_JJ acquisition_NN by_IN another_DT corporation_NN which_WDT had_HVD not_* ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, elected_VBN to_TO file_VB consolidated_VBN return_NNS with_IN it_PP$ own_JJ subsidiary_NNS ._. Similar_JJ consideration_NNS presumably_RB made_VBD it_PPO difficult_JJ to_TO prescribe_VB a_AT general_JJ rule_NN where_WRB the_AT acquired_VBN and_CC acquiring_VBG corporation_NNS have_HV different_JJ method_NNS of_IN accounting_VBG (_( section_NN 381(c)(4)_CD )_) or_CC depreciation_NN (_( section_NN 381(c)(6)_CD )_) ._. Other_AP section_NNS of_IN the_AT 1954_CD Internal_JJ Revenue_NN Code_NN provide_VB for_IN survival_NN of_IN certain_AP of_IN a_AT transferor's_NN$ tax_NN attribute_NNS following_IN a_AT tax-free_JJ reorganization_NN ._. Section_NN 362_CD requires_VBZ carryover_NN of_IN the_AT transferor_NN corporation's_NN$ basis_NN for_IN property_NN transferred_VBN ,_, and_CC section_NN 1223_CD provides_VBZ for_IN tacking_VBG on_RP the_AT transferor's_NN$ holding_VBG period_NN for_IN such_JJ property_NN to_IN that_DT of_IN the_AT transferee_NN ._. Section_NN 169_CD permit_VBZ a_AT person_NN acquiring_VBG grain-storage_NN facility_NNS to_TO elect_VB to_TO continue_VB amortization_NN over_IN a_AT 60-month_JJ period_NN ._. However_RB ,_, a_AT similar_JJ privilege_NN wa_BEDZ not_* specifically_RB provided_VBN in_IN section_NN 168_CD for_IN a_AT person_NN acquiring_VBG emergency_NN facility_NNS ._. Attributes_NNS similar_JJ to_IN a_AT loss_NN carryover_NN ._. There_EX may_MD be_BE certain_AP item_NNS which_WDT are_BER quite_QL similar_JJ to_IN a_AT net_JJ operating_VBG loss_NN carryover_NN or_CC operating_VBG deficit_NN and_CC whose_WP$ right_NN to_TO survive_VB a_AT reorganization_NN should_MD perhaps_RB be_BE subject_JJ to_IN the_AT condition_NNS applicable_JJ to_IN those_DTS item_NNS ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, suppose_VB another_DT excess_JJ profit_NNS tax_NN similar_JJ to_IN prior_JJ law_NNS is_BEZ enacted_VBN ,_, providing_VBG for_IN carryover_NN of_IN excess_JJ profit_NNS credit_NNS ._. This_DT carryover_NN right_NN ha_HVZ a_AT number_NN of_IN thing_NNS in_IN common_JJ with_IN a_AT net_JJ operating_VBG loss_NN carryover_NN ._. It_PPS is_BEZ an_AT averaging_VBG device_NN intended_VBN to_TO ease_VB the_AT tax_NN burden_NN of_IN fluctuating_VBG income_NN ;_. ;_. it_PPS is_BEZ a_AT tax_NN benefit_NN which_WDT might_MD be_BE of_IN substantial_JJ value_NN to_IN a_AT corporation_NN which_WDT expects_VBZ to_TO have_HV a_AT high_JJ excess_JJ profit_NNS tax_NN ._. Under_IN the_AT 1939_CD Code_NN this_DT item_NN wa_BEDZ permitted_VBN to_TO survive_VB a_AT tax-free_JJ reorganization_NN in_IN the_AT Stanton_NP Brewery_NN case_NN ,_, but_CC only_RB over_IN the_AT dissent_NN of_IN Judge_NN Learned_NP Hand_NP ,_, who_WPS wrote_VBD the_AT majority_NN opinion_NN in_IN the_AT Sansome_NP case_NN ,_, a_AT leading_VBG case_NN requiring_VBG carryover_NN of_IN earnings_NNS and_CC profit_NNS in_IN a_AT non-taxable_JJ reorganization_NN ._. Since_CS this_DT type_NN of_IN item_NN wa_BEDZ not_* in_IN the_AT statute_NN when_WRB section_NN 381_CD wa_BEDZ enacted_VBN in_IN 1954_CD ,_, one_PN cannot_MD* say_VB with_IN certainty_NN what_WDT effect_NN the_AT enactment_NN of_IN that_DT section_NN should_MD have_HV ._. With_IN respect_NN to_IN this_DT type_NN of_IN item_NN ,_, one_PN might_MD properly_RB apply_VB the_AT language_NN of_IN the_AT Committee_NN Report_NN ,_, quoted_VBN above_RB ,_, which_WDT caution_VBZ against_IN using_VBG section_NN 381_CD a_CS a_AT basis_NN for_IN treating_VBG other_AP tax_NN attribute_NNS not_* mentioned_VBN therein_RB ._. Actually_RB ,_, there_EX do_DO not_* presently_RB appear_VB to_TO be_BE item_NNS in_IN the_AT statute_NN comparable_JJ to_IN a_AT net_JJ operating_VBG loss_NN carryover_NN ._. Probably_RB the_AT primary_JJ reason_NN for_IN special_JJ treatment_NN of_IN a_AT net_JJ operating_VBG loss_NN carryover_NN is_BEZ the_AT unique_JJ opportunity_NN it_PPS present_VBZ for_IN tax_NN avoidance_NN ._. A_NP ._. Reasons_NNS for_IN selecting_VBG mail_NN questionnaire_NN method_NN There_EX were_BED two_CD method_NNS that_WPS could_MD have_HV been_BEN used_VBN for_IN conducting_VBG the_AT study_NN within_IN the_AT resource_NNS available_JJ :_: (_( 1_CD )_) interview_NNS in_IN depth_NN with_IN a_AT few_AP selected_VBN company_NNS ,_, and_CC (_( 2_CD )_) the_AT more_QL limited_VBN interrogation_NN of_IN a_AT large_JJ number_NN of_IN company_NNS by_IN mean_NNS of_IN a_AT mail_NN questionnaire_NN ._. While_CS the_AT method_NN of_IN interviewing_VBG a_AT small_JJ number_NN of_IN company_NNS wa_BEDZ appealing_JJ because_RB of_IN the_AT opportunity_NN it_PPS might_MD have_HV furnished_VBN to_TO probe_VB fully_RB the_AT reason_NNS and_CC circumstance_NNS of_IN a_AT company's_NN$ practice_NNS and_CC opinion_NNS ,_, it_PPS also_RB involved_VBD the_AT risk_NN of_IN paying_VBG undue_JJ attention_NN to_IN the_AT unique_JJ and_CC peculiar_JJ problem_NNS of_IN just_RB a_AT few_AP individual_JJ company_NNS ._. As_CS a_AT result_NN ,_, it_PPS wa_BEDZ decided_VBN that_CS a_AT mail_NN questionnaire_NN sent_VBN to_IN a_AT large_JJ number_NN of_IN company_NNS would_MD be_BE more_QL effective_JJ in_IN determining_VBG the_AT general_JJ practice_NNS and_CC opinion_NNS of_IN small_JJ firm_NNS and_CC in_IN highlighting_VBG some_DTI of_IN the_AT fundamental_JJ and_CC recurring_VBG problem_NNS of_IN defense_NN procurement_NN that_WPS concern_VB both_ABX industry_NN and_CC government_NN ._. It_PPS wa_BEDZ also_RB hoped_VBN that_CS response_NNS to_IN a_AT mail_NN questionnaire_NN would_MD suggest_VB fruitful_JJ inquiry_NNS that_WPS might_MD be_BE made_VBN in_IN subsequent_JJ study_NNS of_IN a_AT more_QL detailed_VBN nature_NN ._. It_PPS is_BEZ recognized_VBN that_CS a_AT mail_NN questionnaire_NN ha_HVZ inherent_JJ limitation_NNS ._. There_EX is_BEZ the_AT danger_NN that_CS the_AT question_NNS will_MD mean_VB different_JJ thing_NNS to_IN different_JJ respondent_NNS ._. Simple_JJ ``_`` yes_RB ''_'' or_CC ``_`` no_RB ''_'' answer_NNS do_DO not_* reveal_VB the_AT different_JJ shade_NNS of_IN opinion_NN that_WPO the_AT various_JJ respondent_NNS may_MD have_HV ._. A_AT respondent_NN may_MD want_VB to_TO make_VB alternative_JJ answer_NNS because_CS he_PPS doe_DOZ not_* know_VB the_AT precise_JJ circumstance_NNS assumed_VBN in_IN the_AT question_NN ._. There_EX is_BEZ also_RB the_AT problem_NN of_IN the_AT respondent's_NN$ frame_NN of_IN reference_NN ._. Is_BEZ the_AT respondent_NN making_VBG a_AT recommendation_NN for_IN his_PP$ own_JJ benefit_NN ,_, for_IN the_AT benefit_NN of_IN his_PP$ industry_NN ,_, for_IN the_AT benefit_NN of_IN a_AT specific_JJ government_NN department_NN or_CC service_NN ,_, for_IN the_AT benefit_NN of_IN the_AT defense_NN program_NN ,_, for_IN the_AT benefit_NN of_IN small_JJ business_NN ,_, or_CC for_IN the_AT benefit_NN of_IN the_AT taxpayer_NNS ?_. There_EX is_BEZ also_RB the_AT question_NN of_IN whether_CS the_AT respondent_NN based_VBD his_PP$ answer_NNS on_IN factual_JJ information_NN and_CC carefully_RB considered_VBN judgment_NN ,_, or_CC whether_CS his_PP$ answer_NNS were_BED casual_JJ guess_NNS ._. Finally_RB ,_, there_EX is_BEZ the_AT question_NN of_IN how_WQL strongly_RB an_AT expressed_VBN opinion_NN is_BEZ held_VBN --_-- whether_CS it_PPS is_BEZ a_AT firm_JJ opinion_NN or_CC one_CD that_WPO the_AT respondent_NN favor_VBZ only_QL slightly_RB over_IN the_AT alternative_NNS ._. The_AT research_NN team_NN wa_BEDZ very_QL mindful_JJ of_IN these_DTS danger_NNS and_CC limitation_NNS of_IN a_AT mail_NN questionnaire_NN ._. Under_IN the_AT circumstance_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, the_AT team_NN considered_VBD it_PPS would_MD provide_VB the_AT most_QL useful_JJ information_NN at_IN this_DT point_NN ._. D_NP ._. Compilation_NN of_IN mailing_VBG list_NNS The_AT objective_NN of_IN the_AT study_NN wa_BEDZ to_TO determine_VB the_AT opinion_NNS and_CC practice_NNS of_IN small_JJ firm_NNS selling_VBG to_IN defense_NN program_NNS ._. By_IN these_DTS step_NNS the_AT final_JJ AIA_NN list_NN wa_BEDZ reduced_VBN from_IN 8,000_CD to_IN 3,500_CD ._. The_AT third_OD list_NN wa_BEDZ selected_VBN by_IN the_AT research_NN team_NN on_IN a_AT random_JJ basis_NN from_IN the_AT Thomas_NP Register_NN ._. It_PPS wa_BEDZ compiled_VBN a_CS a_AT control_NN sample_NN to_TO determine_VB if_CS the_AT opinion_NNS and_CC practice_NNS of_IN company_NNS on_IN the_AT list_NNS submitted_VBN by_IN the_AT member_NNS of_IN the_AT Aerospace_NP Industries_NNS Association_NN were_BED materially_QL different_JJ from_IN those_DTS of_IN other_AP small_JJ firm_NNS selling_VBG to_IN defense_NN program_NNS ._. Such_ABL a_AT difference_NN might_MD have_HV resulted_VBN from_IN :_: 1_CD ._. The_AT fact_NN that_CS the_AT Aerospace_NP Industries_NNS Association_NN member_NNS whose_WP$ list_NNS were_BED used_VBN did_DOD not_* comprise_VB all_ABN firm_NNS engaged_VBN in_IN defense_NN program_NNS ._. 2_CD ._. The_AT fact_NN that_CS company_NNS on_IN the_AT AIA_NN list_NNS were_BED already_RB participating_VBG in_IN the_AT defense_NN program_NN because_RB of_IN the_AT manner_NN of_IN their_PP$ selection_NN ._. Accordingly_RB ,_, a_CS ``_`` in-group_NN ''_'' ,_, they_PPSS might_MD have_HV different_JJ opinion_NNS and_CC practice_NNS than_CS an_AT ``_`` out-group_NN ''_'' composed_VBN of_IN those_DTS company_NNS not_* so_RB participating_VBG but_CC interested_VBN in_IN defense_NN business_NN ._. 3_CD ._. The_AT fact_NN that_CS AIA_NN list_NNS might_MD not_* have_HV been_BEN selected_VBN on_IN a_AT random_JJ basis_NN ._. The_AT control_NN sample_NN wa_BEDZ selected_VBN by_IN taking_VBG the_AT bottom_JJ name_NN of_IN each_DT of_IN the_AT two_CD column_NNS of_IN name_NNS on_IN each_DT page_NN of_IN the_AT alphabetical_JJ listing_NN of_IN manufacturer_NNS in_IN the_AT Thomas_NP Register_NN ._. If_CS the_AT bottom_JJ name_NN in_IN each_DT column_NN did_DOD not_* have_HV a_AT responsible_JJ executive_NN identified_VBN ,_, the_AT next_AP name_NN above_RB which_WDT identified_VBD such_ABL a_AT responsible_JJ executive_NN wa_BEDZ substituted_VBN ._. Fifteen_CD hundred_CD name_NNS were_BED selected_VBN in_IN this_DT fashion_NN ._. E_NP ._. Mailing_VBG the_AT questionnaire_NN Each_DT questionnaire_NN wa_BEDZ mailed_VBN with_IN a_AT cover_NN letter_NN addressed_VBN personally_RB to_IN the_AT president_NN or_CC other_AP executive_NN of_IN each_DT firm_NN ._. The_AT questionnaire_NNS were_BED mailed_VBN in_IN Seattle_NP ,_, Washington_NP ,_, and_CC sent_VBN by_IN regular_JJ mail_NN to_IN address_NNS in_IN the_AT state_NNS of_IN Idaho_NP ,_, Montana_NP ,_, Oregon_NP ,_, and_CC Washington_NP ._. Airmail_NN wa_BEDZ used_VBN for_IN the_AT address_NNS outside_IN the_AT Pacific_JJ Northwest_NN ._. Each_DT letter_NN contained_VBD a_AT postage-prepaid_JJ return_NN envelope_NN by_IN regular_JJ mail_NN for_IN address_NNS in_IN the_AT Pacific_JJ Northwest_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN airmail_NN for_IN those_DTS outside_IN the_AT Pacific_JJ Northwest_NN ._. Approximately_RB ten_CD day_NNS after_CS the_AT questionnaire_NN wa_BEDZ mailed_VBN ,_, a_AT follow-up_JJ airmail_NN postcard_NN wa_BEDZ sent_VBN to_IN each_DT of_IN the_AT original_JJ name_NNS ._. The_AT first_OD test_NN mailing_NN (_( to_IN 14_CD company_NNS )_) wa_BEDZ made_VBN in_IN June_NP ,_, 1960_CD ._. The_AT second_OD test_NN mailing_NN (_( to_IN 100_CD company_NNS )_) wa_BEDZ made_VBN in_IN July_NP ,_, 1960_CD ._. The_AT final_JJ mailing_NN of_IN the_AT questionnaire_NN wa_BEDZ made_VBN late_RB in_IN August_NP ,_, 1960_CD ,_, to_IN 4,900_CD firm_NNS consisting_VBG of_IN 3,450_CD from_IN the_AT AIA_NN list_NN and_CC 1,450_CD from_IN the_AT TR_NN list_NN ._. F_NP ._. Returns_NNS received_VBN Over_RP 1,000_CD return_NNS were_BED received_VBN within_IN two_CD week_NNS after_CS the_AT final_JJ mailing_NN wa_BEDZ made_VBN ._. They_PPSS continued_VBD to_TO arrive_VB until_IN the_AT end_NN of_IN December_NP ,_, 1960_CD ,_, by_IN which_WDT time_NN a_AT total_NN of_IN 1,343_CD return_NNS were_BED received_VBN representing_VBG 26.8_CD per_IN cent_NN of_IN the_AT 5,014_CD questionnaire_NNS sent_VBN out_RP ._. Fifty-seven_CD return_NNS could_MD not_* be_BE used_VBN because_CS they_PPSS were_BED incomplete_JJ or_CC received_VBN too_QL late_RB to_TO be_BE processed_VBN ._. The_AT remaining_VBG 1,286_CD return_NNS that_WPS were_BED processed_VBN came_VBD from_IN the_AT category_NNS in_IN Table_NN 2_CD ._. G_NP ._. Processing_VBG the_AT return_NNS Each_DT questionnaire_NN wa_BEDZ audited_VBN for_IN obvious_JJ mistake_NNS and_CC for_IN comment_NNS ,_, and_CC wa_BEDZ identified_VBN by_IN a_AT serial_NN number_NN ,_, by_IN the_AT source_NN list_NN from_IN which_WDT the_AT company_NN name_NN wa_BEDZ selected_VBN ,_, and_CC by_IN the_AT geographical_JJ location_NN of_IN the_AT company_NN a_CS determined_VBN by_IN the_AT postmark_NN on_IN the_AT return_NN envelope_NN ._. All_ABN response_NNS ,_, except_IN comment_NNS ,_, were_BED numerically_RB coded_VBN to_TO permit_VB use_NN of_IN data-processing_JJ equipment_NN ._. The_AT code_NNS were_BED key-punched_VBN into_IN IBM_NN punch_NN card_NNS and_CC verified_VBN ._. Each_DT return_NN required_VBD three_CD card_NNS and_CC involved_VBD key_NN punching_NN 228_CD digital_JJ column_NNS ._. In_IN order_NN to_TO be_BE able_JJ to_TO properly_RB relate_VB the_AT data_NN for_IN a_AT single_AP company_NN each_DT of_IN the_AT three_CD card_NNS comprising_VBG the_AT set_NN for_IN each_DT firm_NN wa_BEDZ identified_VBN with_IN the_AT appropriate_JJ serial_NN number_NN of_IN the_AT respondent_NN ._. The_AT card_NNS were_BED then_RB processed_VBN using_VBG standard_JJ IBM_NN punch_NN card_NN equipment_NN ,_, including_IN an_AT IBM_NN 650_CD computer_NN ._. The_AT first_OD step_NN in_IN processing_VBG wa_BEDZ to_TO analyze_VB the_AT return_NNS from_IN Questions_NNS 1_CD ,_, 2_CD ,_, and_CC 3_CD to_TO determine_VB whether_CS the_AT respondent_NNS were_BED large_JJ business_NNS or_CC small_JJ business_NNS ,_, in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_AT definition_NNS contained_VBN in_IN ASPR_NN Section_NN 1-701_CD ._. (_( see_VB Chapter_NN 2_CD ._. )_) The_AT result_NNS are_BER shown_VBN in_IN Table_NN 3_CD ._. The_AT return_NNS from_IN company_NNS classified_VBN a_CS large_JJ business_NNS were_BED set_VBN aside_RB and_CC not_* used_VBN because_CS they_PPSS were_BED not_* relevant_JJ to_IN a_AT study_NN of_IN the_AT opinion_NNS and_CC practice_NNS of_IN small_JJ firm_NNS ._. The_AT second_OD step_NN in_IN processing_VBG wa_BEDZ to_TO compare_VB the_AT response_NNS from_IN company_NNS on_IN the_AT AIA_NN list_NN with_IN those_DTS from_IN company_NNS on_IN the_AT TR_NN list_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO determine_VB whether_CS it_PPS would_MD be_BE appropriate_JJ to_TO merge_VB the_AT response_NNS for_IN the_AT purpose_NNS of_IN the_AT study_NN ._. The_AT method_NNS and_CC result_NNS of_IN this_DT comparative_JJ analysis_NN are_BER described_VBN in_IN Appendix_NN Aj_NP ._. It_PPS wa_BEDZ concluded_VBN that_CS it_PPS would_MD be_BE appropriate_JJ to_TO process_VB the_AT two_CD group_NNS of_IN response_NNS a_CS a_AT single_AP sample_NN of_IN all_ABN small_JJ business_NNS engaged_VBN in_IN ,_, or_CC wishing_VBG to_TO sell_VB to_IN ,_, defense_NN program_NNS ._. In_IN the_AT first_OD place_NN ,_, the_AT two_CD group_NNS of_IN firm_NNS ,_, when_WRB combined_VBN ,_, had_HVD characteristic_NNS and_CC practice_NNS that_WPS were_BED more_QL representative_JJ of_IN company_NNS that_WPS were_BED the_AT subject_NN of_IN this_DT study_NN than_CS did_DOD the_AT firm_NNS from_IN the_AT AIA_NN list_NN alone_RB ._. The_AT vast_JJ Central_JJ Valley_NN of_IN California_NP is_BEZ one_CD of_IN the_AT most_QL productive_JJ agricultural_JJ area_NNS in_IN the_AT world_NN ._. During_IN the_AT summer_NN of_IN 1960_CD ,_, it_PPS became_VBD the_AT setting_NN for_IN a_AT bitter_JJ and_CC basic_JJ labor-management_NN struggle_NN ._. The_AT contestant_NNS in_IN this_DT economic_JJ struggle_NN are_BER the_AT Agricultural_JJ Workers_NNS Organizing_VBG Committee_NN (_( AWOC_NP )_) of_IN the_AT AFL-CIO_NN and_CC the_AT agricultural_JJ employer_NNS of_IN the_AT State_NN ._. By_IN virtue_NN of_IN the_AT legal_JJ responsibility_NNS of_IN the_AT Department_NN of_IN Employment_NN in_IN the_AT farm_NN placement_NN program_NN ,_, we_PPSS necessarily_RB found_VBD ourselves_PPLS in_IN the_AT middle_NN between_IN these_DTS two_CD force_NNS ._. It_PPS is_BEZ not_* a_AT pleasant_JJ or_CC easy_JJ position_NN ,_, but_CC one_CD we_PPSS have_HV endeavored_VBN to_TO maintain_VB ._. We_PPSS have_HV sought_VBN to_TO be_BE strictly_QL neutral_JJ a_CS between_IN the_AT party_NNS ,_, but_CC at_IN the_AT same_AP time_NN we_PPSS have_HV been_BEN required_VBN frequently_RB to_TO rule_VB on_IN specific_JJ issue_NNS or_CC situation_NNS a_CS they_PPSS arose_VBD ._. Inevitably_RB ,_, one_CD side_NN wa_BEDZ pleased_VBN and_CC the_AT other_AP displeased_VBN ,_, regardless_RB of_IN how_WRB we_PPSS ruled_VBD ._. Often_RB the_AT displeased_VBN party_NNS interpreted_VBD our_PP$ decision_NN a_CS implying_VBG favoritism_NN toward_IN the_AT other_AP ._. We_PPSS have_HV consoled_VBN ourselves_PPLS with_IN the_AT thought_NN that_CS this_DT is_BEZ a_AT normal_JJ human_JJ reaction_NN and_CC is_BEZ one_CD of_IN the_AT consequence_NNS of_IN any_DTI decision_NN in_IN an_AT adversary_NN proceeding_NN ._. It_PPS is_BEZ disconcerting_JJ ,_, nevertheless_RB ,_, to_TO read_VB in_IN a_AT labor_NN weekly_NN ,_, ``_`` Perluss_NP knuckle_VBZ down_RP to_IN grower_NNS ''_'' ,_, and_CC then_RB to_TO be_BE confronted_VBN with_IN a_AT growers'_NNS$ publication_NN which_WDT state_VBZ ,_, ``_`` Perluss_NP recognizes_VBZ obviously_RB phony_JJ and_CC trumped-up_JJ strike_NNS a_CS bona_JJ fide_NN ''_'' ._. For_IN a_AT number_NN of_IN year_NNS ,_, there_EX have_HV been_BEN sporadic_JJ attempt_NNS in_IN California_NP to_TO organize_VB farm_NN worker_NNS ._. These_DTS attempt_NNS met_VBD with_IN little_AP sucess_NN for_IN a_AT variety_NN of_IN reason_NNS ._. They_PPSS were_BED inadequately_RB financed_VBN ,_, without_IN experienced_VBN leadership_NN ,_, and_CC lacked_VBD the_AT general_JJ support_NN of_IN organized_VBN labor_NN a_CS a_AT whole_NN ._. This_DT past_JJ year_NN the_AT pattern_NN ha_HVZ been_BEN different_JJ :_: The_AT organizing_VBG program_NN had_HVD the_AT full_JJ support_NN of_IN the_AT AFL-CIO_NN ,_, which_WDT supplied_VBD staff_NN and_CC money_NN to_IN the_AT AWOC_NN ,_, a_QL well_RB a_CS moral_JJ support_NN ._. Leadership_NN wa_BEDZ experienced_VBN and_CC skillful_JJ ,_, and_CC financial_JJ resource_NNS were_BED significant_JJ ._. Regardless_RB of_IN where_WRB personal_JJ sympathy_NNS may_MD lie_VB a_CS between_IN the_AT party_NNS ,_, failure_NN to_TO recognize_VB these_DTS changed_VBN condition_NNS would_MD be_BE to_TO ignore_VB the_AT fact_NNS of_IN life_NN ._. As_CS a_AT result_NN of_IN these_DTS changed_VBN condition_NNS ,_, the_AT impact_NN of_IN the_AT organizational_JJ effort_NN on_IN agricultural_JJ labor-management_NN relation_NNS ha_HVZ been_BEN much_QL great_JJR than_CS in_IN the_AT past_NN ._. The_AT AWOC_NN ha_HVZ been_BEN able_JJ to_TO employ_VB the_AT traditional_JJ weapon_NNS of_IN labor_NN --_-- the_AT strike_NN and_CC the_AT picket_NN line_NN --_-- with_IN considerable_JJ success_NN ,_, particularly_RB in_IN the_AT area_NN of_IN wage_NNS ._. By_IN the_AT very_AP nature_NN of_IN the_AT situation_NN ,_, it_PPS is_BEZ the_AT union_NN which_WDT ha_HVZ been_BEN able_JJ to_TO select_VB the_AT time_NN and_CC place_NN to_TO bring_VB pressure_NN upon_IN management_NN ._. To_IN date_NN ,_, at_IN least_AP ,_, the_AT strategy_NN of_IN the_AT AWOC_NN ha_HVZ been_BEN selective_JJ ;_. ;_. that_DT is_BEZ to_TO say_VB ,_, to_TO concentrate_VB on_IN a_AT particular_AP crop_NN or_CC activity_NN in_IN a_AT particular_AP area_NN at_IN a_AT strategic_JJ time_NN ,_, rather_RB than_CS any_DTI broadside_JJ engagement_NN with_IN management_NN throughout_IN an_AT area_NN or_CC the_AT State_NN ._. Primarily_RB ,_, we_PPSS became_VBD involved_VBN in_IN these_DTS dispute_NNS because_RB of_IN our_PP$ referral_NN obligation_NNS under_IN our_PP$ farm_NN placement_NN program_NN ._. Normally_RB ,_, because_CS agricultural_JJ labor_NN is_BEZ not_* covered_VBN by_IN unemployment_NN insurance_NN ,_, we_PPSS would_MD not_* expect_VB any_DTI issue_NNS to_TO arise_VB regarding_IN benefit_NN payment_NNS under_IN the_AT trade_NN dispute_NN provision_NN of_IN the_AT Unemployment_NN Insurance_NN Code_NN ,_, although_CS such_ABL a_AT situation_NN is_BEZ quite_QL within_IN the_AT realm_NN of_IN possibility_NN ._. But_CC the_AT current_JJ issue_NNS arose_VBD out_RP of_IN the_AT Wagner-Peyser_NP Act_NN concerning_IN referral_NNS to_IN an_AT establishment_NN where_WRB a_AT labor_NN dispute_NN exists_VBZ ,_, and_CC out_RP of_IN Public_JJ Law_NN 78_CD and_CC the_AT Migrant_JJ Labor_NN Agreement_NN if_CS Mexican_JJ national_NNS were_BED employed_VBN at_IN the_AT ranch_NN ._. Most_AP of_IN u_PPO remember_VB and_CC think_VB of_IN the_AT Wagner-Peyser_NP Act_NN in_IN it_PP$ historical_JJ sense_NN ,_, a_CS a_AT major_JJ milestone_NN in_IN the_AT development_NN of_IN public_JJ placement_NN service_NNS ._. Infrequently_RB do_DO we_PPSS think_VB of_IN it_PPO a_CS a_AT living_VBG ,_, continuing_VBG ,_, operating_VBG control_NN over_IN the_AT system_NN ._. However_RB ,_, when_WRB labor_NN dispute_NNS arise_VB ,_, it_PP$ provision_NNS come_VB clearly_RB into_IN play_NN ._. California_NP ha_HVZ accepted_VBN the_AT provision_NNS of_IN that_DT Act_NN (_( a_CS have_HV all_ABN other_AP States_NNS )_) by_IN enacting_VBG into_IN our_PP$ Code_NN (_( Section_NN 2051_CD )_) a_AT provision_NN that_CS The_AT State_NN of_IN California_NP accepts_VBZ the_AT provision_NNS of_IN the_AT Wagner-Peyser_NP Act_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD observe_VB and_CC comply_VB with_IN the_AT requirement_NNS of_IN that_DT act_NN ._. With_IN respect_NN to_IN labor_NN dispute_NNS ,_, the_AT Wagner-Peyser_NP Act_NN state_VBZ only_RB ,_, In_IN carrying_VBG out_RP the_AT provision_NNS of_IN this_DT Act_NN ,_, the_AT Secretary_NN is_BEZ authorized_VBN and_CC directed_VBN to_TO provide_VB for_IN the_AT giving_NN of_IN notice_NN of_IN strike_NNS or_CC lock-outs_NNS to_IN applicant_NNS before_CS they_PPSS are_BER referred_VBN to_IN employment_NN ._. Other_AP provision_NNS of_IN the_AT Act_NN empower_VB the_AT Secretary_NN to_TO adopt_VB regulation_NNS necessary_JJ to_TO carry_VB out_RP it_PP$ provision_NNS ,_, and_CC he_PPS ha_HVZ done_VBN so_RB ._. The_AT pertinent_JJ regulation_NN for_IN our_PP$ purpose_NNS is_BEZ Section_NN 602.2_CD (_( ,_, )_) ,_, a_CS follows_VBZ :_: Referrals_NNS in_IN labor_NN dispute_NN situation_NNS ._. No_AT person_NN shall_MD be_BE referred_VBN to_IN a_AT position_NN the_AT filling_NN of_IN which_WDT will_MD aid_VB directly_RB or_CC indirectly_RB in_IN filling_VBG a_AT job_NN which_WDT (_( 1_CD )_) is_BEZ vacant_JJ because_CS the_AT former_AP occupant_NN is_BEZ on_IN strike_NN or_CC is_BEZ being_BEG locked_VBN out_RP in_IN the_AT course_NN of_IN a_AT labor_NN dispute_NN ,_, or_CC (_( 2_CD )_) the_AT filling_NN of_IN which_WDT is_BEZ an_AT issue_NN in_IN a_AT labor_NN dispute_NN ._. With_IN respect_NN to_IN position_NNS not_* covered_VBN by_IN subparagraph_NN (_( 1_CD )_) or_CC (_( 2_CD )_) of_IN this_DT paragraph_NN ,_, any_DTI individual_NN may_MD be_BE referred_VBN to_IN a_AT place_NN of_IN employment_NN in_IN which_WDT a_AT labor_NN dispute_NN exists_VBZ ,_, provided_VBN he_PPS is_BEZ given_VBN written_VBN notice_NN of_IN such_JJ dispute_NN prior_RB to_IN or_CC at_IN the_AT time_NN of_IN his_PP$ referral_NN ._. In_IN analyzing_VBG this_DT regulation_NN ,_, let_VB u_PPO take_VB the_AT last_AP sentence_NN first_RB ._. It_PPS permit_VBZ referral_NNS under_IN certain_AP circumstance_NNS even_RB when_WRB there_EX is_BEZ a_AT labor_NN dispute_NN ,_, provided_VBN the_AT individual_NN is_BEZ given_VBN written_VBN notice_NN of_IN such_ABL a_AT dispute_NN ._. Assume_VB ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, a_AT situation_NN where_WRB a_AT farm_NN ha_HVZ a_AT packing_VBG shed_NN and_CC field_NNS ._. The_AT packing_VBG shed_NN worker_NNS go_VB on_IN strike_NN ._. There_EX is_BEZ no_AT dispute_NN involving_IN fieldwork_NN ._. We_PPSS concluded_VBD that_CS we_PPSS may_MD refer_VB worker_NNS to_IN the_AT fieldwork_NN (_( but_CC not_* the_AT packing_VBG shed_NN work_NN )_) provided_VBN we_PPSS give_VB them_PPO written_VBN notice_NN of_IN the_AT packing_VBG shed_NN dispute_NN ._. So_QL far_RB ,_, no_AT troublesome_JJ case_NNS have_HV arisen_VBN under_IN this_DT provision_NN ._. It_PPS is_BEZ the_AT first_OD part_NN of_IN the_AT Regulation_NN that_WPS is_BEZ currently_RB at_IN issue_NN ._. Note_VB that_CS it_PPS prohibits_VBZ referral_NNS under_IN either_CC condition_NN (_( 1_CD )_) or_CC condition_NN (_( 2_CD )_) ._. Employer_NN representative_NNS have_HV contended_VBN that_CS the_AT Secretary_NN ha_HVZ gone_VBN beyond_IN his_PP$ authority_NN by_IN such_ABL a_AT prohibition_NN ,_, on_IN the_AT ground_NNS that_CS the_AT Wagner-Peyser_NP Act_NN requires_VBZ only_AP written_VBN notice_NN to_IN the_AT prospective_JJ worker_NN that_CS a_AT dispute_NN exists_VBZ ._. Into_IN court_NN The_AT matter_NN got_VBD into_IN the_AT court_NNS this_DT way_NN :_: One_CD of_IN the_AT early_JJ strike_NNS called_VBN by_IN the_AT AWOC_NN wa_BEDZ at_IN the_AT DiGiorgio_NP pear_NN orchard_NNS in_IN Yuba_NP County_NN ._. We_PPSS found_VBD that_CS a_AT labor_NN dispute_NN existed_VBD ,_, and_CC that_CS the_AT worker_NNS had_HVD left_VBN their_PP$ job_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_BED then_RB vacant_JJ because_RB of_IN the_AT dispute_NN ._. Accordingly_RB ,_, under_IN clause_NN (_( 1_CD )_) of_IN the_AT Secretary's_NN$ Regulation_NN ,_, we_PPSS suspended_VBD referral_NNS to_IN the_AT employer_NN ._. (_( Incidentally_RB ,_, no_AT Mexican_JJ national_NNS were_BED involved_VBN ._. )_) The_AT employer_NN ,_, seeking_VBG to_TO continue_VB his_PP$ harvest_NN ,_, challenged_VBD our_PP$ right_NN to_TO cease_VB referral_NNS to_IN him_PPO ,_, and_CC sought_VBD relief_NN in_IN the_AT Superior_JJ Court_NN of_IN Yuba_NP County_NN ._. The_AT court_NN issued_VBD a_AT temporary_JJ restraining_VBG order_NN ,_, directing_VBG u_PPO to_TO resume_VB referral_NNS ._. We_PPSS ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, obeyed_VBD the_AT court_NN order_NN ._. However_RB ,_, the_AT Attorney_NN General_JJ of_IN California_NP ,_, at_IN the_AT request_NN of_IN the_AT Secretary_NN of_IN Labor_NN ,_, sought_VBD to_TO have_HV the_AT jurisdiction_NN over_IN the_AT issue_NN removed_VBN to_IN the_AT Federal_JJ District_NN Court_NN ,_, on_IN ground_NNS that_CS it_PPS wa_BEDZ predominantly_RB a_AT Federal_JJ issue_NN since_CS the_AT validity_NN of_IN the_AT Secretary's_NN$ Regulation_NN wa_BEDZ being_BEG challenged_VBN ._. However_RB ,_, the_AT Federal_JJ Court_NN held_VBD that_CS since_CS the_AT State_NN had_HVD accepted_VBN the_AT provision_NNS of_IN the_AT Wagner-Peyser_NP Act_NN into_IN it_PP$ own_JJ Code_NN ,_, and_CC presumably_RB therefore_RB also_RB the_AT regulation_NNS ,_, it_PPS wa_BEDZ now_RB a_AT State_NN matter_NN ._. It_PPS accordingly_RB refused_VBD to_TO assume_VB jurisdiction_NN ,_, whereupon_CS the_AT California_NP Superior_JJ Court_NN made_VBD the_AT restraining_VBG order_NN permanent_JJ ._. Under_IN that_DT order_NN ,_, we_PPSS have_HV continued_VBN referring_VBG worker_NNS to_IN the_AT ranch_NN ._. A_AT similar_JJ case_NN arose_VBD at_IN the_AT Bowers_NP ranch_NN in_IN Butte_NP County_NN ,_, and_CC the_AT Superior_JJ Court_NN of_IN that_DT county_NN issued_VBD similar_JJ restraining_VBG order_NNS ._. The_AT grower_NNS have_HV strenuously_RB argued_VBN that_CS I_PPSS should_MD have_HV accepted_VBN the_AT Superior_JJ Court_NN decision_NNS a_CS conclusive_JJ and_CC issued_VBN statewide_JJ instruction_NNS to_IN our_PP$ staff_NN to_TO ignore_VB this_DT provision_NN in_IN the_AT Secretary's_NN$ Regulation_NN ._. I_PPSS cannot_MD* accept_VB that_DT view_NN ,_, either_CC a_CS a_AT lawyer_NN or_CC a_CS an_AT administrator_NN ._. Legal_JJ consideration_NNS First_RB ,_, let_VB u_PPO examine_VB briefly_RB some_DTI of_IN the_AT legal_JJ consideration_NNS involved_VBN ._. It_PPS is_BEZ an_AT accepted_VBN juridical_JJ principle_NN in_IN California_NP that_CS a_AT Superior_JJ Court_NN decision_NN doe_DOZ not_* constitute_VB a_AT binding_VBG legal_JJ precedent_NN ._. It_PPS is_BEZ conclusive_JJ ,_, unless_CS appealed_VBN ,_, only_RB upon_IN the_AT particular_AP party_NNS to_IN the_AT particular_AP action_NN which_WDT wa_BEDZ heard_VBN ._. It_PPS is_BEZ not_* binding_VBG upon_IN another_DT Superior_JJ Court_NN ,_, which_WDT could_MD rule_VB to_IN the_AT contrary_NN ._. Only_RB when_WRB a_AT decision_NN is_BEZ rendered_VBN by_IN the_AT District_NN Court_NN of_IN Appeal_NN (_( or_CC ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, the_AT Supreme_JJ Court_NN )_) is_BEZ a_AT binding_VBG precedent_NN established_VBN ._. In_IN that_DT event_NN ,_, we_PPSS can_MD correctly_RB say_VB that_CS we_PPSS have_HV received_VBN an_AT authoritative_JJ interpretation_NN of_IN the_AT matter_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD which_WDT we_PPSS can_MD follow_VB statewide_RB with_IN confidence_NN that_CS the_AT policy_NN will_MD not_* be_BE overthrown_VBN in_IN other_AP Superior_JJ Courts_NNS ._. But_CC over_IN and_CC beyond_IN the_AT compelling_JJ need_NN for_IN a_AT binding_VBG precedent_NN decision_NN ,_, I_PPSS am_BEM convinced_VBN that_CS the_AT decision_NNS of_IN the_AT Superior_JJ Courts_NNS which_WDT in_IN effect_NN nullify_VB the_AT Secretary's_NN$ Regulation_NN are_BER not_* a_AT correct_JJ interpretation_NN of_IN the_AT Secretary's_NN$ power_NN under_IN the_AT Federal_JJ law_NN ._. I_PPSS believe_VB I_PPSS am_BEM in_IN good_JJ company_NN in_IN this_DT view_NN ._. Factors_NNS that_WPS inhibit_VB learning_VBG and_CC lead_VB to_IN maladjustment_NN Studies_NNS conducted_VBN in_IN various_AP section_NNS of_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS indicate_VB that_CS many_AP child_NNS in_IN elementary_JJ school_NNS are_BER maladjusted_JJ emotionally_RB ,_, and_CC that_CS many_AP of_IN them_PPO are_BER failing_VBG to_TO make_VB satisfactory_JJ progress_NN in_IN school_NN subject_NNS ._. One_CD study_NN ,_, which_WDT involved_VBD 1,524_CD pupil_NNS in_IN grade_NNS one_CD to_IN six_CD ,_, found_VBD that_CS 12_CD percent_NN of_IN the_AT pupil_NNS were_BED seriously_QL maladjusted_JJ and_CC that_CS 23_CD percent_NN were_BED reading_VBG a_AT year_NN below_IN capacity_NN ._. It_PPS is_BEZ apparent_JJ ,_, therefore_RB ,_, that_CS the_AT teacher_NN need_VBZ to_TO know_VB what_WDT factor_NNS have_HV a_AT vital_JJ bearing_NN on_IN the_AT learning_NN and_CC adjustment_NN of_IN child_NNS ._. When_WRB a_AT child_NN fails_VBZ to_TO meet_VB the_AT standard_NNS of_IN the_AT school_NN in_IN his_PP$ rate_NN of_IN learning_VBG ,_, insecurity_NN ,_, unhappiness_NN ,_, and_CC other_AP form_NNS of_IN maladjustment_NN frequently_RB follow_VB ._. It_PPS is_BEZ easy_JJ for_CS the_AT teacher_NN to_TO rationalize_VB that_CS the_AT child_NN who_WPS is_BEZ not_* achieving_VBG in_IN accordance_NN with_IN his_PP$ known_VBN ability_NN is_BEZ just_RB plain_QL lazy_JJ ,_, or_CC that_CS the_AT child_NN who_WPS lack_VBZ interest_NN in_IN school_NN ,_, who_WPS dislike_VBZ the_AT teacher_NN ,_, or_CC who_WPS is_BEZ overaggressive_JJ is_BEZ a_AT hopeless_JJ delinquent_NN ._. The_AT cause_NNS of_IN retardation_NN and_CC maladjustment_NN may_MD be_BE found_VBN in_IN physical_JJ factor_NNS ,_, such_JJ a_CS defective_JJ speech_NN or_CC hearing_NN ,_, impaired_VBN vision_NN ,_, faulty_JJ motor_NN coordination_NN ,_, a_AT frail_JJ constitution_NN ,_, chronic_JJ disease_NN ,_, malnutrition_NN ,_, and_CC glandular_JJ malfunctioning_NN ._. They_PPSS may_MD be_BE caused_VBN by_IN poor_JJ health_NN habit_NNS ,_, such_JJ a_CS faulty_JJ eating_VBG and_CC sleeping_VBG habit_NNS ._. They_PPSS may_MD be_BE related_VBN to_IN mental_JJ immaturity_NN or_CC lack_NN of_IN aptitude_NN for_IN certain_AP type_NNS of_IN school_NN work_NN ._. The_AT curriculum_NN may_MD be_BE too_QL difficult_JJ for_IN some_DTI and_CC too_QL easy_JJ for_IN others_NNS ._. Teaching_VBG method_NNS ,_, learning_VBG material_NNS ,_, and_CC promotion_NN policy_NNS may_MD inhibit_VB learning_VBG and_CC lead_VB to_IN maladjustment_NNS for_IN some_DTI child_NNS ._. Unwholesome_JJ family_NN relation_NNS ,_, broken_VBN home_NNS ,_, and_CC undesirable_JJ community_NN influence_NNS may_MD also_RB be_BE contributing_VBG factor_NNS ._. This_DT is_BEZ only_RB a_AT minimum_JJ list_NN of_IN the_AT factor_NNS that_WPS inhibit_VB learning_VBG and_CC contribute_VB to_IN maladjustment_NN among_IN child_NNS ._. Moreover_RB ,_, these_DTS condition_NNS do_DO not_* influence_VB all_ABN child_NNS in_IN the_AT same_AP manner_NN ._. A_AT vision_NN handicap_NN that_WPS may_MD produce_VB nervous_JJ tension_NN and_CC reading_VBG disability_NN for_IN one_CD child_NN may_MD spur_VB another_DT child_NN on_RP to_IN even_QL great_JJR achievement_NN in_IN reading_VBG ._. Sources_NNS of_IN information_NN about_IN child_NNS Successful_JJ teaching_NN involves_VBZ getting_VBG enough_AP information_NN about_IN each_DT pupil_NN to_TO understand_VB why_WRB he_PPS behaves_VBZ a_CS he_PPS doe_DOZ in_IN certain_AP situation_NNS and_CC how_WRB his_PP$ achievement_NN in_IN school_NN is_BEZ being_BEG influenced_VBN by_IN various_AP factor_NNS in_IN his_PP$ environment_NN ._. The_AT Summary_NN Report_NN On_IN Desegregation_NN Progress_NN In_IN Education_NN In_IN The_AT Middle-South_JJ Region_NN ,_, 1959_CD -_IN 1960_CD ''_'' clearly_RB show_VBZ two_CD piece_NNS of_IN information_NN ._. Problems_NNS to_TO solve_VB From_IN the_AT Summary_NN Report_NN before_IN u_PPO at_IN this_DT Conference_NN ,_, a_AT number_NN of_IN problem_NNS are_BER apparent_JJ ._. Issue_NN no._NN 1_CD ._. Pupil_NN assignment_NN ._. Issue_NN no._NN 3_CD ._. The_AT plaintiff_NN in_IN school_NN desegregation_NN case_NNS ._. Even_RB though_CS in_IN civil_JJ right_NNS legislation_NN in_IN 1957_CD and_CC 1960_CD the_AT provision_NN for_IN the_AT Attorney_NN General_JJ to_IN act_NN wa_BEDZ eliminated_VBN ,_, should_MD we_PPSS nevertheless_RB support_VB such_ABL a_AT clause_NN ?_. This_DT is_BEZ an_AT issue_NN ,_, for_CS it_PPS divide_VBZ people_NNS rather_QL sharply_RB ._. Issue_NN no._NN 4_CD ._. Withholding_VBG of_IN fund_NNS to_IN school_NNS that_WPS deny_VB child_NNS on_IN account_NN of_IN race_NN ._. This_DT is_BEZ the_AT Powell_NP Amendment_NN ,_, which_WDT in_IN 1957_CD divided_VBD even_RB a_AT ``_`` liberal_JJ ''_'' group_NN like_CS the_AT American_JJ Veterans_NNS Committee_NN (_( AVC_NP )_) ._. This_DT is_BEZ soft_JJR than_CS early_JJR Powell_NP amendment_NNS which_WDT would_MD have_HV denied_VBN fund_NNS to_IN all_ABN segregated_VBN school_NN district_NNS ._. There_EX is_BEZ nonetheless_RB considerable_JJ argument_NN against_IN the_AT clause_NN ,_, softened_VBN though_CS it_PPS be_BE ,_, on_IN the_AT ground_NNS that_CS Federal_JJ aid_NN is_BEZ so_QL necessary_JJ to_IN the_AT public_JJ school_NNS ._. The_AT Federal_JJ fund_NNS limitation_NN enlists_VBZ the_AT support_NN of_IN many_AP ,_, the_AT opposition_NN of_IN quite_ABL a_AT few_AP ._. Issue_NN no._NN 5_CD ._. Required_VBN public_JJ education_NN ._. Should_MD a_AT political_JJ subdivision_NN ,_, state_NN or_CC county_NN or_CC municipality_NN ,_, be_BE required_VBN to_TO furnish_VB public_JJ education_NN ?_. For_IN the_AT school_NN year_NN ,_, 1959-1960_CD ,_, the_AT Prince_NN Edward_NP County_NN (_( Virginia_NP )_) Board_NN of_IN Supervisors_NNS voted_VBD not_* to_TO provide_VB fund_NNS for_IN public_JJ education_NN ,_, and_CC the_AT school_NN board_NN therefore_RB could_MD provide_VB no_AT public_JJ education_NN --_-- for_IN white_JJ or_CC Negro_NP child_NNS ._. Is_BEZ public_JJ education_NN in_IN this_DT American_JJ democracy_NN of_IN such_JJ importance_NN that_CS no_AT child_NN should_MD be_BE denied_VBN public_JJ education_NN ?_. Or_CC is_BEZ this_DT subject_NN a_AT matter_NN of_IN self-determination_NN ,_, a_AT matter_NN of_IN state_NNS right_NNS or_CC county_NN right_NNS ?_. If_CS people_NNS don't_DO* want_VB to_TO provide_VB public_JJ education_NN ,_, should_MD they_PPSS be_BE forced_VBN to_TO do_DO so_RB ?_. Even_RB if_CS we_PPSS marshal_VB substantial_JJ agreement_NN behind_IN mandatory_JJ public_JJ education_NN ,_, we_PPSS likely_RB cannot_MD* expect_VB that_CS all_ABN the_AT state_NNS will_MD enact_VB the_AT legislation_NN ._. Should_MD the_AT requirement_NN ,_, which_WDT must_MD therefore_RB be_BE Federal_JJ in_IN nature_NN ,_, be_BE legislated_VBN by_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS Congress_NP ?_. Or_CC must_MD it_PPO become_VB law_NN by_IN amendment_NN of_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS Constitution_NN ?_. We_PPSS actually_RB have_HV two_CD issue_NNS in_IN this_DT question_NN --_-- goal_NN and_CC method_NN ._. Issue_NN no._NN 6_CD ._. Federal_JJ responsibility_NN for_IN education_NN of_IN the_AT citizen_NNS ._. If_CS the_AT above_JJ issue_NN is_BEZ settled_VBN by_IN requiring_VBG public_JJ education_NN for_IN all_ABN citizen_NNS ,_, Issue_NN No._NN 6_CD may_MD be_BE moot_JJ ._. If_CS ,_, on_IN the_AT other_AP hand_NN ,_, it_PPS is_BEZ not_* settled_VBN ,_, or_CC while_CS it_PPS is_BEZ being_BEG debated_VBN and_CC resolved_VBN ,_, doe_DOZ the_AT Federal_JJ government_NN have_HV a_AT responsibility_NN in_IN situation_NNS like_CS that_DT in_IN Prince_NN Edward_NP County_NN ?_. Should_MD the_AT government_NN directly_RB provide_VB education_NN for_IN the_AT child_NNS who_WPS want_VB public_JJ education_NN ?_. The_AT next_AP question_NN is_BEZ whether_CS board_NN member_NNS favor_VB their_PP$ own_JJ social_JJ class_NNS in_IN their_PP$ role_NNS a_CS educational_JJ policy-makers_NNS ._. On_IN the_AT whole_JJ ,_, it_PPS appears_VBZ that_CS they_PPSS do_DO not_* favor_VB their_PP$ own_JJ social_JJ class_NNS in_IN an_AT explicit_JJ way_NN ._. Seldom_RB is_BEZ there_EX an_AT issue_NN in_IN which_WDT class_NN line_NNS can_MD be_BE clearly_RB drawn_VBN ._. A_AT hypothetical_JJ issue_NN of_IN this_DT sort_NN might_MD deal_VB with_IN the_AT establishment_NN of_IN a_AT free_JJ public_JJ junior_JJ college_NN in_IN a_AT community_NN where_WRB there_EX already_RB wa_BEDZ a_AT good_JJ private_JJ college_NN which_WDT served_VBD the_AT middle-class_NN youth_NN adequately_RB but_CC wa_BEDZ too_QL expensive_JJ for_IN working-class_NN youth_NN ._. In_IN situation_NNS of_IN this_DT sort_NN the_AT board_NN generally_RB favor_VBZ the_AT expansion_NN of_IN free_JJ education_NN ._. Campbell_NP studied_VBD the_AT record_NNS of_IN 172_CD school_NN board_NN member_NNS in_IN twelve_CD western_JJ city_NNS over_IN the_AT period_NN of_IN 1931_CD -_IN 40_CD and_CC found_VBD ``_`` little_AP or_CC no_AT relationship_NN between_IN certain_AP social_JJ and_CC economic_JJ factor_NNS and_CC school_NN board_NN competence_NN ''_'' ,_, a_CS judged_VBN by_IN a_AT panel_NN of_IN professional_JJ educator_NNS who_WPS studied_VBD the_AT voting_VBG record_NNS on_IN educational_JJ issue_NNS ._. The_AT few_AP case_NNS of_IN clear_JJ favoritism_NN along_IN social-class_NN line_NNS are_BER a_QL likely_JJ a_CS not_* to_TO involve_VB representative_NNS of_IN the_AT working_VBG class_NN on_IN the_AT school_NN board_NN who_WPS favor_VB some_DTI such_JJ practice_NN a_CS high_JJR wage_NNS for_IN janitor_NNS rather_RB than_CS pay_NN increase_NNS for_IN teacher_NNS ,_, and_CC such_JJ issue_NNS are_BER not_* issue_NNS of_IN educational_JJ policy_NN ._. In_IN general_JJ ,_, it_PPS appears_VBZ that_CS trustee_NNS and_CC board_NN member_NNS attempt_VB to_TO represent_VB the_AT public_JJ interest_NN in_IN their_PP$ administration_NN of_IN educational_JJ policy_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT is_BEZ made_VBN easy_JJR by_IN the_AT fact_NN that_CS the_AT dominant_JJ value_NNS of_IN the_AT society_NN are_BER middle-class_NN value_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_BER generally_RB thought_VBN to_TO be_BE valid_JJ for_IN the_AT entire_JJ society_NN ._. There_EX have_HV been_BEN very_QL few_AP case_NNS of_IN explicit_JJ conflict_NN of_IN interest_NN between_IN the_AT middle_JJ class_NN and_CC any_DTI other_AP class_NN in_IN the_AT field_NN of_IN educational_JJ policy_NN ._. If_CS there_EX were_BED more_AP such_JJ case_NNS ,_, it_PPS would_MD be_BE easy_JJR to_TO answer_VB the_AT question_NN whether_CS the_AT policy-makers_NNS favor_VB their_PP$ own_JJ social_JJ class_NNS ._. There_EX is_BEZ currently_RB a_AT major_JJ controversy_NN of_IN public_JJ education_NN in_IN which_WDT group_NN interest_NNS and_CC value_NNS are_BER heavily_RB engaged_VBN ._. This_DT is_BEZ the_AT issue_NN of_IN segregated_VBN school_NNS in_IN the_AT South_NR ._. In_IN this_DT case_NN it_PPS is_BEZ primarily_RB a_AT matter_NN of_IN conflict_NN of_IN racial_JJ group_NNS rather_RB than_CS social-class_NN group_NNS ._. Thus_RB ,_, the_AT white_JJ middle_JJ and_CC low_JJR class_NNS are_BER arrayed_VBN against_IN the_AT Negro_NP middle_JJ and_CC low_JJR class_NNS ._.
