If_CS this_DT happens_VBZ ,_, there_EX may_MD be_BE some_DTI class_NN conflict_NN in_IN the_AT South_NR ,_, with_IN school_NN board_NNS and_CC school_NN teacher_NNS taking_VBG the_AT middle-class_NN position_NN ._. The_AT educational_JJ profession_NN The_AT member_NNS of_IN the_AT educational_JJ profession_NN have_HV a_AT major_JJ voice_NN in_IN the_AT determination_NN of_IN educational_JJ policy_NN ,_, their_PP$ position_NN being_BEG strong_JJT in_IN the_AT university_NNS ._. They_PPSS are_BER mostly_RB upper-middle-_JJ and_CC lower-middle-class_NN people_NNS ,_, with_IN a_AT few_AP in_IN the_AT upper_JJ class_NN ._. Do_DO they_PPSS make_VB class-biased_JJ decision_NNS ?_. In_IN a_AT society_NN dominated_VBN by_IN middle-class_NN value_NNS and_CC working_VBG in_IN an_AT institution_NN which_WDT transmits_VBZ and_CC strengthens_VBZ these_DTS social_JJ value_NNS ,_, it_PPS is_BEZ clear_JJ that_CS the_AT educational_JJ profession_NN must_MD work_VB for_IN the_AT value_NNS which_WDT are_BER characteristic_JJ of_IN the_AT society_NN ._. There_EX is_BEZ no_AT problem_NN here_RB ._. The_AT problem_NN arises_VBZ ,_, if_CS it_PPS doe_DOZ arise_VB ,_, when_WRB the_AT educator_NN ha_HVZ to_TO make_VB a_AT choice_NN or_CC a_AT decision_NN within_IN the_AT area_NN of_IN his_PP$ professional_JJ competence_NN ,_, but_CC which_WDT bear_VBZ some_DTI relation_NN to_IN the_AT social_JJ structure_NN ._. For_IN instance_NN ,_, in_IN giving_VBG school_NN grade_NNS or_CC in_IN making_VBG recommendation_NNS for_IN the_AT award_NN of_IN a_AT college_NN scholarship_NN ,_, doe_DOZ he_PPS consciously_RB or_CC unconsciously_RB favor_VB student_NNS of_IN one_CD or_CC another_DT social_JJ class_NN ?_. Again_RB ,_, in_IN deciding_VBG on_IN the_AT content_NN and_CC method_NN of_IN his_PP$ teaching_NN ,_, doe_DOZ he_PPS favor_VB a_AT curriculum_NN which_WDT will_MD make_VB his_PP$ student_NNS strong_JJR competitor_NNS in_IN the_AT race_NN for_IN high_JJR economic_JJ status_NN ,_, or_CC doe_DOZ he_PPS favor_VB a_AT curriculum_NN which_WDT strengthens_VBZ student_NNS in_IN other_AP way_NNS ?_. The_AT answer_NNS to_IN question_NNS such_JJ a_CS these_DTS certainly_RB depend_VB to_IN some_DTI extent_NN upon_IN the_AT educator's_NN$ own_JJ social-class_NN position_NN and_CC also_RB upon_IN his_PP$ social_JJ history_NN ,_, a_QL well_RB a_CS upon_IN his_PP$ personality_NN and_CC what_WDT he_PPS conceives_VBZ his_PP$ mission_NN to_TO be_BE a_CS an_AT educator_NN ._. In_IN a_AT set_NN of_IN case_NN study_NNS of_IN teacher_NNS with_IN various_AP social-class_NN background_NNS ,_, Wattenberg_NP illustrates_VBZ a_AT variety_NN of_IN approach_NNS to_IN student_NNS and_CC to_IN teaching_VBG which_WDT depend_VB upon_IN the_AT teacher's_NN$ personality_NN a_QL well_RB a_CS on_IN his_PP$ social-class_NN background_NN ._. One_CD upward-mobile_JJ teacher_NN may_MD be_BE a_AT hard_JJ taskmaster_NN for_IN lower-class_NN pupil_NNS because_CS she_PPS want_VBZ them_PPO to_TO develop_VB the_AT attitude_NNS and_CC skill_NNS that_WPS will_MD enable_VB them_PPO to_TO climb_VB ,_, while_CS another_DT upward-mobile_JJ teacher_NN may_MD be_BE a_AT very_QL permissive_JJ person_NN with_IN lower-class_NN pupil_NNS because_CS he_PPS know_VBZ their_PP$ disadvantage_NNS and_CC deprivation_NNS at_IN home_NN ,_, and_CC he_PPS hope_VBZ to_TO encourage_VB them_PPO by_IN friendly_JJ treatment_NN ._. One_CD social-class_NN factor_NN which_WDT play_VBZ a_AT large_JJ part_NN in_IN educational_JJ policy_NN today_NR is_BEZ the_AT fact_NN that_CS a_AT great_QL many_AP school_NN and_CC college_NN teacher_NNS are_BER upward_RB mobile_JJ from_IN urban_JJ lower-class_NN and_CC lower-middle-class_NN family_NNS ._. Their_PP$ own_JJ experience_NN in_IN the_AT social_JJ system_NN influence_VBZ their_PP$ work_NN and_CC attitude_NNS a_CS teacher_NNS ._. While_CS this_DT influence_NN is_BEZ a_AT complex_JJ matter_NN ,_, depending_IN upon_IN personality_NN factor_NNS in_IN the_AT individual_NN a_QL well_RB a_CS upon_IN his_PP$ social-class_NN experience_NN ,_, there_EX probably_RB are_BER some_DTI general_JJ statement_NNS about_IN social-class_NN background_NN and_CC educational_JJ policy_NN that_WPS can_MD be_BE made_VBN with_IN a_AT fair_JJ degree_NN of_IN truth_NN ._. Teachers_NNS who_WPS have_HV been_BEN upward_RB mobile_JJ probably_RB see_VB education_NN a_CS most_QL valuable_JJ for_IN their_PP$ student_NNS if_CS it_PPS serf_VBZ student_NNS a_CS it_PPS ha_HVZ served_VBN them_PPO ;_. ;_. that_DT is_BEZ ,_, they_PPSS are_BER likely_JJ to_TO favor_VB a_AT kind_NN of_IN education_NN that_WPS ha_HVZ vocational-advancement_NN value_NN ._. This_DT doe_DOZ not_* necessarily_RB mean_VB that_CS such_JJ teacher_NNS will_MD favor_VB vocational_JJ education_NN ,_, a_CS contrasted_VBN with_IN liberal_JJ education_NN ,_, but_CC they_PPSS are_BER likely_JJ to_TO favor_VB an_AT approach_NN to_IN liberal_JJ education_NN which_WDT ha_HVZ a_AT maximal_JJ vocational-advancement_NN value_NN ,_, a_CS against_IN a_AT kind_NN of_IN ``_`` pure_JJ ''_'' liberal_JJ education_NN that_WPS is_BEZ not_* designed_VBN to_TO help_VB people_NNS get_VB good_JJR job_NNS ._. There_EX is_BEZ no_AT doubt_NN that_CS high_JJR education_NN since_IN World_NN War_NN 2_CD ,_, ha_HVZ moved_VBN away_RB from_IN ``_`` pure_JJ ''_'' liberal_JJ education_NN toward_IN great_JJR emphasis_NN on_IN technology_NN and_CC specialization_NN ._. There_EX are_BER several_AP cause_NNS for_IN this_DT ,_, one_CD being_BEG rapid_JJ economic_JJ development_NN with_IN increasing_VBG number_NNS of_IN of_IN middle-class_NN position_NNS requiring_VBG engineering_VBG or_CC scientific_JJ training_NN ._. But_CC another_DT cause_NN may_MD lie_VB in_IN the_AT experience_NN of_IN so_QL many_AP new_JJ postwar_JJ faculty_NN member_NNS with_IN their_PP$ own_JJ use_NN of_IN education_NN a_CS a_AT mean_NN of_IN social_JJ advancement_NN ._. Compared_VBN with_IN the_AT college_NN and_CC university_NN faculty_NN member_NNS of_IN the_AT period_NN from_IN 1900_CD to_IN 1930_CD ,_, the_AT new_JJ postwar_JJ faculty_NN member_NNS consist_VB of_IN more_AP child_NNS of_IN immigrant_NNS and_CC more_AP child_NNS of_IN urban_JJ working-class_NN father_NNS ._. Their_PP$ experience_NN is_BEZ quite_RB in_IN contrast_NN with_IN that_DT of_IN child_NNS of_IN upper-_JJ and_CC upper-middle-class_NN native-born_JJ parent_NNS ,_, who_WPS are_BER more_QL likely_JJ to_TO regard_VB education_NN a_CS good_JJ for_IN it_PP$ own_JJ sake_NN and_CC to_TO discount_VB the_AT vocational_JJ emphasis_NNS in_IN the_AT curriculum_NN ._. The_AT ``_`` public_JJ interest_NN ''_'' group_NNS Educational_JJ policy_NNS are_BER formed_VBN by_IN several_AP group_NNS who_WPS are_BER officially_RB or_CC unofficially_RB appointed_VBN to_TO act_VB in_IN the_AT public_JJ interest_NN ._. Legislators_NNS are_BER one_CD such_JJ group_NN ,_, and_CC state_NN legislator_NNS have_HV major_JJ responsibility_NN for_IN educational_JJ legislation_NN ._. They_PPSS generally_RB vote_VB so_CS a_CS to_TO serve_VB their_PP$ own_JJ constituency_NN ,_, and_CC if_CS the_AT constituency_NN should_MD be_BE solidly_RB middle_JJ class_NN or_CC solidly_RB low_JJR class_NN ,_, they_PPSS might_MD be_BE expected_VBN to_TO vote_VB and_CC work_VB for_IN middle-_JJ or_CC for_IN lower-class_NN interest_NNS in_IN education_NN ._. However_RB ,_, there_EX are_BER relatively_QL few_AP such_JJ political_JJ constituency_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, a_CS ha_HVZ been_BEN pointed_VBN out_RP ,_, there_EX is_BEZ seldom_RB a_AT clear-cut_JJ distinction_NN between_IN the_AT educational_JJ interest_NNS of_IN one_CD social_JJ class_NN and_CC those_DTS of_IN another_DT ._. Another_DT public_JJ interest_NN group_NN is_BEZ the_AT commission_NN of_IN layman_NNS or_CC educator_NNS which_WDT is_BEZ appointed_VBN to_TO study_VB an_AT educational_JJ problem_NN and_CC to_TO make_VB recommendation_NNS ._. Generally_RB these_DTS commission_NNS work_VB earnestly_RB to_TO represent_VB the_AT interest_NN of_IN the_AT entire_JJ society_NN ,_, a_CS they_PPSS conceive_VB it_PPO ._. Nevertheless_RB ,_, their_PP$ conclusion_NNS and_CC recommendation_NNS cannot_MD* please_VB everybody_PN ,_, and_CC they_PPSS often_RB represent_VB a_AT particular_AP economic_JJ or_CC political_JJ point_NN of_IN view_NN ._. For_IN instance_NN ,_, there_EX have_HV been_BEN two_CD Presidential_JJ Commissions_NNS on_IN high_JJR education_NN since_IN World_NN War_NN 2_CD ._. President_NN Truman's_NP$ Commission_NN on_IN Higher_JJR Education_NN tended_VBD to_TO take_VB a_AT liberal_JJ ,_, expansionist_NN position_NN ,_, while_CS President_NN Eisenhower's_NP$ Committee_NN on_IN Education_NN Beyond_RB the_AT High_JJ School_NN wa_BEDZ slightly_QL more_QL conservative_JJ ._. Both_ABX Commissions_NNS consisted_VBD of_IN upper-middle-_JJ and_CC upper-class_NN people_NNS ,_, who_WPS attempted_VBD to_TO act_VB in_IN the_AT public_JJ interest_NN ._. An_AT example_NN of_IN a_AT more_QL definite_JJ class_NN bias_NN is_BEZ noted_VBN in_IN proceeding_NNS of_IN the_AT Commission_NN on_IN the_AT Financing_NN of_IN Higher_JJR Education_NN sponsored_VBN by_IN the_AT Association_NN of_IN American_JJ Universities_NNS and_CC supported_VBN by_IN the_AT Rockefeller_NP Foundation_NN and_CC the_AT Carnegie_NP Corporation_NN ._. This_DT Commission_NN recommended_VBD against_IN the_AT use_NN of_IN federal_JJ government_NN fund_NNS for_IN the_AT assistance_NN of_IN private_JJ university_NNS and_CC against_IN a_AT broad_JJ program_NN of_IN government-supported_JJ scholarship_NNS ._. This_DT might_NN be_BE said_VBN to_TO be_BE an_AT upper-_JJ or_CC an_AT upper-middle-class_NN bias_NN ,_, but_CC the_AT Commission_NN published_VBD a_CS one_CD of_IN it_PP$ staff_NN study_NNS a_AT book_NN by_IN Byron_NP S._NP Hollingshead_NP entitled_VBN Who_WPS Should_MD Go_VB To_IN College_NN ?_. Which_WDT recommended_VBD a_AT federal_JJ government_NN scholarship_NN program_NN ._. Furthermore_RB ,_, the_AT Commission_NN set_VBD up_RP the_AT Council_NN for_IN Financial_JJ Aid_NN to_IN Education_NN a_CS a_AT mean_NN of_IN encouraging_VBG private_JJ business_NN to_TO increase_VB it_PP$ support_NN of_IN private_JJ high_JJR education_NN ._. Thus_RB ,_, the_AT Commission_NN acted_VBD with_IN a_AT sense_NN of_IN social_JJ responsibility_NN within_IN the_AT area_NN of_IN it_PP$ own_JJ conviction_NNS about_IN the_AT problem_NN of_IN government_NN support_NN to_IN private_JJ education_NN ._. Then_RB there_EX are_BER the_AT trustee_NNS and_CC officer_NNS of_IN the_AT great_JJ educational_JJ foundation_NNS ,_, who_WPS inevitably_RB exert_VB an_AT influence_NN on_IN educational_JJ decision_NNS by_IN their_PP$ support_NN or_CC refusal_NN to_TO support_VB various_AP educational_JJ program_NNS ,_, experiment_NNS ,_, and_CC demonstration_NNS ._. These_DTS people_NNS are_BER practically_QL always_RB upper-_JJ or_CC upper-middle-class_NN person_NNS ,_, who_WPS attempt_VB to_TO act_VB in_IN what_WDT they_PPSS regard_VB a_CS the_AT interest_NN of_IN the_AT entire_JJ society_NN ._. Finally_RB there_EX are_BER the_AT parent_NN organization_NNS and_CC the_AT laymen's_NNS$ organization_NNS such_JJ a_CS the_AT National_JJ Association_NN of_IN Parents_NNS and_CC Teachers_NNS ,_, and_CC the_AT Citizens_NNS Committee_NN on_IN Public_JJ Schools_NNS ._. These_DTS have_HV an_AT upper-middle-class_NN leadership_NN and_CC a_AT middle-class_NN membership_NN ,_, with_IN rare_JJ exception_NNS ,_, where_WRB working-class_NN parent_NNS are_BER active_JJ in_IN local_JJ P.-T.A._NP matter_NNS ._. Like_CS the_AT other_AP policy-making_JJ group_NNS ,_, these_DTS are_BER middle_JJ class_NN in_IN their_PP$ educational_JJ attitude_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PPSS attempt_VB to_TO act_VB in_IN the_AT general_JJ public_JJ interest_NN ,_, a_CS they_PPSS see_VB it_PPO ._. In_IN general_JJ ,_, it_PPS appears_VBZ that_CS educational_JJ decision_NNS and_CC educational_JJ policy_NNS are_BER made_VBN by_IN people_NNS who_WPS intend_VB to_TO act_VB in_IN the_AT interest_NNS of_IN the_AT society_NN a_CS a_AT whole_NN ._. They_PPSS are_BER predominantly_RB middle-_JJ and_CC upper-class_NN people_NNS ,_, and_CC undoubtedly_RB share_VB the_AT value_NNS and_CC attitude_NNS of_IN those_DTS class_NNS ._. They_PPSS may_MD be_BE unaware_JJ of_IN the_AT existence_NN of_IN lower-class_NN value_NNS and_CC consequently_RB fail_VB to_TO take_VB them_PPO into_IN account_NN ._. But_CC there_EX is_BEZ very_QL little_AP frank_JJ and_CC conscious_JJ espousal_NN of_IN the_AT interest_NNS of_IN any_DTI one_CD social_JJ class_NN by_IN the_AT people_NNS who_WPS have_HV the_AT power_NN to_TO make_VB decision_NNS in_IN education_NN ._. They_PPSS think_VB of_IN themselves_PPLS a_CS trustee_NNS for_IN the_AT entire_JJ society_NN and_CC try_VB to_TO serve_VB the_AT entire_JJ society_NN ._. Attempts_NNS to_TO influence_VB social_JJ structure_NN through_IN education_NN Educational_JJ policy_NN in_IN the_AT United_VBN States_NNS ha_HVZ a_CS an_AT explicit_JJ goal_NN the_AT maximization_NN of_IN economic_JJ and_CC cultural_JJ opportunity_NN ._. In_IN so_QL far_RB a_CS this_DT goal_NN is_BEZ achieved_VBN ,_, the_AT society_NN becomes_VBZ more_QL fluid_JJ ,_, artificial_JJ barrier_NNS to_IN social_JJ mobility_NN are_BER reduced_VBN ,_, and_CC people_NNS at_IN the_AT low_JJR end_NN of_IN the_AT social_JJ hierarchy_NN share_VB more_QL fully_RB in_IN the_AT material_NN and_CC cultural_JJ good_NNS of_IN society_NN ._. On_IN the_AT other_AP hand_NN ,_, there_EX is_BEZ a_AT counterbalancing_VBG purpose_NN in_IN education_NN which_WDT is_BEZ to_TO pas_VB on_RP the_AT advantage_NNS of_IN the_AT parent_NNS to_IN their_PP$ child_NNS ._. This_DT lead_VBZ to_IN effort_NNS at_IN exclusiveness_NN through_IN private_JJ school_NNS and_CC to_IN the_AT maintenance_NN of_IN social_JJ stratification_NN in_IN the_AT school_NNS ._. Both_ABX of_IN these_DTS purpose_NNS exist_VB side_NN by_IN side_NN without_IN much_AP overt_JJ conflict_NN under_IN present_JJ condition_NNS ._. Maximizing_VBG economic_JJ and_CC cultural_JJ opportunity_NN The_AT broad_JJ expansion_NN of_IN free_JJ education_NN result_VBZ both_ABX in_IN raising_VBG the_AT average_JJ economic_JJ and_CC cultural_JJ level_NN of_IN the_AT society_NN and_CC in_IN promoting_VBG fluidity_NN within_IN the_AT social_JJ structure_NN ._. Fifty_CD year_NNS ago_RB the_AT general_JJ raising_NN of_IN the_AT school-leaving_JJ age_NN to_IN sixteen_CD wa_BEDZ an_AT example_NN of_IN this_DT movement_NN ._. During_IN the_AT past_AP decade_NN the_AT program_NN ha_HVZ been_BEN carried_VBN on_RP through_IN expansion_NN of_IN free_JJ high_JJR education_NN in_IN state_NN university_NNS ,_, state_NN college_NNS ,_, and_CC community_NN college_NNS ._. The_AT reaffirmation_NN of_IN American_JJ faith_NN in_IN the_AT comprehensive_JJ high_JJ school_NN ,_, a_CS expressed_VBN in_IN the_AT Conant_NP study_NN ,_, is_BEZ another_DT indication_NN of_IN the_AT liveliness_NN of_IN the_AT ideal_NN of_IN maximizing_VBG opportunity_NN through_IN the_AT equalizing_NN of_IN educational_JJ opportunity_NN ._. The_AT recent_JJ federal_JJ government's_NN$ student-loan_NN program_NN is_BEZ another_DT step_NN in_IN the_AT direction_NN of_IN making_VBG high_JJR education_NN more_QL available_JJ to_IN lower-status_NN youth_NN ._. It_PPS is_BEZ probably_RB more_QL effective_JJ than_CS the_AT expanded_VBN scholarship_NN program_NNS of_IN the_AT past_AP decade_NN ,_, because_CS the_AT scholarship_NN program_NNS mainly_RB aided_VBD the_AT student_NNS with_IN the_AT best_JJT academic_JJ record_NNS (_( who_WPS were_BED usually_RB middle-class_NN )_) ,_, and_CC these_DTS student_NNS tended_VBD to_TO use_VB the_AT scholarship_NN fund_NNS to_TO go_VB to_IN more_QL expensive_JJ college_NNS ._. Meanwhile_RB ,_, the_AT private_JJ college_NNS have_HV increased_VBN their_PP$ tuition_NN rate_NNS so_QL much_RB that_CS they_PPSS have_HV raised_VBN an_AT economic_JJ barrier_NN which_WDT dwarf_VBZ their_PP$ scholarship_NN fund_NNS ._. The_AT gain_NNS in_IN educational_JJ opportunity_NN during_IN the_AT past_AP decade_NN have_HV taken_VBN place_NN largely_RB in_IN the_AT publicly_RB supported_VBN institution_NNS ._. Unfortunately_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, and_CC for_IN reason_NNS to_TO be_BE discussed_VBN in_IN the_AT following_VBG chapter_NN ,_, no_AT rate_NN relationship_NNS can_MD be_BE made_VBN completely_QL nondiscriminatory_JJ a_QL long_RB a_CS all_ABN or_CC some_DTI of_IN the_AT rate_NNS must_MD be_BE set_VBN above_IN marginal_JJ cost_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO yield_VB adequate_JJ revenue_NNS ._. One_CD such_JJ disagreement_NN ,_, which_WDT will_MD receive_VB attention_NN in_IN this_DT next_AP chapter_NN ,_, concern_VBZ the_AT question_NN whether_CS rate_NNS for_IN different_JJ kind_NNS of_IN service_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO avoid_VB the_AT attribute_NN of_IN discrimination_NN ,_, must_MD be_BE made_VBN directly_RB proportional_JJ to_IN marginal_JJ cost_NNS ,_, or_CC whether_CS they_PPSS should_MD be_BE based_VBN instead_RB on_IN difference_NNS in_IN marginal_JJ cost_NNS ._. The_AT double-step_NN type_NN Despite_IN an_AT ambiguity_NN due_JJ to_IN it_PP$ failure_NN clearly_RB to_TO define_VB ``_`` relative_JJ cost_NNS ''_'' ,_, the_AT above_JJ exposition_NN of_IN fully_RB distributed_VBN costing_NN go_VBZ about_RB a_QL far_RB a_CS one_PN can_MD go_VB toward_IN expressing_VBG the_AT basic_JJ philosophy_NN of_IN the_AT practice_NN ._. The_AT first_OD ,_, or_CC double-step_NN ,_, type_NN might_MD also_RB be_BE called_VBN the_AT ``_`` railroad_NN type_NN ''_'' because_RB of_IN it_PP$ application_NN to_IN railroad_NNS (_( and_CC other_AP transportation_NN agency_NNS )_) by_IN the_AT Cost_NN Section_NN of_IN the_AT Interstate_JJ Commerce_NN Commission_NN ._. The_AT Cost_NN Section_NN distinguishes_VBZ between_IN (_( directly_RB )_) variable_JJ cost_NNS and_CC constant_JJ cost_NNS in_IN a_AT manner_NN noted_VBN in_IN the_AT preceding_VBG chapter_NN ._. The_AT variable_JJ cost_NNS alone_RB are_BER assigned_VBN to_IN the_AT different_JJ unit_NNS of_IN freight_NN traffic_NN a_CS representing_VBG ``_`` long-run_NN out-of-pocket_JJ cost_NNS ''_'' --_-- a_AT term_NN with_IN a_AT meaning_NN here_RB not_* distinctly_RB different_JJ from_IN that_DT of_IN the_AT economist's_NN$ ``_`` long-run_NN marginal_JJ cost_NNS ''_'' ._. There_EX remains_VBZ a_AT residue_NN of_IN total_JJ cost_NNS ,_, or_CC total_JJ ``_`` revenue_NN requirement_NNS ''_'' which_WDT ,_, since_CS it_PPS is_BEZ found_VBN to_TO behave_VB a_CS if_CS it_PPS were_BED constant_JJ over_IN substantial_JJ variation_NNS in_IN traffic_NN density_NN ,_, is_BEZ strictly_RB unallocable_JJ on_IN a_AT cost-finding_JJ basis_NN ._. Nevertheless_RB ,_, because_CS the_AT Cost_NN Section_NN ha_HVZ felt_VBN impelled_VBN to_TO make_VB some_DTI kind_NN of_IN a_AT distribution_NN of_IN total_JJ cost_NNS ,_, it_PPS ha_HVZ apportioned_VBN this_DT residue_NN ,_, which_WDT it_PPS sometimes_RB call_VBZ ``_`` burden_NN ''_'' ,_, among_IN the_AT unit_NNS of_IN carload_NN traffic_NN on_IN a_AT basis_NN (_( partly_RB ton_NN ,_, partly_RB ton-mile_NN )_) which_WDT is_BEZ concededly_RB quite_QL arbitrary_JJ from_IN the_AT standpoint_NN of_IN cost_NN determination_NN ._. In_IN recent_JJ year_NNS ,_, this_DT burden_NN (_( which_WDT includes_VBZ allowance_NNS for_IN revenue_NN deficiency_NNS in_IN the_AT passenger_NN business_NN and_CC in_IN less-than-carload_JJ freight_NN traffic_NN !_. )_) ha_HVZ amounted_VBN to_IN about_RB one_CD third_NN of_IN those_DTS total_JJ revenue_NN requirement_NNS which_WDT the_AT carload_NN freight_NN business_NN is_BEZ supposed_VBN to_TO be_BE called_VBN upon_RB to_TO meet_VB ._. Since_CS this_DT book_NN is_BEZ concerned_VBN only_RB incidentally_RB with_IN railroad_NN rate_NNS ,_, it_PPS will_MD not_* attempt_VB to_TO analyze_VB the_AT method_NNS by_IN which_WDT the_AT staff_NN of_IN the_AT Interstate_JJ Commerce_NN Commission_NN ha_HVZ estimated_VBN out-of-pocket_JJ cost_NNS and_CC apportioned_VBN residue_NN cost_NNS ._. The_AT single-step_NN type_NN We_PPSS turn_VB now_RB to_IN a_AT type_NN of_IN fully_RB distributed_VBN cost_NN analysis_NN which_WDT ,_, unlike_IN the_AT ``_`` railroad_NN type_NN ''_'' ,_, draw_VBZ no_AT distinction_NN between_IN cost_NN allocation_NN and_CC cost_NN apportionment_NN :_: the_AT single-step_NN type_NN ._. It_PPS might_MD be_BE called_VBN the_AT ``_`` public_JJ utility_NN ''_'' type_NN because_RB of_IN the_AT considerable_JJ use_NN to_IN which_WDT it_PPS ha_HVZ been_BEN put_VBN in_IN gas_NN and_CC electric_NN utility_NN rate_NN case_NNS ._. Here_RB no_AT attempt_NN is_BEZ made_VBN ,_, first_RB to_TO determine_VB out-of-pocket_JJ or_CC marginal_JJ cost_NNS and_CC then_RB to_TO superimpose_VB on_IN these_DTS cost_NNS ``_`` reasonably_RB distributed_VBN ''_'' residue_NNS of_IN total_JJ cost_NNS ._. Instead_RB ,_, all_ABN of_IN the_AT total_JJ cost_NNS are_BER treated_VBN a_CS variable_JJ cost_NNS ,_, although_CS these_DTS cost_NNS are_BER divided_VBN into_IN cost_NNS that_WPS are_BER deemed_VBN to_TO be_BE function_NNS of_IN different_JJ variable_NNS ._. As_CS already_RB noted_VBN in_IN an_AT early_JJR paragraph_NN ,_, the_AT more_QL familiar_JJ cost_NN analysis_NNS of_IN utility_NN enterprise_NNS or_CC utility_NN system_NNS divide_VB the_AT total_JJ cost_NNS among_IN a_AT number_NN of_IN major_JJ class_NNS of_IN service_NN ,_, such_JJ a_CS residential_JJ ,_, commercial_JJ ,_, industrial_JJ power_NN ,_, street_NN lighting_NN ,_, etc._RB ._. This_DT ``_`` grand_JJ division_NN ''_'' permit_VBZ many_AP cost_NNS to_TO be_BE assigned_VBN in_IN their_PP$ entirety_NN to_IN some_DTI one_CD class_NN ,_, such_JJ a_CS street_NN lighting_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN least_AP to_TO be_BE excluded_VBN completely_RB from_IN some_DTI important_JJ class_NN or_CC class_NNS ._. High-tension_NN industrial_JJ power_NN service_NN ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, would_MD not_* be_BE charged_VBN with_IN any_DTI share_NN of_IN the_AT maintenance_NN cost_NNS or_CC capital_NN cost_NNS of_IN the_AT low-tension_NN distribution_NN line_NNS ._. But_CC the_AT major_JJ portion_NNS of_IN the_AT total_JJ cost_NNS of_IN a_AT utility_NN business_NN are_BER common_JJ or_CC joint_JJ to_IN all_ABN ,_, or_CC nearly_RB all_ABN ,_, class_NNS of_IN customer_NNS ;_. ;_. and_CC these_DTS cost_NNS must_MD somehow_RB be_BE apportioned_VBN among_IN the_AT various_AP class_NNS and_CC then_RB must_MD somehow_RB be_BE reapportioned_VBN among_IN the_AT unit_NNS of_IN service_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO report_VB unit_NN cost_NNS that_WPS can_MD serve_VB a_CS tentative_JJ measure_NNS of_IN reasonable_JJ rate_NNS ._. The_AT general_JJ basis_NN on_IN which_WDT these_DTS common_JJ cost_NNS are_BER assigned_VBN to_IN differently_RB measured_VBN unit_NNS of_IN service_NN will_MD be_BE illustrated_VBN by_IN the_AT following_VBG highly_QL simplified_VBN problem_NN of_IN an_AT electric-utility_NN cost_NN analysis_NN ._. But_CC before_CS turning_VBG to_IN this_DT example_NN ,_, we_PPSS must_MD distinguish_VB two_CD subtypes_NNS of_IN analysis_NN ,_, both_ABX of_IN which_WDT belong_VB to_IN the_AT single-step_NN type_NN rather_RB than_CS to_IN the_AT double-step_NN type_NN ._. In_IN the_AT first_OD subtype_NN ,_, the_AT analyst_NN (_( following_VBG the_AT practice_NN of_IN railroad_NN analysis_NN in_IN this_DT particular_AP respect_NN )_) distributes_VBZ both_ABX total_JJ operating_VBG cost_NNS and_CC total_JJ annual_JJ capital_NN cost_NNS (_( including_IN an_AT allowance_NN for_IN ``_`` cost_NN of_IN capital_NN ''_'' or_CC ``_`` fair_JJ rate_NN of_IN return_NN ''_'' )_) among_IN the_AT different_JJ class_NNS and_CC unit_NNS of_IN service_NN ._. Here_RB ,_, an_AT apportionment_NN ,_, say_UH ,_, of_IN $5,000,000_NNS of_IN the_AT total_JJ cost_NNS to_IN residential_JJ service_NN a_CS a_AT class_NN would_MD include_VB an_AT allowance_NN of_IN perhaps_RB 6_CD per_IN cent_NN a_CS the_AT cost_NN of_IN whatever_WDT capital_NN is_BEZ deemed_VBN to_TO have_HV been_BEN devoted_VBN to_IN the_AT service_NN of_IN the_AT residential_JJ consumer_NNS ._. But_CC in_IN the_AT second_OD subtype_NN ,_, which_WDT I_PPSS take_VB to_TO be_BE the_AT one_CD more_QL frequently_RB applied_VBN ,_, only_RB the_AT operating_VBG expense_NNS and_CC not_* the_AT ``_`` cost_NN of_IN capital_NN ''_'' or_CC ``_`` fair_JJ return_NN ''_'' are_BER apportioned_VBN directly_RB among_IN the_AT various_AP class_NNS of_IN service_NN ._. To_TO be_BE sure_JJ ,_, the_AT capital_NN investment_NNS in_IN (_( or_CC ,_, alternatively_RB ,_, the_AT estimated_VBN ``_`` fair_JJ value_NNS ''_'' of_IN )_) the_AT plant_NN and_CC equipment_NN are_BER apportioned_VBN among_IN the_AT different_JJ class_NNS ,_, a_CS are_BER also_RB the_AT gross_JJ revenue_NNS received_VBN from_IN the_AT sale_NNS of_IN the_AT different_JJ service_NNS ._. But_CC any_DTI resulting_VBG excess_NN of_IN revenue_NNS received_VBN from_IN a_AT given_VBN class_NN of_IN service_NN over_IN the_AT operating_VBG cost_NNS imputed_VBN to_IN this_DT class_NN is_BEZ reported_VBN a_CS a_AT ``_`` return_NN ''_'' realized_VBN on_IN the_AT capital_NN investment_NN attributed_VBN to_IN the_AT same_AP service_NN ._. Thus_RB ,_, during_IN any_DTI given_VBN year_NN (_( A_NP )_) if_CS the_AT revenue_NNS from_IN the_AT residential_JJ service_NN are_BER $7,000,000_NNS ,_, (_( B_NP )_) if_CS the_AT operating_VBG expense_NNS imputed_VBN to_IN this_DT class_NN of_IN service_NN come_VB to_IN $5,000,000_NNS ,_, and_CC (_( C_NP )_) if_CS the_AT net_JJ investment_NN in_IN (_( or_CC value_NN of_IN )_) the_AT plant_NN and_CC equipment_NN deemed_VBN devoted_VBN to_IN this_DT service_NN amount_VBZ to_IN $30,000,000_NNS ,_, the_AT cost_NN analyst_NN will_MD report_VB that_CS residential_JJ service_NN ,_, in_IN the_AT aggregate_NN ,_, ha_HVZ yielded_VBN a_AT return_NN of_IN $2,000,000_NNS or_CC 6-2/3_CD per_IN cent_NN ._. Other_AP service_NNS will_MD show_VB different_JJ rate_NNS of_IN return_NN ,_, some_DTI probably_RB much_QL low_JJR and_CC some_DTI high_JJR ._. There_EX are_BER obvious_JJ reason_NNS of_IN convenience_NN for_IN this_DT practice_NN of_IN excluding_VBG ``_`` cost_NN of_IN capital_NN ''_'' from_IN the_AT direct_JJ apportionment_NN of_IN annual_JJ cost_NNS among_IN the_AT different_JJ class_NNS of_IN service_NN --_-- notably_RB ,_, the_AT avoidance_NN of_IN the_AT controversial_JJ question_NN what_WDT rate_NN of_IN return_NN should_MD be_BE held_VBN to_TO constitute_VB ``_`` cost_NN of_IN capital_NN ''_'' or_CC ``_`` fair_JJ rate_NN of_IN return_NN ''_'' ._. But_CC the_AT practice_NN is_BEZ likely_JJ to_TO be_BE misleading_VBG ,_, since_CS it_PPS may_MD seem_VB to_TO support_VB a_AT conclusion_NN that_CS ,_, a_QL long_RB a_CS the_AT revenue_NNS from_IN any_DTI class_NN of_IN service_NN cover_VB the_AT imputed_VBN operating_VBG expense_NNS plus_IN some_DTI return_NN on_IN capital_NN investment_NN ,_, however_WQL low_JJ ,_, the_AT rate_NNS of_IN charge_NN for_IN this_DT service_NN are_BER compensatory_JJ ._. Needless_JJ to_TO say_VB ,_, any_DTI such_JJ inference_NN would_MD be_BE quite_QL unwarranted_JJ ._. For_IN the_AT reason_NN just_RB suggested_VBN ,_, I_PPSS shall_MD assume_VB the_AT use_NN of_IN the_AT first_OD subtype_NN of_IN fully_RB distributed_VBN cost_NN apportionment_NN in_IN the_AT following_VBG simplified_VBN example_NN ._. That_DT is_BEZ to_TO say_VB ,_, an_AT allowance_NN for_IN ``_`` cost_NN of_IN capital_NN ''_'' will_MD be_BE assumed_VBN to_TO be_BE included_VBN directly_RB in_IN the_AT cost_NN apportionment_NN ._. Three-part_JJ analysis_NN of_IN the_AT cost_NNS of_IN an_AT electric_NN utility_NN business_NN In_IN order_NN to_TO simplify_VB the_AT exposition_NN of_IN a_AT typical_JJ fully_RB apportioned_VBN cost_NN analysis_NN ,_, let_VB u_PPO assume_VB the_AT application_NN of_IN the_AT analysis_NN to_IN an_AT electric_NN utility_NN company_NN supplying_VBG a_AT single_AP city_NN with_IN power_NN generated_VBN by_IN it_PP$ own_JJ steam-generation_NN plant_NN ._. Since_CS the_AT company_NN under_IN review_NN is_BEZ supplying_VBG what_WDT we_PPSS are_BER here_RB regarding_VBG a_CS only_RB one_CD kind_NN of_IN service_NN ,_, we_PPSS might_MD suppose_VB that_CS the_AT problem_NN of_IN total_JJ cost_NN apportionment_NN would_MD be_BE very_QL simple_JJ ;_. ;_. indeed_RB ,_, that_CS it_PPS would_MD be_BE limited_VBN to_IN a_AT finding_NN of_IN the_AT total_JJ annual_JJ operating_VBG and_CC capital_NN cost_NNS of_IN the_AT business_NN ,_, followed_VBN by_IN a_AT calculation_NN of_IN this_DT total_NN in_IN term_NNS of_IN annual_JJ cost_NN per_IN kilowatt-hour_NN of_IN consumption_NN ._. In_IN fact_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, the_AT problem_NN is_BEZ not_* so_QL simple_JJ ._. For_CS a_AT statement_NN of_IN cost_NNS per_IN kilowatt-hour_NN would_MD ignore_VB the_AT fact_NN that_CS many_AP of_IN these_DTS cost_NNS are_BER not_* a_AT function_NN of_IN kilowatt-hour_NN output_NN (_( or_CC consumption_NN )_) of_IN energy_NN ._. A_AT recognition_NN of_IN multiple_JJ cost_NN function_NNS is_BEZ therefore_RB required_VBN ._. The_AT simple_JJT division_NN ,_, and_CC the_AT one_CD most_QL frequently_RB used_VBN (_( with_IN subdivision_NNS )_) in_IN gas_NN and_CC electric_NN rate_NN case_NNS ,_, is_BEZ a_AT threefold_JJ division_NN of_IN the_AT total_JJ operating_VBG and_CC capital_NN cost_NNS into_IN ``_`` customer_NN cost_NNS ''_'' ,_, ``_`` energy_NN ''_'' or_CC ``_`` volumetric_JJ cost_NNS ''_'' ,_, and_CC ``_`` demand_NN ''_'' or_CC ``_`` capacity_NN ''_'' cost_NNS ._. If_CS this_DT threefold_JJ division_NN of_IN cost_NNS were_BED to_TO have_HV it_PP$ counterpart_NN in_IN the_AT actual_JJ rate_NNS of_IN charge_NN for_IN service_NN ,_, a_CS it_PPS actually_RB doe_DOZ have_HV in_IN some_DTI rate_NNS ,_, there_EX would_MD result_VB a_AT three-part_JJ rate_NN for_IN any_DTI one_CD class_NN of_IN service_NN ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, the_AT monthly_JJ bill_NN of_IN a_AT residential_JJ consumer_NN might_MD be_BE the_AT sum_NN of_IN a_AT $1_NN customer_NN charge_NN ,_, a_AT $5_NN charge_NN for_IN 250_CD kilowatt-hours_NNS of_IN energy_NN at_IN per_IN kilowatt-hour_NN ,_, and_CC a_AT $2_NN charge_NN for_IN a_AT maximum_JJ demand_NN of_IN 2_CD kilowatt_NNS during_IN the_AT month_NN at_IN the_AT rate_NN of_IN $1_NN per_IN kilowatt_NN --_-- a_AT total_JJ bill_NN of_IN $8_NNS for_IN that_DT month_NN ._. But_CC our_PP$ present_JJ interest_NN lie_VBZ in_IN the_AT measurement_NN of_IN cost_NNS of_IN service_NN ,_, and_CC only_RB indirectly_RB in_IN rate_NNS that_WPS may_MD or_CC may_MD not_* be_BE designed_VBN to_TO cover_VB these_DTS cost_NNS ._. Let_VB u_PPO therefore_RB consider_VB each_DT of_IN the_AT three_CD type_NNS of_IN cost_NN in_IN turn_NN ,_, recognizing_VBG that_CS this_DT simplified_VBN classification_NN is_BEZ used_VBN only_RB for_IN illustrative_JJ purpose_NNS ;_. ;_. cost_NNS actually_RB vary_VB in_IN much_QL more_QL complex_JJ way_NNS ._. 1_CD ._. The_AT customer_NN cost_NNS These_DTS are_BER those_DTS operating_VBG and_CC capital_NN cost_NNS found_VBN to_TO vary_VB with_IN number_NN of_IN customer_NNS regardless_RB ,_, or_CC almost_RB regardless_RB ,_, of_IN power_NN consumption_NN ._. Included_VBN a_CS a_AT minimum_NN are_BER the_AT cost_NNS of_IN metering_VBG and_CC billing_NN along_RB with_IN whatever_WDT other_AP expense_NNS the_AT company_NN must_MD incur_VB in_IN taking_VBG on_RP another_DT consumer_NN ._. These_DTS minimum_JJ cost_NNS may_MD come_VB to_IN $1_NN per_IN month_NN ,_, more_AP or_CC le_AP ,_, for_IN residential_JJ and_CC small_JJ commercial_JJ customer_NNS ,_, although_CS they_PPSS are_BER substantially_QL high_JJR for_IN large_JJ industrial_JJ user_NNS ,_, who_WPS require_VB more_QL costly_JJ connection_NNS and_CC metering_VBG device_NNS ._. While_CS cost_NNS on_IN this_DT order_NN are_BER sometimes_RB separately_RB charged_VBN for_IN in_IN residential_JJ and_CC commercial_JJ rate_NNS ,_, in_IN the_AT form_NN of_IN a_AT mere_JJ ``_`` service_NN charge_NN ''_'' ,_, they_PPSS are_BER more_QL frequently_RB wholly_RB or_CC partly_RB covered_VBN by_IN a_AT minimum_JJ charge_NN which_WDT entitles_VBZ the_AT consumer_NN to_IN a_AT very_QL small_JJ amount_NN of_IN gas_NN or_CC electricity_NN with_IN no_AT further_AP payment_NN ._. But_CC the_AT really_QL controversial_JJ aspect_NN of_IN customer-cost_NN imputation_NN arises_VBZ because_RB of_IN the_AT cost_NN analyst's_NN$ frequent_JJ practice_NN of_IN including_VBG ,_, not_* just_RB those_DTS cost_NNS that_WPS can_MD be_BE definitely_RB earmarked_VBN a_CS incurred_VBN for_IN the_AT benefit_NN of_IN specific_JJ customer_NNS but_CC also_RB a_AT substantial_JJ fraction_NN of_IN the_AT annual_JJ maintenance_NN and_CC capital_NN cost_NNS of_IN the_AT secondary_JJ (_( low-voltage_NN )_) distribution_NN system_NN --_-- a_AT fraction_NN equal_JJ to_IN the_AT estimated_VBN annual_JJ cost_NNS of_IN a_AT hypothetical_JJ system_NN of_IN minimum_JJ capacity_NN ._. The_AT precondition_NNS of_IN sociology_NN have_HV remained_VBN largely_RB unexamined_JJ by_IN the_AT sociologist_NN ._. Like_CS primitive_JJ number_NNS in_IN mathematics_NN ,_, the_AT entire_JJ axiological_JJ framework_NN is_BEZ taken_VBN to_TO rest_VB upon_IN it_PP$ operational_JJ worth_NN ._. But_CC what_WDT is_BEZ the_AT operational_JJ worth_NN of_IN a_AT sociology_NN which_WDT mimetically_RB reproduces_VBZ the_AT idea_NN of_IN physical_JJ model_NNS ?_.
